1b1(rgyud): klon+da du/Amyamatsalany+tsA ma d+hA ra d+d+hi/rmong skad du/
1b2(rgyud): su
1b3(rgyud): 'phags pa mi ga ma pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/dkonamachog gi sum la phyeg
1b4(rgyud): mo lo//'di skad bdag gris thos pa rus gcig na/rdza bcom ldan 'ongs
2a1(rgyud): /'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /na mkha'i snying po
2a2(rgyud): dang /sa'i snying po dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /'jam dpal dang /snan ras ga
2a3(rgyud): dbang phyug dang /lag ni rdo rje dang /byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba' zhig dang ngo //de nas byang
2a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas po'i
2a5(rgyud): lha nga sa la btsugos te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam
2b1(rgyud): bu'i gling 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /sha za ma rungs pa dag gis mi nad dang /phyug sa nad dang /yams
2b2(rgyud): nad dang /rnam par 'tshe ba dang /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang /sdang ba dang /rmi lamya ngan pa dang /dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
2b3(rgyud): ser ba dang /sa g.yos pa la stsogasuM byung ste/de dag zhi bar mdzad de gsol zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das cing mi
2b4(rgyud): gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/sgra'i ba spu'i khung bu nus 'di zer mi lce ru
2b5(rgyud): tu 'bar ba byung ste/'dod pa dang /gzugs dang /gzugs med pa la thug pa me lce 'brir ba gcig tu gyur to//de'i
2b6(rgyud): tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lha mo dang /lcen dang /lhang nge ma yin te/lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lha me dang /lha ne dang /
3a1(rgyud): ltung ma ts+tshin+da no//klu rlung gnod sbyin da /shazlal sosmras pa rnams ni rlung drug /pas bdas pa'i shing bshAn
3a2(rgyud): no/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi de byings rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/mnyam
3a3(rgyud): phyag rgyub shig na ste nabs kyi pus mo la pordungs pas thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi phan pa'i sgra can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang ba ma
3a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa dag byung ste/thabs las byung ba'i khro bo'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas nas na mkha' me lus pa 'od kyis 'grangs
3a5(rgyud): pa'o//'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs po tshang sa pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /drag po chen po
3a6(rgyud): bzhi po dag ha hUM hri/zhes bya bas skrag par byed pa/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang ser sna dag 'joms pa/klu
3b1(rgyud): dang /gnod sbyin dang /sha za yi dgas la sogs pa haM maM zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to//gsung gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku n+dan
3b2(rgyud): zhabs phyed sa l-i pus mo dang mthe bong btsugs pa/zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khro bo brtan pa'i sku can/shes rab kyi bdag
3b3(rgyud): nyid ralo gri me 'od dang bcas pas 'od kyis 'gengs pa dag sprul to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi sngags
3b4(rgyud): smras pa de na maHsa man+ta badz+ra tAM/a tsa la ka nA na tsaN+Da many+dzu ro ShA Na/s+pho Ta ya hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika khan+da d+d+hiM mau hU~M ma~M zhes brjod de/phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa khu
3b5(rgyud): tshur bcangs te/srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs pa ni/ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/g.yas bskor du mtshams bcad do//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NI
3b6(rgyud): a tsu la ku na naM tsaN+Da mA hA ro Sha na/s+pho Ta ya hUM/a mr-i ta hUM hUM zhes brjod do//phyag rgya ni lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang ste/mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan
3b7(rgyud): pa ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ste/g.yas nas bskor lo bgegs bskyed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam por dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba
4a1(rgyud): dasrungs pa ni dmar po'i yi ger spyi bor bsam ste/rnam par dag dwa'i mi phye 'dis brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus me 'od dang
4a2(rgyud): bcas par sgom ste/na maHsaM man+ta badz+dzat+taM/a tsa la ka na tsIN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ka ti b+h+yaH/sarba bi ga te b+h+yAM/bi shr-i mu khe b+h+r-iHsarba ta thA gra tA hAM maM rAk+Sha zhes brjod/phyag/
4a3(rgyud): rgyu ni rdo rje thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar smin mtsham su bca' bor bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pa chen ngor
4a4(rgyud): srung ba bsrungs pa ni hU~M dang bzhi'i rnam pas bltas te/nu maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/a tsau la ka na tsan+da ma hA ro Sha Ni kA te b+h+yaHsarbaM bi ga te b+h+yo//bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
4a5(rgyud): tathA ga ta trI ma~M/r-ik+Sha mA hA bA le sarba ta thA br-i ta pre mi ninaHhUM hUM phaT T+Ta thu TA the/a pra ti ho tA~M swA hA zhes brjod/phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o thal mo
4a6(rgyud): skyur la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la bung mo rtse sprid/srin lag gnyis brkyang nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug lnga snying kar bcu sa twe srung ba ni yum gyi ste/
4a7(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren dang ma rungs pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyi 'byer bor 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pI ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs
4b1(rgyud): byate/kha zas kyi bye brag bzla' ba dang /bca' ba dang /bzhib pa dang /bang ba dang /bldag pa lnga sogs pa dang /gzugs dang /sku dang dri dang ro'i bye brag la byin
4b2(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa mdzad de/oM sarba d+har+m+ma tA si ta hUM zhes byas pas dag par byas te/oM a mr-i te oM hUM hrIHzhes bya bas ni 'drid pa'i don du'o//oM na moHsarba ta thA ga
4b3(rgyud): ta a pra lo ki te sam+b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya bse lan bdun 'dun btab ste bsngos pos tshim par 'gyur ro//phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan
4b4(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa/ljang por 'dod na sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//nA mo rat+na twA yA ya/na maHtsaN+Da badz+rI pA Na ye/na ma ba~Mdz+dza krodz+nyo ya/daMSh+To ta ka na b+hai ra wA ya/a sa~M
4b5(rgyud): mu sa la pa ra shu bA shA hAstA yA/tad+ya thA/oM a mr-i tI kuN+Da l-i kha kha khyA hi wIn+ti/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ban+d+ha dan+tAM/ha na ha na/gr-ih+Na grAt+taM/gar+dz+dza gaH/ba smai Ta ya/sarba
4b6(rgyud): g+h+nAM b+hin+na yakrA nAM ma hA ge Na pa tI d+hI bI ta an+ta ka ra na swAhA/zhes bya ba brjod do//lag pa gnyis khu tshur dri rjengasu la khwa nang du bston te mdzub mo sgreng li brang du sgroli la phyug
4b7(rgyud): rgya bcings te/gtor ma btang zhing 'chags pa'i dus su yang de bzhino//nye reg bya ba dang khrus bya ba ni rin po che'i bum par dri nam ngo'i tshul/na maHsa main+te badz+ran+tu/oM tsal
5a1(rgyud): ka na ya a mri ta zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste/lag pa g.yon pas bum pa bzung nas g.yas nga'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la/ri mo can
5a2(rgyud): gyi nang du a bsams la chu blugs te/oM shud+d+ha dun+te sho d+ha nA yai swA hA/zhes bya bas khrus bya'o//de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems
5a3(rgyud): dpa' byams pa la'o//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan
5a4(rgyud): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang /rnga dang /bdug spros dang /lha'i zhal zas dang /lha'i bu pho dang /bu mo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta
5a5(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang /mchod bI yo byad dag tu med pa dag kwi/rjes la mchod pa dang bskor ba rgya chen po dag byas te byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas byang
5a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' byams pa spro ba dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par
5a7(rgyud): gzhag ste/'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te dga' bar rtogs pa tsam mo//de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/rtse gcig pa'i rtog dpyod spang ste/
5b1(rgyud): /du dananam//bsam ba na u na sags sa/ma par ston na ste/rtog pa dang dpyod pa sgyu ba tu da bam mo//donas bsam gtan gsum pa nas ban par
5b2(rgyud): snying rje dang dga' ba dang /btang snyoms kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud skyel ba//de bzhin du chos thams cad ni ni mkha' lta mtha'i bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o//rnam
5b3(rgyud): /dz+nyAnatrA trA s+yAd+hA byA s+t+wa~Md+d+ha//zhes brjod d+ha/byAgaN+Do ni ga//lag pa gnyis so sa du chung bci sa te/min pong gnyis nang du m+bu la mdzub ma gas
5b4(rgyud): sbyang gas ma snang na gyu //su pacom ldan 'das kyis pa 'a/ smai
5b5(rgyud): bar byin dkyil 'khor la thugs kyis blon da kyi sbyirnam pa'i kun zhe skye par bsamasates tron de las chos thams cad tshig gis lAm deng grol ba zhes bya
5b6(rgyud): skya dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'bro spu dang bcas pa'o//de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdon 'das nas skyes pa'i dri ma med cing yongasu rgyas par cho
6a1(rgyud): bdag po'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba/'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du na mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig
6a2(rgyud): pa'o//na mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur te de dag las bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo
6a3(rgyud): chen po//rnam rtog thams cad yongasu bcom pa/dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o//de yang gzhan zhing sku'i sha rgyas pa ni dper na bus pa gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa'i
6a4(rgyud): lus lta bu ste/de'i sku mdog ni mthing nag tu gnas te/dper na dbyar gyi che ro spyan nag po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o//na mkha' ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gred
6a5(rgyud): pa ni/dper na rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no//dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni dper na shing a la ka'i 'bras bu bzhin no//sku cung zhig
6a6(rgyud): 'gying ba dang g.yo ba ni dper na dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'dus rtol bzhin no//zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa ni dper na gyad kyi 'gros bzhin no//spyan gsum shin
6a7(rgyud): tu dmar ba ni dper na bal sha'i me tog bzhin no//spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni snang 'og gi bgogs srog pa ste/dper na lha ma yin gyi bya gting ma zab bzhin//mche ba gcig
6b1(rgyud): pani/dper na zla ba phyed pa bzhin no//lcags shin tu 'khyug pa ni dper na na mkha'i klog bzhin no//smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni dper na shing 'drid sha'i lam bzhin no//phyag mas
6b2(rgyud): nA ral gri bsnams po ni dper na gza' che ni'i 'od ltung ba bzhin no//sbrul gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni dper na rgya mtsho'i 'ching bzhin no//de lta bu'i sku des ni tshangs pa dang /@
6b3(rgyud): byin dang rgyal po'i chen po bzhi po dag dang /phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams dbang du sdud pa lha dang klu ma rungs pa dang srin mo dang /sha za dang /grul bum dang /lto 'phye la sogs pa
6b4(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa dag go/de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NI/traT/a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/tra ma ya d+hu maM ya hUM/tra ta ha maM
6b5(rgyud): zhes brjod par bya'o//des ni 'tshe ba dang /rnam par 'tshe ba dang /sdang ba dang /rnam par sdang ba dang /log 'dren dang /rnam par log 'dren dang /srin po dang /lha dang /
6b6(rgyud): klu dang /grul bum dang /sha za la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro//rlung las gyur pa dang /'khris pa las gyur pa dang /bad kan las gyur pa dang /'bras dang /shu
6b7(rgyud): dang /g.yon pa dang /mdze dang /'brum bu dang /'brum bu phra mo dang /rims nyin gcig pa dang /nyin gnyis pa dang /zla ba phyed pa dang /ldang dub pa dang /yung
7a1(rgyud): tsam par rims dang /rtag pa'i dmyas las thar bar 'gyur//song gi dang /stag dang /dom dang /rnyed dang /s+yAng ki dang /sbrul dug can dang
7a2(rgyud): sbrang bu dang /sha sbrang dang /bung ba'i gnod pa las thar ro//rgyal po'i chad pa dang /dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las thar ro//rkun po dang /bran dang /bza' mi 'thab
7a3(rgyud): cing rjod pa las thar ro//chu yis 'jigs pa dang /me yis 'jigs pa dang /sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang /lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa las tha ro//ral gyi dang /
7a4(rgyud): shak+ti dang /dgra sta dang /mdung dang /mda' dang /mda' bo che dang /'khor lo dang /mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las tha ro//'chi ba dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba las
7a5(rgyud): thar ro//mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun dag par 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal ba dang /yi dgas dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /yul mtha' 'khob dang /
7a6(rgyud): dbang po ma tshang ba dang /lha tshe ring po dang /log par lta bar 'dzin pa dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba las mnyes pa med pa dag tu mi 'gyu ro//gzungs sngags 'di ni dus
7a7(rgyud): gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/lan cig brjod pas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyuraro//'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni chos nyid kyi lam rdorje
7b1(rgyud): lta bu rgyar bya nyid du thob par 'gyuraro//de nas rta bdun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa bsam te/byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir hUM ser
7b2(rgyud): po mig tu'o//srog gi lam du ni maM nag po bsam par bya'o//spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yi ge bsnams te sngags 'dri brjod par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rI prA Ni ts+tshaN+Da
7b3(rgyud): mahA ro Sha Na hU~M zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te/gung mo sgreng po'i rgyab tu mdzub mo cung zad dkug la/srin lag kyang de bzhin byas te/rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//'di'i byin gyis
7b4(rgyud): brlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa'o//gser la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye brag nas dang /'bras dang /gro dang /so ba dang
7b5(rgyud): til le sogs pa dang /zho dang /'o ma dang /sbrang rtsi dang /kha ra dang /gser dang /dngul dang /zangs dang /mu tig dang /byi ru dag blugs te/'bru gsum pa'i sngags
7b6(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//na maHsa man+tha ta thA ga twe b+h+yoHbi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM ung+ga ga te/s+pha ra Na i maM gA ga na khai nas brjod par bya'o//phyag
7b7(rgyud): rgyan mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//na maHsarba to thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya ba las 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o//de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod
8a1(rgyud): par bya//nas/sa/nA nanA/ sa nga rgyu mangs mam ma la/ /lam sbyor bas gsol ba nga na
8a2(rgyud): dam tshig gso'o//'phagos pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gnyis pa'o//@/de nas dang tshig na di yon te/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dunan
8a3(rgyud): 'bras bu dang /lam+b+ha dang /sgrub pa'i khyad par taM/gang nas bai rnams te khyad par gyis mchod cing nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya'o//tshang med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
8a4(rgyud): rgyu rtag tu sgom shing smon lam rgya chen por gdub par bya//sags d+ha /phyo d+hA dang /sngags dang /t+yag d+hA'i rten rnon tu bcod tha~Mng bral ma hU~M/m+b+ha dang /b+h+ra ma dang /
8a5(rgyud): myong chub kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang ngo //srog gis btus pa'i sems rten thams rtsod la byams pa dang /snying rje sngon du song bas gnod pa dang /rnam
8a6(rgyud): phyir 'tsho ba sbrengs te nAm yang dor bar mi bya'o//ser sna smras te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//sems can la gnong ba da /rnam par 'tsho ba sbyangs pa
8a7(rgyud): tshul khrims basbyin gyi'i//rang la rnam par 'tshe bra la bzed par bya'o//rang gnan gyi na sgrub bol btsun pa bar mi bya'o//rnam par g.yeng ba srungs te su /
8b1(rgyud): bAtAn+d+ha la mnyam par gzhag go/nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par don la ma yongs par bya'o//dam tshig med cing myi gnas pa la bsam gtan dang /tang /
8b2(rgyud): ngo 'dzin dang /sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa kun bsten cing bshad par mi bya'o//srog gcod pa dang /ma byon par len pa dang /'dod pa la byin ci log pa dang //brdzun tu
8b3(rgyud): smrasgra ba ni tshangs par spyod pa dang //spyod par 'dod pas spangs par bya'o//dge slong rnams dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /dam tshig dang ldan pa la gus par bya zhing brnyes
8b4(rgyud): bIr myi bya'o//thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o//khro ba dang po'i tshil du smra ba dang /lad ludangango /bshang gci 'dor ba dang /dri ma 'khru ba dong /skudang
8b5(rgyud): sen mo lnga sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang /dri nga ba dang /dri mi zhim pa bku zhing minam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o//khang pa ni spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong ba
8b6(rgyud): gtsang zhing dri ma med pa dag bkra shis pa'i sgro shAr du bstan pa/gseng skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa'im/bram ze'i khyim mamo/dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/
8b7(rgyud): khang ngam/ro bo'i rtsa 'am/bye skad sgrogs pa'i sa 'am/dgon pa 'am/bas mtha' 'am/spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus bskyang nul byas la/chu'i stan 'a
9a1(rgyud): te gnas par bya'o//khri la 'dug pa spang bar bya'o//zho dang /'o ma dang /ma dang /lang+tha dang /la ban dang /snum 'khur dang /'khur skya dang /'bras/
9a2(rgyud): dang /'bras zan la sogs pa dag bsrung ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o//sha dang chang dang /sgog pa la sogs pa dgu pa'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o//zla ba dang /
9a3(rgyud): skar ma dang /chos grangs la sogs pa ni yar gyi ngo dag la dkon mchog la gsol ba btab la bsgrub par bya'o//re ba dang /rnga ma dang /rtsub pa dag ni ma yin no//'dod
9a4(rgyud): pa'i don tu 'jam zhing gnas pa la ni 'gal ba med do//dus rtag tu yi dam la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir bya mos pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o//sprul pa'i khro
9a5(rgyud): bo rdo rje shugs can ni kha dog shin tu gnag pa ste/nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnom lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o//rdo rje chags chen ni mdog dmar po
9a6(rgyud): chags pa dang chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o//rdo rje rnon po ni ljang gu ste/'dzin cing yongasu 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid lcags rgyu 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje 'bar ba ni mdog
9a7(rgyud): dmar ba ste/mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'joms pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje'i grags 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje khro bo ni ser po ste/khro ba dang khro ba'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri 'bar ba bsnams sde
9b1(rgyud): rdo rje gtum chen ni mdog ljang nag ste/btang snyoms dang btang snyom su gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje thabs bdag ni du nga'i mdog can bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag
9b2(rgyud): nyid kyi rje rje bsnams pa'o//rdo rje stobs chen ni mthing kA ste/dman pa dang dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje rgyu'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/
9b3(rgyud): rten 'phrul dang rten cing 'brel byar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi btsun 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje rab 'byed ni sna tshogs phrin las kyi mdog can mtha' dang mtha' los grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi
9b4(rgyud): rdo rje rje gcig pa bsnams pa'o//de dag ni sa bcu'i bdag nyid can me 'bar ba'i sku las rab tu 'phye ba'o//'bigs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gsum pa la/
9b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la thun mong du de dag pa'i phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa/gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la
9b6(rgyud): maN+Dal mda' gang ba byas te/ba'i rnam lnga'i bskyang nul byas la/me tog sngon po dkram par bya'o//de nas bum pa gser ram/dngul lam/zangs las byas pa'i lhung
9b7(rgyud): bzad kyi tshang du byas te/der rin po che ga ser dang /dngul dang /zangs dang /byi ru dang /mu tig dang /rnam pa lnga gzhug par bya'o//sbrang rtsi dang /bur mo dang // ring
10a1(rgyud): zho dang /'o ma dang /mar rnams gzhug par bya'o//nus dang /'bras dang /sau ba dang /til dang /blo dang /cu rtsa rnams gzhug par bya'o//cu
10a2(rgyud): gang dang /gur gum dang /dza ti dang /sug mal dang /ka ko la dang /l-i shi rnams gzhug par bya'o//tsan dan dang /e ga ru dang /du ru ka dang /glo rtsi dang /
10a3(rgyud): spos dang /ga bur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyang gzhug par bya'o//mtsho dang /rdzing dang /steng kau dang /'bab chu dang /lu ma bkod pa rnams kyi chu yang blugs la ba
10a4(rgyud): la 'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas mgul pa bcings te gzhag par bya'o//dri dang //me tog dang /'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan byas te/dri dang spos
10a5(rgyud): dang /me tog dang /mar me dang /byugs pa dang /lha bshos dang //rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o//'byung po thams cad pa'o gtor ma yang cha bdun
10a6(rgyud): num lnga la sogs par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rINAM/A tsa la tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na/sarba big+h+nAM s+pho Ta ya/badz+ro d+hika khaD+ga d+hU zhes bya bas mtshams rnams bcings par bya/
10a7(rgyud): de bzhin du srung ba'i tshag rdzogs par bya ste/bum pa la gzungs kyi theg pa btags nas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yongasu bsgyur ba'i bum pa la brum zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha
10b1(rgyud): dog dang /tshad dang ldan pa'i bum pa'o//thugs kyis bon las byung bza bcom ldan 'das don du kho na nyid lngas mnyam par bzhugs pa/byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sa sa
10b2(rgyud): rgyas dang /'phags pa'i gang zug dang bcas pa gang na seng ge'i steng na sna tshogs pa'i gad ni pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o//chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa drug gis bcom
10b3(rgyud): ldan 'das snyam par bya'o//chos nyid dang /sems dang /sems kyi rnam pa dang /sgra dang /smre brnyan dang /gzugs dang /gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur
10b4(rgyud): me gdan pad+ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sde'i steng du bsam ste/thugs kyis bon las ram gri ma 'di dang bcas pas nam m+bA kun khebs pa'i//de las bdu chur gas
10b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsnams te/mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/oM AHb+h+rUM/prA ba ra s+yAta kA rA pra tIts+tshi hUM zhes brjod par byan/
10b6(rgyud): namAHsa man+ta bud+d+hAnAM/oM AHhUM/sarba daM ba tA a tsin N+ya a mr-i ta d+ha rA ya swAhA/zhes brjod par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hAn+ten+tu/oM ha ri b+haM ge b+h+r-in/sarba bId+yA d+ha rA
10b7(rgyud): pUdzi te swAhA/zhes brjod par bya'o//na maHsa min+ta bud+d+hAnA~M/oM AHb+h+rUM/d+harma d+hA tu a nu ga te d+b+ha bod+d+ha swA hA/zhes brjod parabya//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/oM A~MHts+tsha
11a1(rgyud): /maN+Da mo tri b+h+yo ga te puT+Te truM zhes brjod par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hAn+tu/oM AHb+h+rUM/sar+b+ba tad+hA ga ta a tsaM p+sA Na a d+hA ba dan d+hA na d+h+ya nir+ya a pan
11a2(rgyud): stu zhes brjod par bya'o//ni madz+nyAs mon+ta b+h+yar+d+hanA~M/oM b+h+yaHhU~M/ga ga na sa mA ya ts+tshin+d+he hU~M swAd+d+ha zhes kyi rjod par bya'o//nam/sa min+ta Tad+h+yanA~M/A dz+nyAr sa toSh+Tha ba twen
11a3(rgyud): d+hi b+hu dza na s+pha ra NI ye hU~M swAd+g+ha zhes brjod par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/a b+hisma ra ya~M/swe re Na i mAM ga ga no khaM/d+harma d+hA t+yA Ak+Sha shA yaM se man+t+ra ye/sarba tA thA gA tA ba
11a4(rgyud): ri shud+d+ha muN+Da le ma ma pA Ni d+hi pU dza na ma len d+harmA d+hA tu/a d+hiSh+ThA na pa tsi hUM swA hA zhes brjod do//rdo rje dang dril bu bsil bar bya'o//thal mo bkan laM/mdzub mo gnyis
11a5(rgyud): gung mo'i rgyob tu cung zhig bkug la sbyar/srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsngal la mthe bong cung zhig bkug pa ni yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o//sor mo rnams gung mo la brtan te
11a6(rgyud): cung zad bkug nas gung mo sgreng ba ni dro dug spos kyi phyag rgya'o//ser mo rnams phran tshun bsnol te nang du bcug nas/mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//
11a7(rgyud): mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor me rtse sprad de/lhag mo khu tshur bcangs pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o//mi 'jigs pa'i phyag lag na garon pas 'khrig ma bteg pa ni dri'i phyang rgyal
11b1(rgyud): tsa tu rgyu la/ShaT na ra~M Na/gats+tsha ya/gats+tsha pa/sarba /
11b2(rgyud): nan+dan/sarba shU nA/praSh+Te shA ya rkyen pa/maHts+tsha /kle kau su
12a1(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la las dang rnam par smin pa dang /'jigs pa dang /gnod pa dang /rnam par 'tshe ba dang /nad la sogs pa zhi
12a2(rgyud): bar dmigs te bzlas par bya'o//de nas gtong bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o//'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u ste
12a3(rgyud): bzhi pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa/shing bal shin tu dri ma med pa la bram ze 'am gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'i khrus
12a4(rgyud): byas te/dkon mchog gsum la gsol ba btab la brtag par bya'o//rigs ngan dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i ras dag ni spang bar bya'o//ras de gur gum dang gla rtsi
12a5(rgyud): dang a ga ru la sogs pa'i chus bkrus te dag par bya'o//de nas sngags 'di gro ga 'am ras la bris nas gdags par bya'o//a A i I u A ra rA la l-I e AM au
12a6(rgyud): IM aM aHka kha ga g+ha nga/tsa tsha dza dz+nye nya/Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ta tha da d+ha na/pa pha ba b+ha ma/ya ra la wa/sha Sha sa haHk+ShaHzhes bya ba bris te dgod par bya'o//de nas
12a7(rgyud): sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/s+pho Ta ya hUM/tra tha haM maM/oM bAkye daM na maHzhes bya ba las thams cad 'grub pa
12b1(rgyud): ste/gur gum dang tsan dan dang /glu rtsi'i tshul bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o//de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par byas te/bram ze'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o//tshon ni gser dang /da
12b2(rgyud): dang /zangs dang /lcags rang gis bri bar bya ba 'am/yang na kar rtsi dang /mtshal dang /ljong ros dang /bag+ma dang /spang ma dang /mthing shun dang /rgyu skyigs dang /
12b3(rgyud): sol dang /snag cha dang /de la sogs pa'i mtshon rnams la a kA ru dang /du ru ka dang tsin dan dang /glo R+Sha dang /rgya smos la sogs pa rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan
12b4(rgyud): bdun brjed de byi bar bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/tsa~MN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/tra thA haM me/bAkyaM hUM/oM AHbi ri hUM/khe tsa ra mr-i zhes brjod la bri bar bya ste/khyad
12b5(rgyud): par bzang po 'jom pa'i dusu tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dag pa la kha zas byin te spyan dbye bar bya'o//bri ba yang de bzhin te/spyan 'byed pa'i dusu sngags 'dri brjod do//
12b6(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nA/tsiN+Da ma hA ri Sha Na s+pho Ta ye hUM/tra thA haM maM/ga gau na bA rak+Shi Na/ku ru NA ma ya/sarba ta thA ga ta tsak+ShaHaM AHhUM swA hA zhes sbrang rtsi gser gyi thur ma la
12b7(rgyud): byugs la lan gsum du byugs par bya'o//bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongasu zin pa dang /'dri mkhan la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/gser ram/dngul lam/
13a1(rgyud): zangs sam/ra'am/rdo ba dag las byed na yang de bzhin du bya'o//gzugs dang sku'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin dang rang bzhin ma yin pas khyad par tha
13a2(rgyud): da pa dag tu bya ste/rang bzhin dang ldan pa la bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni yongasu bsgyur nas byin gyis brlabs par bya'o//de nas khyad par bzang po'i dus
13a3(rgyud): su khang pa de'i rnam lngas byug par byas te/ras ris dang /thong ka dang /po ti dang /glegs bam la sogs pa myaN+Dal gyi steng du bzhug su gsol to//spos dang /me tog
13a4(rgyud): dang mar me dang /dri dang /lha bshos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa bshams te/gtor ma yang de bzhin du'o//gdugs dang //rgyal mtshan
13a5(rgyud): dang /ba da na dang bla ro la sogs pa yang bri bar bya'o//dwe nas khro bo'i sku dang ldan pas sngags brjod par bya ste/na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/a mo g+ha e hi/a pra tI
13a6(rgyud): ha ta a tsa la tse ta e naM ta ka NAM/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ti tsu ru tsu ru/tA dI tA dwe/ta Ta ta Ta/bIg+h+nAM g+ha ta yA/mA ra ya/khA da ya/s+pho Ta ya/sa taM tsa me/a nu ban+d+ha ya/a d+h+waM
13a7(rgyud): ku ru/a d+ha ha d+ha ta naM kra/ka ta ka ta/ma ti ma ta/hai haM maM maM/i taM ba la e hi ma hA nu ni bi she na/nan+da nen+na/a bai sha ya a be sha ya/a tse le tsi ha/ta Ta tawau//
13b1(rgyud): dam da ma/phaT phaT/zhes 'bum brjod par bya ste/lha'i sku gnyis la ni bye ba'o//zhi ba ni sprul pa'i sku ste/sngon du ni de bzhin shes par bya'o//A ga ru dang du ru ka dang /can
13b2(rgyud): dan dang /ga bur dang /gla rtsi dang /rgya spos kyi tshul/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na maHshAkya mu naM e/ta thA ga te b+h+yaHartad b+h+yaHsamyakraM bud+d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/mu ne
13b3(rgyud): mu ne ma hA mu ne/oM dza ya dze ye/bAkyaM sha sAhA/oM bAkye baM dza ya/oM bAkye niSh+Te ye/oM bAkye nam/oM b+hAkyaM daM na maHoM AHhU~M haM maM zhes bya bas sku khrus bya'o//
13b4(rgyud): de nas rol mi bsngags par bya'o//rjes la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha/ts+tsha ma~M/oM A d+hA n+ya tra pan nai tAta ba b+ha stor su Thi shudad+d+ha/d+hur+m+mad+b+haH
13b5(rgyud): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o//de nas mchod pa dpag tu med pas mchod do//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig tu brjod pa
13b6(rgyud): gzungs sngag so//na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kAn+taM/sar+b+ba tathA ga tA ne tsat+ta tsaN+Da bi la ba la/ba d+hU ba dz+ra/shAn+te shAn+te/ts+tsha la ha la/ba ra ba la/ma rU Na ma rA Na badz+rad la s+pho Ta me/li ti/
13b7(rgyud): ta shi kha re/sa man+ta bar+N+Na Nidz+dzar+thaM d+hIH/na mo stu taM/a ma g+ha tsiN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa sa~M ra Sha ra Na ta hU~M la badz+ra s+phoT/mai swA hA/na mas+t+rai ya d+hI kA nAM ta thA ga tA nAM sarba tra a pra tiH/
14a1(rgyud): ta brAp+tA d+harma tA ba lAn+taM/a a sa ma sa man+ta to a nAM ta tra bAp+ti shA sa ni/ha ra ha ra/sma ra sma ra Na/bi ka tA rA gA/bud d+ha d+hAr+m+ma te/su ra sa rA/sa ma ba lA/
14a2(rgyud): ha sa ha sa/tra ya tra ya/gaM gau na me hU ba re lak+Sha Ne dz+wa la dzA la na sAM ga re swA hA/ne maHsa man+ta bud d+ha ya/na miHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/oM a ra dze/bi ra dze/ma hA
14a3(rgyud): bi ra dze/swa ra te swa ra te/tra yi tra yi/bi d+ha mi na/saM b+haM dza ni ra ma ti sid+d+ha a tr-i traM swA hA/zhes brjod do//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang
14a4(rgyud): thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs te/lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang sngags dang /phyag rgya thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
14a5(rgyud): dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'dis lha dang /sngags dang phyag rgya bcings pa rnams nus pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro//lha dang /sngags dang /phyag rgya rnams kyis
14a6(rgyud): ltas dang mtshan ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro//srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gzungs 'di rjesu brjod par bya'o//de bzhin ga
14a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i khrus 'di la brtson par bya'o//na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/tad+ya thA/oM au ho shud+d+he shud+d+ha ma ho shud+d+ho shud+d+he/raM to aM shud+d+he
14b1(rgyud): shruSh+Ta/a thu ma hA Ad+d+hi shwad+d+he shud+d+he sa m+b+ha ga s+yAt+ma zhes brjo dad//'dun do zhon gshogs pa thams cad kyang mchog gsum d+has d+ha/tshul sngags bzlas nas
14b2(rgyud): khrus byas na drag pakun 'dag par 'gyur//rmi lam ngan pa dang /rgyus ngan pa de mtshan ma ngan pa dang /dus ma yin pad+ma 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur//r-im+b+has dang
14b3(rgyud): 'brum bu dang /lha gor dang /'bras dang /shu ba dang /'go ba'i nad dang /'tshe ba las thar bar 'gyuraro//'phags pa myi g.yo ba'i gzungs las l-iT ste lta ba'o//
14b4(rgyud): deni sa bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin pa dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa tshar gi cod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyur kho
14b5(rgyud): mo'aM rnam pa gsungs pa/dang po chos kyi daSh+Tis kyi rang bzhin gyi me'i rnam btsun gyi na mkha'o//rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu bya dan rten ma lus byung ba'o//
14b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gangs ltar dkar byA'i zlus pa com pa can+da dam so//sna'i dkyil lho po rig ser gyi mngagacan b+h+r-i ba ni rdo rje can+da lam lngas byung //de'i snying ri rab chen po sna dz+nyAn
14b7(rgyud): las grub pa'i tshang dang ldan pa oM las byung ba'o//mi'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa re las//de'i nang du brum kha dge sna chags byung ba'i
15a1(rgyud): bu brtsegs pa/gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang bcas pa'i rin po che sna lU las grub pa ni shol dang /bai DUr+ya dang /byi ru dang /in+d+ra nI la dang /grasar las
15a2(rgyud): grub pa'o//de'i nang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma mnga'i ma brgyad pa'i gdan no//shar gyi mda'i ma ne shel las grub pa'o//rtswa'i madrab ma ni bai DUr+ya las grub pa'o//nub kyi mdab ma
15a3(rgyud): ni byi ru las grub pa'o//byang gi mngabi ma ne in+d+ra nAM la lpa grub pa'o//mtshams rnams kyang shal dang /bai DUr+ya dang /byi ru dang /in+ne nI yaM las grub pa'o//dbu su
15a4(rgyud): ni tshogs bdag glang sna'i stong du sna tshogs pa'i 'dam skyes dnganyi ma'i gdan no//shar du brgya byin/lhor lha chen po//nub tu khyab 'jug byung du thig bzungs ris/
15a5(rgyud): shar lho mtsham su tshangs pa/lho nub mtsham su gzhon nu/nub byang du dga' byed/byang shar du kun rgyal ba ste/lha chen po brgyad kyi steng du/pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan no//
15a6(rgyud): yi ge raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang /maM les byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ma dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi g.yo ba namapa'i
15a7(rgyud): mdog can/nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phyag g.yas na ral
15b1(rgyud): gri bsnams pa/g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa/phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o//shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi go tsamA las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma
15b2(rgyud): tsam dang ldan pa las/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can byi mi g.yo ba/shes rab kyi mdog can nyi ma'i snying po las pus mos reg cing bzhugs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang
15b3(rgyud): stoldan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'grengs pa/phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/g.yon pa na klu nor rgyus bsnams pa/phu phru zhes bya ba'i sgra
15b4(rgyud): 'odon pa'o//lhor bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs yi ge d+ha las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma d+he dang ldan pa las/bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag
15b5(rgyud): 'di me g.yo ba/bai DUr+ya'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das na ma' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phyag
15b6(rgyud): g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o//phru phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa/nub tu bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs yi ge maM las byung bar
15b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi mtshan ma me dang ldan pa las/bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi gamo ba bye ru'i mdog can/nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa
16a1(rgyud): rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gongs pa/g.yas na ral bri snams pa/g.yon na klu chu lha bsnams pa
16a2(rgyud): phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o//byang du bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs yi ge haM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma haM dang ldan pa las/bcom ldan 'das las kyi
16a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba in+d+ra ni la'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la dbus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das na mkha'
16a4(rgyud): ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa//g.yon na klu rigs ldan bsnams pa/phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa/shar lho mtsham su raM las
16a5(rgyud): byung ba'i tri shU la raM gyis mtshan pa dang /ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba g.yas kyi dang po nai tri shU la/g.yon gyi dang po na klu mtha'
16a6(rgyud): sa kyi bu/g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o//lho nub mtsham sukhaM las byung ba'i dbyug tho Shau gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gracig phyag bzhi
16a7(rgyud): nga'i gshon rje'i gshed ngo bai DUr+ya mdog can g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje'i dbyug ze//g.yon gyi dang po na klu dga' bo'i snam so//g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma gnyis na mo thob phu
16b1(rgyud): bsnams pa/nub byung mtsham sa Na las byung ba'o khyA T+wA~M g+haN+Da'-i mtshan po dang ldan pa bzhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i rta mgrin byora'i mdog can/g.yas kyi dang pon khan+ta ga
16b2(rgyud): gsun gyi drang pon klu pad+ma chen po bsnams pa/g.yas gsan gyi 'og man lcags sgrogs bsnams pa'o//byang shar mchim su hUM las byung ba'i be tsin hUM gis mtshan pa dang ldan
16b3(rgyud): nga'i zhal cig phyag ngozhi pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/g.yas dang po na bcon/g.yon gyi dang po na klu stobs kyi rgyu bsnams pa/g.yas g.yon gyi nyam
16b4(rgyud): gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o//shar lho'i gru tshid la lha mo bdug pa ma mdog mthing ka spos por 'dzin pa dang ldan pa/lho nub tu lha ma me tog ma mdog dkar mo me tog 'dzin
16b5(rgyud): ba dang ldan pa'o//nub byung du lha mo mar me ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa/byang shar du lha mo de cheb ma ljang ku dri chubasnams pa'o//de dag ni gzhonu lang tsho la bab pa/mdzes
16b6(rgyud): pa'i tshul can hUM las bskyed par bya'o//shar phyog su lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar po lcags kyu bsnams pa ste/lho phyogasu lham gser bye mdog can zhags pa 'dzin
16b7(rgyud): pa'o//nub phyog su lha mdo mar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o//byang phyog su lha mo ldeng ku dril bu 'dzin de'o//de dag ni rlung zhig khris de'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya//
17a1(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las yongasu gnas par bsgom par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par brjod pa'i gzungs 'di gsungs so//
17a2(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/oM tsiN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM/trai laukya bi dza ya hUM phaT/na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM a kro d+he ka ya mAM ta ka hUM phaT/na maHsa man+ta
17a3(rgyud): badz+rA NAM/badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba/tu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/na maHsa man+ta badz+rI NAM/tra tha a mo g+ha a mra ti kuN+Da li hUM phaT/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hAn+tu/tra tha badz+ra/a tsa la tse ta
17a4(rgyud): da taM de ha hUM phaT/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/trA the rat+na a tsa la pa tsi hUM phaT/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/trA tha pad+ma a tsa la tsa la bin d+h+waM hUM phaT/na maHsa man+ta bud
17a5(rgyud): d+hA nAM/tra thaM a mo g+ha karma a tse laM ha na haM ne/hUM phaT/zhes bya ba gsungs te/lha dang lha ma yin dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /lha dang klu dang /ma
17a6(rgyud): rungs pa dang /sdang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdig pa dman pa'i las rnams 'dag par 'gyur ro//'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u drug pa'o///
17a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/tseN+Da mahA ro Sha Na a tsi la ka na/tsiN+De tsaN+Da/na ta na ta/matra
17b1(rgyud): /sa twA na/1/rgyun tu d+hAnatA nA/ hA/tsad+d+ha / stan ra/!smra/rgyas sa nas tas/ da/
17b2(rgyud): !/banat+ta bon d+d+ha/d+hAnaN+Dan/ti/A \u0f7f sha sa a sha ya/madz+dzama?n+d+ha pa laka/dun dun/ ti ni/kha da khang sa rbadr-ib+h+yAM/mA ra sastAr yaM/
17b3(rgyud): pa ya/mab+d+ha sat+te// n+te/nA/tAnat+ta/d+ha ta ya/ /
17b4(rgyud): Ta yad+g+ha dza ma ya ma ya b+h+yarmAT+Ta tI moM/yi ba'i rdzas mo snet+ma/nAmaHsa man+ta d+ha/ma d+h+ye duH/ d+d+ha/ sa sh+mi hU~M
18a1(rgyud): man+tat+pa//nar+thA ba la/(r+N+NarAHD+hA/a du/d+hAr+Na/sung ts+tshad+ha dz+dza/apyAtIt+tAt+te be le b+h+yo na mo dza la yat+mat+ta/yan+taha sa na maH
18a2(rgyud): swA//zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'jam+bu gling na gnas pa'i lha dang /lha ma yin dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin pa dang /mau 'am ci dang /skyo 'phrul sogs pa thams
18a3(rgyud): cid sreg cings la 'gyel bar gyur to//de nas cho ga gsungs//lcags sde lnga la sa byis pa'i ram gri khru tshong gsum pa byas te/sngabs kyi phreng ba mi haM zhes bya ba bkod
18a4(rgyud): la/khru dro dang ldan pa'i spos kyis maN+Dal byas te/mchod pa'i rjes dang ldan pa'i dra dranago ste/gzungs sngags 'di khri brag du brjod cing bzlas na ral grin mkha' la 'a
18a5(rgyud): par 'gyur//ri nas gsul su gas na dadrug zas pa kyi shing yang dum bu rjem bur gcod par 'gyur /g.yul las rgyal bar byed do//lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i
18a6(rgyud): bzed byas te/mye hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge bad de/gser dang /dngul dang /zangs las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /dpal bo'u dang /
18a7(rgyud): /'khor lo dang /nyadang /drung gis su 'khyil pa rnams dang /byi r+ya bcug pa'om/yang na zas li byi ru bcu gapar byas la gzungs sngags 'ji gas
18b1(rgyud): ras la bris te/khong pa 'am mgul du btags nas gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lhung bzed na mkha' la 'phags te/gsol ba btab na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste/sngon
18b2(rgyud): ba'i shing bzhin no//na mkha'i tI to'i lde dang /'ug pa'i mig dang /ga nyis cha mnyam pa dang /lcags sna gsum gyi phye ma la khwa ta'i khrag gis ril bu bdun nim nyi shu
18b3(rgyud): gcig byas te/thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags he maM zhes bya bas pad+ma la bskor te/gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+ma na mkha' la 'phags te/de mi
18b4(rgyud): dbugs dang bral ma thag tu snying gi khrag rlangs dang sbyar te/mig ni snang byed du bsam zhing ril gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na thams cad mthong zhing thos la/khar
18b5(rgyud): bcug na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyu ro//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/sar+b+ba tathA ga ta bya ba lo kau ta/dzaM ya dza ya/bAkye dam ni wa ni tsak+Shu ra bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/rnga lpags la bya
18b6(rgyud): rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas mnyes te/lham byas la/haM dang mi rang gi rkang 'brel la dris te/gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lham na mkha'i la 'phags te/rkang pa la byA rgod kyi
18b7(rgyud): tshil bu byugs nas gon me gar 'dod par phyin no//na maHsa man+ta dud d+hanA~M/oM bruM ma dA ya pra ta swA tAM/zhes bya bas na mkha' la 'gro zhing 'phags te/bya rgod bzhin du'o//skye ba
19a1(rgyud): bdun pa'i sha dang /bya rgod kyi sha dang /rtsangs pa'i sha dang /sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la 'dogu byas te/gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs
19a2(rgyud): nas ram nye ba dang nye'u shid pa dang /bra ma ko ra'i mar dang sbyar ba'i 'degu rnams nang re la srang ro cha sbrang rtsi dang /ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste/zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na
19a3(rgyud): namakha' la thogs pa medo//rta nag po'i mig gnyis kar po 'am/byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar ba'am/pha bang dkaro bo rnams mi mngal nas skra dkar po'i srog chags la ma
19a4(rgyud): bya'i chu 'khar phor du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas te blud la/de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar gton pa grib ma la bskams nas ma rul ba'i phye ma la sngags 'di btab
19a5(rgyud): te/g.yas g.yon ma nor bar byugs na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyu ro//'phags pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyuraro//mon spros dang /gi bang dang /stag ma'i shun pa dang
19a6(rgyud): nya khris dang /ru ta dang /phug ron gyi mig dang /lho dang /go ro tsa na dang /rtug pa rnams la ril bu byas te/khams pa'i ga'ur ril bu re re la gzungs sngags haM maM
19a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba brjod de/ga'u na mkha' la 'phags nas/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/na maHyaM na ma hA ri bi ni nat+ti dIHzhes lan bdun btab nas byin na gang 'dod pa
19b1(rgyud): dang du d+hAr//bya rgad dang /byu ga dang /ud+hA /ga dang /sgyu klo du/rgyu dang / rnams ma n+do dang /sbyor po dang /bram sa so/lta ba la gargya
19b2(rgyud): sngas zlas te/sprob pa sa na dus ma yin ci'i sngon dung/ra dag la kat+tA d+han+te sbyin rnams 'alo bzhi sa /'dri thag la sogs pazhi par gyur/
19b3(rgyud): gcan za na thams dang /sha zi thams cad dang /khyi dang /phag dad/ma'i rtog pa dang /gu zhul dang myur/rdung pas 'dugs na dmakun 'dum pa
19b4(rgyud): 'phags pa mig yo pa'i gzungs las la du bdun pa'o///AHd+himA re AHd+hU T+Ta/rnaMm ston 'di ni sdigs kyi rmyil ba ste/len cig brjo
19b5(rgyud): d+ya dzumA nu'i grong gi lha dang /klu dang gni sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi ba 'gyuraro//rims nyan gi cin pa dang /zla'i byung ba dang /zla ba gcig d+hA dang /ljang drub pa dang /
19b6(rgyud): rtag pa'i rims dang /yud tsam+b+ha pa~M las gyur//'brum bu dang /g+ha gor dang /shu ba dang /maM dpal dang /g.yon pa dag zhi bar 'gyuraro//lan cog brjod pas
19b7(rgyud): kyang /mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig bzhi par 'gyuraro//rig byed tshig gi dang po dang /gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni//gsum pa dag ni lnga par ldan//bzhipa
20a1(rgyud): yI ni bzhi pa dang //lnga pa dag gi lta ba'o//uSh+ma'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa ni//oM yis mtshan pa bI bya ste//uSh+ma rnams
20a2(rgyud): kyi gnyis pa dang //bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang //uSh+ma yi ge bzhi pa la//u yis rgyan cing thig ler bcas pa'o//sde tshan lnga pa dag gi ni//dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang //
20a3(rgyud): bzhi pa dang por bcas pa ni snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag go/'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te/khyi nag po'i thod pa'i nang du bcug la/gzungs sngags
20a4(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/nyungs kar gyis brabs par bya'o//de nas klu yod pa'i gnasu khyer la rang gi lus la glo rtsis byugs te/chu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzung
20a5(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na maHsh+tsaN+Da mat+tA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/na mo b+ha ga ta~M bud d+hA b+hA rI ya/tad+ya thA/phuT phu Ta/d+ha ra b+ha ra/mi li mi li/hUM hUM phaT
20a6(rgyud): phaT/phyag rgyu ni sor mo rnams brkyang ste/mthe'u chung bkug la mthe bos mnan te bskor bar bya'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+rA kro d+ha ta ya grI ba na mi mi li tsi l-i d+hA/
20a7(rgyud): bAn d+ha yo/kr-i d+hA ya/badz+ral mo yaM/ma ka na ya~M/oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/pradz+wa la pra dz+wa la/s+phun+da s+phuT/sarba nAM ga ban d+ha ban d+ha/nAM ga na~M sa ra sa ra/bi sa ra sarba dudz+dza dza da/
20b1(rgyud): k+Sha/rgyu ga / gnyis gosas te//skyon du/sats+tsha ba rgyu grol la 'dzub mags smosamanananas rlung gtas ga shobs skang la chu ma
20b2(rgyud): dang ma nyis ga gathos te skye bor ban nas/sngags lan 'dun rjod 'a bar gyi//blagu dang / nga ni dang dang/1ma
20b3(rgyud): pa dang /sgog skye dang /shu dag rnams sbyar te lus la byugs nas rdzas kyis srung ba'o//rgyu sol gyi mi la bsregs te bdugs na ser ba dang /dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams ni
20b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyuraro//zho dang /'o ma dang /mar dang /sbrang rje dang /shu ra ma dang /kha raM dang /'bras yos dang /dung dang /mchil dang /
20b5(rgyud): rgyamatsho'i sA la sogs pa dag la bar gnong du thugs tAM/yungs ka rA lag rdzas sngags 'di brjod cing /klu mchod par bya'o//na mo t+na trA yA ya/ni ma sh+tsad+d+ha badz+rI krong+ga
20b6(rgyud): \u0f7f/oM An+tan+tak+Sha/tAk+Sha/khA ThA la~M thAs+'u kIn+da d+d+ha/oM ga tA la ts+tshe ha~M/kan rjes zhes brjod pos klu rnams pade bdeng ldan par 'gyur/
20b7(rgyud): par 'dod na dri zhim do'i chus maN+Dal byas te/sgra tshil la klu'i gzugs sor mo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas maN+Dal gyi steng du me tog gtor la gzungs thag btags te 'inag par bya'o//
21a1(rgyud): snying khar gong gi de gro ga la gi'u wang gis dris la bzhugs par byas/nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po se ru yi lcug mas khyab par byas nas gzungs
21a2(rgyud): 'di brjod par bya'o//oM suM su pA ti badz+ra dun+te mi li mo le ba ri sha ye/ba ri sha ya swA t+ma/zhes brjod de/rang bsrung bar gnas par bya'i//gal te klu rnams kyis tshar mi
21a3(rgyud): 'bebs na klu rnam mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyuraro//spos kyi maN+Dal byis te/rgya spos kyi me la gzugs bsro zhing gzungs sngags brjod pa ni spogs pa'i tshe
21a4(rgyud): ga'o//dri zhim po'i me la bu ram dang /sbrang rtsi dang /kha ra dang /til la sogs pa'o dgang blugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ste/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM
21a5(rgyud): shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o//'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs le'u brgyad pa'o////de nas 'dam skyes pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i 'dab
21a6(rgyud): ma tsan gyi steng du a las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor/de'i steng du muM gi sa bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma muM dang ldan pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal
21a7(rgyud): mgon po'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bur/gser btso ma'am gur gum gyi kha dog 'dra ba/zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
21b1(rgyud): gis bzhugs pa la phyag g.yas pa na ral gri na mkha' la 'phyar ba/g.yon pas pu tI thugs kar 'dzin pa'o//shar gyi pad+ma'i mda' ma la/'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha ba la
21b2(rgyud): gur gum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gtsog phyag gnyis pa/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/phyag g.yas pa na ral grin mkha' la 'phyar ba/gAyon pa na ud
21b3(rgyud): pA la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kha na 'dzin pa'o//lho'i pad+ma la 'jam dpol gsung gi dbang phyug sku mdog mthing ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
21b4(rgyud): gis bzhugs pa/phyag g.yas pa na ral grin mkha' la 'phyar ba/g.yon pa na 'khor lo thugs kha na 'dzin pa'o//nub kyi pad+ma la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog byi ru bcag
21b5(rgyud): pa lta bu/zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag gnyis na ut+pal gnyis bsnams pa'o//byang gi pad+ma'i mdab ma la 'jam dpal
21b6(rgyud): shes rab ral gri/sku mdog ljang ku la zhal gcig phyog bzhi pa/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral grin mkha' la 'phyar ga g.yon
21b7(rgyud): kyi dang po na ut+pa la sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kar 'dzin pa'o//g.yas kyi 'og ma na mda' 'dzin pa/g.yon gyi 'og ma na rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o//sku de dag ni ma reg
22a1(rgyud): de mun pa thams pasngal pa' malus pa'i 'od kyis 'chos 'brug//oM d+ham ston po byar du nas brjod su sa ba ltang da
22a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang ya pa zungs ra gyur//rin po rgya'i rnam padun nga drung /rdar bum /nr-i da gA d-i dang / segs badrin
22a3(rgyud): rgyarmugs te/nam san+nat+kar+dz+dza ki t+te/b+hUHa dab+h+r-idz+dza swAHkr-i ru d+d+henA~M/oM um+b+ha na sa/hU~M gnas A hrIn+d+ha5/
22a4(rgyud): main+taye b+h+yo/des gzungs sprugs 'di bum pa'i tshul lan bdun brjo du/khrus+ya sa na sdig pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/dbyung po na zhing zos pa 'dzin par
22a5(rgyud): 'gyur//nam-i sar+b+ba skri ka m+me/ar+had d+d+haHsam+b+ha kr-i bud d+hA me/ni mos /de d+hi satwA sA/mar+d+ha satwA sa/Sh+Tha/oMmad+hirmA5/ta na ta na/
22b1(rgyud): sAd+hA nau/na maHso bo d+hA na/pr-i ShAM sha ya/lo hu ta le hu ta/kr-i ta kr-ita/p+la ban d+ha pra ban d+ha/a de shwa/a bo sha ya/ho mau sarba br-in+tha/d+hu hUM phaT ya swAt+ma/zhes bya dus
22b2(rgyud): nad pa la 'bras kyi snye ma 'am/til btab ste khrus bya'o//gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas/las dang nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal les thar bar 'gyu ro//
22b3(rgyud): kar ri shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na yong zhi bar 'gyur ro//ral gri la btab ga rul du zhugs na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro//smyung ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du
22b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o//gro ga 'am rAl bris te//sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la btags par bya'o//skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste/
22b5(rgyud): mdud pa byas la srid kyis gdungs pa la btags te/'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am/bu mo dag sbyang bas 'dug ste/yi dam du 'don na lha dang
22b6(rgyud): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /sha za la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //gza' dang /rgyu skar dang /lce 'bab pa dang /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag las grol bar 'gyur//
22b7(rgyud): stag dang /dom dang /dred la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang /rlung dang /ser ba dang /dus ma yin pa'i sa g.yo ba rnams zhi bar 'gyuraro//yid gzhungs shing
23a1(rgyud): thos pa 'dzin pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyong ba la gzhol bar 'gyuraro//'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur
23a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis 'di lan cig gam/lan gsum mam/bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par byed na de'i lus la mdze dang //
23a3(rgyud): phol mig dang /'bras dang /shu ba dang /g.yan pa dang /lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /mig dang rna ba'i dang /so na ba la sogs pa dag mi 'byung ngo //zhes gsungs//
23a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/rnam par thar pa'i sgro kun nas 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/sems can dmyal ba dang /
23a5(rgyud): yi dgas dang /dud 'ge dang /gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jig rten du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /bathob bral dang /
23a6(rgyud): dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i gnas man chad khyab par mdzad do//bsam gtan dang po'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag/bsam
23a7(rgyud): gtan dang po nas langs te/bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag/gnyis pa las langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag/gsum pa las langs
23b1(rgyud): nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag/bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas na mkha' mtho' yas skye mchod la mnyam par gzhag/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lnga
23b2(rgyud): langs nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las longs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ci
23b3(rgyud): yang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yod min med min skye mched la mnyam par gzhag/de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag/de nas bcom
23b4(rgyud): ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /na mkha'i snying po dang /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /'jam dpal dang /spyan ras
23b5(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang phyag na rdo rje dang /byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o//lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'amo tsa dang /
23b6(rgyud): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa mo g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u dgu pa'o///
23b7(rgyud): 'phags pa me g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang ngos bsgyur cing zhuste brtan la @
24a1(rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yA badz+ra krod+hA rA dzA ka lA la b+hU tan+da nA ma/bod skad du/'phags pa rdo rje sgo za rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba//dpal 'jam pa
24a2(rgyud): dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi na mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying por byin gyis
24a3(rgyud): brlabs pa'i steng du rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor ba'i dbus su dpag tshad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma
24a4(rgyud): shin tu mtho ba/kun kyang rin po che du ma'i khri pad+ma dang seng ges mtho ba dbu rtse rin po che du ma'i khri pad+ma dang seng ges mtho ba dbu rtswa rin po che zur mangs kyi mchod rten pad+ma/
24a5(rgyud): 'khor lo dang /gdugs mtho bar dwangs pa la dar gyi sbyangs lding ba/de'i grib ma sa gzhi la bkod pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i gzhon pa las babs
24a6(rgyud): nas nang du gshegs pa/sna tshogs dril bu dang /ba don dang rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /dra ba dang /dra ba phyed pa dang /rnga yab dang /zla ba phyed pa dang /rdo rje
24a7(rgyud): byed pa dang /chu 'phyang shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes pa/sgo khyad khyams dang /sgo glegs dang /rin po che'i me long dang /gdugs la sogs pa du mas
24b1(rgyud): /rin po che'i phyagu 'atsugs te mdzes par byas pa du ma de thams cad dbus su 'khor gyod dkyil 'khor chen po dang snyan rtog tu bzhugaso//de yang 'a lta ste/byang chub
24b2(rgyud): sems pa'i tshigs ni stegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyang b+hag+sa dang /la mdo la dang /sma nga byams pa dang / pa thams cad rnam pa solo bya /
24b3(rgyud): zhi ba'i blogs dang /sna tshogs dkris pa dang /mahA 'ad sa tog 'chad pa dang /rnam pa'i snyeng po dang /gzugs mdzes dgu pa dang /sku'i steng rje dang /byusman rdo
24b4(rgyud): sogs pa byung chub ste ma sna dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba drug bdun dang /shA ri'i bu dang /mdzo sa dang/'od skye la sogs pa bye b+ha pani dang /sa
24b5(rgyud): chen sman po chen po brgya byin da /tshangs pa dang /khyob 'dreg da /dang sbyind/lus 'an pa dang shin rje dang /dgo' rab dbang phyug lo sogs pa 'i
24b6(rgyud): snam brgya dang ldan cig ts+tsha chos kyi rnam byungs gseng sngags zhes bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'/nyin thos dang /'jig rte sbyong ba la sogs pa na
24b7(rgyud): bcu mdo ldan pa'i 'khor rnams mi dgongs pa thad da kyibasam po dang 'thun pa tshon pa skyed pa dbye/che tshul du ma bskyed /'di zer dum 'gyod kyi
25a1(rgyud): gcig tu bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum bzhin du 'khor la gzigs nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram te/byang chub sems dpa' sems
25a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/yi ge ming tshig dag go sgos//sngags dbyibs chosu byin rlabs kyis//yi ge sgra tsam phyed dam gcig/mngon sum rjes 'jug
25a3(rgyud): ring thung dang //dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshon mas mtshan//sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu bdag/dbang bcu don bcu rnam pa bcu//mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres chos//
25a4(rgyud): byams dang thugs rje chen po dag/dbyangs gcig gis ni sngagasu gyis//sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab zhi dang //yid 'phrog dpal 'byor dbang phyug dang //mthu stobs du
25a5(rgyud): mi bskyed pa dang //rtag gnas thob dang don nges thob//rdo rje bla na med sems bskyed//mdor na gang gis gang 'dod pa//bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs pa'i phyir//
25a6(rgyud): rdo rje blo na med pa gser//cho su bla na med pa sgrogs//'khor lo bla na med pa bskor//ral gri bla na med pa zung //pad+ma bla na med pa chongs//rin chen bla med gsal bar
25a7(rgyud): gyis//dkyil 'khor tshul du spros nas kyang //mchod rten tshul du bsdu bar bgyis//lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang //lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci//srin po sha
25b1(rgyud): za brjod byung tshogs//'jigs pad+ma/kyang 'jigs gyur pa'i//nam 'phrul du ma 'di bsgyur chog/gsung mchog do skad thos mthag/lan na rdo rje mthu bo ches//dka' mas
25b2(rgyud): thal me rob sbyar te//snyan pa'i tshig gso 'di gsol te//gser dang rin chen lnga po laso//rab mchog ri bor gyur pa las//'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang //rtags
25b3(rgyud): yang dag 'dzin pa ltar//rnam par shes dang phung po bzhi//'byung ba rnam par dge bsgrubs pas//lha dang phyag rgya phrin la su//sngags shes rnams kyis bzung byas nas//
25b4(rgyud): btul ba'i ye shes byang chub rim//khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan thub pa che//kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches//sku las sna tshogs mdangs
25b5(rgyud): 'od can//'od zer du ma byung nas kyang //gzhi dang sdong po me tig gis//rgyun pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas che//sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos//'jig rten skyong dang
25b6(rgyud): bdun gyi chags//ma lus pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur//nyan thos rang brgyam 'dar bar gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi//tshogs rnams shin tu skrag
25b7(rgyud): par gyur//da che phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams nas//sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spu nas//khro bo chen po'i tshogs byung ba//'od zer rtse mos drangs nasu//zhing
26a1(rgyud): /A ky-i la ma gas//rad bar tshogs sa nas//dal da nam+b+ha bAr gyur// nad+hasardzas//mngal lan
26a2(rgyud): 'di grags pa yin na ts+tshos sa sar+b+ba9//gang ga nags/chos kyi mas b+hu 'i/
26a3(rgyud): gshegs//dri ma med pa'odaman su mtshu//gsang sngags spyod de'i tshul dgeg/thos nas m+b+ha rgu 'dus ma byas//'jig rten mgon po brnyas pa gyu/
26a4(rgyud): nas lagan rdo rje chags//la ra N+Di kyil 'khor thams cad //snum pa mye tog paka s+yA to//gat+to nas phyog 'tshul bskor ba //da shing su
26a5(rgyud): su/das pa tsugs thal sgyur gsol pa 'dabs//mi gnas ye shos che ba'i mchog/yon tan rgya mtsho'abyung de ga go//mtshan nyid thams cad rlu ba rgyan ga/
26a6(rgyud): mtshan min spangs de'i thub tshe//dri med dge paji ltar lags//gsang sngags tshul du spyod pa //'dus ma byis de'i byang chub dang //'dzig nin mgon 'dag
26a7(rgyud): bdag cag rnams la sman rab dang //'gro la thugs rje che mdzad phyir//mgon po bcom ldan thub pa che//yong dang yang du ba shang du gsol//de nas yang dag rdzogs
26b1(rgyud): sa / na mnanas klu/rlu sgyu dul ma/ na rgyu/glug spyod na don /nas ra /
26b2(rgyud): dkoral sogs paraH//yi ge mchod sbyin rtsal dang //nyan dudu 'dzin dang sron pa dang //mchod 'dra mi ton dang //de dag sems dang sgom pasgo/// ma
26b3(rgyud): na gyis rgyu// sa rgyun mo du / /sa ma rje/tsheni 'di spya sa nags/
26b4(rgyud): ga ci pas na na tshus bu ma ma nyid/ra sa da sa na gro byi me pa nga//dgas kyis de 'i bral ba las
27a1(rgyud): phyogs mos ma lus pa//chos nyid bdag med spyod pa ni//chos dbyings ye shes mngon byas nas//ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsal ba//'dus ma
27a2(rgyud): byas kyi byang chub ste//chos rnams kun gyi gzhi lus so//'dod pa'i khams sogs yon tan la//shin tu bde rol spyad pa spyod//sangs rgyas mu stegs can rnams kyi//
27a3(rgyud): lkog tu gyur pa gsang ba ste//bskal pa bsam yas dpag med du//brlabs dka' yangs zab rgya chen rnams//sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du//lus ngag yid la
27a4(rgyud): gang gnas pa//dbyer med tshul du skyob pas na//sangs rgyas kun gyis sngagasu brjod//mtshan dang dpe byang ldan pa'i sku//yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa ni//bden pa
27a5(rgyud): gnyis la gnas pa yau//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgon//la la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs//l-i lar dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs//la lar srin po srin mo'i
27a6(rgyud): gzugs//la lar gro ba bzang po'i gzugs//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //seng ge ltar gzigs mdzad la sogs//sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni//rkang gnyis lha
27a7(rgyud): min rnams gnyis sogs//'phro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o//rtag dang 'dre dang nges med pa'i//gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams//'jig rten phal pa'i mgon po ste/
27b1(rgyud): gzugs byang kha dog tha dad pa//yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gis//grangs me byung ba mchod 'os so//thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag/rdo rje can gyis bzhengs nas kyang //phyag 'tshal/
27b2(rgyud): bskor po byas nas ni//spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol//'dren pa btso bos bcom ldan 'das//sngags zhes pa ni gang gang yin//phyag rgya zhes ni ci lta bu//ting
27b3(rgyud): 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar bshod //lus ngag yid la ji ltar gnas//dbyer med tshul du ji ltar skyobs//bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang //gzhan la brtse phyir bshad du
27b4(rgyud): gsol//de nas rgyal ba gtso mchog ni//ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas te//tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis//rnam rtogs zad phyir 'di gsungaso//snying po nye snying
27b5(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sngags//las kyi sngagasu gyur pa ste//snying po brjod par sa bon no//nye snying ye shes mchog dang ni//gsang ba'i snying po zhes grogaso//las kyi sngags ni gnyis
27b6(rgyud): yin te//bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang //sbyor tshogs grub par byed pa'o//phyag rgya lag pa'i 'du byed dang //rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba'o//rtag su mtshon dang
27b7(rgyud): 'dabs pa dang //'gyur ba med par byed pas na//phyog rgya zhesu bshad pa'o//rang gi rtse gtsog sems bsdus na//sems la lhag pa'i chos 'bebs pa//de ni ting nge 'dzin
28a1(rgyud): zhes bya//de ltar de dag la brten nas//snga ma'i gnas de yongs gyur nas//sgo nga bral ba'i 'dab bzang ltar//lus 'di mkha' la cher song nas//
28a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du//rgyal ba dam chos mnyan nas kyang //rgyal sras kun la bshad pa dang //skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas kyang //shes bya ma lus
28a3(rgyud): phyogs khyab pa//lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o//sems dang yid ni 'dres pa'i tshe//ye shes bde bar shar ba ni//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//dbyer med
28a4(rgyud): tshul du skyob ces gsungs//'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lhag par gnas pa'i don yongasu bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o///
28a5(rgyud): zhu bas brtul dka' bgegs chen dang //log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir//sems kyi bye brag thugs chud nas//de dang gzugs 'dral gzhom pa'i phyir//rtog med
28a6(rgyud): namakha'i lam gnas te//rdzogs sangs gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sku//rab 'phags khro bo stobs chen dpal//sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi sras//mi g.yo'i mtshan
28a7(rgyud): grags de la 'dir//rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal//tshangs sogs lha dang lus can kun//de la rtag tu mchod par byed//rgyal bas byas bzo rgyal sras kyi//
28b1(rgyud): nardzog sa bsnam gyis mi khyab pa'o//ya shes rdzogs nus myog yo'os//thob pas mgus panas b+ha//ngas kyi rdol 'joms dang b+h+yoste//chu ru gtsud pan khra bA y-in//skyugs
28b2(rgyud): kyi bden tshig mi sgrubs//nyan thos pa drung tshogs kyis migs//rgyug med 'dud zhwa bras rgya'o//rdzu 'al pa stod med mi ge mo ga/de bzhin nyid kyi snying ba mchog
28b3(rgyud): nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku//chos dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas//sprul 'dis srid pa'o kham skyong mdzod//mkha' ltar dri med spros bral bas//dus gsum sangs rgyas
28b4(rgyud): thams cad 'byung //skyes med na mkho'i rang bzhin la//tha dad tsam du gsing sngags zhes//brjid kyang dag go sbyong yul 'das//sgrib pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs/
28b5(rgyud): sems med rang bzhin stong pa nyid//sgyu 'drar med kyis sgom pa yin//dngos med mnyam mdzes 'did don rnams//gsang sngags mgon 'das brjod bus s+ho'o//mi stegs
28b6(rgyud): bdag dang sreg gang zag/gtso bo skyes bu khyung gnas pas//'khor brtag rtog nga rgyal rmongs//leg pa'i zhugs bcings stug bsngal sbyid 'dag med srog maud sems can med//
28b7(rgyud): byed pa med cing gtso ba med//khyabo gnas med cing dngos po med//rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med//mig rtog srid 'ching zhags bcad phyir//dngos med sna tshogs
29a1(rgyud): gzugs bsgoms pas//dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang thob//phyi nang khyad par goms pa'o//dbu ba chu bur skya 'drar sgom//stong nyid las ldang ting 'dzin
29a2(rgyud): gyis/rnam rtog sdig bcings las grol nas//'tsho med ye shes go 'phangs tha'o//phung po khams dang skye mched med//kun gzhi med de gang zag med//gzung 'dzin
29a3(rgyud): med de bcings med par//rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad//kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i//stong nyid byang sems sgyu 'dra bar//bag yod pas ni rtog bsgom
29a4(rgyud): na//byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char//yid bzhin nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che//mkha'i ltar gos pa med pa'i sku//sngags spyod byang chub sems dpa' yi//byang chub sems
29a5(rgyud): kyi sgom pa thob//ngo mtshar gsungs te thos ma thag/khro bo rnams kyis gtso la bstod//rtag tu dag cing dri med pa//rnam rtog rgyun 'gags kun rtog meng //rtag rtog
29a6(rgyud): med la zhugs pa yi//dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod//chos kun g.yo ba med pa khyod//spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas//kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa
29a7(rgyud): rtog/rang bzhin spos bral khyad phyag 'tshal//sems can sna tshogs pa na don du//mdzad spyod sna tshogs gsungs pa'o//dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung //
29b1(rgyud): rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal bstod//sun pa pra rab rdul spangs pa'o//skyon bral na mkha' dag paltar//mgon du khyod su shal sgong ltar//kun rtog/sangs la phyag 'tshal
29b2(rgyud): bskyed/sgras med no 'a lta bu 'o//dngos pa thams cad dang bral ba//dung khams skye mched shin tu dag/ye shrIs rgya mam phyag 'tshal ba //mnga' la 'ong shwa
29b3(rgyud): sna tshogs ltar//gre tso khyod dag pa'i sems can gzigs//ngan 'gro kun sgrol dpa' chen 'khrungs//go cha chen po phyag 'tshal bstod//chos nyid las byung snying po ni/
29b4(rgyud): yi ge gcig pa gzi brjid che//sems can sdug bsngal sa gzhi le//mun 'khrigs sel lo phyag 'tshal bstod//sngags mtshig gtso bo'i gsang ba 'dis//rgyal
29b5(rgyud): sras chos 'phel shes rab bskyed//bla med gi 'phang myur 'gro gsungs//gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//dngos kun gyur dang bcas pa yi//las dang skye las
29b6(rgyud): rnam par grol//rgyal ba rgyu med bdag nyid 'khrungs//gtso mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //dngos med ye shes me lho yis//'dus byas ri bo kun bsreg so nas//
29b7(rgyud): chas dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal//bla med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //bstod pa'i don de thugs chud nas//'gro la phan phyir tshig gsungs//gsang sngags
30a1(rgyud): log par spyod pa dang //sor sna log par goms pa las//'dod pas non pa'i sems rtog gis//sngags pa yi dgas gnasu skyes//dang pos/
30a2(rgyud): mar me me tog dang //zhal zas gtor ma phreng ba sogs//mchod pa'i rdzas dang yo byad dang //mi yi lus dang kha zas la//'tshe zhing sgrub pa'i bar du gtsang//mi sdug nang skyed
30a3(rgyud): lo tog 'chi//gnyis pa gnod sbyin 'dra gyur nas//sha khrag chang la snom zhing rgyug/thos bsam sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing //nad skyi tshe len log lta skyed//rig sngags
30a4(rgyud): 'chang gi gdon gzhom phyir//sgrub pos 'bad de sngags brjod bya//sngags mthu bskyed pa gtor ma dang //sbyin bsreg phyag rgya sngogs bcas dang //mnan pa'i las
30a5(rgyud): kyis nags me ltar//thogs pa med par 'joms para'i gyur//de dag rten byed lha yin te//de gsal byed pa ras ris yin//de kun rnam dag gsal byed pa//byang
30a6(rgyud): chub sems mchog zhi ba ni//log rtog 'khor ba'i zo chun la//ral gro rnon pa'i sta re ltar//'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las de bzhin nyid
30a7(rgyud): kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas sngags dang phyag rgya dag/'byung bar rab tu bshad par bya//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri puM ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaH
30b1(rgyud): Ad+ha/stong po dam pa'o//nAmaHsar+b+bAm+b+ha p+ta d+hag+ha/Sh+ThaHsa twat+takat+tadz+dza/sa / t+su \u0f7fsar+b+ba/sta shAl//namaHsa Sh+ThaHsaH/
30b2(rgyud): /d+d+had+hA'o//Sh+T+r-ibadzin ma swA/la maskyes te/nam /gsung ba'i byed pal//de nas phyug
31a1(rgyud): na maHsarbA sA pA ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga twe b+hU dz+nyA sarba b+hU oM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ha na ha na/kun+na kun+tha/mA ra ya duSh+Ta bi na ya kaHd+hA dza go cha'i'o//na maH
31a2(rgyud): sar+b+ba sA pu ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta tAM ga te b+h+yAMHsarba thA au d+hA ra d+ha ra badz+rI na li/kha T+wAM ga pA sha d+ha ra swA hA/gtsu gI tai r-i gyi'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/
31a3(rgyud): sarbaM b+h+re oM b+hany+dzi ban d+hi da ha bats+tsha b+h+r-isl-i ruM ku ru ha nu te na badz+dzi/gr-ih+Na gr-id+d+ha phaT/tho ba'i'o//naM maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga taM b+h+yaHsarba thA oMSh+Ta na tA murti/dza
31a4(rgyud): da hA/sA d+hA ye sA d+hA ya/bi dzi yau bi dzi yaM/biM dza ya kIr+t+ti swA hAM/mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA pA ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbe tha oM b+hu d+ha ra d+ha ra
31a5(rgyud): a tsin d+ha be la bi kra ma NaM/bu ra bu sa la ya/rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba swA hA/rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsarba sAM pA ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA gre te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM badz+re hr-i da ya/
31a6(rgyud): badz+ra ma taM gi swA hA/snying kha'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsar+b+be sA pa ri pU ra kai b+h+yaHsarba ta thA gA te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM hUM da ha da haM/kiny+tsi rA yaM siM/A na ya shri g+h+raM/rak+Sha rak+Sha/
31a7(rgyud): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/dr-iSh+TA na/da ma da ma swAh+ma/phyogs bcing ba'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ro kaM b+h+yaHsarba te thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA o dun du na ma hA pA sha kha T+wAM ga d+hA ra/pi/
31b1(rgyud): pU ra ko b+h+yaHbka' rtags kyi'o//na maHsar+b+bA sA pa ri pu ra ka b+h+yAr+d+hasArba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM ga ga na gan d+hod b+ha byA/ma hA sa ma ya/pa ri pU ra ka s+yAh+mA/dr-i'i phyag rgya'o//
31b2(rgyud): ni maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra kaM b+h+yaHsarba tA thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM bi shud+d+ha dz+nyA na r-I dza saM b+ha be gaM ga nA nAn hAHswAh+ma/ma mo'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa raM pu ra ke b+h+yoHsarba
31b3(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thi/oM shud+d+ha d+harma te/shud+d+ho shud+d+haHgrih+Na gr-ih+Na/sar+b+ba swa ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHs+thA hA/gaM te ra ma'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA bai ri pU ru kaM b+h+yaHsarba ta thA
31b4(rgyud): ga tAM b+h+yoHsarba thA/oM shud+d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swaM b+ha thaMtiSh+To tiSh+Tha ma d+hA ni yai swA hA/bdug pa'i'o//no maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbe thA/oM ga ga~M ni bi krAn
31b5(rgyud): gA me nai ma hA shud+d+ha na ye swAhA/me taMg gri'o//na maHsor+b+bA sI pa ri pu ra ki b+h+yaHsarba ta thA gA te b+h+yaHsarba thA/au ta na ha na/bi ra ma bi shud+d+he/d+harma na ya pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/zhal
31b6(rgyud): zas kyi'o//na maiHsan+ni swe pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga taM b+h+yad+d+hasarba b+ho/o a pra ti hi hai na d+ya ta da me da ma/sarba thA//sa pa ri pU raM ke b+h+yaHswA hA/dpa' bo spyan drang ba'i'o//
31b7(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbe thAM/oM bi shud+d+ha bi shud+d+ha/sa kra swa b+hA pa A na ya/ma hA na ye swA hA/byang chubo sems dpa' sman drang po'o//na maH/
32a1(rgyud): sa s+thA m+pA gi b+h+yaHsar+b+barmAn teSh+ThaHsarbarbA/oM bi shud+d+ha sAt+ma/tAn tan/dam dam+b+ha/mat+ma na ye s+yAt+ma/nyan thos spya dang pa'i'o//na maHsan+na
32a2(rgyud): bi ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHs+yoHnA/oM badz+nye kaR+Sha ya/shrI g+h+raM/da t+ta da~M ti/pa tsa ba tsaM/ma hA pa riny+dza re swAtAM/pony+dzi pa mo spyan drang po'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA bi ri b+hur/
32a3(rgyud): ke b+h+yaHsarba ti thA ga to b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hU/oM ma za ma tha A na yA/A na m-i/pra baM sha ya pra be sha ya/s+yArbe ta thA gaM ta/sarba de baM/ta mau ta ma/mat+ma na ya/bi ra wa re swAtAM/
32a4(rgyud): 'jog rten pa rnams spyan drang ba'i'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ki b+h+yaHsarbe ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM sa d+ya sa dz+yA/ma hA sa dA ya/da ma da ma/mahA da ma/A kaR+Sha ya/A
32a5(rgyud): kaR+Sha yaM/a d+yA bA ma hAM na yA shud+d+he swAhA/drang srong spyan drang ba'o//na maHsar+b+ba swA pi r-i pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba b+hU/au dza ya dza ya/bi dza ya bi dza ya/mehA sat+ya
32a6(rgyud): ba da ni/sarba hi ti swAtAM/srin mo rnams spyan drang ba'o//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/au tri hI dA/ma thA ma thA/da ma da ma/ta na ta na/mahA
32a7(rgyud): na ye/ma ra ma ra/hi sAt+ma/ma mo rna spyan drang ba'o//na maHsar+b+bA sA pa ri pU ri ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ge te b+h+yoHsarba thAM/au ta na badz+ra hUM phaT/sarba duSh+Ta bra haM/ma tha ma tha
32b1(rgyud): \u0f7fd+ha/sarba do/na dam dam/sarba dz+nyAn mo dz+nyAHs+yAt+ma/rkang stangs tsham du ma gyi ga so//nam+b+haHstonas pa m+b+ha //b+h+ya sarba tathAg tub+h+yas+yAr+b+ba//oM A /
32b2(rgyud): Ak+Sh+ma shU thA na /byung ba gas//seMs du ma sa pags pa/man/sa ngas sbyi
32b3(rgyud): namasar+b+ba m+b+ha bai b+hur/\u0f7fsar+b+ba t+ter+m+mag r+b+haSh+Thasa~Mr+b+bad+d+ha/e s+yA b+hA ba sarba/d+d+ho b+hUs+'ut+ma/nam s+yAd+g+has+thA ba m+b+ha gab+h+yaHsU b+h+yaHsarba/oM lab+h+yo sar+b+ba/
32b4(rgyud): g+han lad+d+ha ya~M s+yAt+ma/nim sarbAs par b+hair/sarbatwA thA gaN+Di saHhAs d+g+hasa~Md+d+he/d+hAd+d+ha mi hU~M /rkyen pas bzhin du sgyur ba dang //kun gyis thim par bya
32b5(rgyud): dang //'dod pa'i las rnams gang dang ga //grub par bya ba'i sngag sa yin//gza' chen brgyadang rgyu skar ma'i//nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnamasaM ky-i sngags//na maN+Da sar+b+ba s+thA pa ri b+hur
32b6(rgyud): kar+dz+dzaHsarba tathA ga ta b+h+yAHsarbaSh+Ta/A daMHNAMsau/e b+hai riHsud+d+har+N+Na br-i tas+ya ti/shukraHsha ne sh+tsa raHrAHkau tud+h+we/mr-ig shrIR+Sha/auSh+Ta/
32b7(rgyud): kunanasu/du mya ma shrISh+Tha/ma~Mg+na pur+tha U nI ud+hA ra bab+banA~M/!/ oMp+tA/5 shwA ShA a nu drAd+hAr+g+haM ru lA/shud+d+hats+tsha/oMd+hIrmASh+TA T+Ta shri ga ad+g+ha dza/
33a1(rgyud): d+hiSh+Tha d+hA nASh+Ti/pUr+b+ba b+hU dra pA drA ut+ta ra b+ha dra/pra dA bai ba d+hI/a shAn+ti/b+hA ra Ni/oM dang swAtAr bcas pa ni/rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te//gang 'dar
33a2(rgyud): las kyang sbyar bar bya//mchod pa'i rigs kyang thaM dad bya//na maHsa man+ta kA ya b+hAk+Shit+tA badz+dzi trAM/oM a tsa le tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Nu s+pho Ta ya tra ka khA haM maM/na maHsa man+ta kA
33a3(rgyud): ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+rI NAM/oM badz+ra kA pa tsaM duM baM/oM na maHsarba tathA ga te b+h+yaHsaMrbaM b+ha ye piM ga teb+h+yabi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khe rak+Sha/mad+hU ba li/sarba ta thA ga te du
33a4(rgyud): nr-ir+Na tau/b+hu hU~M tra~M b+hU/a pra ti te te swAhA//khro bo spyan gcig drag shul can//srung dang bcas par mchod po dang //sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub/
33a5(rgyud): ci 'drod las la tshogs sbyar//lag g.yas gung mdzub bzhibs te brkyang //srin lag mthe chung mtheb mos mnan//shugs drangs tshul phyung mkha' la'i phyar//
33a6(rgyud): ral gri phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms//g.yon pa khu tshur sdigs mdzub skyed//slar sbyar byed pa zhags pa'i rgyu//bung mo mtha' chungs sor skyed//mdzub mom
33a7(rgyud): med nang du dgug/mthe bong gzhibs pa gung 'bram sbyar//snying kha bkod do go cha'i rgyan//sor 'khyud khu tshur nang du bsdam//mthib gnyis cung bsgyur mgo thong rgya//
33b1(rgyud): g.yon pa'i khu tshur nang bcug nas//mtho bong g.yas sgreng tho ba'i rgya//phyogs bcur brdung ba ltar bya'o//g.yas pa khu tshur bung mo sbyang //spyi gtsug phyag rgya gtsug tu bzhag/bra lon
33b2(rgyud): pa khu tshur gung mdzub sgreng //bka' rtags phyag rgya rtag tu 'phyar//khu tshur gnyis pa sgribs lto sbyar ba//rdo ba lta bu'i phyag rgya'o//g.yos pa khro tshur snying khar bzhag/snying
33b3(rgyud): kha rgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o//lag gnyis sor mo so sor brkyang //phyogs bcu bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag sbyar gung gnyis nang bcug pa//dri yi phyag rgyar bshad pa'o//
33b4(rgyud): khu tshur rgyu ba sprad gung mthe bong //mthe bong gung mdzub spyod dang 'khyud//gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o//thal mo khong stong shugs ltar gdon//bdug spos 'bul ba'i
33b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//lag gnyis so sor gung srin bkug/mthob mnan bzhag brkyang me tog rgyu//thul skyar gung srin mdzub mo bkug/mthe'u chung mtheb brkyang zhal zas rgyu
33b6(rgyud): skyil krung 'dug ste snyim pa bad//mthe bong gnyis ni nang du bkug/so go zhibs nas g.yab byed po ni//dpe' bo gtso bo spyan drang rgya//thal sbyar mdzub bkug mthe blo
33b7(rgyud): monan//byang chub sems tshogs 'bugs pa'i rgya//snyim bkyeng mthe chung gshibs te brkyang //lhag ma brgyad po so sor dpung//nyan thos rong rgyal rdzu 'phrul can//
34a1(rgyud): ma lus thams cad 'gug pa'i rgyu//khru tshur g.yas pa g.yon steng bzhag/mdzub gnyis brkyang te so sor dgugs//cung zad skyod par byed pa ni//bony+dza
34a2(rgyud): bam 'thugs da'i r+g+ha//du chur rgyu ba sbed gling mdzun ni//me ser drung por ga shings te brkyang //mthib gnyis cung zad skad de 'gregs//'jog rten pan mos 'khrugs pa'i
34a3(rgyud): t+ya//g.yon min g.yas pa sa~M ng+ge m+bA byaM//brtul zhugs drung srung dgug shi N+ya//g.yon gdu chur bung ma sgreng //de sa grwa 'i sngon ma 'gugs pa'i rgyu//lagagasus
34a4(rgyud): kan tu brkyang nas kyang //mthe bos mdzub mnan gsum pa g.yog/ma bdun la sogs ma mi rnams//las kyi dus su gugs par gyur//ros kyis btub cing
34a5(rgyud): drang po yis//pus mo dag la rkang mthib sbyar//spyi bor me tog thal sbyar yang //phyogs der gaslob cing 'bru tshugs blta//zlum pa'i stabs kyis 'di kun gyis//
34a6(rgyud): gegs tshogs 'joms shing rnal 'byor spyod//log pa g.yas ni gyen du brkyang //g.yon pa snying kar ba sdigs mdzub ste/rkang gnyis sprod nas rting pa rdabs/
34a7(rgyud): hUM brjod drag skang bdun du lha//sa gsum ge sa byang zla ga ma stabs//rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i skyabs dang ni//h+ye ha brjod kying zhabs rgya bcings//phan tshun bsnol nas/
34b1(rgyud): bgagaso lnga bstun//'khor ba phyag rgya phye mar bya//rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang na//rdo rje thal mo mkha' la bsnun//khri gnyer mig can ma mchu man+dan//spyan lag
34b2(rgyud): gnyis gnyis mi ltar smad//rkang pa mnyam sta byos hU~M s+thA can//lag gnyis bsdigs mdzub phyage rgyu'o//rkang gnyis mnyam du gzhog pa las//g.yas kyis g.yon bskor
34b3(rgyud): lto ba yin//mdun du g.yas te rgyab tu g.yon//rgya mtsho ma gsum gsum mnan pa ni//rtse gsum yin te rtse gsum rgya//lag pa steng brkyang dbyig sgreng ltar//bge/
34b4(rgyud): la bsnun zhing 'bru tshugs bltar//g.ya su tho ba hUM brjod brdeg/g.yon pa snying kha'i bsdigs mdzub ste//gnyis ka bklad pa 'khor lo byaM//nub bltas rkang pa mnyam
34b5(rgyud): gzhag nas//mdun g.yas rgyab dang g.yon phyogasu//g.yon pas bgegasu gas ma mnan bya zhing //rim pas me dang ril gri dang //bsngags mdzub zhags pas phyogs
34b6(rgyud): bzhir bcing //ha hUM dag brjod brjid gnod rgyu//rkang gnyis pus 'bur lag pa gnyis//gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan//bgegs bskrad phyir na 'bru tshugs pa ste//
34b7(rgyud): rtse gcig rdo rje sngabasu bocang //rkang pa g.yas g.yon ras kyis bskor//lha byad g.yon te shar nub go yas//brkyang zhing drag tu brdab par bya//rgyab nas drang dang tho
35a1(rgyud): dang //rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rgya//phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs//phyag rgya dang ni stangs stabs kyis//phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na//'byung //
35a2(rgyud): bopo'i tshigs 'joms smos ci dgos//thams cad dbang du sdud par byed//de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yis//rkang stabs khyad par ba shad por bya//shar du rkang pa mnyam
35a3(rgyud): ba yis//rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg/lhor ni rkang ting sbrid de gdong //hU~M sgrogs thal mo mdun rgyab sbyar//nub tu rkang spyod lag pa gnyis//so sor bsdigs mdzub rgyan
35a4(rgyud): du brkyang //byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang //rkang pa ya gcig sa la sgreng //khu tshur mdzub sbyar dpral bor bzlog/rkang gnyis mnyam byas res kyis phyar//mche gtsigs
35a5(rgyud): hU~M sgrogs khro gnyer lta//byang shor thig ler grags pa'i rgya//khu tshur mthe'u chung mche bo'i rgya//rkang pa ras btag shar lhor phye//lho nub rkang gnyis res kyis brdab//
35a6(rgyud): zhogs pas 'debs dang ral bris gcod//nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang //lag gnyis mthab spras 'khor lo bskor//yang na tshe gcig phyag rgyas gdab//stangs
35a7(rgyud): stabs thams cad ha hUM sgrogs//de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yis//phyag rgya cho ga bshad par bya//khu tshur gung mo brkyang rtse spang //mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du
35b1(rgyud): sa//nam du sgyu /sa ma na na du spyod do smra / na
35b2(rgyud): gas pa bsdus po'i rjod nas/sngags dang b+h+ya 'i la'u ste gsum pa'o///blan med ts+tshe si sa suM//tshig
35b3(rgyud): 'dod pas thams cad du//dge ba'i ris bzung ba tsal nas kyang //bkrus te sngags kyu spyang byas la//dur smrig du ni bsgyur bar bya//rgyud bzung dul zhing dul bag spyod//
35b4(rgyud): chos thos ri ma ma 'i sgror//skyed chung yid ga'angs khro med sa//sa~M hU~M kun kun no la sgyur// sa nga mu~M Ti kAn tar /b+hukA ni thAn se //hrI
