35b5(rgyud): nga 'tshal lpags dmer//ram dpa'i tha~Mng shun b+hi nor sde//smyig dang a dzi na ge bi ste/sho tA dag kyang dkar por 'gyur//sa spong so btang sgrogs ste b+h+yaH/bir 'dzim
35b6(rgyud): rab 'bring tha ma bri//rgyal dang sa ri nam gru dang //snron sbubs smon drug lha 'tshams shes//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa//thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la//dbus su bya
35b7(rgyud): chub shing mchog drung //gser mdog 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i chas//chos 'chang phyag rgya ngur sgrog bsdams//log su 'dab bzang rgyal po gnyis//snyim pa me tog bkra
36a1(rgyud): /gsus//gang+gA su 'di rten kA//rtswa sgro kun bral tshwa // sgrubs so gas pa//snyunA gsus thos pa sa r+thA/
36a2(rgyud): nara'i stod g.yogs stug smad dkris//rin chen rgyan can do ker can//rdo ba dmar po'i khri stengs na//ral gri dang ni zhugs pa dang //gau yan pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs
36a3(rgyud): btso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs che la//rdo rje 'dzin sngo ngur smig can//rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang //de yi 'og tu sgrub po ni//dbus btsugs spos kyi khang bu 'dzin//gtso
36a4(rgyud): bo zhab su khro bo che//nag po khams gsum bstan po yi//lag gnyis rin chen khri la bteg/gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste//'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi//rdo rje 'dzin
36a5(rgyud): dang sgrub pa'i sngo//yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig/klu yi bu mo mdzes ma gnyis//pang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad//zhi ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyir//de nas bris sku
36a6(rgyud): yang dag bshad//dbus su shAkya thub pa dang //g.ya su 'phags pa 'jam dpal te//g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o//bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni//shin tu blta dka'
36a7(rgyud): gsus po che//zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yis rgyan//kha nas khrag 'dzag lce 'dril ba//mche gtsigs d+hIHsgra cher sgrogs pa//spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od//
36b1(rgyud): d+hurastsug+sa snams pa char sbyin mdo//sku la khyod rnon nga ba can//dbul po dang char banas rgyan//g.yo du rin rgyan zur zad 'byung //bskul ba mo 'di 'ab ba yos//d+yA
36b2(rgyud): rdzog+h+ra sreg par mdzod//grams kyi dang po rdo rje ste//gnyis pasi ral gri 'ad 'ad 'tshong //gtsun gyi deng po rdo rje ni gas// nyis pa bsdigs mdzub de rgyung ste mdzad/
36b3(rgyud): chen rdo yi khri steng su//bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang //g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis gnas//de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byad//spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub bo bri//ci 'byor rgyun
36b4(rgyud): du mchod par bya//mngon spyod sgrub pa'i ras ris ni//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//dur khrod ras la mi go maM baM//mdog nag spyan gsum zu ri mr-ig lta//ngur stso
36b5(rgyud): gos gon khro gnyer ldan//rol gri dang ni zhags pa 'chung //bris nas bdag gi khrag gi ni//spyan phye gsol ba btab par bya//ri mo 'dis ni rigs 'dzin kyang //sgrub po
36b6(rgyud): mngon spyod smos ci dgos//yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir//mthi kA na ri'i rgyun can ni//brkyang bsnu ma rdo d+he d+hil bu 'dzin//pad+ma zla bA la bzhugs bri//dmag dpung rangs
36b7(rgyud): pa'i ras ris ni//gser mdog khri'i mi g.yo ba//mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku//'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa//zhal bzhi phyag kyang bzhi pa ste//ral gri zhags
37a1(rgyud): da blo 'dzin//ri bo che dang bsdigs mdzub 'og/zhabs bzhi bdud bcu stong khar ro//de nas rig 'dzin dngos grub kyi//rus ris bro ba yang dag /
37a2(rgyud): mig yo khro bozhal gcig pa//mdangs blanangs zer ma'i me tig mchog/ral gri zhags pa sdig mdzub can//dbus mo gsas bteg na ston pa ni//sa la cung zad ba tsugs
37a3(rgyud): par mdzad//mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis//dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams dga'i gzugs//g.yasu rnam sbyang mdzad bris te//g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o//de mdun
37a4(rgyud): sgrub bo nyid kyang dri//gang yang rnyis mo thams cad la//mchod de me tog gtor nas kyang //spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te//rten 'brel sngags kyi rab gnas bya//
37a5(rgyud): rjes smon lam btab pa ni//oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa yi//bsod nams grangs ming gzhol mi lang //ngas ni 'gro ba ma lus pa//bla med go 'phangs thob par shob
37a6(rgyud): snrums can dmyal bdud 'gro dang //yi dgas gang dag grangs med rnams//bdag gri bsod nams mthu yis ni//thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig/gang yang
37a7(rgyud): mi dbul phongs dang //mi nod mu gi dgra chom sogs//bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis no//de dag thams cad bral gyur shog/ji snyed sems can thams cad rnam//
37b1(rgyud): spyod sa mya na// chags dongan durgyun gnas//'ga' yang sdug bsngal ma pa //nas can ga sas dag spyod// sa la b+hU nas/
37b2(rgyud): dge'i skye tshigs spyod byed te//kun kyang bde ni / nas hU~M la sus sunA brgyud//lagan da dang mye tog sogs//mchid pa 'i byed kyini bags nas/
37b3(rgyud): hUM dang gsal bya phyir/dag shegs bsu de ni 'di spyad brjod//oM bye gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das//sno pa gzugs pa rnams//d+mo m+WAr+ya yang brtsa
37b4(rgyud): basmos bcas /den gro sa yang sbyin //nas su mi tog la khyer can du
37b5(rgyud): /dam ga sa su /na pas ga 9/gos kyi rloms sogs di sa//
37b6(rgyud): rjes skyes ni na//zhes pa gan su mchod par bya//da brgya da//mas mi ni yin du
38a1(rgyud): rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang //mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min//sems can ma mos spang bar bya//dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed//the tsom
38a2(rgyud): le lo spang bar bya//rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir//khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas//gos bkra dri ma med pa bgo/zas kyang 'bras rtsog dri med la//nyung ngu bza' zhing
38a3(rgyud): btung bar bya//mangs pas gnyid dang le l-i dang //dri nga ba ni bskyed par 'gyur//tho rangs dang por langs nas ni//slod thal bar du brtson par bya//nam gyi gung la
38a4(rgyud): gnyid pa'i tshe//'grol phanu byA'i sems kyi nyal//'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las dris sku'i le'u ste bani pa'o///de nas yang dag
38a5(rgyud): bshad bya ste//lha sgom pa yi rim pa ni//rang gzugs stong par byas naso//yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo las//sgra grags pa ni rig pa che//zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta
38a6(rgyud): bur snang //der son pa ni rdo rje sogs//rang gi phyag rgya nyid yin no//de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni//'ja' tshon shar po ji lta bar//mtshan dpe medangs 'od yang dag ldan//
38a7(rgyud): brjod cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang ldan//sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni//byis pa gzhon nu'i lang tsho 'dra//rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni//gzugs mdzes lha yi tsi lta go//
38b1(rgyud): na/// dang phrul pags pa//sku sogs par shod rnag la 'gyur// tshogs d+hats+tshed rgyun+da rnams na//rgyu ldan sa/sa// //
38b2(rgyud): pa khrag ca ni ni//stong gi kham sa yod par mdzad//t+yA ha~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT kyi//dar skad 'brug spyi sngags glan//ri rab 'bum rnyil tshil tshwa me ltar//lus rab ltas
38b3(rgyud): rgyan pa ni//gzi ldan 'khyud cing bu sgra 'don//'gro 'dra 'ad kyi dkyil 'khor ni//nye' du ma dus mi'i bskul pa 'dra//rab gadrug mtshon che du mni//lha mi nAM dus
38b4(rgyud): 'khrug pa'i cha//khro bo khro ma'i tshogs 'byung ba//thams cad yi ge hUM s+thA can//ma mo dang ni mkha' gro rnams//b+h+yo yig drag po'i bdag nyid can//thu pA yi ge tshulas
38b5(rgyud): bskyod//rgyal sras rig ma nyan thos dang //'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed//na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaHswa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsar+b+baD+D+h+ya a~M san saM skar ba
38b6(rgyud): shod d+ha d+had+hAr+m+ma te ga ge na/sa mud ga te sa hA pa ri shud+d+he/mo hA na y+ya pa ri wA re swAhA/rang gi lus la sems bcug nas//sdig pa thams ts+tshed rab tu bri//ngang tshul bzang por
38b7(rgyud): yang dag byung //rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas//drang srong rdzu 'phrul can du 'gyur//gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na//rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos//rang rang
39a1(rgyud): rigs kyi lha rnams kyi//gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan kha dog ni//dkyil 'khor rA ma ni ris mA las//gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya//de nas mI g.yo khro
39a2(rgyud): bo ches//rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas//dag cang gsal la sbyin pa yis//tshig gi yang ni 'di gsol to//rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das//gtum mo mtshan nyid
39a3(rgyud): ldan pa yi//nga yi mtshon nyid khyed bshad nas//de tshe rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos//gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas//rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis//gsang chen
39a4(rgyud): bar 'di bka' stsal to//dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo rje//mthing ka'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin//mthing ka brkyang bskum khro sems can//nA ra'i rgyan bcus 'jigs byed sku//
39a5(rgyud): gyen skra kha spu gyon sor dmar//pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ni//me yi nang bzhugs rdo dril 'ching //rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po//bzhi pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa//lnga pa'i
39a6(rgyud): lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi//me yis sa boni dgugs pas mnan//bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin//gsum pas btego hUM phaT bcas//gsang sngags rgyal po bla med
39a7(rgyud): 'dis//dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang //khyad par du ni 'byung po sel//klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che//na mkha' lding gi cha byed che//grub pa'i gter gyi don du ni//ser po//
39b1(rgyud): 'od dang ldan pa yi//dmar po dang ni ljang nag dag/drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang //tshe ring ba la shes pa'o//lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni//'byung por gyur pa'i de ma thag/sa
39b2(rgyud): stengs thams cad mun nag 'khris//bdud rnams thams cad rab tu ching //ye shes me 'od chen po 'di//bzod par bla la gcig mi mchis//bgegs chen log par 'dren pa rnam///
39b3(rgyud): dog pa'i sems kyis thag rings 'bros//gsang sngags yi ge hUM sgra can//glog 'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra//klad par yi ge hUM gi gzugs//gru gsum maM yi gzugs brnyan cen/
39b4(rgyud): 'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas//bgegs tsho gas sreg cing 'bros par byed//bong bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs//ro langs ma lus thams cad kun//ha hUM brjod cing 'bros par
39b5(rgyud): byed//rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rdul dang mtshungs//gyen thur haM gi 'phro 'du dang //khro bcu swa bon yi ge hU~M//me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar//mngon sum rtswa la me bzhin du//
39b6(rgyud): snying gi hUM gis 'das nas kyang //klad pa'i hUM gis sreg par byed//'dod dang phyag rgya lha yi sku//bskrad dang bcing dang myos byed bsam//seng ge dang ni gleng chen 'brug/drag
39b7(rgyud): po'i sgra skad ci 'dra bar//rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlos pa ni//bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa//sreg cing phye ma rdul du rlog/snying nang snying po bstan pa ni//'od 'bar 'od
40a1(rgyud): kyis sdig pa'i chags//du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad//lus ngag yid brtan 'khor mo sngags//oM dang AHdang DU byor gyis//dpal 'phel dang
40a2(rgyud): phyug bskyed pa dang //go cha chen po bskon par byed//na ma s+t+wa~M ya d+hI kA nAn/ta thA ga tA nAM haM go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'dis//rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na//bgegs
40a3(rgyud): rnams sreg pa smos ci dgos//sa ma ya s+t+waM e tAM gis//ye shes lha dang 'brel par bya//rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni//ye shes dbu rgyan brtags par bya//ga
40a4(rgyud): la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can//'khor kun mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya//bdag nyid yi gor byas nasu//me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni//mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya//
40a5(rgyud): sdang ba d+h+r-i gi sgra laso//'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//sngag
40a6(rgyud): spyod tshul gyi cho ga nyon//dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing //byang chub sems las ma bskyed de//dbang skur rjes gnang ma thob la//sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi//gas
40a7(rgyud): sngogs rang nyid len pa ni//byis pa lcags sreg med pa 'dra//thog ma med sgrib bkru ba'i phyir//rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjod//oM sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag rgyu
40b1(rgyud): / sa g+sa d+hA nanam du rgyun nAd m+WA/g+sa sa
41a1(rgyud): oM shes rab ral bri bla na mod//gang gis 'chang ba rgyal 'gyur to//bdud kyi dpung ni bshegs nas kyang //mkha' la ye shes 'od 'bar 'gyur//
41a2(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+rA dz+nyA nA khan+ta a d+hits+tshin+d+ra d+h+waM/a/rdo rje zhags thugs rdo N+DI can//nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong po rnams/thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang //srid
41a3(rgyud): pA'i 'ching ba las grol mdzad//oM sirba t+ya thA ga tA badz+ra pA shaM na aSh+NISh+T+rIny+tsa hUM//dbang dang rjes gan de ma thob cing //dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la//bla ma mnyes par
41a4(rgyud): mi byed na//sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro/log lta can gang bla ma 'tsho//dmyal ba'i gan su 'gro bar nges//'dir nyams pas ni nad yams dang //dgra bo mu ges
41a5(rgyud): rtag tu 'chi//dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyams dga' ba//chu klung mtsho 'gra mi ro ljongs dang //'bras bu me tog bskyed mos 'tshal//kun dga' rab khang bzang mchog/
41a6(rgyud): bzhi mdo re sul shing gcig drung //phyugs ltas khang brtsegs glang chen bres//gtsug lag khang deng dgon pa dang //chu gling mtshe'u 'gram ne'u gasding du//bsnyen dang
41a7(rgyud): dbang bskur byed pa dang //dur khrod sogasu las rnams sgrub//las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang ste//dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po la//thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa//
41b1(rgyud): yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya//gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya//yang na rnga'am bdun du bya//gza'i dkyil 'khor khru gnyis to//yang na phyi dang gsum pAr bya//kun tu ban
41b2(rgyud): po drung ste//khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te//khang pa gnyis po che gsum pa//rta babyas rdo rje pad+ma'o//lha rnams bzhi tshe dag tu 'gyur//thub pa'i sgo na bzhi don te/gzhan
41b3(rgyud): du sgo gcig pa nyid shis//'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang gi sgo//chos ni nub sgo rdo rje lho//gza' dang 'jig rten skyong sogs shar//dbang bsgyur lha yi gnas rnamasu//bum pa
41b4(rgyud): phyag rgyar bcas pa 'am//sku 'am rang rang phyag rgya bzhag/thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//pad dkar steng du lhung bzed//gtso bo yis ni sor drug ste//lhag ma rnams ni
41b5(rgyud): sor bzhi'o//rigs kyi mtshan mas yang yang bskor//byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni//pad dkar rdo rje gdangos por bcas//dbang ldan spyi blugs byams pa'i 'o//shar du
41b6(rgyud): 'jam dpal u dpal sngo//mair ni kun bzang yid bzhin no//lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin//bden bral mkha' snying bad dkur te/nub tu pad ser rdo rje chos//nub byang sa snying
41b7(rgyud): pad+ma dmar//gtsug tor gnod mdzes steng 'og char//gtsug tor dang ni gtun shing //shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste//mi ri ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsumo//rdo rje rtse gcig
42a1(rgyud): /gshin rje lhor//bden bral ral gri stobs po che//nub tu rta mgrin pad+ma ste//byang du bsogs dpya rdo rje rgya//nub tu dbyug pa ston pa ste//dbang ldan du
42a2(rgyud): mi g.yo ba//de yi rgyag tu nyan thos ni//shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang //mdzo gal bu dang 'di srung dang //rgyal mchog dang nis stengs spyong //rta thul dang ni ba lang 'a ga
42a3(rgyud): drag shul dbang chen tshangs bu can//b+ha ra d+h+wa dza steng rgyas dang //dga' bo nyer dga' sgra gcan//de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o//pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed do//de nas yang
42a4(rgyud): dgu bshad bya ba//'jam dpal dkyi m+b+ha la bar bzung po yi//dbusu ral g+hi me 'od na na//rin chen rje brag stong du blo//byang du rdo rjes mtshan mi yi//dram pa bri ba byam
42a5(rgyud): pa'o//shwar du kun tu bzang po yi//rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya//g+hor ni me 'ong ldan pa yi//lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri//nub tu 'jig rten dbang ba ste//dad dkar 'od dang ldan
42a6(rgyud): pa b+hi//yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs can//rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan pa//mer ni rab 'bar rdo rje yi//bagled 'phreng pad+mal gnas kyi//bden du l+yA du ni rA
42a7(rgyud): brjod pa'i//ko cha 'bar ba bri bar bya//rlung du mdzes pa gzhon nu'i///rin chen skyon ni bri bar bya//steng du rtul ba ces/zlo ci'o//ping+ge steng du zhwa na yi//'on tu
42b1(rgyud): m+b+ha ma ga kazugs/rdo blug sa sa zhugs pa blo//b+h+yo ga rtag pastan ldan//tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod pa bya//brtan pa zlos pa'i ny+tsa //rmya k+shi b+h+ya du b+h+yo bAr d+ha/
42b2(rgyud): zlo ba'i du la la b+h+ring 'chang ba ma//ma khar so mA na~M shar du/ bai ng+ga chang ba yi//rnama'ajigasamA ni thu//ma gyi phyogs b+h+yo//mdzad
42b3(rgyud): sgye r+yen+te byed 'dzin//rin chen rdo steng shar g+ho gr-i/shar stong glegs 'dzin ma zhes pa//'khor 'i ma byur d+ha g+sa//'ber ba'i gtun shing bden la du//'adz+ram/
42b4(rgyud): bam+b+hi duk+Sha/bal skur gling po nang du ts+tsha/dzo ga rgyu da//sngags nas dkyil 'khor sbyin gyis bstsu//namaHsar+b+bar+b+ba thAg tun su/
42b5(rgyud): /ma swAd+d+ha/smyen b+h+yAM sa ga shig sogs pa'i dang //snang tshig gzugs min ma//nAm/snro twASh+Tha ba sh+tsama? ShehrI.A
42b6(rgyud): zhe na/sngag r+b+hag ste b+hA ga d+hA na~M shrI b+hU swAn//bsnyen pa 'dzum la byin rlabs dang //lha sgrub pa de mchod pa'o//don pa maud dag pa shA b+h+ya/rdo rje sngon gyi la
42b7(rgyud): sa su jig na gyung //drung ba ba tshang // na ma sa /krang dri srin pa'i ma //skye na namapa'i dri mang //
43a1(rgyud): sngon po 'chang ba'o//nung tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma//byung du thugs sa shugs poche//dzorje nug po 'dzin pa \u0f88\u0f90//sgrol ma khro nyar ral gcig dang //mad
43a2(rgyud): bzang ma ni mtsham su bri//khro bo dang ni pho nya mo//'jam pa'i dbyings kyi rim pas dgod//de nas phyag na rdo rje yi//dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya//dbus phyag na
43a3(rgyud): rdo rje nyid//rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o//shar du sangs rgyas spyan ma yin//lhor ni pa 'dzin mA ma kau/nub tu gros 'chang na bza' dkar/byung du sgrol ma sud pal 'chang //
43a4(rgyud): phyogs bzhir na mkha' dri med dang //shugs po che dang rdo rje rtog/bsnyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams//rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o//der yang ston ltar khro bo rnams//rim
43a5(rgyud): bo bzhin du bri bar bya//de yi cha rgyab dkyil 'khor la//drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni//dpung bzang la sogs rdo rje can//brgyad po byang gi phyogasu bri//tshogs 'chang ba
43a6(rgyud): gnyen 'gro skyong dang //mthong dka' rigs byed bden bral med//ngan stong brgyad de drang srong shar//lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma//rdo rje tho ba drag shul mo//rta rna ma dang khro gnyer
43a7(rgyud): ro langs me dong lcags sgrog ma//mthong dka' ma ste brgyad po bri//dug sel rma bya 'od zer can//nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma//dbyangs ldan dril sgrol brgyad nub phyog
43b1(rgyud): kun kyang rang rig phyung rgyu can//skyo yi phyog su dgod bya ba//thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi//brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che//tshongs pa 'dzum da la dkyil 'khor la'o//rgyal
43b2(rgyud): da rnams rgyu mu mdzub bo//gzhan mi pa sbyin so rtags/natsho sbyin+dan+tu/gzhan nu 'drog myod N+Di 'dzin gyi//khyod med mo sbyi la//nag po tshe dang dge spyo /
43b3(rgyud): ngan spong dang ni tshigs bdag go//mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes pa yi//dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'i//ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o//phyogs bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o//'khor los
43b4(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i chu byad can//rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang //rgyu bram g.yas pa'i phyog tu 'ching //g.yon pasdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang //rin chen breg la sku bzhugs nas//zhabs
43b5(rgyud): gnyis pad+ma'i steng du'o//mtsham su khro mo bzhi po yang //gtso bo dang mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams//de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu//sru 'am phyag rgya'i phreng ba bri//dkyil 'khor cha mi
43b6(rgyud): rgyab tu ni//'jig rten skyong bcu drungag /shul can//khros pas rang rigs 'khor bcas bri//bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri/dri bzung chus bkong lta grangs sam//bcu gnyis sam
43b7(rgyud): no drug kyang rung //kha rgyan dang bcas bzhag par bya//bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal mtshan//yon chab bdug spos me tog dang //sgron me byung chab zhal zas dang //gling bu sol snyan
44a1(rgyud): nA bza'i tshogs//gtor ma dri bzung sman dang bcas//yid 'ong dri zhim zas skom tshogs//dkyil 'khor smras nas mchod par bya//sa la dbus mo
44a2(rgyud): tshad brkos nas//'bru srin shing rdo dum bu sogs//skyon mang 'bral nas sa yis dgang //ba'i rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar//me tog bcal bkra mo mchod sogs bkod//
44a3(rgyud): lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas kyang //dge dang mi dge'i rmi lam brtag/rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas//sa bdag mo la gsol ba gdab//khyad par du yang gtor mas mchod//
44a4(rgyud): bu chur shog ces theg chen gyi//tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas//gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams//khyod la yang dag bstan par bya//dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba//
44a5(rgyud): rnams//mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas//ye shes mtshungs pa med pa brnyes//skyob pa shAkya seng gros kyang //gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dis//bdud sde shin
44a6(rgyud): tu mi bzad pa//dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom//'jig rten 'dul phyir chos rnams kyi//'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das//de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir//bu
44a7(rgyud): khyod blo gros 'di gyis shig/u dum ba ri'i me tog ltar//rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste//skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che//rnyed dka'
44b1(rgyud): na dang//gan sa sa na byu/na tu ga skyodu // tu da// du rlos //myur
44b2(rgyud): la bgis rgyags sa//seM s+t+wa~M s+yaigs sdigs nur su // dzigs so/sa mi klog sa na nas 'thun 'di dang //sreg
44b3(rgyud): di dang //zas seMm gos rgyun la sa spyod // deg skyed dal phyi b+ha dag/myur dus sma ba ma// stegs sa brdzuni ng+gA s+ho//sbyar
44b4(rgyud): gsum mgon po rnams//byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i//byang chub sems ni bla med pa//dam pa bdag gos bskyed par bya//sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //dge ba'i chos ni spyad ce
44b5(rgyud): dang //sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum//deng nas mchog tu brtan par gzung //'gro la lhag pa'i sems bskyed nas//bla ma li ni yon phul zhu//yid bzhin no ri 'dra
44b6(rgyud): bla meng sgra//zhi ba sangs rgyas glu 'bengs thob//srog gcod nu nu brdzun mi tshungs spyod//myos byed mthung dang rgyu gar rog//rgyan blugs mal chen mgyi ba dang //phyi dro ba zas
44b7(rgyud): spang bste//brgyad dang bcu gcig bco lnga dang //khyad par dudri ni gnam stong la//del 'byor thob po shin tu dkon//sas rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon//sdom pa rlangs nas
45a1(rgyud): srog bzhin du//g.yengs med bsdams te bsrung bar bya//gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya//lha moM bde ldan lus thob nas//dmyal ba dud 'bro yi dgas
45a2(rgyud): gnas//thob gnas spang dekA de dag no//nam yang thob pa mi bya'o//bdag ni dada' bo ral bri 'chang //gsong ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas//bka' las 'das pa'i gdugs can rnams//
45a3(rgyud): dum bu phye mar 'grus par 'gyur//slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni//bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthung skyed bya//long spyod 'i rol phyir gtor ma btang //bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod
45a4(rgyud): pa brten//bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas//gtong phod dul zhing chos spyod mangs//nad med bzod des snying rje tshe//sngags sgrub brtson dpal shes rab can//brtags nas
45a5(rgyud): slob ma lnga 'am bdun//dad partson zhi dul bla ma bkur//sdigs 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang //dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa bzung //'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i
45a6(rgyud): rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub che//gzhan du med pa
45a7(rgyud): phul byung ba//rgyu de 'dir bshad pa mnyan par byos//mo ni ri na chen dang po ste//gang gang sgrub pa de dang de//'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min//ral gri lcags sam
45b1(rgyud): shi la byas//sbyar bzhi pa 'am sor brgyud bya//yu bar phyogs kyi rgyuny+dzA b+h+yo//dwa yon ma lta hU~M zhi mtshus//dgrus N+Do dang ma b+h+yon mchod//rno drug sngags bzlas khro bsna/
45b2(rgyud): ral gri drod dngul 'od du'abar//blangs pas mnga'i spyod yul 'gro 'gyur//tshon bar gyi bsgril ba s+t+wa~M//lho yi bzhon po sna tshogs bcings//sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'go bar 'gyur//
45b3(rgyud): gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa 'am//shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub//rgyal mtshan nor bu gi wang gdugaso//lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin sgrub//lha rnams sgruban tha
45b4(rgyud): shing la//gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te//sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong //ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod pa smra//klu la nA ga gai sar shing //gnod sbyin la ni gse
45b5(rgyud): las gzugs//dri za la~M ni 'chi'i sh-i //mkhal rjo 'jim pa'i gzugs kyis//srin po la ni dur khrod shing //gang yang gzugs byis rkang pa ni//g.yon pas de mo skaman
45b6(rgyud): te/sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong //ci 'dod sme tshe dgos pa blang //shA ra du ras rIsi khaM smad drung //dus gsum khrus byas gos rlom gyon//sum 'bum bzlas na mar ngo la//
45b7(rgyud): brgyad la 'byung po gtor ma sbyin//maN+Dal steng du re'i zhag nas//rang nyid rin chen khri steng du//snying na khri brjod ro'i dul 'gyur//mi sgru ba khaM yi nang du lce//pad+ma la phye ste/
46a1(rgyud): nan mad//banad+hAn la gri rig 'dzin 'gyur//lha yi gzugs kyi tshangs pa yi//'jog rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu//go wang bdun banas
46a2(rgyud): les ni//skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo //mig po dbus mo bcug pa 'am//'jam de la ris ma'i drung du ni//'jam dpal sngags 'di sa ya bzlas//nyal khyod pa'i mchod
46a3(rgyud): pabyas//mtshan ras bzlas pa'i tho rangs nus//dang po rtags su g.yo bar 'gyur//gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed//phyogs bzhir ma khyen pa sgra chen po//tahA 'brun
46a4(rgyud): spyad grag par 'gyur//gsum par mkha' la rig 'dzin rnams//me tog char 'bengs chun 'phyar bskyong //de rjes rig 'dzin ma sros dang //'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor na
46a5(rgyud): khro rgyal byon nas gsung sbyin gyis//ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur//rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs//ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya//'grub nas borgyad gnyis cha byed can
46a6(rgyud): brgyan bzeng lag na rim glu thogs lha yi bzhon pa la bcibs nas//rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu//sangs rgyas zhing ma sbyin pa'i tshe//rgyal sras rnams kyis phyog
46a7(rgyud): byas nas//mchod pa chen po thoba'i gyur te//bskal pa du mar che gnas 'gyur//ud pal sngon po lig gu mig/ru rta zangs snod ril bu banag/zla ba gzas zin po
46b1(rgyud): bzlas nas//mig brkus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur//bdag ni sus kyang mi mtho'o//gnam lcags rdo rje sor bcu drug/ngos gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te//tsan dan dmar
46b2(rgyud): dang dri bzang phyug/chu 'phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar//mchod cing bzlas na tha mAr ni//mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de//ku shaM khrus kyi stong 'dug nas//rdo rje lag gnyis gzung
46b3(rgyud): mthag/dud 'phrul 'od du 'bar nas kyang //'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi//'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur//'khor lo bdun brtsegs mtshon cha dang //gser da
46b4(rgyud): mal lham tshangs skud sogs//dgos pa thams cad de ltar sgrub//sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung //tshes gcig nyin par sku gzugs kyi//mthe bor dza ti sngags brjod brdeg
46b5(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad kyis mthe bong las//'od zer phyung nas rig mo thag/dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil gyur nas//'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po thob//sus kyang mi thub lus grub 'gyur/
46b6(rgyud): tsheche ni bskal po'i bar du gnas//sa la pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri//bum pa skud pa nag pos bkri//tsan dan gyis byug dris kyang dgang //pad+ma'i steng gzhag pad stongs 'dug/stong drug
46b7(rgyud): brgyad bzlas sa gzhigs//pad+mar snang zhing sa gzhir snang //chu des gtor la khru gang bskor//blangs pas bskal pa'i tshe tshad thob//grog mkhar saM la seng ge bya//gi wang
47a1(rgyud): sa byugs dkyil 'khor bzhug/g.yon 'gul bar du mchod cing bzlas//seng ger gyur nas rgyu bzhon nas//'dod gzugs lha gnas kun tu 'gro/
47a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur//tshe lo khri phrag gcig bskor nas//rig 'dzin chen po'i gan su 'gro/'dir gsungs pa 'am ma gsungs pa//sngags dang lha 'angs
47a3(rgyud): sgrub pa yis//rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams//ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las/rig 'dzin sgrub
47a4(rgyud): de'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//phran tshe gas las kyi sbyor ba gtso//gza' yi cho ga 'di yin te//gnod pa sel dang pha
47a5(rgyud): skyed mdzad//ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa yi//dkyil 'khor dbus pad+ma ni//kha dog sna tshogs nyis rtseg gi/dbus su spangs rgyas de bzhin lhor//chos ni rdo rje chos dkar go/
47a6(rgyud): shar du dge 'dun ljang ku'o//nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar//byang du phyag na rdo rje ste//byang shar du ni 'jam dpal ser//mer ni gshin rje gshed po gnag/dbyugs
47a7(rgyud): 'chang ma he zhon pa'i//mi g.yi mgon po srin po phyogs//rta mgrin rlung gi phyog su'o//dkon mchog gsum po chos 'chang rgya//sems dpa' khro bo rang rtag so//kun kyang
47b1(rgyud): na chen khri la 'bugs//de rgyab chal bza' rnams te//shar du nyi ma dkar ser ni//rta la zhon te pad+ma 'chang //nub tu zla ba dkar po ni//ku mu da 'chang ngang bzhon//lhor ni mig dmas
47b2(rgyud): kha dog dmar//rol pa'i stong bzhugs me sbyin bsnams//lhag pa mdog ser ud bral 'tshang //byang du bde stengs bzhugs b+ha yi//pur bu mdog sngon glegs pa mthogs//
47b3(rgyud): shar lho phyogasu klu la bcibs//pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang //lho nub gser gyi khri la bzhugs//byang shar spen pa mdog nag ni//tshangs pa'i steng na dbyug pa thogs//
47b4(rgyud): nub byong sgra gcan dud ka ni//sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin//rnon po ljang ku ral gri 'chang //gtso bo drung du pad stengs bzhugs//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba swa pa raM pU
47b5(rgyud): raM kau b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM b+ha ki nI swA hA/nyi mA'i snying po'o//na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM sarba tra yaM a swA hA/zla ba'i'o//no muHsarba te thA ga taM/
47b6(rgyud): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ko b+h+yaHsarba thA au A bIr+yA ya swAt+ma/rnon po'i'o//na moHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yAMHsar+b+ba sA bA ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarbaH/oM su bi shud d+ha swAhA/mig dmar gyi'o//
47b7(rgyud): no maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM bi su Ta pa ka ya sA hA/gza' lhag gi'o//oM na ma~MHsarba ta thA ga taM b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba sA pa ra~M pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba thA oM
48a1(rgyud): b+h+r-i ka mya d+hA ya s+thAhwA/phur bu'i'o//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+bA swa ba ri pU ra kle b+h+yaHsarba thA oM su d+har+m+mar+N+Na ra ho stA hA/pa thA sangs kyi'o//ma sarbA r+b+heb+h+yas A pa ra
48a2(rgyud): b+hu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM kr-iSh+Ta bair+Na paM kaM s+yA hA/spen pa'i'o//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sAM pA ri ra kle b+h+yaHsarbab+hU au ba kr-i dA laM ku ru tsi stAt+ma/sgra ga can gyi'o//sngags
48a3(rgyud): re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas//ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab//longs spyod spel cig 'jigs pa sel//nad med bgegs rims 'joms par 'gyur//rims sogs
48a4(rgyud): gzas zin nad la yang //sku yi drung du gsol btab sel//zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba//de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa//skabs gtus/
48a5(rgyud): nas dgra khyim sba//dgra bo nad skyed nor rnams brlag//rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung ba rau nges//stag pu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu//dgra bo'i sgor spras skrod par byed//ne'u laM nag po
48a6(rgyud): zhal rba rus//rang khrag gtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams//gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor sba//dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bar 'gyur//mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni//thod pa
48a7(rgyud): so can nang thugs nas//gang gi sgor bzhag khang pa 'jig/ku shi'i gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan//dbang byar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na//rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur/
48b1(rgyud): //byung ba gzhan lta sgras dgas//bud mod skyes phyugs la sogs la//ra mod ldan pa'i gzugs byas to//rkang pa gzha na mnan mong babs paH//dang dang gang yang ngas par 'gyu/
48b2(rgyud): sal bgegs kyi gzugs byis te//sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur//'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te//gdab cing brdungs na sel bar nges//phur bus gang
48b3(rgyud): dang mtshan chas drug/rdo rje rin cig brgyud ldan//sa la byas pa'i thams byar du//gzugs brnyan bcug ste nga bas mnan//gzas zin nub mo'i maN+Dal//dri zangs mi
48b4(rgyud): tog sil me bkra me//pha rol phyin pa'i rmu gos bem bzhugs//dngas ma'i snod du mar bzhago ste//sing lde mas ni bskol bar bya//dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang /
48b5(rgyud): gter mthong byar yang 'dis 'gyur//khros dus spyan gyi phyag rgyu bya//hUM mthi'i gsang sngags drag tu brjod//dur khrod ltung grong byin pa//gdon gyi 'dzin na ma bran du 'gyur//
48b6(rgyud): don sa mig yo spyan gcig pa'o//sngags kyi chog po shad por bya//ris mo'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum//brjod pas 'di mi bsnyen pa rdzogs//dben par zin gyi tshong rje sbyin/
48b7(rgyud): ni rgyab cu 'phrul par 'gyur//medzub mo'i rgyal hUM bkod nas//brjod pas sprin rnams 'brel bar byed//dge bo sbyar bcas gzugs brgyan la//rkang gson mnan bzlas rgya
49a1(rgyud): /phur gdag/bka' nyan 'gyur rogatubs na shing //skud pa ser po bcings nang ngag/srang lab mnan nA mnan pa 'gyur//ralpags brabs na ga/
49a2(rgyud): nyon 'gyur//srad bu yungs kar la bzlas te//'chang na gang 'dod srung bar byed//ne ma dzu sarba ta thA ga tA b+h+yaHsarba bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarbathA/oM tsatrai la maN+Da ro ShaNA
49a3(rgyud): b+h+yad+d+harnA mait+mamUH/tsi l-ikAn dz+haiMd+hIb+h+rUM e b+hU tItwA twAt+tathA ga twAd+b+ha/ trUM hU~M n+do swAH/rgyu mtshor 'du bye'i dz+rI du//tsan dan sngags pa'i 'di na//sngags pa
49a4(rgyud): tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs//gser gyi dang tshe rnyid par 'gyur//bram ze 'am ni dge 'dun raso//rgyal po ras sam g+hi ga la//pad+ma mu khyad gnyis ldan bri//lte bar oM nA
49a5(rgyud): ming dang bcas//tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShA Na//phaT dang bcas pa mdab mer bkod//mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te//gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri/dri dang me tog
49a6(rgyud): sogs mched nas//skabs kyi dril nas lus la bcang //gdon dang nad dang mu ge sel//g.yul du phyin pa rgyal bar 'gyur//yang na ral gri so bzhir bri//'od kyi
49a7(rgyud): ri mo nang chud pa//yaM d+harma la sogs kyis bskor//dbus su ming dang bcas pa yi//snying po sngags ni khrig su dri//'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur//mtho lngas
49b1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i bar du ni//mtho gang 'phang du yod pa bya//nang du ma tshul gyis 'jam dpal sngags//mgo na rgyun du bltas pa bro//kha la nyo bar rton 'grol sngags//spya lnga las byas
49b2(rgyud): dgra yi gzugs//dug dang gi khrag gis bris nas//ming sdig bsang par bcas pa ni//ling kha'i snong khor bcug byas te//dkyil 'khor gru gisum nag pa yi//dngos/
49b3(rgyud): mtho gang brus byas te//nang bzhig steng du sder bu sbub//ji srid mar gyis chos gcig nas//zla ba mi snang zhag bar du//nyin mo rten 'brel sngags bzlas te//mtshan dus
49b4(rgyud): khro bo spyan gcig pa'i//sngags ni drag tu brjod par bya//mtshams dang ci srid mtshams bar du//g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags//drug cu rtswa bzhi'i grangasu brjod//
49b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung //bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni//mchod rten la ni bseg bshad bsil//sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang //sngags la
49b6(rgyud): 'phya zhing sems can 'tsho//log lha log par spyod byed cing //sems can la 'tsho byed pa ni//rgyal po khro bo che bcu dang //'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi//mtshigs gan
49b7(rgyud): dang rgyu skar tshogs//bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol//rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi//'don pa'i methu yang du mi brjod//dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni//nag po gru
50a1(rgyud): gsum khru gang ba'i//sreg shing nag po gsum pa la//bde gshegs yi ge brgya bas pa/gur gum li khris bris pa'o//mya ngan mod shing gru gsum la//
50a2(rgyud): rgya gram dbang chen rim par bca'o//laM sta~M b+ha ya nan pa brgyad//phyogs brgyad bri da'i rwa dbus la//nye snying ming dang bcas pa bri//de yi lte bar snying po ni//bsad pa'i
50a3(rgyud): ming bcas bri ba'o//tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod//ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras//sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod//ce srid gsum dang bdun par du/
50a4(rgyud): le lo med par byas gyur na//dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang //sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te//sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
50a5(rgyud): gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pA mis//sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste//khyad par sbyor ba cung zad bshad//yungs kAr bsnun pas 'byung po 'bros//ser bsrung ni 'khor lo
50a6(rgyud): 'am/rnga dang rung la bri bar bya//ga yul du 'jug na ral bre sogs//nad la 'khor la chu yungs kar//tha~Md lo kor gyi sa sa phrer lo//bris te skor sbas spre'u srung //
50a7(rgyud): spra tshil gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa//dur khrid thal bzlas blo stengs bzhag/nad pa gden las srung bar nges//snying khar ming sngags spel bcug nas//tshe mkhar
50b1(rgyud): btsugs ngag rengs byed//snying la btsugs nas khros pa zhe//nan tan sems kyis gsod par nges//ling gas brtags kyi nus pa med//yang na rabs chad thod pa la//ming sngags bris
50b2(rgyud): ta mi khrag bkang //rabs chad du ra sbas rigs rgyud 'chad//khyi nag thod par ming sngags bcas//dug bkang klu gnas sdes mdzes yin//dgra yi skor sgras 'byed par byed//
50b3(rgyud): zhing du sbas na lo nyes byed//phyugs nad god 'byung zla dang 'byed//chu dong sbas na chu skems 'gyur//me dur sbas na rims kyis 'dzin//yang na dgra ming khrag gis bris//spra tshil
50b4(rgyud): gzugs kyi snying khar bcug/mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i//nang bcug dong bzhag lhung bzed sbub//bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing //nag po ches nas phyis bskor
50b5(rgyud): zhing /bden pa'i mthu brjod gzugs brnyan sreg/dgra bo shi 'gyur tha tsom med//gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag/ka tra ta yi lte ba ma la//ka ro ki yi dusu ni//gzugs la
50b6(rgyud): ming dang sngags bcas bri//rkang pas mnyes na rdul du 'gyur//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin na//mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la//sngags dang yul lha'i ming spel bri//lha yi gan
50b7(rgyud): bcug de stang du//sngags bzlas phur pa snying khar gdab/gdug pa'i tsher ma'i hom sbar te//mi rta ba glang khyim he//sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod//lha khyod yul
51a1(rgyud): 'dir thog ser pob//med na bskal par khyod nyid sreg/de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do//'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus
51a2(rgyud): pa'i brgyad las sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste brgyud pa'o///de nas sbyin sreg las rnams kun//myur 'grub thabs ni bshad par bya//mngar gsum du ra bya
51a3(rgyud): bsregs pa yis//gnod rigs thams cad sel bar byed//yam shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing //gdon nad thams cad zhi bar byed//'o ma can gyi ya ma shang la//
51a4(rgyud): 'o ma dur ba til dang 'bras//snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na//gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//ga bur mngar gsum 'bru thams cad//dur ba dkar
51a5(rgyud): po'i yam shing rnams//'am can gyi shing la sreg/nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi//'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad//phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur//dur ba
51a6(rgyud): mngar gsum ming bcas pas//bsregs pas rta phyugs nad zhi byed//shar lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni//dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'grub//khru gang khru gnyis tshad kyi
51a7(rgyud): thab//sor bzhir kha khyer rim pas btang //sems dpa' pad+ma'i rdo rje dang //gcig pus zhi rgyas dbang drug 'grub//de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni//ci 'dod thob pa
51b1(rgyud): bshad par bya//pad+ma'i tshul 'bum phrag gcig/rgyal po thob ste blon za no//ku mu da la 'bum phrag gsum//zho dang mngar gsum dang bcas pa'o//a ba marga'i 'bras bu dang /
51b2(rgyud): mdar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag thob//ri bzang 'bum dag bdun gyis ni//yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur//dur ba til dang 'bras sogs sreg/bud med bu bzang thob par/
51b3(rgyud): 'gyur//nor 'drad pas ni rkun po yi//lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhig nas//mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni//nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur//yang na rgya yi lpags pa
51b4(rgyud): la//gur gum gi wang yung bas ni//byi ba che brjid ser po bri//shar na mdzod phugs bltas par bzhag/zas kyi lhag mas mchod bya zhing //gsol ba btab pas nor rnyed
51b5(rgyud): 'gyur//pad+ma'i ze ba ka laM ka/pri yang kus ni nor rnyed do//'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen thob//ku mu da yi 'bras sogs sreg/longs spyod che dang sa gzhi 'thob//
51b6(rgyud): pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtse mar//srin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol ba//gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur//bol ba'i 'bras bu mngar gsum bcas//'bum phrag gsum du bsregs
51b7(rgyud): bas ni//rang nyid rgyal po chen por 'gyur//mar dang nyung kar dkar pos ni//nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregs na//snying po stong pa rgyas par 'gyur//nas la sogs
52a1(rgyud): pa'i 'bru rigs rnams//gang bsrogs gsol btab de rgyas 'gyur//gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can//me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur//spos
52a2(rgyud): shing bsregs na 'khor gnog 'brel//zho mAr seng lding me la stong //bsregs nA nor rnams rnyed par 'gyur//de nas dbang gi skyog lugs bshad//trai la dang 'bras
52a3(rgyud): sogs du bu ma bsregs//bud med dbang du byed pa'o//pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg gis//byis pa rnams ni dbang du 'gyur//'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ra'i//shing la bsregs
52a4(rgyud): na lte dang byed//gsum po de dang gu gul sreg/gnod sbyin rnams ni dbang du 'gyur//mya ngan med pa'i yam shing gis//gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du 'gyur//rgyal po'i
52a5(rgyud): yungs kar yungs mar bcas//bsregs pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur//de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i//sbyin sreg yang dag bshad par bya//ming bcas tshad dang nim
52a6(rgyud): bya bsregs//bstan snang dgra ba~M myur du 'chi//dgra ming drug gis nim pa la//skyes te dug drung lhan cig tu//sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas//thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag
52a7(rgyud): ste//lnga po yungs mer gyis bkang nas//gsum ni skyed po gnyis brtsegs la//khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas//sngags brjod thal bar gyur par du//nyin phyed
52b1(rgyud): bsrog na dgra 'chings//'chi ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun//ra khrag nyung mar tshwa r+ya skyogaso//che ba'i dung shing yam shing la//bdun phrag maung dang bcas pa sreg/stong phrag gnyis kyis
52b2(rgyud): rta phyugs 'chi//bzhis ni bu dang chung ma 'chi//drug gi nye du gnyen 'dun brlag/brgyud kyi dgra yi rang srog 'chung //gal te skyabasu 'ong gyur na//'o ma stong bsregs rnal du
52b3(rgyud): sos//khrag dang dug phye nim pa'i 'bras//yungs mar la sbags brgya rtsa brgyad //myos byed la bsregs dgra bo 'chi//yang ni rus phyi ni ma pa'i lnga//rang gi khrog gam yungs
52b4(rgyud): mar sbag/yang na ske tsho dug dang ni//nim pa'i 'bras bu bsad par bya//yang na gri khrag gis bsregs pas//byed ma myur du gsod par 'gyur//ni ma pa'i lde dang ra khrag dug/
52b5(rgyud): dri ma lnga bcas gzugs snying khar//ming yig bcug nas phur bus gdob//rig sngags byed ma nyid log 'gyur//rgya skyegs mi rus phye ma yis//mi lpags rlon pa dgra gzugs/
52b6(rgyud): bri//dug dang ske tshe cung zad byug/nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro//bsregs pas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi//du ra bro 'o mas sros par 'gyur//dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang //
52b7(rgyud): mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams brlab//tsha gsum lan cha du rang sbyar//yungs mar ro sgra sbrul shun dang //ni ma pa'i lnga dang mi rus phye//skye tshe dug phye sgog tsong dang //sgog
53a1(rgyud): skya tsher ma'i me la sreg/dgra bo khrag tu skyugs te 'chi//rgya skyegs lan che ba lang mkhris//bsregs na mchin gas nad kyis 'chi//sge'u gsher
53a2(rgyud): lan tshwa tsha ba gsum//gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal du ma l-i//mgo nas rkang po'i bar du sreg/thig nag gis ni gsod par 'gyur//'o ma can gyi yams shing la//
53a3(rgyud): dkar gsum bsregs na sos par 'gyur//dri chus spangs pa'i s+ya las ni//thab khung byas te dug gis byug/nim pa'i 'drab mar dgra bo'i ming //ra khrag gis bris
53a4(rgyud): rgyus pa dkris//tshe gsum shing gi mir bsregs pas//rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges//dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba gsum//ming bcas gzugs brnyan nim pa'i mor//
53a5(rgyud): bsregs ni dgra bo dmu rdzing ngam//mdze nad gyis ni gsod par 'gyur//tsha gsum ni ma pa dug dang dur//khrag dang lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan ni//lan tshe nim pa che ba'i
53a6(rgyud): ma ra//byugs nas argi'i shing la bsregs//mdze nad chen pos gzung nas 'chi//ra khrag tshwa gsum nyungs mar spos//nim pa'i lo ma na le sham//nyungs dmar
53a7(rgyud): dug bsregs tshabs 'chi//ne'u sho 'am dug dang che//da ru ra lnga tsha ba gsum//sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya//nyungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi//tshe gsum
53b1(rgyud): pa yi 'bras bu yi//nim pa'i 'dab ma dgra ming bri//thod par dug nyungs lhan cig bzhag/da ru ra lnga btsos na 'ching //ris ma byang du bltas nas kyang //rang nyid lho phyogs blta
53b2(rgyud): bar bya//tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang //'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can//ma mo mkha'agro sha za sogs//sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems//rig 'dzin khro bo'i
53b3(rgyud): /rgyal po dang /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson//sdigs cen nga rgyal gdug cing khro//chad lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog bcom//bstan la sdang zhing sems can 'tshe//
53b4(rgyud): mtshams med can 'di bsgral du gsol//rlung gis 'phar zhing cha re gyis gshir//mes gdung rdul chub skabs 'dir sgra//seng ge mkha' lding steg khro dos//bcom zhing 'bu sbrang
53b5(rgyud): bung rgod kyis//khrag 'jib bya tshogs mkha' la khyer//mngon spyod las kyis bsam gtan no//de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa//mi rus phye ma tshe skye tshe//gnod sbyin
53b6(rgyud): 'khrig pa dug shing la//tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas ni//bo skad dang dbye dang smyo bar byed//ngur ba 'o mar bcas pas sos//da dur yan lag lnga 'bras bu//tsher ma'i
53b7(rgyud): mes bsregs skyo bar byed//tshe gsum lan tshwas cha rims bskyed//yang na sheng bskams lta bur bskams//rngam pa'i ra dang rang sgyur bcas//dgra bo grang ba'i rims
54a1(rgyud): kyi 'debs//khA'i sgro ai raN+Da yi myur khus//byugs ba da du ra me la sreg/log stobs khwa ta lta bur ni//dgra bos mtha' kun tu 'khyam//ske tshe mi
54a2(rgyud): rus lan tshwa dug/nyungs mar nim pa'i me la sreg/dgra bo rtag tu 'thub pa dang //nad rnams kun gyis 'dengs par 'gyur//dur khrod thal bsol bar bcas//dgra bo'i gzung
54a3(rgyud): byas dum bur mnan//cham nga ma phur bus 'debs pa ni//po la mig nad ngan skyed par byed//bya rgod 'ug pa byi la sha/ne'u le'i bu rnams khyer ba'i mer//drug cu rtsa brgyad
54a4(rgyud): bsregs pa yis//mthun gnyis myur du 'byed par nges//khrag gcan ras lo gzugs bris nas//rkang g.yon sker mnan cham ngam bcaso//'dod bcas sngags ni
54a5(rgyud): drag po yis//brgyal dang rims nad mtshor nad bskyed//dgra yi skra dang rkang rjes sa//dgra gzugs dug dang ske tshis byug/chos mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur//
54a6(rgyud): dgra yi pha rus dug rang sgyur//gzugs byad ni ma pi'i mar bsregs ni//dgra bo gdon cheni nad kyis 'debs//phag rtug swA hA arga'i shing //tsher mes sregs na
54a7(rgyud): mgo 'khor 'gyur//ne'u le byi la byi tshor sru//bsregs ne bung bu brlag par 'gyur//mi dang ne'u le khA rus pa//yung mar nem pa'i me la sreg/grong dang grong khyer
54b1(rgyud): smad par byed//stag su pod dusu dug dA'i su//sU ta me tog nA lo sham//nom pa'i lo ma dug bsrogs byed//nom pa'i 'bras bu drudug lan cha//da dur 'bru ba slebs na dang spyod nga/
54b2(rgyud): du khrag du ngur 'bras bu yis//nim pa'i shing lnga dgra ming bri//cha gsum lan cha/khrag gis byugs//lcags snod yungs mar nang bzhag nas//ni mi pa'i shing gis
54b3(rgyud): maM yis gtso//dgra bo lha dang 'byed par 'gyur//mi khyi bya rgod rus phye drug/sgo cha yungs mur sbrul shun dang //nim bi'i lnga dang skabs lan tshwa//tshar mas bsreg na nad kyis
54b4(rgyud): 'dengs//ske tsho du sbrul che ba'i mar//gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung //char rgyas pa dang thog 'dab 'gyur//'phags pa rje zla ba'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/sbyin skyes
54b5(rgyud): gi le'u skye dgu pa'o///de nas tshangs po khyab 'jug sogs//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis//bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang //snyan pas tshad du 'dri
54b6(rgyud): brjod do//oM ma sangs rgyas thams cad la//thabs dang shes rab bsam du med//thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni//mtshungs medo rgya che dam chos gsungs//dug gi
54b7(rgyud): 'jigs pras stengs 'khrigs//nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi//bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'di gus na//ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stong par 'gyur//de nas tshangs sogs
55a1(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong //rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas//dam zhing ched du brjod pa 'di//snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol//ye ma sangs rgyas che ba
55a2(rgyud): bdag/sems can kun la sman par dgyes//skyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yis//mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs//gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas po//'khor/
55a3(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skyong //'gro la sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni//ltab pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs//byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas rnams
55a4(rgyud): kyis ni ngo mcher spyan ni gaudangs na su//ched du brjod po 'di brjod do//e ma sangs rgyas bsam mo khyab//gdod nas thug su 'gro don chud//rtog med rang bzhin las grol
55a5(rgyud): nas//bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang gsungs//'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod//gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed//de rjes 'jigs me dang yi med//dogs pa
55a6(rgyud): spangs na zad par gyis//sa la bzhugs nas sems can don//ma bsams thogs pa med par byed//gsang sngags rgyal po skyobs kun la//sbyangs nas 'dod don kun
55a7(rgyud): grub ste//na mkha' chu ser dag pa ltar//sgom pa bla med yid rgyas byed//de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs//ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang //gtso la me tog gtor byas te//
55b1(rgyud): tshad du brjod pa 'di brjod do//a ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab//dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab//'gro la phan+da dang don byed pa'o//cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang //snying rngu
55b2(rgyud): dbye bas rgyas gyur nas//mnar med la sogs ngan 'gro yi//'jigs rnams las rgal pad+mo ltar//rnal 'byor can de mdzes par spyod//de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i/
55b3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas//shin tu dam pas sbyin tshig bris//ched du brjod pa 'di brjid do//e ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang //dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab/
55b4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i mun pa chen por ni//bying bas blta dka' rtogs pa yis//sngags dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab//mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang //blta dka' 'byung po drag po rnams
55b5(rgyud): lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur//de nas rig pa'i lha mo che//spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams//ngo mtshar gyur nas sprin gdangs te//snun pas ched du 'di brjod do//e ma spangs
55b6(rgyud): rgyas rmad du byung //e ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che//e ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab//chos rnams skye med 'gag pa med//sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol pa ltar//sgyu ma gdul bya tshim
55b7(rgyud): mdzad pa//spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar//sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar mdzad//de nas phyogs bcoM'i sangs rgyas rnams//stong gsum mi mjed 'jig rten khoms//godul
56a1(rgyud): ba dag la rab gzigs nas//'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la//ngo mtshar rmad kyis gsung gis ni//ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//oM zhes dang po phyag
56a2(rgyud): 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa//ser sna rnam par dag nas yo byad dbang thob dang //gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni//rab dga' ye shes khro bo kham//
56a3(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal 'dud//tsaN+Da yig dri bzang can den byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs//tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshel dbang ba dang //las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen
56a4(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang ni//dri med ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tsha lo//Da yig nyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i zhi gnas dang //bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang //mos
56a5(rgyud): ba sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes bya'i stobs dang ni//'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshalo//ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag mthong che ba'i bdag/brtson 'grus
56a6(rgyud): dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang //khams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni//'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshed po phyag 'tshalo//hA yig ma
56a7(rgyud): chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che//bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob dang //thams cad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni//sbyang dkar
56b1(rgyud): yo shes rnas smin khyod phyug 'tsha//ra mig sa ra 'angs nang bral shes dag lasmra dang ///bsam tan rnamathar tong 'dzin dang ni snyoms zhugs pa'o//kun nas nyon mo num/
56b2(rgyud): rnamasbyin mas//mngan gyur sa shes 'a 'i ma la/ga chen yang rgya chen pa langs che da 'i sems pa
56b3(rgyud): thob dang //sngon gyi gnas rnams rjesu dran pa mkhyen pa'i stabs//ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'khyim la 'dud//N+Di yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gca//dz+nyAn la
56b4(rgyud): dag sa spyan lamaHla dang ba dang/dang tshig dang mtsha ma yin pa mkhyen du'i sno sa//sogs shesta bang seM n+du rI b+h+ya/'o//hU~M sIbad+hAs sbyin 'dus
56b5(rgyud): 'brug pa dad rgyangs can//bzlas dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang pob dang //'chi pho dang ni gang zhis skye ba mkhyen pa'i skyabs//legaso pa'i thugs mi shes khI 'i hU~M mdzad 'du/
56b6(rgyud): s+yA thA ga rmugs kun gtsor dag pas shel dung mtshus//ye sheste dag pas tsha stsal dbadu ni zang po dang //zag pa thams cad yang dag nadru bas mkhyen pa'i stobs//chos
56b7(rgyud): smon+do rgya yi shes khyo bo gnang mdzes 'drung //de nas chos rje thub pas ni//ljags kyi dbang po zlum byas nas//'dzum pa mdza bas rab gzung sa /lam phyi
57a1(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i dbus//lag na rdo rje mthu chen la//stan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa//mchog tu brtan par rabya bsngags pa//rdo rje theg pa bla na med//mi
57a2(rgyud): gang bsod nams dman pa 'am//mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang //rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag/gser 'gyur gyi ni rtsi bzhin du//log rtag me lus dag
57a3(rgyud): nas kyang //rtog med bde ba'i skur byung te//rmi lam bzang po'i sems bzhin du//rnam 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang snang //mu mtha' med pa 'khor ba'i mtsho//bskal
57a4(rgyud): gzings chen bla med 'di//chags gsang med pa'i tshul du ni//khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya//lag na rdo rje stobs po ches//ston pa la ni 'di gsol to//rgyud 'dri phyung ma
57a5(rgyud): thag tu ni//gdul dka' ba ni rab tu zhi//sa stengs nad dang gdon mu gi/bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral//slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir//brtan por bdag gis
57a6(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi//dpa' bo mkha' gro drag po rnams//yid kyis brtul zhugs phyug nas kyang //rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i rjesu 'brang //lha dang 'jig rten po dang ni//ma mo srin mo
57a7(rgyud): mkha 'gro ma//sha za gnod sbyin srin po rnams//rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed//rgyud 'dzin longs spyod spel bar byed//ston pas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin//legs sa/
57b1(rgyud): shin tu cher legaso//rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor can chen de//rgyun tu srung zhing blo 'phel mdzod//de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas//byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang //mkha' 'gro ma mo
57b2(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong//lha klu gnod sbyin dri zor bcas//thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams//dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'o//mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas
57b3(rgyud): 'khor ba'i ba con ra nas//lha klu 'bum phrag 'tsho bral dkar po dge ba'i kun slong sems//skyes nas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad byung mtshar//rgyas pa'i tshul
57b4(rgyud): bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin tu gsang //'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las/mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o///
57b5(rgyud): 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogaso///'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang
57b6(rgyud): bAcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//na maHsarba bud d+ha/bo d+hi satwA nAn/sa man+ta a m+bo g+ha/a pra
57b7(rgyud): ti ta ta/shA sanA nAn/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/mau hA bo d+hi satwA ya/badz+ra satwA yau/badz+ra bi pU lA ya pad+ma saM b+ha bA ya/pad+ma yau ne yaM/tad+ya thAM/oM hrIHka ra
58a1(rgyud): dang /bar gyur/sa ma /de na sa phyogs bcu'i de nani /shegs pa sems cad kyis byeg chub sems de
58a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs par byug gi mig byugs / stsa yon tan rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzus ston pa 'di bshad ngas/sems
58a3(rgyud): can rnams la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshim bstan pa legs lags//'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang /sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dge bar byed pa'o//gangal la
58a4(rgyud): nyan pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa des ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /dge ba'i mchog kyang thob por 'gyur//de nas
58a5(rgyud): lho'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po dpa'i chad 'bum phrag du mar khyu cing /'jig rten gyi khams gsum po kun tu rgyas kok+ta ste/'khor dang bcas pa dang rdo rje dkyi
58a6(rgyud): 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug dbang po rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i
58b1(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pas mngon+d+ra par bskyod pa/sA yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi/spyod gsum ma lus yon tan chen po'i bdag/dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil la /
58b2(rgyud): can//stong rjes khyab pa'i dkyil la bai d+ha che ba//rab dag shrI kyis rab tu ston pa'o//skal pa bzang po rnam pa zhi ba'i mtsho//shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po
58b3(rgyud): bad/rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod//rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa//mchag sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes//dpag med pas kyang
58b4(rgyud): dpag med bskul bar 'byung //skyabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing sel bar mdzad//nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba//srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan//thos
58b5(rgyud): ba'i rgya mtsho sem can kun pas dpa'//'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog/spyan cha 'gul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams//dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs te'i
58b6(rgyud): thor tshugs can//tshul bzang yon tan sbyin du mtshams pa'i gzugs//'jigs pa'i rlu chen 'chubs kyi mchin che can//dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu//tshul gyi
58b7(rgyud): longs spyod bde can mchog gi rgyu//dkyil 'khor mchog gi spyod yul rgyu gcig pa//srid gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags//dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te/
59a1(rgyud): sdig med pa//gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste//mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'byung //sa brnyes 'od zer rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'//
59a2(rgyud): chen po'i mche ba thogs pa med pa ste//snga ma mun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med//dge bo dag pas spyod yul rnam par dag/tshul gyi dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par
59a3(rgyud): dag/srid gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung ba//srid gsum bde chen yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste//dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa
59a4(rgyud): chen po rab mchog yangs//nor bu'i rgyan te rdo rje'i rgyun du thogs//pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba//dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa//bde la longs
59a5(rgyud): spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag/smon lam rgya chen rgya mchi ldan pa ste//'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mjed pa//sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad//
59a6(rgyud): skol bzang bskal pa stong gis gnang ba po//rdo rje mchog gis bsgrags pa'i dkyil 'khor can//yon tan rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor ba//dge ba'i mtshan nyid
59a7(rgyud): dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba//de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can//cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan//lha chen brgya mnga' sum cu gsum bdag
59b1(rgyud): dbang //lha dang lha man dbang bcas rnams kyis btud//brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'//bsod nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba//pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma
59b2(rgyud): nyid las byung //dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste//chos brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po//sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa//bskal pa rab
59b3(rgyud): 'byam mang por mkhas pa ste//dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku//'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po//rgya cheni dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs//rab dag/
59b4(rgyud): bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod//na bza' dar dkar la banabs 'od mdzad pa//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes rgyan pa lags//cha phrar gsar mdzad mtha' yas zad
59b5(rgyud): mi shes//dpa' bo'i nyi ma 'od zer rgyan mnga' ba//nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing //nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa//me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i
59b6(rgyud): lha zhes grags//gtsug phud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag/btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes//rang gi rig gsal dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba//
59b7(rgyud): pad+ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig le'i mtshan//spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa//gsang sngags mngo po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po//tshogs chen 'dun ma 'dus
60a1(rgyud): dri'i mda' bdag lags//spyan gsu dag gos dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa//ka la bing ku'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul//mda' dang rus gzhu stobs chen mtshon/
60a2(rgyud): cha bsnams//stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul//rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par smras pa ste//rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba me pas bstod//tshogs
60a3(rgyud): mchog dga'abyed rnams kyis rab bstod pa//chu srin 'dzin khri 'jigs la sa rab grol mdzod//gzugs mang mngal zhing dadi sgyid rab sbyin pa//lha yul grol ba'i khyad
60a4(rgyud): par dkyil 'khor can//mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'//stabs gshegs yon tan na che mchog 'od zer ljon//'jig rten nang na mkhas
60a5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs//sa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can//'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes//nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa/
60a6(rgyud): tha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste//rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can//don dem tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ga/theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i
60a7(rgyud): nyi ma lags//dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes//skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom//blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po//bde ldan gos rgyan yang
60b1(rgyud): sna tshogs can//bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzod//rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa'o//rgyal bas gsung ba'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo//bdu la longs spyod
60b2(rgyud): che 'byung dri ma med//zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa//ming dang srid med brgya byin log pa'i mchog/'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug bo//stobs dang
60b3(rgyud): rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags//sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mo tshungs//dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'//khyad par gsum
60b4(rgyud): 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs//khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i//rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo//pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnam//
60b5(rgyud): pa//thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs//spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba//rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas
60b6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//mchog chen rdo rje'i glu la bstod pa yi//maung brgya rtsa brgyad skyon se l-i legs pa mnga'//ci skye la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod//spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni
60b7(rgyud): bstod byed pa//des ni ring po mi thogs yon tan gyi//longs spyod mchog tshon chos ni thob par 'gyur//mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la//spyan ras gzigs dang
61a1(rgyud): dam pa sbyin par byed//sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur//'dod pa gang yin bde blag/de yis 'thob//de ni sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos te//lam
61a2(rgyud): srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bor 'gyur//srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad+ma skyes//de 'dra'i chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur//de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod
61a3(rgyud): cing //gang zhig rtag tu bde bar 'dod pa yis//'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs//pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis//bcom ldan 'das bla ma/'phags
61a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so///'phags pa byams pa'i mchin brgya rtsa brgyad pa
61a5(rgyud): gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshalo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas rang gi snying po gsungs pa/
61a6(rgyud): na mas+t+raM ya d+h+r-i kA nA na/sarba ta thA ga tA nA naM/tad+ya thA/oM sa ra sa ra/su ru su ru/d+ha ra d+hi ra/mahA d+ha ra/tsa ra tsau ra/ma tA tsa ra/b+ha r-i b+ha ra/mahA b+ha ra/kam+ba kam+ba/
61a7(rgyud): mahA kem+ba hU~M/ma hA s+pha ra Ni/d+harma a gra sA ga re swA hA//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye ma gzungs chen po ni yon tan
61b1(rgyud): ba ste/mtha' yas par khyab pa/bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig/
61b2(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis snyen bkur mdzad pa/sgrib pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /'khrug pa dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar bar byed
61b3(rgyud): pa'o//sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongasu thar par byed pa ste/shin tu dkon pa'o//de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang /lha ma yin du bcas pas/
61b4(rgyud): nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa
61b5(rgyud): brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa//rgyal tsha ba mi yi bdog po ste//'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal//dor ba chen po mngon par rgyas//
61b6(rgyud): tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste//de bzhin gshegs shing rdul dang bral//dbang chen brtse ldan 'od ldan pa//sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon//rgyal chen mtshon che brgya pa ste//
61b7(rgyud): mtshon cha tshan po rdo rje'i mtshon//yon tan 'od rgyas bsgyings pa ste//nar bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thegs pa//srid gsum dag na dpa' ba'i sku//rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can//
62a1(rgyud): lhun po zla 'byin ti sa yi//rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po//dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa//rab tu dka' ba de bzhin des//yongasu dga' ldan chen
62a2(rgyud): po'i lha//che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog/sangs rgyas gdung brgyad rgyas mdzad cing //sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan//sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod//
62a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po//ti si zla 'byin bzhin du gnas//so yi dbang phyug bde mdzad po//rdo rje'i pad+ma legs par skyes//chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod//sa/
62a4(rgyud): dang mnyam pa thub par dka'//snang bar mdzes pa 'byung ba'o//srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags//btso bo chen po tshar grags pa//seng ge chen po stobs po che//tshe lugs
62a5(rgyud): tshun po zhal che ba//skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul//rdo rje byi ru bai DUr+ya//nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs//byi ru gser gyi bcal bkram la//sku chen zhabs kyi stabs
62a6(rgyud): kyis gshegs//zhal gdangs nyi mi du ma'i gzi//lcang lo cod pan dobu thod can//rigs sngags 'chang rgyas zhabs la gtugs//brjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod//
62a7(rgyud): nor bu rgyan 'bul 'od zer gyis//brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas//cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba//nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan//rin chen sna tshogs mchog
62b1(rgyud): zhong //dri mad dkyil 'a ra rab tu 'phro//rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa mo//'bar du chen po'i lta ba can//'od zer mang ngos dog pa mo//phan pa'i thabs nA rab ston pa//brjod//
62b2(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis bshad bya yi//'od kyi zhal gas la rnga yab bsgyud//dadu rgyan 'od zer sbrel bar bkod//chen dris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher//lhun po phrad cing 'jug pa lta/
62b3(rgyud): hAhAzhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs//rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo can//shin tu dga' mdzod bde sbyin pa//byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos//btson pa kun las rnam par rgyal//snying
62b4(rgyud): rje'i stobs las byung ba ste//mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar//byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can//kun nas dpa' ba'i dkyil 'khor ba//ma pa ma thub med dag pa ste/
62b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che//byams pa'i snying po snying po che/bya mos pa'i pad+ma las byung ba//rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can//rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba//rigs/
62b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud//de bzhin bsten cing bstod pa'o//grub pa chen po'i rig sngags grub//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad//thams cad grub mdzad
62b7(rgyud): grub pa'o//sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags//gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges//mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa//nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi//sdang bas dri
63a1(rgyud): ma sel bar mdzad//'bar nga rtsa mar 'od snang ba//dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste//gzhung dang 'thun pa'i chos dbyings dang //nye bar gyur cing shin tu
63a2(rgyud): des rba smAhA sAt+ma'i bdag po mchog/'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad//stobs che 'chang ba bkra shes pa//nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags//stobs byed rgyal ba'i
63a3(rgyud): longs spyod ldan//mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can//dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad//rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa//sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med//dkyil 'khor
63a4(rgyud): ldan pa rdo rjes ston//rlung chen shugs kyis bskyod pa yi//g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs sgra ldan pa//sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste//de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes//
63a5(rgyud): mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyas//khyab bdog sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//de nas sa yi dbang phyug po//byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la//bstod nas
63a6(rgyud): kun mkhyen gnod bral ba//thub pa'i nyi mas bka' stsal pa//kye ma med brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ming gi yon tan 'od ldan la//bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa//thabs
63a7(rgyud): chen bla na med pa ste//ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni//'jig rten kun gyis bde byed pa//'di ni gton pa tsam gyis kyang //sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur//sdig pa
63b1(rgyud): dga'as rgyal ba smo//byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la//ming bud+d+ha rtsu brgyad dam pa 'dis//ni ni la la gang bstod pa//de la lha la stsogs kun+da dang /lag na rdo rje stobs chen
63b2(rgyud): rnams//rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun//gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed//gang zhig ming ba rgyar brgyud mchog/myur du 'don pa'i mi da ni//sangs rgyas sa yang thos
63b3(rgyud): 'gyur te//'di la the tsom yong med//nang par mal nas longs nas ni//ga zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod//dri la byams par rtogs pa yi//byams pa bde
63b4(rgyud): legs byed par 'gyur//de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing //sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang //de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel bu yi//ming brgya
63b5(rgyud): rtsabargyad ched du dag phyir ltogs//'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/gzungs sngags dang bac+doMs pa rdzogs so///oM AHmAM tri mr-i swAt+ma/
63b6(rgyud): 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya chu zhing sun gyi 'od 'phro bas na mkha'i dkyil dri zhim
63b7(rgyud): par mdzad pa la phyag 'i'atshalo//namakha'i spyod yul can so'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tsha'o//oM sa s+t+wa~M ka mA rak+Shi 'i phu la sem+b+ha ga/ /
64a1(rgyud): s+yAt+ma//gzungs 'di rjod ma thag tu dran song dang na thams cad rab tu rno par 'gyur/sa ya gams par gyur// tshe drug go sgra yang grags par/
64a2(rgyud): /sa sa rgyas pan lagis sa sbyin no//den ma ldan seMrnam sna dzod kyi na
64a3(rgyud): narnams rnam nga nga la dzin gyu/na btsun /
64a4(rgyud): legs pa dus na tu rnam par dag par 'gyu/ /sa mamag sa go/ shA
64a5(rgyud): thams cad snang byed du//zla bag+h+nA nura'i gyur te/sems can rnams ts+tshed rab tu sem+b+ha par byed do//nam khye'i lta bur 'gyur//ngani song gi sdug
64a6(rgyud): sems kyi kyis ma gos so//sa zhi 'gyur te/'thong ma mad do//srin po sgrub po ma can thams cad kyis kyi spyod ba sa dus/
64b1(rgyud): thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so//de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa ched mode grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/nyan pa dang /'chang//
64b2(rgyud): ba dang /klog pa dang /brjod pa dang /ston pa tsam dang /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/de'i 'dod pa dang /smon pa dang /re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro//
64b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang /char mi 'bab pa dang /sdang bas dkrugs pa dang /mi nad dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /gnod pa 'byung ba dang /'jigs pa'i
64b4(rgyud): dus dang /'chi ba dang /chom rkun dang /mgon med pa dang /g.yul 'gyed pa dang /gcan zan dang /mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongasu srung bar byed pa/bde ba dang /
64b5(rgyud): 'byor pa dang /ci 'dod pa dang /ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha bton te/sgra ring zhes byas nas gos
64b6(rgyud): dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de/snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa
64b7(rgyud): brgya mtsho'i bstod pa yong dag par brjod po/nam pa'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog/'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'//sems can dag pa bla med rin chen
65a1(rgyud): mchog/thar pa'i snga bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel//kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen//bar mkhyen chos mkhyen pade dang ma
65a2(rgyud): bde mkhyen//lam mkhyen gtso mkhyen dag dang mi dge mkhyen//dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stob dring stobs min mokhyen//'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mtshig/lam
65a3(rgyud): mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog/rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog/dge mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog/zhi
65a4(rgyud): rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab//'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rag/rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab//mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab//legs
65a5(rgyud): /sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron//thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron//dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron//rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shwar
65a6(rgyud): ba'i sgron//mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od//legs 'od thar pa'i pho ba rten gyi 'od//'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od//rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i
65a7(rgyud): 'oda'i chang ba//rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang //rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po//rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang //dpa'
65b1(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang //rdo rje bzang po rdo 'od rdo rje 'bar//rdo rje sems dnga' rdo rje 'bar byas rgyan//rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drug/rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog
65b2(rgyud): dbang //nu bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo//sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis rgyan//ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams//mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs
65b3(rgyud): lta zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar//rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur//sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrugs byed phreng mchog can//klog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg
65b4(rgyud): lnga brtan//ral gri mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon//rdo'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs//'khor lo'i mtshan thogs bcibs pa r-i dang 'khrul//gsal
65b5(rgyud): zhing mtshan thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms po//bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug/sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis rgyun//grags pa'i rig su byung
65b6(rgyud): bas rgyal po mdzad//mu tigri phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis//sku mdzes brnyes shing bun sum tshegs pa brnyes//rab 'byam mchog brnyas sa la 'jug pa brnyes//
65b7(rgyud): mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la//rigs pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa//bde 'dren zhib 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa//tshe lugs gsal mchog dar
66a1(rgyud): mamayamamamatsha samamamamams mtham/anacathasamamamasamamamam khams ama.a yamam ya mas bayas mam ma mal mams ma
66a2(rgyud): /chen po 'dran//byams 'dun nyim 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren//logs 'dzin nang na sa 'dron snying rjecan//dri nad cha lugs dasal ba mjugs 'ab/
66a3(rgyud): rnam brags sgeg pas grags pa'i bden can//'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen//longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/sku dkar sku mthon sku
66a4(rgyud): mdzes su bza ga//su ser sA dA//ra dar 'chen po'i sku//sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga'i spyan lcogs sgra//rigs su rig sngags chang b.rin tshun bsnams//gtsug gi nor
66a5(rgyud): gtsug can cod pan mchog/cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/dpa' 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang de'i mchog/sngags pa ni drug rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshugs/
66a6(rgyud): rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu r+m+ma//sring gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'//ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa//yon tan mthu stobs khyud
66a7(rgyud): par rnam pa grags//nor bu chen po nar smrig nor dri'i rjod//nyi ma nar bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar//mi bzhin nor bu 'ablo kun mgon gcig pu//nama'i dkyil
66a8(rgyud): na nor bu gcig snang ba//sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grag so//srid gsum bsrungs ma gcig pu rgyal sras mi tsho/zhi ba rab tu ni bskyabs res sdug/
66b1(rgyud): sgyo gu'i bdab pa bang 'byung pad+ma skyes//kun nas 'od bzang lugs bshad chos mnga' ba//darla ba legs po shad rab dul lags bshang phyag/zla bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skya gnas
66b2(rgyud): bzang //mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan//zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas//'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad//legs 'byung shes rab
66b3(rgyud): 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa//snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad//rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo//blo yangs par ni bkram zhing rnam par grags//
66b4(rgyud): kun tu longs spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog/blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs//sangs rgyas pad+ma mda' rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal//dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du//
66b5(rgyud): 'thad//snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul//ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun gnyis rab gsal ba//spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa//'jig rten zhil ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra//
66b6(rgyud): mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs//drag po 'jigs pa sdig sal gdum las skyos//rab dul mkhas pa 'brags dga' 'dris pa sla//rab tu drag pa gnyen rab
66b7(rgyud): gser mdog can//lha chen bde byed gsapa shing phyag na bsnams//spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel//'od bzang me tog mtshan thogs me tog mnga'//na bza'
67a1(rgyud): bzang ba nabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen//lags dris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mda'//na bzang sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal//zha lnga'as
67a2(rgyud): zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra//zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mjed//bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mda'//zhal mdangs rgya mtshogasal mdzad lam me ba//
67a3(rgyud): dbang chen rdo rje'i thogs legs 'jigs pa'i sgra//rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin//sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan//blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog/rgyan
67a4(rgyud): 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan//rgyu dang mi rgya 'gro ba kun gyi gnas//de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang //stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid//
67a5(rgyud): skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags//mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ros bskyed pa'i rgyu//sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can//mthu stobs mnga' zhing skyon bzang sdug par
67a6(rgyud): ldan//ston pa bzang po stong pa nyid lam gyi stegs//gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad//brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa//dkyil 'khor dom pa kun gyi slob
67a7(rgyud): dpon lags//gcig pu skyo dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen//rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes//dbang bskur darnyis shing sa bcur legs par gnas/
67b1(rgyud): granas chen son pa mchog gnas gtsog bu lags//skye dku rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang //sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'dri thos nas//bad gshogs slas mchog su
67b2(rgyud): zhig 'don byed pa//'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang //nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi//mdun 'dug nung por bstod pa 'di brjod gang //de ni srid gsum se na
67b3(rgyud): mchog 'gyur zhing //dri mo'i gnas kun las kyang thar bar 'gyur//g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang //mu ga'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba ni//mangs po su zhig sngar
67b4(rgyud): langs dang skyes nas//nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa//de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang //sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol//des ni zhi
67b5(rgyud): mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang //bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur//bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'am//rgyal srid 'thob dang byang gzugs nor 'thob dang //rigs/
67b6(rgyud): 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi sgrub phyir//bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//de phyir ji ste rtag tu 'dod bde kun//'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba//na mkha'i snying
67b7(rgyud): po srid gsum mgon po la//rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par dgyi//'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogasaso///
68a1(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs lcags dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po//snying rje chen po kun tu
68a2(rgyud): /bzang po na mkha'i dkyil kun rab 'byams ma lus pa dang /mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phyos pa'i sku tha dad pa med
68a3(rgyud): cing /dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/gzugs sna tshogs can/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang /rab mchog dam po sbyin pa yon
68a4(rgyud): tan chen po'i sku/sa kun mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshol lo//de nas de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can//
68a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting 'dzin rab 'byams sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
68a6(rgyud): bo snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe/stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongasu rgyas par gyur te/na mkha'i khams kyi
68a7(rgyud): khongasu gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to//de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi kho su gtogs pa'i
68b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mgo bor byugs te bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu legs legs//
68b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen po shod cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog/lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas/
68b3(rgyud): de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas/gzungs 'di bshad do//tad+ya thA/oM na mo na mas+t+ri/b+hu ba ni/shwa ra/ma hA b+ho gA ya/a swa ma sa ma/a mr-i ta sa ma//
68b4(rgyud): a nan+ta sa ma/ga ga na sa ma/tri b+hu ba na sa ma/a she Sha sa ma/be Sha sa ma/pa ra mAna? sa ma/sA b+ha ba se ma/ta tha tA se ma/a ro dza sa ma/a d+hi sa ma/bud+d+hi sa ma/
