68b5(rgyud): d+hAHtr-I b+hUt+tA sa ma/a b+hiSh+Tha sa ma/sam sa ma/e k+ShA nA ya s+thA ga ra/bi shud+d+ha/A lo ka/hrI hrIM/lab+d+ha la b+hA//bi dza ya ngi dz+ra yaM/o/pra sa kr-i tA/na ya na ya/ha ma?/
68b6(rgyud): nirad+hiSh+Tha ne/saM b+ho ga/aM a na la ya la ya/d+harmA a gr-i/d+ha re d+ha ra/dza ya dza~M ya/hUM hUM/d+hA ma d+ha ma swA hA/de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo//'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon
68b7(rgyud): bo gcig pu/sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/byang chub sems dang 'akun tu bzang pos/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar
69a1(rgyud): tshan aH thatham mthanams sam camacas ma tham/a ma camatha thas na thamasamamamam ma ya ya tha ma Na/ ma.a' ya am 'ayam ya mas tham thamams mam mtham tham thams
69a2(rgyud): byas nas//de skad ces smras te/'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byaso//de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
69a3(rgyud): gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/'od zer 'bar zhing snod la rab tu g.yo bas rgyan po'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tig thod stan chen po las bskyed de/dkyil 'khor nas langs
69a4(rgyud): nas/ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/smras pa kye mi snying rje chen po dang /yan tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam po'i gzungs chen mo//kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen
69a5(rgyud): mo//mtha' dang /dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing /sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/chos kyi dkyil 'khor
69a6(rgyud): glanas myed pa'i gzungs chen mo//kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas/'phags pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sol cing /nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la/lta ba'i
69a7(rgyud): ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par bstsags shing /bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma
69a8(rgyud): mngon sum du 'thong bas/byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongasu rdzogs pa rje su thob pa ma yin pa
69b1(rgyud): gzhan ni/sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyam par yang mi nus na/gzung ba dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/gzungs
69b2(rgyud): chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o//kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par
69b3(rgyud): rnyed pa'o//'tshe ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o//mngon par shes pa rnams kyis bzhi bzang ba'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs paso//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la
69b4(rgyud): gnas pa'o//yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o//'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis/ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur//lan gnyis brjod pa
69b5(rgyud): tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro//lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis/nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro//de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis/gong nas
69b6(rgyud): gong du yin te na rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyuraro//'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar
69b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//shing gcig bsgrengs kyi drung du bzlas brjod byas na/grub pa thams cad thab par 'gyur ro//'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/sems can thams cad dbang du
70a1(rgyud): 'gyur//nags tshul chen pa'i nang du rtum ma krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na/bsam gtan chen pa thob par 'gyur la/nyon mongs pa dang bral bar
70a2(rgyud): 'gyu ro//'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pa mchod nas/lus ngal bar 'gyur gyi bar du/gzungs
70a3(rgyud): chen mo 'di brjod la/ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na/rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas/yang dag/
70a4(rgyud): par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de//chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad do//'di skad du/rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs//khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
70a5(rgyud): 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/khyod che badz+rIs nas sa chen po thob par 'gyuraro//zhes kyang gsung ngo //de nas lus bde ba dang /sems bod ba dang /dga' ba chen po dang /dang pa
70a6(rgyud): dang /mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyuraro//mthu chen po dang /che bar grags par yang 'gyuraro//lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo //nang
70a7(rgyud): par langs nas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o//sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i sems
70b1(rgyud): bskyong par bya'o//de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yong su rdzogs shing /sdig pa thams cad dang brel te/nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom pa/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
70b2(rgyud): kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro//lha lo sogs pa yang de la srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyu ro//de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni/
70b3(rgyud): ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyuraro//de nas rdo rje'i gtsug pud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po ga sngags 'chang tshon po rnams dang /smyan
70b4(rgyud): chen mo la sogs pa/rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang /rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags
70b5(rgyud): kyi lha chen mo rnams dang /rin chen drag pa can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen ma rnams dang /lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor
70b6(rgyud): gyi lha rnams dang /dar chan dang /gzugs bzang dang /shin tu lta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang /bAn rnams dang /bran mo rnams dang /mi 'khrugs pa
70b7(rgyud): la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang /lus mchog la sogs pa srin pa'i dbang po rnams dang /mi mi la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i
71a1(rgyud): dbang phyug rnams dang /rdo rje ma tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/byang chub
71a2(rgyud): chen po'i mchog/'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/sna tshogs
71a3(rgyud): kun gyi 'byor pa che//dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog/sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che//gzi brjid chen po stobs pa che//
71a4(rgyud): gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab//khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal//rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad//sgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa//rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/
71a5(rgyud): rab dga' chen pos 'dul ba po//lha tshan dbang phyug chen po ste//btsan pa khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag/saM stengs sa 'og sa la dgyes//de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa/
71a6(rgyud): dul dang sbyin pa'i go rims thabs//rab mkhyen stong gis mnga' bdag lags//shas nyan can de bzod la dgyes//brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che//brtson
71a7(rgyud): 'bras bcu dang thabs bcu pa//stobs bcu'i seMs chen thu bo ste//mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang //yongasu ldan zhing bcu sel ba/rdul sel rgya mtsho chen po ste/
71b1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba//rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs//cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba//mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang /shin tu sdug pa dga' bskyed pa//stong
71b2(rgyud): chen po las byung ba//nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'//sa dang mnyam pa na mkha' dang //rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can//gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs//rgya mtsho
71b3(rgyud): bzhi yi chu dang 'dra//rmugs dang skyo bzhi par mdzad//thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil//g.yul sel g.yul la 'gyed pa ste//g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/
71b4(rgyud): gsungs bzang dang pa'i gdangasu bzhed//dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras//dbang po'i las lhag thub dang mnyam//chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan//rab dga'i phun longs
71b5(rgyud): zhi mdzad pa//nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad//dbang po rgya gas pa'i rims nad sel//khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms//gsung stan 'jam pa nyid dang mnyam//
71b6(rgyud): mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang //mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das//sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig/byang chub snying po rgya cher rol//rim pa rab ston dge ba ste/
71b7(rgyud): spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa//dag mdzad srog mdzad mchog sbyin po//'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms//'thob
72a1(rgyud): mdzad dpe med gsung ba bo//rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba//skyes pa zung myed tshogs kyi bdag/nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa//sems can 'khor ba
72a2(rgyud): zhi mdzad pa//brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral//kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po//kun tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor can//kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang po mdzad//kun tu nyes pa sel ba lag//
72a3(rgyud): mi bzad sa 'og rnam par dkrugs//de bzhin zad mdzad thugs par mdzad//nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs//nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad//'bar ba'i
72a4(rgyud): dka' ba 'phyog mjed pa//rgyags shing bde ba zhi bar mdzad//rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa//sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms//pha rol zhugs pa'i sdig sel ba//dag pa
72a5(rgyud): namakhwa'i spyod yul can//dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin//'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa//ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin//longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa//dbang
72a6(rgyud): phyug sbyin zhing chog sbyin pa//nor skyon tshogs ldan rdo rje can//gzugs bzhin dbang po rnam par rgyul//dog cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa//bde 'byung gro tsug na nor bu thogs//sa
72a7(rgyud): 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po//dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa//'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad//rin chen dro ba rin chen mnyam//sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can//
72b1(rgyud): yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan//brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can//gsung ba chen po shes rab che//sangs rgyas tshul ni rab smyon pa//mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi//thog pa blan
72b2(rgyud): med par ldan//mchod pa chen po'i chos che ba//'bras bu chen po'i chos kyi mchog/ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po//zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa//bzang po bzang dang mtshungs
72b3(rgyud): pa nyid//kun tu rab 'byam sel mdzad pa//snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen//snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can//snying rje chen po yongasu rdzogs//dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad
72b4(rgyud): mtsho mchog dang ba rab mtho ba//rtsod tshan 'das pa spyod yul can//skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa//rnyed par dka' ba'i dal 'byor can//kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba//dgra ba'i
72b5(rgyud): dam pa sbyin pa po//kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste//zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'o//dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma legs//zla ba lta bur sim
72b6(rgyud): mdzad thabs//mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen//spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'//dam tshig chen po'i dri nyid mkhyen//
72b7(rgyud): slob dpon chen po grags pa che//dam pa nyid de blo na med//gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad//de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni//yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas//dag
73a1(rgyud): cing byung la mkhas la sogs//smon tan 'byung ba rig sdugs rgyal//rgyug na nor bu thogs la sogs//mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang //
73a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal chu bo btsam pa yi//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs//kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya//ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin//mi rnams la la gang zhig gis//
73a3(rgyud): sdig bsal kun tu bzang po la//snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na//des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob//gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don//mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs
73a4(rgyud): shing //de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi//ye shes mo lus smra bar nus//de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya'i spobs lngas nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing //yon tan
73a5(rgyud): sna tshogs byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams las//bstod pa chen po snang byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na//stobs bcu mnga'o
73a6(rgyud): ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur//'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs//
73a7(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje le phyag 'tsha'o//de nas byang chub
73b1(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i rang gi snying po smras pa/oM badz+raHN+Da/sarba duSh+TAn tA ka/twA na da ta pa tsa trUM phaT+Ta/de nas gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu/sa chen po g.yos par gyur/
73b2(rgyud): d+he/bgegs dang /log 'dren thams cad kyang sgrub nas/nyam thug pa'i skad phyung ngo //dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ta ha zhes 'dzer to//lha la sogs pa
73b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang /rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du/rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/sdang
73b4(rgyud): bsal ba dang /'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig/rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das bdeg gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lagasaso//rig sngags
73b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog dang /bge gos thams cad bzlog pa dang /sdang ba thams cad bzlog pa dang /sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang /dam pa stsol ba dang /'byor pa stsal ba dang /
73b6(rgyud): sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang /thos na don mchis pa dang /brjod na don mchis pa dang /bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang /stobs bskyed pa dang /gzugs
73b7(rgyud): bzeng bar bgyid pa dang /spobs pa bskyang ba dang /dbang phyug thob par bgyod pa dang /nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang /dbang bgyi ba dang /sdang ba 'joms pa dang /snang
74a1(rgyud): 'jig par bgyid pa dang /dug sol ba dang /rgyal bar bgyid pa dang /dga' bar bgyid pa dang //mchog tu dga' bar bapyod pa da /dang bar 'apyod pa dang /
74a2(rgyud): nga rgyal 'joms pa dang /pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang /sdig pa zhi por bgyid pa dang /nongs par bgyis pa sbyong ba dang /'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar
74a3(rgyud): bgyod pa dang /mtshams ma mchis pa bzlog pa dang /rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /dpal bskyed pa dang /skal bya bzang
74a4(rgyud): por bgyid pa dang /sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang /gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang /ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang /yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs
74a5(rgyud): par bgyid pa dang /char ches pa dang /char mi 'bab pa dang /dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/g.yul chen po dang /myi nang chen po dang /rtsod pa
74a6(rgyud): dang /mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang /sdang ba dang /byang stems dang /ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang /skrod pa dang /srog 'jigs pa'i tshe dang
74a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na/nang par langs nas/lus khrus bgyis la/gos dkar po 'tshal ste/kha shar phyogasu bltas la/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi
74b1(rgyud): gdang du lta zhing/lan bdun brjod na brjod pa tsam rgyus/'jigs pa thams cad las bar bar 'gyur zhing grub du chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/thams cad du yang rgyu la bAr
74b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/sems can rnams lce snang bya dang /skyob pa dang /skyed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchi so//de nas 'khor thams cang ngo mtshar chud de gyur nas/rdo
74b3(rgyud): 'ching la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bskyed/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che//rdo rje rgyal po ba ba che//rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che//rdo rje snying po stabs
74b4(rgyud): che//rdo rje 'khrug po zhags pa che//snying rje chen po stobs po che//rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzod//rdo rje hUM gi hUM legs te//rdo rjes 'og 'jigs pa po//chags
74b5(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje chags pa che//chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che//phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste//spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags//rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka tsha//mthon
74b6(rgyud): 'thing dbye sgras rgyan pa lags//ral gyi sngon po ral gri che//dkyil 'khor ston pa'i dkyil 'khor can//mthon ka'i sbyin te dbu sngo ba//'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan//
74b7(rgyud): rdo sngun pa stobs mi mtshungs//rdo rje smra pa'i stobs cheg/zhu bo ro rje rje bo che//sil mdzad khro ba'i rgyags pas so//khrim pa'i spyan na rab tu gtod//khro ba bzhigs
75a1(rgyud): @ris stsol bar mdzad//gzhu bsnams zhugs pa bsnams pa ste//rdo rje'i mangs ni nges par 'gums//dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams//rdo rje'i zhugs/
75a2(rgyud): pas rab tu 'joms//rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che//'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro//sna tshogs sku ste thig las des//gzi brjid skyid pa grags mdzad pa//bzod
75a3(rgyud): par dka' ba reg mi bzod//sdig dang bgegs rnams gtsad mjed gi//drag ngo chen po rdo rje khro//skyel byed drug po skyil bar mdzad//gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs//
75a4(rgyud): rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'//rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan//dam pa'i ti si lhun po'i ri//gang rkyongs chen pos gzhad pa po//spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum//
75a5(rgyud): rig grangs 'chang mchog rdo rje can//rigs sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags//na bza' dza gong rtsa dmar gsol//mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes//srin po
75a6(rgyud): srung po drag po ste//me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes//nyi ma tshan po nyi ma'i 'od//'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed//grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po//rab mchog rab
75a7(rgyud): mchog rnams kyis mtshang //mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngob//mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags//cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od//phun sum tshogs ldan
75b1(rgyud): sems drug pa//ye shes tshe ldan srung ba che//rlung dmar lags te spyod yul ring //gtsobo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs//'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa//rgya chen gtsug na
75b2(rgyud): nor bu thogs//mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon//'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gtsug/gsum gzigs rtse gsum btsug phud gsum//'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen maN+Da/
75b3(rgyud): za ba bo sta 'jigs par mdzad//mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa//tshamatshom med de srin las byung //rtag par dkar dgyes dus 'byor pa//rgyu skar rgyal ras 'phel bar
75b4(rgyud): mdzad//rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste//bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags//bai DUr+ya ltar dri me sku//mdzes shing stobs skyod sna tshogs stobs//dga' ba skyed pa
75b5(rgyud): dga' bar mdzad//dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog/lha tshan dpa' bo chen po ste//brtan po dpa' bo lam me ba//bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod//dam du 'ching
75b6(rgyud): ba'i rtsal mnga' ba//mtshon cha che rdzogs cod pan can//rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba//pad+ma chen po phyag ring ba//pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog/nag po chen po 'byung
75b7(rgyud): ngo che//gtum chen thog thog chen po ste//rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang //rdo rje mtshan cha brgya rdzogs so//rtul pod thub pa brtsan pa ste//'byung po chen pa tshogs kyi rje/
76a1(rgyud): zhi ba dbang du rje'i mtshun//drug bAH mo rnam byar shams//rgyal du'os ga zugs chug/ can du la la d+hun//rdo lcags mangs /
76a2(rgyud): mdzad pa//rdo rje mdas ni rnam par spyod //rdo rje na yod rdo d+hA'i dbang //rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'-i'o dz+hal//ye shes dam pa theg pa che//thabs brnyes snying rje chen 'i legs//rdo rje
76a3(rgyud): po rtsed mo can//spyan bzang rnam por gzigs pa po//rdo rje dril bu rnam dge spyan//'je' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen//rdo rje chen po dgon pa pa//rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par
76a4(rgyud): mdzad//rdo rje chen po gang rgyangs sgrogs//me tog chun po 'od gsal ba//dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras//des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags//sna tshogs can te lta//
76a5(rgyud): kun mchog/rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan//rdo rje gtsug sdud shes rab can//rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes//mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag/bskal pa'i rlung chen
76a6(rgyud): lta bu lags//dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang //rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gi rjed//gsang ba pa ste gsang ba gsungs//skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba/
76a7(rgyud): rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrogs//rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms//rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che//rdo rje 'bar 'tshan 'bar ba//nor bu spros pa'i na bza' gsol//spos da
76b1(rgyud): me rtog phyeng gis rgyun//dbu yi snyan chag du bka tags//sangs rgyas bstan paston pa po//rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//dbang phyug chen po grags pargya//dkyil 'khye
76b2(rgyud): slob dpon dkyil 'khor can//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston po go//daM rje rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings//sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags//de lta rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/
76b3(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod//de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa//rdo rje gsang bas rgyud pa yi//rdo rje brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di//ming ni rdo rje don yid 'byung //
76b4(rgyud): thams cad bzlog byed pa//ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad po'adi//dad pas gang zhig 'chang byed pa//grub pa thams cad thib 'gyur zhing //nyes pa kun las rnam par grol//lag na
76b5(rgyud): rdo rje stobs po che//rtag tu phyi bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur//lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che//gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod//de ni sdig pa kun las grol//ngan 'gro kun las par
76b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur//gsang sngags thog mar spros pa 'di//su zhig nangs par langs nas brjod//rgyal po blon po grong khyer pa//gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur//bstong pa'i
76b7(rgyud): mchog 'di su 'don pa//'jig rten thams cad dadabar 'gyur//sdig pa thams cid zad po dang //tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur//ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin//
77a1(rgyud): bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur//gang zhig nang par langs nas no//lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod//de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang //ldan 'gyur 'di la the tsho
77a2(rgyud): med//ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'dren pa la//bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang //'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang //zil gyis mnan par mi nuso//shes
77a3(rgyud): rab can ni gang zhig gis//ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog gton na//gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang //bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob//gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di//
77a4(rgyud): nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don//mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi//bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur//'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/gzungs
77a5(rgyud): sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so////'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/phyogs bcu'i
77a6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo//'jam
77a7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad bral ge//yon tan dri ma mang po'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan po'i sku//zhabs bton gyi pad+ma la/lha dang
77b1(rgyud): mi dang /lha ma yin dang /klu dang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang /cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tsha lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
77b2(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo//tad+ya thA/oM b+h+r-i/ma hA ma Ni/ru tsi ra ka lAM pa/bits+tshitra/muk+ta dA ma/a laM kr-i ta sha
77b3(rgyud): rI ra/pe ra mo satwa mo tsa ka/ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma/ko Sha d+ha ra/pr-i ba ra d+harma/la ba d+ha/bi dza ya/su ra ta/sam+b+ho ga pa dar sha ka/kle sha ga ra/pra sha ma ka/shU n+ya
77b4(rgyud): tA swa b+hA ba/a nu swa ri[:]ma hA bo d+hi satwe bA ra/ba ra ta/ba ra Na da da/oM ma hA pU sha pra sa ra/a sa ma sa ma/a nan+ti sa ma sa man+ta/b+ha dra/sa man+ta san+d+hu ra/sa man+ta A
77b5(rgyud): ka ra/sa man+ta pra sa ra/sa ra sa ra/he he many+dzu ra ba/ma hA badz+ra/ma hA khana?/ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/b+hin+da b+hin+na/bi ra dza bi ra dzaM/karma a ba ga ma ka/ku ru ku ru/d+hu ru d+hu ru/su
77b6(rgyud): ru su ru/mu ru mu ru/d+ha d+ha d+ha d+hA/d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/mang+ga ma hA/ma hA ma tA/mo tA yau mi ha ya/b+h+r-i b+hU/b+hI ma b+hI ma/na dan da/sa ra sa rA/matA bo d+hi sat+su/mai tsa ya/
77b7(rgyud): mA ma nA tha/ma nu sr-i ta/oM pA ya du/kha na su khaM da ma hA kA ru Ni ka/a nA tho ha/duHkhe to haM/sa ri dza haM/u pad dru to haM a bi bik+to ti/ku sI do haM/ma raH
78a1(rgyud): d+hAt+ta/d+hAnab+h+ya gA d+hAnA/s+'u khit+par+thAn/s+yA na dAd+hA/an+d+rar+thAn+dan/sun+ta b+hUkar/sar dzes/radzA.AR+YA/u pad d+ha t+yAm+ban/saR+Sho p+tA //
78a2(rgyud): pra sha ma ka/a bi big tA nAn/ku sha li sam+b+ha ra/ba ri pu R+Sha yi tA/ku si dA nA naM/mahA b+hIr+ya da tA/mA ra Na/d+harmir+N+Na/ma mi te/bad+hA d+hA tAM/ma ma bi b+hi bAn/
78a3(rgyud): n+yA tho b+hU \u0f7f/sha rat+naM/bai ra yAnr-i tAt+tA/sarba duHkhA ni/me pra sha ma yaM/sarbA kl-i sha ra dzi si mi/u hr-i na ya/sar+b+ba swan/sU r-I pai d+hA ba/duHkha nI myA/
78a4(rgyud): nAM shra ya/sarba ku sha la d+harma/pA ri pu ra ma me/ku ru/sarba karma/a ba ra Na/kle sha pa rat+na ma/mi bi kI ra/ma hA bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi/b+h+r-iR+ya pA ra me tA/yo
78a5(rgyud): br-im+be/san+ni yo dza yaM/A ba rA Na/d+harma/bI rA ga bau rarA dzA/sany+dzA ha pra dzaM ta/d+hA ri Ni/sa ma kha sa ma/dza la ni d+hi sa ma/me ru sa ma/ma hA bo d+hi satwe ba ra daM swAtA/
78a6(rgyud): rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di//'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa ni//de ma thag tu sems can rnams//skye dang rga ba zad par gyur//ngan 'gro thams cad na
78a7(rgyud): gyur nas//bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'angar//lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'//log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur//sdig pa zhi par byed pa yi//gzungs 'di
78b1(rgyud): shrad pa'i mod la yang //grangs med phrag ni lung phyur stod//'khor Sha'i brtson rA dag nas thar//'jam dngul gzhon nur gyur pa yis//'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bskyungs shing //dang //
78b2(rgyud): tshe rig sngags bshad pa na//brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas//rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i//sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos//sangs rgyas 'od kyis snang ba yis//sa yi steng yang khyab
78b3(rgyud): par gyur//bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang //srin po me bzang gzugs can rnams//stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes//skyed phyung tshig ni 'thun par smra//lha
78b4(rgyud): rnams zhi ba'i tshe lugs can//thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas//gang nA rdo rje ral gri che//de yi drung lhags smras pa ni//phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog/'jim pa'i
78b5(rgyud): dbyangs ni stobs chen la//shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can//bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa//sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang //sna tshogs gzugs can
78b6(rgyud): mi yi badrag/shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs//drag po drag po rab 'joms pa//gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal//dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe//rdo rje
78b7(rgyud): can de snying sbyor ba//mi shes pa yi rang rib sel//sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba//skye dgu'i bdag po sreg par dgyes//gzu stobs can la phyag ring ba//nyon
79a1(rgyud): mangs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad//mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol//me teg phreng rgyan sna tshogs can//spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste//dgye
79a2(rgyud): shing na bza' sna tshogs gsol//'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu bzhad//dkar gnag 'byed pa'i spyan mnga' ba//he hi'i sgra ni rab tu bsgragaso//rab tu dka' ba ston par dka'//
79a3(rgyud): rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan//rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can//tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste//sdang ba'i snying na 'jigs par mjed//cha lugs sngo ba/
79a4(rgyud): sa skyong ba//lha'i bdag po dga' bar mdzad//'dod pa'i lto ste 'dod sel brtan//rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa//brtan po rnams la brtan par grags//yon tan
79a5(rgyud): dag gi phyogasu gzhad//btud pa yis gtud phyag bgyis pa//rtag tu mchod cing brjid pa lags//stobs po che la shugs che ba//phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po//
79a6(rgyud): sgeg tshon rdo rje dam pa ste//mdzes shes rab srung ngo tsha shes//dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog/dkyil 'khor chen por ston pa po//dkyil 'khor chen
79a7(rgyud): por grags pa ste//dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags//dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can//zhabs la brjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan//ha ha swA hA'i bdag
79b1(rgyud): malan yams mamacam/sasam thamams ma tham/mamacamam tham mamamathasamamams ma mal mas tha yang a yang a ga ma la/yams ya la maman ma thams mamacam pas
79b2(rgyud): chag//mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam//hUM gas 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste//'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po//lha dang lha min rnams kyis bdud//de bzhin mchod cing
79b3(rgyud): ri mor bgyis//zha 'bring gad rgyangs chen po cen//rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad//'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags//gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba//drag po
79b4(rgyud): dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba//mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can//'dzume zhing sgeg par kun tu spyod//spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags//nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/
79b5(rgyud): nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba//nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs bzhin//tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bzhod//mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad//nor sbyin de bzhin
79b6(rgyud): gsang sngags sbyin//dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srod sbyin//gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa//dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri//kun tu rmongs pa sel bar
79b7(rgyud): mdzad//'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa//zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa//dpung rgyan snyan che gdub 'khor can//nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste//rgyu dang
79b8(rgyud): mi rgyu 'gro ba'i spyan//rab rab sel bar mdzad pa po//ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa//dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog/'jigs pa sol bar mdzad pa ste//'jigs
80a1(rgyud): pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa//dkar ba spro ba 'od bzung ba/mthun tsun b+h+yo na ston pa lcags//ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba//de bzhin cha lugs rab
80a2(rgyud): ston//shes rab ral gyis 'debs paro mdzad//ston nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa//byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen//rnam par grags pa gsan pa des//rig
80a3(rgyud): sa 'tsha ba rnams kyis bstod//rigs sngags tshong bsgrubs //shin tunam brgyal 'bar las sgyur//'jigs med thugs shes rab can//de bzhin /
80a4(rgyud): de'i chos 'dzin pa//mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste//zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa//lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur//sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad//
80a5(rgyud): sems can kun la rab ston pa/brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog/sems can kun gyi blo la mkhas//sred med bu ste drug shul stobs//ma yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste//byis
80a6(rgyud): pa'i sku mchog mchog sbyin pa//rtseng mo rol mo ston par mdzad//phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad//bdag gir mi mdzad rtul med brtan//mkha' 'dra dpe med
80a7(rgyud): smra mkhas pa//bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po//mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du med//de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal//brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs
80b1(rgyud): mya ngan med cing gnas pa med//'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang //dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'joms//tshad med des 'joms rnal 'byor pa//'dod pa gnon pa
80b2(rgyud): khyad par gshegs//mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog/gshin rje 'pham mdzad skye dgu srung //las dang nyon mongs rab bsreg pa//ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags//legs
80b3(rgyud): po khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan//brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing //dad pa bskyed por byed pa 'di//lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad//bgegs chen dang ni log 'drin/
80b4(rgyud): dang //gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang //mdangs 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis//de ring legs par bstod par gyur//'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab//bsgyings pas lha
80b5(rgyud): yangs bde bar 'gyur//de dag kun la bltas nas kyang //'di skad du ni tshig smras pa//khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing //nges legs thar pa thob gyur la//'jigs med
80b6(rgyud): bkra yangs shis par shog/nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig/de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing //'brug cher sgra lder sgrogs pa yi//de bzhin gshegs pa zhal bsal bas///
80b7(rgyud): shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa//kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul//sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir//sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/
81a1(rgyud): mal na am maca/sasam camams mtham sa ma cacan thas mamathas thasam mamamamatham kha mam mtsham tha ya mal Tha/mams yams ya yamakham tha' tha ma sa mamam ma
81a2(rgyud): shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur//kye ma bsod nams cher bcas pa'o//sems can rnams ni rab sbyangs phyir//dam pa skyon pa'i grub pa'i gzungs//'ja
81a3(rgyud): pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad//la la gang zhig mnyam gzhag nas//sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi//grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am//yang na nyan tam sems
81a4(rgyud): kyang rung //de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing //sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur//sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa//de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur//de bzhin
81a5(rgyud): gshegs kyi sa chen yang //ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa//rab dga' shin tu dri ma med//'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can//sbyangs
81a6(rgyud): dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur//ring du song dang mi g.yo ba//legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin//sa chen dam pa de dag kyang //gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi//sems
81a7(rgyud): can chen pos mi thogs par//tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur//sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang //sems can kun la sdug pa dang //spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi//
81a8(rgyud): byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang //sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing //bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi//ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid
81b1(rgyud): /'ongad 'di//sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas//'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la//shin tu dang ba'o sems kyi su//nang par langs nas su brjod pa//de la rig sngags 'chung kun dang //
81b2(rgyud): de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag/rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang //de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang //
81b3(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje'i mchog 'chang rnams//de la nges par srung bar byed//do ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing //mnyam par gzhag pa snang bar 'gyur//gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po
81b4(rgyud): rnams//bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag/dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yi//rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal//de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas//'tshe bar byed
81b5(rgyud): kyang mi nus//lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang //bsod nams mnyam par thob par 'gyur//shos rab chen po gang zhig gis//nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas na//dri ma
81b6(rgyud): med cing rab dag la//rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang //sems can thams cad dga' ba yi//yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob//mtshungs pa med cing stobs sgyid lam
81b7(rgyud): mchog 'gro ba dang //'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bsnyad cing //yid 'drog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi//gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par
82a1(rgyud): gsungs pa yin//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog s+ho///'phags pa sgrib pa thams
82a2(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag
82a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo//oM a mra te/bon+du dza ba/ma hA su kha swAhA/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod kyis/phyag g.yasaM ba brkyang ste/byang chub
82a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas/bka' stsal pa/yon tan rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di
82a5(rgyud): byung bas/sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legaso leg so//kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i
82a6(rgyud): klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gang la le'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang /sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro//sku
82a7(rgyud): gi dung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba ya ra gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/chos bco lnga la bsnyung bar 'dug cing /gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/spos dang /bdug po
82b1(rgyud): dang /mar me dang /me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa la sogs pas mchod la/bskor ba byas nas/bzlas brjod byas na/dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/sdig pa tha~Md
82b2(rgyud): dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la/spos la sogs pas mchod de/bzlas
82b3(rgyud): brjod byas na/rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed cing /nyon mongs pa dang /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do//de nas rdo rje
82b4(rgyud): me tog thaMd chen pos gsum gyi dbang phyug dang /thabs gcig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas/stan las langs te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa zed
82b5(rgyud): rnam par sel ba la btud nas/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa//sems can kun gyi gtso bo che//byang chub sems dpa' tshul che ba//nyon mongs dri ma kun
82b6(rgyud): las 'das//chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tsha lo//sgrib pa kun las nges par grol//nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing //nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba//skyon bral khyod la phyag
82b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo//lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing //theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa//theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te//theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal//snang po chen
83a1(rgyud): man mams sam cams mtham/sa mamam thasamamathasamamams yam sa yas mas ma ma.ams/mas ya samakham tha
83a2(rgyud): por snang ba brnyes//yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba//'jig rten 'ongs po khyod phyag 'tshal//theg pa chen po dag pa//
83a3(rgyud): che//sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing //rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams grangs pa//rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal//dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal//dar ba chen po nyin
83a4(rgyud): mongs tshems//bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste//rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal//zla ba chen po nyi ma che//lhun po chen po dbang phyug che//lha chen mgon po chen po ste//
83a5(rgyud): 'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal//sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad tsong //sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa//kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che//rnam sel khyod la phyag
83a6(rgyud): 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste//chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags//ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che//sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshalo//sku mdze
83a7(rgyud): yon tan snying po mkhyen//rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan//sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che//ye shes dge pa khyod phyag 'tshal//bstan pa gnas dbang bdag po ste//
83a8(rgyud): bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste//yangs pa dri med shes rab can//snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal//zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon//zhi ba 'jig rten dag par mdzad/
83b1(rgyud): ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na//dpa' btsan khod la phyag 'tshalo//skal bu chen po nyon mongs bcom//'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste//zhi ba zhi mdzad bde byung
83b2(rgyud): br-in chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal//thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che//bde 'byor gnas pa dri ma med//rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen//nyes sil khyod la phyag 'tsha lo//
83b3(rgyud): rtse mo yangs pa rnam par grogs//sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa//snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog/dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshalo//sdug bsngal gsum
83b4(rgyud): sel gsum gyi mchog/dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra//rnam gsum mkhyen pa brnyes pa'i bdag/rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tsho lo//byang chub sems dpa'i ston gyi/
83b5(rgyud): 'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes//bskal pa dag ni grangs med par//tshogs tshon bsags khyod phyag 'tsha lo//sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes//sa yi 'bras bu phun sum
83b6(rgyud): tshogs//yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba//ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshalo//ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa//nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel//ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/
83b7(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal//mgon po chen po snang ba che//sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel//zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa//yon tan pa mtha' khyod phyag 'tsha
84a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa//chus kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs//dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa//rin chen mtha' yas khyad phyug
84a2(rgyud): 'tshal//rdo rje chen po dri med mchog/rdo rje mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'//na mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan//ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'//de bzhin gshegs dang
84a3(rgyud): yul gcig pa//sel pa ba~M swA dI ma hU~Mng //shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras//sred gtsang khyod la phyaga'atsha lo//rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog/rdo rje 'dur ba rdo
84a4(rgyud): chang //rdorje sbrul can rnams kyiHkaM//rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal//rin tshun chen ba na chenA~M thA/rin chen rdo rje'i 'od cheg//rin tshun 'ang mdzes rin chen byu
84a5(rgyud): rin chen bstan po srung mdzad pa//stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes shing //ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston//stong nyid longs spyad yul dang ldan//stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tsha'o/
84a6(rgyud): shes rab mtshungs med shes rab ca na//dag pa rnam dag sa dang bral//chos cig las byung snang ba po//'jig rten 'ongs pa'i tshul chen lags/'jig rten snang mdzad
84a7(rgyud): mkhas pa//'jig rten chos las snang bar 'das//'jog rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes//rgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag/nyam pa ma lus sol ba ste//phy-iH
84b1(rgyud): la na yam thamam masasam thamams ma thamamamam thasamamathas mamamamams mams nga yamags yas yas sa bam tsam ma yam ya sams 'ayas yamamakhas ma tham
84b2(rgyud): tshen skye bo kun la phan//sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po//kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal//dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod pa//dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog
84b3(rgyud): dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can//dga' ba ldan pa khyod phyag 'tshal//sgeg tshon 'dzin zhing dgongs por ldan//rnam par sgrog la spyod pa brten//rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog
84b4(rgyud): sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che//theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas//bla med mchog khyod la
84b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo//dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis//ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas//rdo rje
84b6(rgyud): bstan pa rnam grags pa//bai tsam ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//kye ma 'byor tshun snang ba yis//dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba//gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa//
84b7(rgyud): 'di dag se sor brjod byed na//de ni nyes pa kun bzlog cing //rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang //nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis//sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la//blo ldan/
84b8(rgyud): gang zhig bstod byed po//de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur//gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/nang par langs nas brjod byed pa//sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur//
85a1(rgyud): bgogs rnams kyis kyang yongasu btang //sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang //de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang //ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing //sa marno//
85a2(rgyud): chen po thob par 'gyur//gang zhig nges par gnas byas la//ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa//des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas so//ring por mi thogs thob par
85a3(rgyud): 'gyur//rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba//gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni//rdo rje dkyil 'khor bstan pa la//ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur//byang chub sems
85a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so///'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgyaH
85a5(rgyud): brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tsha lo//oM suM b+ha ni su~M
85a6(rgyud): b+haha ra tsa rA/me hA pA sha/ma ru tA/a mo g+ha/badz+ra satwa swA hA/de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi//gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang //rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor/
85a7(rgyud): dam pa ni//ti si'i gangs bcas g.yos par 'gyur//sa yi snying po chags dbang la//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras//skal ldan chen po legaso legs//
85b1(rgyud): smra stengs khyod kyis yangs par byas//khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing //yon tan dpag mod mchog bskyod pa//sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang //nyes pa ba/
85b2(rgyud): cing thos po 'di//'khor bar rab tu rgyun ni//nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te//ji ltar 'dom gyi pad+ma dag/'dam gyi nyos pas mi gos bzhin//lus can dge la su yang rung /
85b3(rgyud): khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa//de dag las ni gcig tsam yang //byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur//mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/thos na snga mas par
85b4(rgyud): byed pa dang //nges par yon tan thams cad kyang //thos par 'gyur te the tshom med//de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor//langs te sa yi dbang phyug po//sa yi snying pos
85b5(rgyud): mchog la//ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni//sa yi snying po gtso bo che//glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba//cad pan can te sa brnyes pa//phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog
85b6(rgyud): rigs ldan rag mdzad mchod pa'i gnas//gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa'o//bzhi bcas ldan po'i klung gi tshul//swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/thams cad mkhyen panyi ma'i mchog/
85b7(rgyud): snying po snying po mkhyen par grags//gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol//sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs can//sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan//'bras bu mngon sum ston
86a1(rgyud): pa po//rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen//snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med//mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba//shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs/
86a2(rgyud): 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing //gar stabs chen po ston pa po//ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra//na mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa//nyi ma chen po nyid yin te/
86a3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po 'bar po bskor//yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa//sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can//chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che//yon tan rgya mtsho'i ga
86a4(rgyud): chen mtsho//yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog/thabs tshu la zab la mkhas pa ste//theg po chen po 'jigs pa med//mchod
86a5(rgyud): ba chen po sgra tsha ba//zla ltar grags bya'i dkyil 'khor can//rdo rje 'chang chen mtshon brgya pa//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor me tog tha~Md//blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/pad+ma chen po
86a6(rgyud): stabs po che//sngags 'chang chen po stobs cher ldan//sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags//lag na rdo rje yon tan nges//nor bu'i me tog thod kyis rgyun//mnyam nyid 'byam
86a7(rgyud): la longs spyod pa//rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can//rdo rje'i 'angamanga' rdo rje ldan//sa yi bdag sbyin po bzhin//sa la longs spyod longs spyod tshe//mtshan chag ma
86b1(rgyud): phun sum tshogs//rab 'byam snad ni rnam par grags//smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa//spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste//me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings//spro ba chen po phyag
86b2(rgyud): ring ba//brtan po brtan pa bod byin pa//ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste//gangs can lhun po lta bu lags//dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang //ba tson po khyab 'jug stobs
86b3(rgyud): dbang phyug/'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs//de bzhin nyid tshul spyod tshul can//rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa//dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol//gzigs/
86b4(rgyud): pa ring ba spyan yangs pa//nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med//thogs pa med dpogs rin chen gtsug/srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu//dul ba nyon mongs dri ma gsal//dag pa
86b5(rgyud): gtsang mgos sbyong can//rnam par gnon pa yul las 'das//ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che//stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba//bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can//
86b6(rgyud): dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed//sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa//mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan//dga' ba rgyal cher rab 'byung ba//rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying
86b7(rgyud): po mkhyen//rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags//rgyal po rigs chos skyed pa'i rten//rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan//rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa//rig sngags 'chang
87a1(rgyud): ba stobs po che//mngon par 'phags pa khyad par mchog/mgron bzangs nad dang bral ba lags//skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste//sangs rgyas la man
87a2(rgyud): ston pa//sgrol ba smin mdzad sdud par mdzad//dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud//rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas//rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten//
87a3(rgyud): grub pa sbyin pa rnam dag mchog/tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po//dkyil 'khor rtswa ser mnga' ba ste//'od zer ljang ku'i 'od dang 'dra//par len gza' ser po ban
87a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis rgyan//spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal//nor bu sna tshogs 'ad 'byung ba//rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro//mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med
87a5(rgyud): sku yang dag cing na bza' dag/dge pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan//dag pa'i chos mnga'i dang ba ste//'byung ldan sreg pa sel mdzad pa//'khor ba zad mdzod shes rab can//
87a6(rgyud): tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba//rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags//rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che//'byung ldan rab 'byam shes rab can//ma lus grags pa'i 'od
87a7(rgyud): bzang ba//sa yi stong po snying po che//rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren//dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs/khyad par 'phags pa'i yul
87b1(rgyud): la gnas//zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil//dga' ba dang bskyod pa ste//ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba//rlung gi drag shUl lta bur grag sa/
87b2(rgyud): drag po lags te drag sel btsang //rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la zhi//rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bor mdzad//lhun po to se ma lo yas//spyod yul zab mo nod pa ste//rin
87b3(rgyud): chen rdo rje snying po che//sa gzhi spyod yul mnga' ba lags//rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od//rdo rje dkyil 'khor dag gis rgyun//de bzhin gshegs pa lhur dgyes pa/
87b4(rgyud): shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten legs//rab gsal dpal mdzad gceng ma ste//phyogs tsha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug tsha//de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la//ming brgya rtsa brgyad mtsho/
87b5(rgyud): rnams kyis//rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni//rdo rje sa gsum dbang mchog smras//yon+da tan snying po shes rnams kyis//med brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing //nyes pa
87b6(rgyud): bzlog pa 'di las gzhan//sA yI steng na ngas ma mthong //ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di//thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste//sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang //dri ma
87b7(rgyud): kun bral yon tan nges//de phyir sgrib pa thams cad kyis//phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis//ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di//rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis//
88a1(rgyud): maung brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di//bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi//gnas mchog blan med pa ste//dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yi//yad ni shin tu dang ba yis//sa yi snying po
88a2(rgyud): mtshan gsal ba//'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i//yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang //dpal yon rgya cher 'dzin pa yi//ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di//me ni gang zhig rjod byed
88a3(rgyud): pa//sdug bsngal kun las myur du grol//'ophags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsartse brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya
88a4(rgyud): many+dzu shrI nA ma eSh+Ta sha ta ka na/bod skad du/'bags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo//shin tu dang ba'i sems kyisu//
88a5(rgyud): thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te//sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi//mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi//gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste//gzugs rnams kun
88a6(rgyud): gyi bla na med//mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs//'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags//bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral//mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung //sku gsung/
88a7(rgyud): phrin las bsam mi khyab//de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab//stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can//stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan//stong pa nyid la lhag par moso//srid pa gsu
88b1(rgyud): po stong bar ston//thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//sa rnams kun gyi dra dag dang ldan//sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur//sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa//ngan
88b2(rgyud): 'gro kun dang de bzhin du//mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms//ngas kyis rgol ba cher gcod pa//spro ba'i seng ge'i mo yi mchog/dul zhing nyon mongs dgra rnams dang /
88b3(rgyud): sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'//sems can thams cad yongs su skyob//grol zhing 'jig rten blol mdzad pa//ral pa mun ji brtul zhugs can//tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs//bgrang
88b4(rgyud): nor thogs shing phyag 'khar bsnams//dag cing dag la rnams dang ldan//'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' bdag mdzad//pad ma las 'khrungs pad ma'i spyan//pad+ma'i bri ba'i khyu
88b5(rgyud): dog 'dra//bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad+ma lags//gtsang ma ud pa la sngon po bsnams//bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan//khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas//khyod ni
88b6(rgyud): dang po'i sangs rgyas lags//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes//bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po//'jig rten skyong ba sbyin stong maunga'//khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bodag/
88b7(rgyud): khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams//kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso//khyod ni khyu mchog skyo dgu'i gtso//thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgos//rnam par 'drin dang 'dul
88'a1(rgyud): mdzad pa//rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs//'od zer stod ldan nyi ma khyod//zla ba dang ni pur du'ang khyod//rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang ltag pa/
88'a2(rgyud): dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod//klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod//de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags//lha min dbang po thags bzangs ris//mig dmar gza'
88'a3(rgyud): lag pa pa sangs//spen pa dpa' bo lha kun logs//lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa//'jig rten chos kyi dri ma phral//khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog/'jig
88'a4(rgyud): rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig/ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa//dam po sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs//bdud kyi las kyis yongs midz+dzi//kha na ma tho mi mang
88'a5(rgyud): zab//dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags//khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin//mi 'dul kho lo bsgyur ba'i mchog/blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan//blo
88'a6(rgyud): dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags//khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing //byang chub yan log me tog rgyan//rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/
88'a7(rgyud): lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur//yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa//sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod//khyod ni mjug rings gza' mchog lags/
88'b1(rgyud): na dung sgyung sadz+nyAnanA rgyal chub dbang bsgyur /sna brgya'o dbang phyu/ba mags/ rnams kyi//myu
88'b2(rgyud): 'odas pa na ston nan//na namam pa sa man//na med sta/rkyen ma zhen na zlar/sems tshan
88'b3(rgyud): rlob kun rdzogs mdzod/'bying ba kun gyis / /rin chen khyod la rkyen 'amasa'ajam la kyi sbyin paka' stsal hA/
88'b4(rgyud): kye dam nI m+me saH//ji sang bris pa'i mtshan rnams da/rigs skyugs bcus pa 'dzinanan/smig gyur rnam dge
88'b5(rgyud): rab tu tho//brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan//skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa//de 'dod zas ma dgu yid bzhin du//gdon mi za bar
88'b6(rgyud): 'gyu 'gyur/bzang po'i rgyun rnamam+b+ha dranan na/marnamapa bskul ba ma ma ma//sa rnams me zad//phyu //da/
88'b7(rgyud): sems cad myu du byu /'dzi rten ma nga/'jug na pa chu/pham pa rkyen dgrul pa dran na/
89a1(rgyud): sa na pa' bar 'gyur/tho nga ldan pas na b+h+ya/sa pa gan ma su gnas/bas chu tan
89a2(rgyud): 'dod na yang //thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med///'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgyaHbrgyad pa rdzogs so//
89a3(rgyud): rgya srung du sku n+ya mdzo brA tI dz+nyA nA ma d+ha rak+Shi/bod skad du 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas bzhes b+h+yo gzungasadakon
89a4(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
89a5(rgyud): b+ha ga g+ha/mun patathA gau tA yA/auHte/samyaka sa ma bud d+hA ya/tad+ya/oM a dzi te s+yA dza
89a6(rgyud): aM ba rAdz+r-i/au dzaM tiSh+Tha ma/hwAr+ya /mr-i tri a ba 'o tit+ta/ka rakA rau/mad+h+ya saM myA ya sad d+d+ha/b+hA ra b+hA ra/madz+nyA bo d+hI mar+N+Na bIdzA/
89a7(rgyud): smar smar/Asma kaM sa ma yai/ba~M d+ha bo d+hi/ma hA bo d+hi swA hA/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so//oM mo hi mai hi mo/mihA mo hi s+thohA/snying po'o//oM nu ni mu na
89b1(rgyud): smar swA hA/nye ba'i snying po'o//gzungs 'ang nyan pa tsam dang /klog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la sems pa dang /bsgoms pa tsam gyis/gang gi tshe bdag
89b2(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na/bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/bla na med pa yang dag par
89b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyu'o//tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa'i ri dgas dang /bya rnams kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
89b4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo//'di thos pacom gyis nam du yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ngan seng gi dri mos kyang mi gos so//me'i mngal du yang mi
89b5(rgyud): skye'o//lho'i'o bskal pa stong du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur//dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyuraro//ji ltar byasams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub
89b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de bskyed par mi bgyi lag so//nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas/de ji ltar gyur kyang rung /blo
89b7(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'bya'o//'phags pa byams pas dam bcos pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
89'a1(rgyud): rgya bar skad du/Ar+yA dzam b+hA la nA ma aSh+ma sha tA ka/drod skad du//'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan dargya rtsa brgyad pa/'phags pa gnod 'dzin
89'a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo//de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po//gser dag gis ni legs pa raM brgyan//rin chen gyis ni rang mdzes shing //min shin tu 'byar 'dra ba//lhung
89'a3(rgyud): lo can du zhugs nas kyang //gsong bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi//zhabs gnyis la ni rab 'jus nas//shin tu mnyam bzhag dris pa ni//bcom ldan gnod 'dzin rgyal dbang
89'a4(rgyud): po/gsang sngags tshogs ni kun gyi bdag/rig sngags 'chang rnams kun gyis mchod//lha dang lha min phyag byas pas//ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po//byang chub
89'a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i yon tan ldan//mgon po sems can kun don mdzad//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'dzin//sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas//snying rjes non
89'a6(rgyud): pa'i yid kyi su//yang dge rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir//bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de//mi rnams nor ni nyung ba dang //bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba/
89'a7(rgyud): mthong nas sdug bsngal chen po yis//rab tu gzir to gsang ba'i bdag/de nas gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas//bcom ldan gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag/snying rjes non te
89'b1(rgyud): /smras pa ni//legs par nyon cig gsang bya pa//mgon po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan//sems can kun gyi don byed pa//dbul ngo'i nyon mongs sopa bya po//nor ro cig gi
89'b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan//dbul ba'i nyes sIg sel byed pa//gang gA'i bye ma'i grongs snyed kyi//rgyal mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa//
89'b3(rgyud): 'od zer brgya pa zhes pa yi//zhing na sangs rgyas nyi mo'i zhal//chos ston pa ni bdag gis kyang //doni rang gis sngon thos te//dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan//de ni bdag
89'b4(rgyud): gi shes rab kyis//sems can kun don brtson pa po//khyod la legs par bstan par bya//khyod ni mnyam bzhag rab tu nyon//'phags pa lha dang lha min bla//shes rab ldan zhing
89'b5(rgyud): chos la gus//snying brtse'i bdag nyid bzod ldan brtan//dbang po zhi ba dbang po thul//dge bas sdig 'joms shes nyan can//nges shing don kun sgrub pa po//mi gnang mi slu/
89'b6(rgyud): dpal dang ldan//mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa//dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs gcig pa//sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa po//gter rnams skyong ba gzi brjod can//
89'b7(rgyud): rtag sbyin no re ni 'phel byed pa//rin chen 'byung gnas skye bo 'dul//chu yi bdog po chu 'bebs pa//gnod sbyin chu spyod bdag nyid can//gter don nye bor ston pa po//
90a1(rgyud): gser gyur po lhun po ste//dbul ba'i gdon las thar byed pa//dbang po nye dbang 'gro ba'i mgon//chu'i dbang po sprin mdog can//'jig rten mig dang
90a2(rgyud): 'jig rten bla//nyi ma zla ba ther zug pa//nor chen rgyal po chen po ste//log na nI'u laM rab gnas pa//gzhon nu seng gi tog can te//gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che/
90a3(rgyud): tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa//gsong por snyan por smra ba po//bram ze 'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste//che ba don grub grub pas mchod//rig sngogs 'chang ba 'khor los
90a4(rgyud): sbyar/dku bai ra dang mi la zhon//bum pa'i lto can mag yangs pa//lha'i dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs//khyab bdag bde 'byung nor bzangs smras//sems can rnams ni skyong la
90a5(rgyud): dga'//'dod dgur bsgyur gzugs yid kyi lha//cod pan can de rigs dga' ba//g.yon phyogs cod pan lag pa dbyug/lag pa brgya pa stobs po che//sa brgyad dbang phyug
90a6(rgyud): lha yul ba//zla ba nya bo'i zhal mdog can//ded dpon tshogs kyi bdag po ste//gnas brtan tshong pa skal ba bzang //yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang //dpag pas
90a7(rgyud): ljon shing mi yi bdag/mchog don 'os pa gtso bo ste//mchog sbyin mi'u thung khyab 'jug pa//skya bas 'os bkra shis srung ba po//rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan//
90b1(rgyud): skyeyi so blo dris dkrugs//byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi bdag/rab tu dar+ya branar mozang //slong gi'i rnal smin thA N+Da la nAn+da//ston pa 'jog rten gsum la swAN+Dal//gaH/
90b2(rgyud): ngatshang pa rigs kyi mchog/pad+ma'i lci ba thub med rgyul//tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che//gnod 'dzin bdag nyid che ba so//ming brgya rtsi brgyad ngas bshad 'di//sdig pa rnams
90b3(rgyud): cad 'joms byed cing //dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa//'byor dang skol bzang skyed pa 'o//glang po rte nor 'phel byed pa//gza' dang rgyu skar rmi lam ngan//ltas den sel bar
90b4(rgyud): byed pa ste//nags sam gal te grong dang ni//dur khrod yang ni ri yang rung //mkhas pa gang na klog pa der//gauyul dang ngagra ni nyam nga ba//sbrul dang mechu chom rkun sogs//
90b5(rgyud): stag dang dom dang 'jigs pa che//rgya mtsho bgrod dkar mi bzang las//mi ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//dbang po me dang chu lha dang //gshin rje srin bdag rlung lha dang //ner sbyin
90b6(rgyud): dpal ldan ku be ra//nor bu bzang smos lnga rtson dang //rtse mo can dang 'brog gnas dang //lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang //g.yel ba med per nyin mtshan du//rab tu dgo
90b7(rgyud): bzhin srung bar byed//gang na ming 'di klog pa der//glang chen rta dang ba lang dang //lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang //'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel//mi nad dang ni 'gro
91a1(rgyud): ba'i nad//gnad pa kun las byung ba rnams//thams cad du ni bde logs 'gyur//lhag par byis pa rnams lnga shrIs//dril yi dgas klu rnams dang /
91a2(rgyud): ma mo dang ni gden drag dang //mkha'agro ma dang mi 'am ci//srin po rnams kyang 'chi mi byed//nad do cog las rnam par grol//de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan//bu dag
91a3(rgyud): dang ni che bo dang //dpal dang gtong ba rnams kyis rgyas//rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang //longs spyod chen po'i nang du skye//tsha dang dpal dang ldan pa dang //nad
91a4(rgyud): mang rigs dang bral bar 'gyur//tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran//longs sbyin thos pa 'dzin pa dang //byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan//skal ba bzang po nyid du
91a5(rgyud): 'gyur//phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal gnod sbyin rje//gseng bdag khyod lo phyag 'tshal te//ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po//lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud//sems can
91a6(rgyud): dngal mnyes gshin pa//nor bzangs sras kyi grags pa 'di//dngul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa//rab tu bshad pa legs par gsungs//don kun grub pa gsang ba'i sngags//
91a7(rgyud): bdag gis kyang ni 'dir dbul te//de ni legs par dran tsam gyis//mi ni dngul los grol 'gyur zhing //gzhan gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur//dgra rnams kyis kyang
91b1(rgyud): mtshams shing //skul ba bzang dang skal dang ldan//lo ban+d+ha yang ni 'tshe bar 'gyur//lha yi glang po rin chen dang //rgyalga d+had rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang //nges par myur du thod 'gyur/
91b2(rgyud): /ni man mang/sa ma /nImam+muSh+T+rId+hAm+b+ha/ ts+tshe t+maskr-i/oM hrIH Sh+T+r-i/de b+hai nag+sa nA swA tASh+T+rAka~M/de
91b3(rgyud): ya ma nu sma ra hI hUM phaT swA hA//'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogaso//ro'i me'o//rgya gar skad du/A TA nA TI ya ma su tra na nA mi mahA
91b4(rgyud): swAdz+dza/bod skad du mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang /'thun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag
91b5(rgyud): blo dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu
91b6(rgyud): khwa dog 'phags pa g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /g.yog 'khor gnod
91b7(rgyud): sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang /bcom ldan 'das ga lo ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs
92a1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug/de'i tshe rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal byar gyur to//rgyal po chen
92a2(rgyud): po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/
92a3(rgyud): sgra rnams kyis ni de mtshal//dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgyas gang dag 'ongs pa dang //da ltar byung dang ma byon po//thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/
92a4(rgyud): khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabasu mchi//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dog gnas mal
92a5(rgyud): dgon pa dag dang /nags 'dab dag dang /bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/de nas gnod sbyin dang /mi ma lags pa gdugs pa gnyug mar gnas
92a6(rgyud): pa gang dag/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang /mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/gnod sbyin dang /mi ma lags pa gdug pa
92a7(rgyud): gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/shin tu nyung la/gnod sbyin dong /mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug
92b1(rgyud): mar gnas pa gang dag/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni chos mang lags te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang /dag
92b2(rgyud): ma rnams dang /dge bsnyen rnams dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang /bskyab ma dang /bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /gnod sbyin dang /mo mi
92b3(rgyud): lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon bla ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang /mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du/kun tu rgyu
92b4(rgyud): ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma legs pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub
92b5(rgyud): par bgyid na log so legaso zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do//de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos
92b6(rgyud): kyi bus/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/kun
92b7(rgyud): tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang /'thun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to//skye bo gang
93a1(rgyud): dag gtong phod cing //phra ma ma mchis ser sna bral//gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa//mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa legs//gang gi cha ral rten nas
93a2(rgyud): ni//das na nyin mor brjod pa yi//nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor ca ni//nyi gdugs gang nas 'o charo 'gyur ba'i//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen glags dang //
93a3(rgyud): ldan pa ni//dri za'i bdage bo rgyal po ste//ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi//de ni nye du lhan cig tu//glu dang gar gyis rtag tu NAM//dri za rnams kyi yongs bskor cing //
93a4(rgyud): dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis po lngas//de la bu ni ma mchis te//brgyad na dang ni bcung gcig/de dag rang 'thun grags pa ni//dab ba zhes bgyi stongs pa che/
93a5(rgyud): dang lha min g.yul 'i'agyed pa//kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags//de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma gnyen mthong nas//skyes bu cang shes
93a6(rgyud): khyod la 'dud//skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes//me yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni//rgyungs rings gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags//bdag la dge bas gzigs
93a7(rgyud): suM gsol//khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba//de skad yang dang yang du thos//de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces//'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/go'u ta ma rgyal la
93b1(rgyud): 'tshul skye//sangs rgyas da zhabs ldan pa/myu na 'das lnga phyug 'al mats+tsha//dan+d+ha shAran b+h+yo/sa don//brdang phyu sa n+d+ha s+yA//phyogs pa mdun
93b2(rgyud): pUr skyong ba byid pa//rgyal tshon grags dang ldan pa legs//gang na yi dogs zhes bgyi ba//rgyad kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can//srog gracod bgyid pa ma rungs pa//'jungs shi
93b3(rgyud): mi snyan sgra bgyid pa'i//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste//ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi//de ni
93b4(rgyud): du lhan cig tu//glu dang gor gyis rtag tu rtse//grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor rnying //hrul bram rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas//de la bloni mang mchis brgyud
93b5(rgyud): cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/de dag ming 'thun grags pa na//dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che//rtswa dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa//kun tu gzhan gyis mthub lags//de dag
93b6(rgyud): rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas//skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud//skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes//mi yis phyag bgyi
93b7(rgyud): khyod la no//rgyang rings gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags//bdag la dge bso gzigasu gsol//khyod la mi men phyag 'tshal ba//de skad yang dang yang du thos//de slad
94a1(rgyud): bdag ni 'di skad ces//'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa//mya ngan 'das la
94a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal mchi//de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni//bzang po lagaso shes skye bo mchi//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags//gang
94a3(rgyud): zhig nub pa kho na las//des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi//nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can//nyi gdugs gong du nub 'gyur ba//de na mtsho chen zab mo ni//shin tu 'da'
94a4(rgyud): ba dka' ba ste//de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes//skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//klu yi bdag po
94a5(rgyud): rgyal po ste//ming ni mig me bzang zhes bgyi//de ni nye du lhan cig tu//klu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse//klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing //klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis
94a6(rgyud): boltas//de la bu ni mung mchis te//brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni//dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che//lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyid
94a7(rgyud): pa//kun tu gzhan gyi mi thub lags//de dag rnams kyi rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas//skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud//skye mchog
94b1(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes//mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni//rgyud rings gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags//bdag la dge bas gzigasasu gsol//khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/
94b2(rgyud): de skad yang dang yang du thos//de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces//'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'a tshol cig/go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol shig/sangs rgyas rigs dang zhabs ldan pa//
94b3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi//de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni//bzang ba logs shes skye bo mchi//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal tshun glags dang ldan pa
94b4(rgyud): lags//gang ni byang gi sgra mi snyan//dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes dang //gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni//brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing //de dag mi rmo mo 'debs la//bsha
94b5(rgyud): yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing //tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang //nges par yongasu spyod bgyid cing //za su sa lu kha dag dang //dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang //dri bda' me tog
94b6(rgyud): tshogs 'dra zhing //lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal//na li gai ra bskol bgyis nas//tshod mar de 'tshul sran song min//gang na mu lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i//sman dag 'khrung bar
94b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste//ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi//doni nyi du lhan
95a1(rgyud): cig tu//glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse//gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing //gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas//de la bu ni mang
95a2(rgyud): mchis te//brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gi cig/de dag ming 'thun grags po ni//dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che//lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyod pa//kun tu gzhan gyis
95a3(rgyud): mi thub lags//de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas//skyes bu cung shes khyod la 'dud//skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal//
95a4(rgyud): zhes//mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni//rgyung ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags//bdag la dge bos gzigasu gsol//khyed la ming 'thun phyag 'tshal ba//
95a5(rgyud): de skad yang dang yang du thos//de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces//'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/go'u ta ma khyod la phyag 'tshol cig/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa//
95a6(rgyud): mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi//de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni//bzang ba legs shes skye bo mchi//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags dang ldan
95a7(rgyud): papo lags//shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung //lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po//nub phyogs ni ni migasi bathang //byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po//rgyal po chen po sde
95b1(rgyud): bzhi dag/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan//rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che//phyogs bzhi pa ni skyong bar dgyid//rgyal bong dag gi mnga' gzhug pa//gnod sbyin 'dod
95b2(rgyud): dgung mchi ba rnams//de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing //phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu//de dag ni chibs rta dang /rnga mo dang /khyu mchog dang /ma he drang /rwa dang /
95b3(rgyud): lug dang /sbrul dang /bya dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /gauzhon nu dang /gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lagaso//glang po che gcig gis shing //
95b4(rgyud): rta drangs shing //phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lag so//chi bas rta dang /rnga mo dang /khyu mchog dang /ma ho dang /ra dang /lug dang /sbrul dang /byA dang /skyes pa
95b5(rgyud): dang /bud med dang /gzhon nu dang /gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing /phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lagaso//rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i//gnod sbyin
95b6(rgyud): 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams//gzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni//phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid//rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis//'di
95b7(rgyud): lta ste/kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lagaso pa dang /gar bcas sa stengs kun tu rgyu ba dang /sbubs can dang /grong khyer sbubs
96a1(rgyud): can zhes bgyi ba dag lag so//byang phyogs na mtsho ka bi ka zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis lagaso//nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang /gos
96a2(rgyud): can dang /gos mchog can dang /pad+ma can dang /pad+mo bzang po can dang /sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lag so//che ba rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa//'dzin
96a3(rgyud): pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te//chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung //de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur//btsun pa grong khyer u shi ri'i sbubs kyi pha rol na//
96a4(rgyud): lus gnas dang ni gnas yongs dang //de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can//rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang //bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'//btsun pa
96a5(rgyud): grong khyer sbubs can gyi//pha rol byang gi phyogs cha na//'dun sa bya dkar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te//der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lagaso//rkang mi sdug la
96a6(rgyud): mchu 'phyangs dang //'jigs rungs lto spro can dag mchis//de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtags//rmo bya khrung khrung sgra snyan cing //khu byug sgra skad chen po dang //shang shang de'u
96a7(rgyud): dag sgra 'byin cing //rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang //ko'u kum pa dang chun lag dang //bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing //me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'//lus
96b1(rgyud): ngan po de glu gar gyis//pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse//btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can+da gyi pha rol na//rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba//yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags//
96b2(rgyud): bdag gAng ni mchi sa d+ma'i mdun sa de ni khye na chog can+da zhes bgyi ste/bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lag so//de la gusang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso//tad+harmA/
96b3(rgyud): i li ma li/i li mI li/kai Tim+bA lI/hi li kiM Tim+b+ha laM/hu dum+be/tu dur dul/gau ri/gan d+hA ri/go dr-itan/oM ke mok+Sha s+thi//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
96b4(rgyud): spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang /dri za chen snyoms dang /dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang /dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bigyi lag so//'di lta ste/'dod mos dga'
96b5(rgyud): bos myos pa dang //klu yis myos pa spun dang ni//phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos//me tog myos pa spun rnams dang //rtag tu myos dang dpal gyi myos//nor gyis myos
96b6(rgyud): dang dga' byed dang //ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang //rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra//gtum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang //gser spyod bu mo gsor con dang //pa bi sangs dang phur bu dag/
96b7(rgyud): 'brog gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags//de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te//de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'che'o//dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhi zhing /

97a3(rgyud): ni ka/tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bA to saM swA hA//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong ma'i me/dge bsnyen na me/dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun//

97b1(rgyud): de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'tshal pa bdun du 'gas lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong ma'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bston

98a1(rgyud): gyi sde dpon rnams dang /dmag dpon gyi ming brjod par bgyi lag so//'di lta ste/byin dang nyo byin kau mri sha/rtsibs logs che dang bsus po che/
98a2(rgyud): lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu//g.yon phyogs nag po dramar po dang //sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang //rna ba ring dang 'brugau sgra sgrogs//ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang //

98a6(rgyud): 'gas//de la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lag so//tad+ya b+hU/si re bi si raM/si ri bi sa re/si raM bi sa re/kriSh+Na tsa ga le/ka rA Di/biM gaM le swAhAM/
