99a1(rgyud): ye dwags kyi 'khor pho'am/yi dgas kyi 'khor mo'am/yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tsho bar babyid pa blags
99a2(rgyud): lta zhing blags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /nye bar 'greng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur na/glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/yi dgas rnams kyi yi dgas 'du
99a3(rgyud): ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lagaso//de la gsang
99a4(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags/// ma mu mi/oM mi la/yu mi l+ya ba dza yai s+yAd+d+ha/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snor bdag gis klu rnams dang /
99a5(rgyud): chen po rnams dang /klu'i sde dpon rnams dang /dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lag so//'di lta ste/dga' dang nya dga' kun dga' dang //nor rgyas dang
99a6(rgyud): ni 'dzam bu bzang //ser pa dang ni zho na dang //dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang //mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral//rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag/ngos yangs po dang ngos
99a7(rgyud): bkra dang //yangs pa can dang bkra bdud rgyal//gdengs ka tshan dang skar dka' dang //nag po che dong lag 'gro dang //ra skyong dang ni 'jog pa dang //g.yon phyogs de
99b1(rgyud): bzhin nag pa dang //skyob pangs da/radang grogs pAn+ta//'gro gnas rnga stod mchis pa lags//de dag ni bdag blo spyan lags to//de dag la dang klu 'di ni 'ad chu'o//
99b2(rgyud): klu 'di ni bdag me gtong shes mchi zhing /de dag la go bar bgyid lags//bdag la 'tsho ba'i klu dag dang //bden mi hrI tong byA hU~M rnam pa kyi//ldegs phy-i smras pa 'di thosan/
99b3(rgyud): ar+thakA'i dog pa bzhin//de'i mgo tshal bdun du 'grus//de la gsang sngabs kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so//tad+ya thA/tsi le dzi tsa li/tsi la~M bi tsi li/go ri gan d+ha ri/ma taM gi
99b4(rgyud): tsaN+Da li swAhA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyis dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma lang
99b5(rgyud): ba dang 'thun pa'i mang//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pA rkang pa la phyag 'tshul bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgyu tshar lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa dri la/gal te klu'i
99b6(rgyud): klu mo 'am/klu rgad po 'am/klu rgan mo'am/klu'i bu pho 'am/klu'i bu mo 'am/klu'i 'khor lo 'am/klu'i 'khor mo 'am/klu'i mngag gzhug pa'am/klu'i mngag gzhug mAM
99b7(rgyud): mche bar bgyid pa klags lta zhing //glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar 'greng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur na/glags mi rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed la/klu rnams kyis klu'adu ba'i
100a1(rgyud): nang du mchir mi chud cing //rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste//de'i mgo ar+tha ka'i dag pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lag so//
100a2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i
100a3(rgyud): mdo||rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/gal te lus srul po'i/
100a4(rgyud): lus srul mo 'am/lus srul rgad po 'am/lus srul rgan mo 'am/lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/lus srul po'i bu mo'am/lus srul po'i 'khor pho 'am/lus
100a5(rgyud): srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'am/'tsho bar bgyid pa/glags lte zhing glags tshol ba la la
100a6(rgyud): zhig nye bar mchi zhing /nye bar 'agling ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur nu/glags mi rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed la/lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i
100a7(rgyud): nang du mtshar mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du chel po bdun du 'gas lagaso//de la gsang
100b1(rgyud): sngags kyi chog 'di dag lags//d+hAd+haSh+Tha/A bo ba ha na/mad+h+yan ba dz+rI yo swAhA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang /gnod sbyin
100b2(rgyud): chen po rnams dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang /dmag dben rnams kyis ming brjod par bgyi lag so//'di lta s+t+wa~M/dbang po zla ba chu ltu ngo //ba ra dA ni skye dgu'ablo ga/
100b3(rgyud): dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod cing ngo //mgrin nga ni dang ni 'gul nges dang //stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang //sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang //rimanyam gsar can gang po dang //se U
100b4(rgyud): padang gi tshun can dang //gnod sbyin bu lung rgyud dang 'breg gnas dang //rgyal ba mag mi rgyal ba//dAnA sna tshogs s+t+rai dan+tu//lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang //tshog
100b5(rgyud): lnga ser po yid dga' dang //gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas//'bras blo gsum dang 'gul gsum pa//'gro gnas ji snyid mchis pa lags//de dag ni bdag gi spyan lags
100b6(rgyud): ti/de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni//bdag la 'tsho'o//gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mtsho zhing /de dag la go bar bgyid lag so//bdag la mchi ba'i
100b7(rgyud): nod byin dang //bdag mi nga ba'i gnan sbyin gyis//legs pa'i smos pa 'di thos na//mthug 'dzin pa bzhin//de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas//de la gsang sngangs/
101a1(rgyud): kyi chog ni 'di dag 'grus//tad+ya thA/hi li mU la/tA l+yA me la/kr-Ir+t+r-im+b+ha laM/ta likr-Ir+t+tim+b+ha le/oM tum+b+he t+tAm+b+he/oM tur+m+ma tur+m+ma/A b+hA moH/na daH/
101a2(rgyud): b+h+ri ga ra/riSh+Te set+ta me swA hA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu
101a3(rgyud): rmyargyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid//
101a4(rgyud): po de la/gal te gnod sbyin nam/gnod sbyin mo 'am/gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/
101a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po 'om/gnod sbyin gyis 'khor mo 'am/gnod sbyin gyis mngag gtsug pa'am/gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/glags lta zhing
101a6(rgyud): glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar 'greng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur na//glags mi rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed lo/gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du
101a7(rgyud): mchir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin chel pa bdun du 'ogs lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan
101b1(rgyud): dus nyan nos dag slong dum/dge sbyong ma sa da smyan nam//dag bskyon mya gangs gan n+d+ha d+hU ba dang /snun ma lags pa da ldan po spyang/gags dang /spyang nga
101b2(rgyud): nga rgyan nga sa sa shing na ra ma/snod sbyi da /sbyi ni
101b3(rgyud): srin de'i bu po 'am/srin po'i bu mo 'am/srin po'i 'khor po 'am/srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/srin po'i ma ga zhug pa 'am/srin dro'o mngag gzhug ma 'am/'tshe bar bgyid/
101b4(rgyud): ba glags lta zhing glags tshal bal la zhing nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'breng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur glags mi cing /gnas mi rnyed la/srin po rnams kyi 'du ba'i rlu du
101b5(rgyud): mchir me chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang ljang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ar+d+ha ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshol ba bdun du 'gas legaso//de li gsang sngags kyi tshig
101b6(rgyud): 'di dag lags//tadz+yor+m+mA/trai li te lo//d+hA l+yA d+d+hi lu/yu me su me li/yum+b+ha la ba dzi ye s+thAnA/de nas rgyal po rnam thos kyi rdzas/bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sngar
101b7(rgyud): tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu 'i ma yin pa dang 'tshun gyi med//rig sngags dang srung ba dang /su na 'i rkang po la phyog 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'adi nyid/rgya cher brjod nas
102a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun /
102a2(rgyud): gyi gtsol gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhug so//bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos
102a3(rgyud): kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /g.yog 'khor
102a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang /nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin naso/nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de'i tshe rgyal
102a5(rgyud): po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to//rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/de'i
102a6(rgyud): tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa//lha rnams kyis ni de ma tshal//dpa' chen khyod la
102a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang //da ltar byung dang ma byon pa//thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal//khyod la bdag ni skyabasu mchi//btsun pa
102b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge sbyong da /dge slong ma'am/dge bstan nam/dge bstan ma gang dag gnas mal ston pa dang /mags 'a ba dag dang /bas mtha' dug no gnas pa das
102b2(rgyud): kyang mchis la/de na gnod sbyin dang me ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang /mngon par ma dad pa/
102b3(rgyud): dag kyang mchis te/gnod sbyin dang /mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag ni shin tu nyung la/gats+tshad
102b4(rgyud): sbyin dang /mi ma lag pa gdug pa gnyug myur gnas pa gang dag/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/btsun pa bcos
102b5(rgyud): kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang /dge slong ma rnams dang /dge bsnyen rnams dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /bde ba la reg par
102b6(rgyud): gnas par bgyi ba dang /gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mir gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dad par bgyi ba dang /mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel
102b7(rgyud): bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang /'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di
103a1(rgyud): nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na/leg ste log so zhes gsol pa dang /dge slong drug ngas rgyal po chen po rnam rjes kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas
103a2(rgyud): gnang bar mdzad//de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/de'i zhabs lo mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/nga'i spyan sngar
103a3(rgyud): kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsil te/
103a4(rgyud): skye bo grong dag gtong phod cing //phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral//gang dge sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa//mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags//gang zhig 'tshar la brten nas ni/
103a5(rgyud): des na nyin mor brjod pa yi//nyi ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor can//gnyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags
103a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa ni//dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste//ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi//de ni he du lhan cig tu//glu dang gar gyi rtag tu rtse//dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor
103a7(rgyud): cing //dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas//de la bu ni mang mchis te//brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni//dbang po zhes bgyi stobs ngon
103b1(rgyud): lho dang lha min ga yul 'gyed pa//kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags//de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas//skyes bu cang shes khyod lnga 'dung//
103b2(rgyud): skyes mtshig khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes//mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni//rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tsha le lags//bdag la dge bas gzigs gsol//khyod la mi min phyag
103b3(rgyud): 'otshal ba//de skad yang dang yang du thos//de slad bdag la 'di skad ces//'dren pa rgyal ni phyag 'tshal cig/go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs
103b4(rgyud): ldan pa//mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tsho la mchi//de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni//bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal tshon grags dang
103b5(rgyud): ldan pa lags//gang ni yau dgas zhes bgyi ba//rgyab kyi sho 'tshal phra ma can//srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa//'jungs shI ngo mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i//phyogs de mad+mo/
103b6(rgyud): par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste//ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi//de ni nye du lhan cig tu//glu dang gar gyis
103b7(rgyud): rtag tu rtse//grul bu mo rnams kyis yongs bskor cing //grul bum rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas//de la bu ni mang mchis te//brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/de dag
104a1(rgyud): ming 'thun grags pa ni//dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che//lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa//kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags//de dag rnams kyis/
104a2(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas//skyes bu cing shes khyod la 'dud//skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes//mi yis phyag bkyis khyed la ni//
104a3(rgyud): rgyang rings gnos shing phyag 'tshal lags//bdag las dge bas gzigasu gsol//khyod la mo min phyag 'tshal po//de skad yang dang yang du thos//de slad bdag ni
104a4(rgyud): 'di skad ces//'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa//mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi//de ltar
104a5(rgyud): lho yi phyogs de ni//bzod pa logs shes skye bo mchi//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags//gang zhig nub pa kho na las//des na
104a6(rgyud): mtshan mor brjod pa yi//nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can//nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba//des na mtsho chen zab mo ni//shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste//de ni chu sngon
104a7(rgyud): rgya mtsho zhes//skye bo rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen brags dang ldan pa ni//klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste//ming ni mig mi bzang
104b1(rgyud): zhes 'gyi//de ni nyo du lhan cig tu//glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse//klu rnams kyis nu yongs bskor cing //klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas//de la bu ni mang mchis te//brkyad tu
104b2(rgyud): dang ni bcu dang gcig/de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni//dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che//lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa//kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags//de dag rnams kyis
104b3(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas//skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud//skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes//mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni//rgyang
104b4(rgyud): ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags//bdag la dge bas gzigasu gsol//khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba//de skad yong dang yang du thos//de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces//'dren
104b5(rgyud): pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/go'u tam rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa//mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mche//de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni//bzang //
104b6(rgyud): ba logs shes skye bo mchi//phyogs de mngon por skyong bgyid pa//rgyal tshon grags dang ldan pa lags//gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan//dga' zhing lhun chen lta mdzes dang //
104b7(rgyud): gang na mi rnams tshol ni//brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyu ro zhing //de dag mo rmo mi 'debs la//bshol yang 'chang bar mi bi byed cing //tshe rang mdog dang ldan pa dang //nges par
105a1(rgyud): yongasu spyod bgyod cing //zasu sA lu kha dog dang //dri dang blo dang ldan pa dang //dri dang me tog tshogs 'dra zhing //lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal//nal
105a2(rgyud): ker bskol bgyis nas//tshod mor de 'tshal sran tshad min//gang na me lce rje 'dra ba'i//sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi//phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen
105a3(rgyud): grags dang ldan pa ni//gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste//ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi//de ni nye du lhan cig tu//glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse//gnod sbyin rnams kyi yongs
105a4(rgyud): bskor cing //gnod sbyin rnams kyi mdun gyis bltas//de la bu ni mang mchis te//brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni//dbang po zhes bgyi
105a5(rgyud): stobs po che//lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa//kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags//de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas//skyes
105a6(rgyud): bu cung shes khyod la 'dud//skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes//ma yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni//rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags//bdag la dge bas
105a7(rgyud): gzigasu gsol//khyod la mi min phyag 'tshol ba//de skad yang dang yang du thos//de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces//'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig/go'u tam rgyal
105b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal cig/sangs rgyas rag dang zhabs ldan pa//mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi//de ltar byang po phyogs de ni//bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi//phyogs da
105b2(rgyud): mngon par skyong bgyid pa//rgyal chen glags dang ldan pa lags//shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung //lho phyogs ni ni 'phags skyes po//nub phyogasun ni mig mr-i bzang //
105b3(rgyud): byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po//rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan//rdzu 'phrul tshon po stobs po che//phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid//rgyal
105b4(rgyud): bau dag gi mngag gzhug pa//gnod sbyin 'dod dbur mchi ba rnams//de dag glang po che gatshal zhing //phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu//de dag gi ni chibs rta dang /rnga mo
105b5(rgyud): dang /khyu mchog dang /ma ha dang /ra dang /lug dang /sbrul dang /bya dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /gzhon nu dang //gzhon nu ma 'tshal zhing /phyogs
105b6(rgyud): phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so//glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing /phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lagaso//chibs rta dang /rnga mo dang /khyu mchog dang /
105b7(rgyud): ma he dang /ra dang /lug dang /sbrul dang /bya dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /gzhon nu dang /gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing /phyogs phyogs dag tu yang
106a1(rgyud): mchi lags//rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che//gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams//bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni//phyogs bzhi dang na
106a2(rgyud): skyong bar bgyid//rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis//'di lta ste/kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma
106a3(rgyud): logs pa dang /gar bcas sa stengs kun tu rgyu ba dang /sbubs can dang /grong khyer sbubs can zhes bigyi ba dag lags//byang phyogs na mtsho ka bi bang ka zhes bgyi ba yang /
106a4(rgyud): mchis lag so//nub phyogs na grong khyer ser pa bskur ldan dang /gos can dang /gos mchog can dang /pad+ma can dang /pad+ma bzang po can dang /sa gzhi can zhes
106a5(rgyud): bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lagasaso//che ba rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa//'dzin pa zhes bgyi mtsho mchis te//chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung //de las dgung char 'bab par/
106a6(rgyud): 'gyur//btsun pa grong khyer u shi ri'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang //de bas gnas yongs rgyun lugs can//rgyun lugs mang dang de bas
106a7(rgyud): mang //bar snang ma nga'i lo bya ltar gda'//btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol//byang phyogs na mdun sa bye gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/dar ni gnod sbyin rnam
106b1(rgyud): dog nas lags//rlung ma shASh+TAn tshun sa dang //'dugs dus na do//chog//don sngon shong 'bras bu b+h+ya/na bya nga byung sgra snyan dang //rgyu zlag sgra da
106b2(rgyud): chen po dang //shang shA N+De ru sna byin cing //rmA bya rnams kyi sgra dge dang // rje me me ng+ge chun lags dang //bya rnams hU~M tshogs skad 'i sbyin ci//me tog swA m+b+hi'i rala~M drA/
106b3(rgyud): sus ngan po dbyugar gyis//bahU~Mn pang na cigaH//bAtsun pa grong khyer byung po can b+h+rUM pa lan/la bo da 'di zhes brgyug/dz+wa la la Sh+T+ri mu wA rgyas lags/
106b4(rgyud): drug ban mchis 'i mdun sa de ni tshog na zhes kyi te/bdag ga ma nI rnam thos kyi bu zhes pagyi lpags//de lagasang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dge lag s+ho//taH
106b5(rgyud): /Il ma le/kiTish+ma m+b+ha/d+hudu m+b+ha/kau gamyokaM t+tha/brdzun pa bcomaldan 'das kyinar/
106b6(rgyud): bdag gis drin rnams da/chen po rnams da dr-i pa ni rnams dang /dmyig dpon rnams kyi ming brjod pa bgyi lags//'di lta ste/'dod rgyas dga'
106b7(rgyud): bas myos pa dang //klu yis myos pa spyan rnams dang //phreng bas myos dang skad rtsis myos//matog rgyas pa sbyin rnams dang //rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos//nor gyis myem da
107a1(rgyud): dga' byed dang //ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang //rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra//tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang //gser spyod bu mo gser can dang //pa ba sangs dang phur bu
107a2(rgyud): dag/'phro gnas ji snyed rgyal po legs//de dag bdag gi spun lags te//de dag le bdag dri za 'od ni bdag la 'tshe'o//dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing /de dag
107a3(rgyud): la go bar bgyid lagaso//bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang //bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis//legs par smras pa 'di thos nas//ar+d+ha ka'i dog pa bzhin//de'i mdo tshal pa
107a4(rgyud): bdun du 'grus//de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso//tat+t+wa thA/ku tu le/ku tu le/ku tu le/ku tu le/e hi e hi/sA d+ha ma ti kaM sA d+hA ti kI sA siti
107a5(rgyud): sA d+ha b+haN+Do ni ka/tin+da duSh+Ta b+hU to si swA hA//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyud
107a6(rgyud): dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma legs pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing /'dron
107a7(rgyud): par bgyid pa de la/gal te dri za'am/dri za mo 'am/dri za rgad po 'am/dri za rgan mo 'am/dri za'i bu pho 'am/dri za'i bu mo 'am/dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/dri za'i
107b1(rgyud): 'khor mo 'am/dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/glags lta zhing glags tshal ba la la zhing //nye bar mchi zhing /nye bar 'greng du ma/nye bar
107b2(rgyud): mchis par gyur na/glags mi rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed la/dri za rnams ni dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho byang lcang lo can du yang gnas mo 'thob ste/de'i
107b3(rgyud): mgo ar+tha ki'i dog pa bzhin du tshol pa bdun du 'gas lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma
107b4(rgyud): ging la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya cher
107b5(rgyud): lung mnos shing 'i don par bgyid pa di la/gal te sha za 'am/sha za mo 'am/sha za rgang po 'am/sha za rgan mo 'am/sha za'i bu pho 'am/sha za'i bu mo 'am/
107b6(rgyud): shu za'i 'khor po 'am/sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/shra za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la
107b7(rgyud): zhig nye bar mchi zhing /nye bar 'greng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur na/glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /rgyal
108a1(rgyud): po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'grus leg so//de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di
108a2(rgyud): dag lagaso//tad+ya thA/d+hu mi hA mr-i/d+hu mi laM/tU mi le/ba tI ya~M swA hA//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang /grul bum chen po
108a3(rgyud): rnams dang /grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang /dmag dpon rnams kyis ming brjod par bgyi lagaso//'di lta ste/byin dang nye byin kri mi sha//rtsibs logs che dang
108a4(rgyud): gsus po che//lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu//g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang //sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang //rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs//ral pa can dang stobs
108a5(rgyud): bcu dang //srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi//'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed//la pa bzang ldan gsum po dang //tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po//'gro gnas dza snyed marmi
108a6(rgyud): pa lags//de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te//de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o//grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing /de dag la go bar
108a7(rgyud): bgyid lagaso//bdag la 'che bo'i grul bum dang //bdag mi gtang ba'i grul bum gyis//legs par smras pa 'di thos na//ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin//de yi ma
108b1(rgyud): tshol bdun du 'das//de la gsang stabs kyi tshog ni 'di dag lags//tud+yA thA/si ra bi si ra~M/si ri ba~M sa ra/sau ri ba~M sa ra/kr-iSh+Ta cho ka li/ka ra Di/pi ga la swAt+ma/btsun pa
108b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngamo/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bstan ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun de'i mdo//rig
108b3(rgyud): skyugs dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de lau/gal te grul bum mem/grul bum
108b4(rgyud): mo'am/grul bum rgad po'am/grul bum rgan mo 'am/grul bum gyi bu bo'am/grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/phrul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/
108b5(rgyud): grul dum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'che bar bgyid pa/glegs lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /nye bar 'greng ngam
108b6(rgyud): bar mchis par gyur na/glags mi rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed la/grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gan+da
108b7(rgyud): mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge
109a1(rgyud): num/dge bskyon ma dang la lA kun+da d+ha rgyu byA dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phya/
109a2(rgyud): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya tshur lung mnos shinga'i don par bgyod pa de la/gal te yi dag /se snyam/yi dgas mo 'am/yoM dgas rgad po 'am/yi dwags rlan
109a3(rgyud): mo 'am/yi dgas kyi bu pho 'am/yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/yi dgas kyi 'khor po 'am/yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/yi dgras
109a4(rgyud): kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/glags lta zhing blags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /nye bar mchis par gyur na/blags mi rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed
109a5(rgyud): la/yi dgas rnams yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du mtshir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gra nas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ardza ki'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba
109a6(rgyud): bdun du 'gas lagaso//de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso//tad+ya thA/yu me yu me/yu mi ya/yu mI lAM ba tr-i ye swA hA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
109a7(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang /klu chen po rnams dang /klu'i sde dpon rnams dang dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyid lagaso//'di lta ste/dga'
109b1(rgyud): dang nye dpa' kun dga' dang //nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang //ser po dang ni zho rna dang //dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang //mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral//rab grol dang ni rgyal
109b2(rgyud): bdag/ngos yongs po dang ngos bkra dong //yangs pa can dang bkra bdun rgyal//gdangs ka tshe drang skar dka' dang //nag po che dang lag 'gro dang //ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang //g.yon
109b3(rgyud): phyogs de bzhin nag po dang //sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni//'grogs nas ji snyed mchis pa lags//de dag ni bdag gi spun legs te//de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag
109b4(rgyud): la 'tshe'o//klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing /de dag la go bar bgyid lag so//bdag la mtshe bi'i klu dag dang //bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis//legs par smras
109b5(rgyud): pa 'di thos na//ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin//de yi mgo chel pa bdun du 'gas//de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso//tad+ya thA/tsi le bi tsi la/gau rI gan+ta ri/ma taM gi//
109b6(rgyud): tsaN+Da li swA hA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa
109b7(rgyud): dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sreg pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/gal te
110a1(rgyud): klu 'am/klu mo 'am/klu rgad po 'am/klu rgan mo 'am/klu'i bu pho 'am/klu'i bu mo 'am/klu'i 'khor pho 'am/klu'i 'khor mo 'am/klu'i mngag gzhug
110a2(rgyud): paba'am/klu'i mngag gzhug ma'i tshe bar bgyid pa/glags lto zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bor mchi zhing /nye bar 'greng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur na/grags mi
110a3(rgyud): rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed la/klu rnams klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du
110a4(rgyud): tshal ba bdun du 'gas lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngom/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun
110a5(rgyud): tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid/rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par 'gyid
110a6(rgyud): bdi la/gal te lus srul po 'am/lus srul mo 'am/lus srul po rgad po'am/lus srul po rgan mo 'am/lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/lus srul po'i bu mo'i//
110a7(rgyud): lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/lus srul po'i mingag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/glags
110b1(rgyud): na shAn la ma rlan ts+tshan mardzun du/ nga rdzu sna blan tun/rgyun byu /sa ngal/ sgyu/nasasu ma
110b2(rgyud): 'dra ba nang du mchir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'tha'i ste/de'i maho ye rdza ka dog ba bzhin du rgyal bdun du m+b+ha lagaso//de la gas
110b3(rgyud): kyi cho ga ni 'di dag lagaso//tat+t+waT+Ta/a be/ba ta na/bad+d+hAn+tu/t+tA ye swAhA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnong sbyin rnams dang /gan+d+had na
110b4(rgyud): chen po rnams dang /gad d+hAn smai pon rnams dang /dmag dpon rnams kyi mau brjod par kyi lagaso//'di s+t+wa~M/dbang po zla ba zhwa m+b+ha //ber d+ha rje ste dgu'i
110b5(rgyud): dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod rtso dang //mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang //stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang //sgra rab dang ni nyi lnga dang //ri mnyam gser can gang po dang //seng long
110b6(rgyud): ba dang g.yon can dang //gnang sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang //rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po//dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni//lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang //tshig lnga sar b+ha
110b7(rgyud): yid dga' dang //gnod sbyin ri bo 'khor dang bcas//'bras bu gsum dang mgu la gsum pa//'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags//de dgen bdag gi spyan legs te//
111a1(rgyud): de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la tshe'o//gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing /de dag la go bar bgyid lagaso//bdag la 'tshe ba'i
111a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang //bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis//legs par smras pa di thos nas//ar+dz+dza ka'i dog pa bzhin//de yi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'grus//de la gsung
111a3(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lag so//tad+ya thA/hi le mi le/hi le mi le/kI d+hi mU le/hi le kI d+hi mU le/oM tu ma bai tu ma be/o tu ma be tu ma be/oM ge mo ge/ge do hi/
111a4(rgyud): b+hing g+ha re/ri Sha sad t+ye maM swA hA//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/dge slong mi 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang li la kun tu rgyu ba dang /
111a5(rgyud): kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par
111a6(rgyud): bgyis br-i de la/gal te gnod sbyin nam/gnod sbyin mo 'am/gnod sbyin rgad po 'am/gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/
111a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po'am/gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tsho bar bgyid po/glags lnga
111b1(rgyud): zhing thags tsho lta ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /nye byar 'greng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur na/blags mye rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed la/gnod sbyin rnams kyu gnod sbyin 'du
111b2(rgyud): nang du mchir mi chud cing /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/de'i mgo ar+tha ki'i dog pa bzhin du tshol pa bdun du 'gas lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan

111b5(rgyud): po rgan mo 'am/srin po'i bu pho 'am/srin po'i bu mo 'am/srin po'i 'khor po 'am/srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/sbyin po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/srin po'i mngag gzugam
111b6(rgyud): 'tshe bar bgyid pa/brags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /nye bar 'greng ngam/nye bar mchis par gyur na/glags mi rnyed cing /gnas mi rnyed

112a1(rgyud): bdun du 'gas lagaso//de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags//tad+ya thA/hi lo ti lo/hu lu du lu/yu me yu me le/yu mi lA bi tri ye swA hA/
112a2(rgyud): zhes rgya cher smras nas/de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/de nyid du me snang bar gyur to//dge slong dag khyed kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /
112a3(rgyud): bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang /gnod sbyin dang /mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang /mngon par dad
112a4(rgyud): pab rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//rig sngags dang /srung ba dang /sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
112a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid longs shig/zung shig/tshangs shig/lhogs shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan
112a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//bar sdom ni/i ki/d+ha sI/u tsi/a ti ti/gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang /go rims bzhin
112a7(rgyud): du sbyar ro//mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang /kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo//zhes bya ba rdzogs//rgya gar gyis mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
112b1(rgyud): dz+dzabar+b+ha dang /zhwa chen gyi lo ts+tshab ban d+hu ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pha nga////rgya gar sbyang du/Ar+yAn+tatA ma d+ha
112b2(rgyud): bode skad du/'phags pasbyin chen po//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams cad la phyag 'tsha'o//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus grwa cig ni/bcom ldan 'das
112b3(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga'i gnas na/nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang
112b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' dang /rgya mtsho dang /ma dros pa dang /gzi can dang /
112b5(rgyud): chu lha dang /'jog po dang //yul 'khor srung dang /nor rgyas kyi bu dang /klu'i rgyal po gtang zung dang /sa srung gi bu dang /mdongs bu dang /dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /dpal
112b6(rgyud): bzang dang /glog gi phreng ba dang /gtsug na nor bu rin po che dang /gtsug na nir bu thogs dang /snang ldan gtsug pud can dang /gtsug pud 'ja' can dang /klu'i rgyal po
112b7(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /dbang po'i mchod sdong dang /'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /bkra shis ldan dang /dkyil 'khor chen po can dang /lag gi 'gro chen po dang /
113a1(rgyud): skar mdog dang /zla ba'i gzi brjid dang /dpal gyi blo gros dang /zla mthong dang /klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /shin tu bstan dang /mgul
113a2(rgyud): na nor bu dang /sprin byung dang /char rgyun dang /rab 'joms dang /rnam par 'jom dang /mthu bsgyings dang //gdengs ka chen po dang /dbyangs zab dang /klu'i
113a3(rgyud): rgyal po cher sgrogs dang /rnam par sgra 'byin dang /ut+pa la dang /rtsal chen dang /gshol mda' 'dzin dang /sna tshogs sde dang /zhags pa chen po dang /klu'i
113a4(rgyud): rgyal po e lo'i mdab ma dang /kun tu snang dang /rna rtsub dang /dung dang /da ra da ra dang klu'i rgyal po u pa dar da ri dang /bde byed dang /lag 'gro dang /lag 'gro chen
113a5(rgyud): po dang /dri ma chen po dang /'phur lding dang /sog ma med dang /'phyang ba dang /srin bu gnas dang /nag po dang klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang /'dam bu dang /nye ba'i
113a6(rgyud): 'dam bu dang /dung thogs dang /'gro lding dang /rab mdzes dang /glang chen sna dang /rnon po dang /swair skya dang /glog 'bar dang /glog 'od chen po dang /stobs
113a7(rgyud): lha dang /chu stobs dang /klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang /bdud rtsi can dang /mu stegs can dang /bai DUr+ya'i 'od can dang /gser mdog sgra dang /gser 'od dang /
113b1(rgyud): zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang /nyi 'od dang /'char pa dang /ba glang mgo dang /klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang /nAg po dang /gshin rje dang /dge tshul dang /sbal pa dang /ngang pa
113b2(rgyud): gze brjodang dang /mu khyud 'dzin dang /sa 'dzin dang /mgo stong can+d+ra dang /gtsug na nor bu dang /klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong ba dang /sprin chen da /sde bzang dang /sa sbyong
113b3(rgyud): dang /mis byin dang /rnam par dul dang /dga' ba 'byung dang /chu srin kum b+hi ra dang /chu sI na kum b+hi ra'i gdong dang /dug 'dzin dang /klu'i rgyal po myur gdugs dang /pad+ma
113b4(rgyud): ka dang /mjug ma dang /rab 'byung dang /'jigs byed dang /gzi brjid mdzes dang /mgo lnga pa dang /bal li ra dang /shing rtas rgyal dang //klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang /klu'i
113b5(rgyud): /rgyal po mjug rings dang /mgo bo che dang /bi ma pi ka dang /pi te ra dang /mgyogs 'gro dang /klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang /klu sde dang /gau chenA dang /'dam bu
113b6(rgyud): byin dang /klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang /'od 'bar dang /mgro bdun pa dang /stong chen dang /mthong dga' dang /rab tu che ragatu ma dang /dri me ga ni brjid dang /mig
113b7(rgyud): bzang dang /drag po chen po dang /'od 'phro phung po dang /klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang /khro bo drag shul can dang /rin chen chu sbyin dang /chu sbyin sprin chen dang /dbang po'i
114a1(rgyud): 'od dang /rkang pas ma chu dang /sbyin zla dang /'i sprin dang /me tog dri chen po dang /ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang /klu'i rgyal po ran chen
114a2(rgyud): mig dang /tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang /sprin chen snying po dang /kha ba can dang /dpal gyi snying po dang /sprin mthu can dang /mtshan mo 'dzin dang /chu sbyin dang /chu
114a3(rgyud): sprin chen po dang /klu'i rgyal po gzing rdzing me 'dra dang /sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /khro med dang /sa'i bum pa dang /klu dpa' dang /chu 'dzin dang /sprin gdugs dang /
114a4(rgyud): oMng gi ra'i gdong dang /klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /sprin las mngon 'byung dang /klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang /cha byad mdzes dang /lus chen dang /spyang lho dang /
114a5(rgyud): zhi ba dang /dpa' ba dang /gser dang can dang /mchog tu brtson dang /dug drag dang /dbyangs snyan dang /klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang /rab tu char 'bebs chen
114a6(rgyud): po dang /rnam par g.yo dang /'khrugs sgra dang rnga sgra dang /bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang /dga' bar byed pa dang /'brug sgrogs dang /dpa' sde dang /sred med kyi bu dang
114a7(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i klong dang /klu'i rgyal po yon po dang /klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa/klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dge 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs
114b1(rgyud): gcig tu bzhug so//de'i cha klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas/bla gos drug pa gcig tu gzar k+te/pus mo g.yas pa'o sta ngas la btsugs nas/bcom
114b2(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de log pu zil mo sbyar ba btud nas/bla ma la bum pa dang /phu du chen po byed pas/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /
114b3(rgyud): phyi ma dang /na bza' dang /gdug so dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /dar gyi lda ldi dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /klu dbyangs dang /rin
114b4(rgyud): po che'i me tog dang /rin po che'i lda ldi dang /mu tig gi phreng ba dang /klu'i me tog dang /mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa/grangs med pa
114b5(rgyud): dag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/smon lam rnams btab pa/lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
114b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsha thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho
114b7(rgyud): thams cad dang /sa dang /chu dang /mi dang /rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang /gzug su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las/rdul dro rab kyi
115a1(rgyud): rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrangs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad lam yang dag par 'das pa/grangs med/dpag tu med//bsam gyis mi khyab/
115a2(rgyud): mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa los yang dag par 'dos pa dag dang /lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun tu mngon par phyogs pa/
115a3(rgyud): dpag tu med pa/grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gangs pa/
115a4(rgyud): ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o//snyam pa 'di lta ste/kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho'i sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu
115a5(rgyud): med/grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du med tshad med/brjod du med pa dag gis/na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/byang chub so de'i
115a6(rgyud): lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang /'od zer stug po dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
115a7(rgyud): 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang /me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs
115b1(rgyud): ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /phye ma dang /shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spos dang /bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin
115b2(rgyud): rnams dang /sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par
115b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs nas/de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyis sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du med//tshad med/brjod med pa//
115b4(rgyud): ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//yul thams cad
115b5(rgyud): du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub
115b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti steng du bya'o//bla mar bya'o ri myor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//thams cad kun tu snang ba'i nor bu ri na po che'i char 'byab po bkrod po'i
115b7(rgyud): nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams
116a1(rgyud): dang kun tu spras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sang+yas
116a2(rgyud): kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnamasu bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang //
116a3(rgyud): 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rje su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su/de bzhin
116a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gzhal mod khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi
116a5(rgyud): sku snang ba rnam par snang byed pa'i nor bu rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis/na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub seM de'
116a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin thams cadadra la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//rin po che dang /spos dang /me tog sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa/
116a7(rgyud): ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /
116b1(rgyud): rin po che'i sgron ma dang /spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
116b2(rgyud): me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par rgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/na mnga'i dkyil kun tu
116b3(rgyud): khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying pa can/bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /ran
116b4(rgyud): po che thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis rab tu rgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa kun tu rgyas par
116b5(rgyud): 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin
116b6(rgyud): gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//gser dang //rin po
116b7(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi tshomatshom dang /phreng ba dang /rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng
117a1(rgyud): de'i khri rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /an da rnal dang /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sbyin rnams dang //
117a2(rgyud): nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nur bu rin po che snang gisil rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri
117a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po ches rgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /an da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i
117a4(rgyud): snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
117a5(rgyud): rin po che 'bar ba thams cad 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can rgya
117a6(rgyud): seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun
117a7(rgyud): tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//
117b1(rgyud): dang /nor du sna tshogs pa thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sbyin rnams dang /kun nas sgrol ma las thal mo sbyar ba sprin 'byung ba'i smos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams
117b2(rgyud): dang /shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya
117b3(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang /bkod pa thams cad byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
117b4(rgyud): snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsam na thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /byang chub
117b5(rgyud): kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byis pa dang /ldan po'i shing ljon pa rgya ma
117b6(rgyud): sprin rnams dang /sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can
117b7(rgyud): gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor du'i rgyal po snang bar byed po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rgyani bkod patha~Mng
118a1(rgyud): kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sa ga'i dra rgya sprin rnams dang /rinapasna tshogs 'od 'gro ba'i sgron ma 'breng ba'i snying can gyi nga na pa dIR+YAr+tha
118a2(rgyud): sprin rnams dang /kun nus sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng gri'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spros dang me tog dang pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin te che'i snying po
118a3(rgyud): can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
118a4(rgyud): bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dbyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu rgyun pa/rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu rin po
118a5(rgyud): tsha' yal ga dang /phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi song ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spos sna tshogs dang /rin po tshe'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
118a6(rgyud): kun nas rgyan pa nyid snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khro rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang
118a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mor bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang
118b1(rgyud): /rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /an dA rnyil gyi ze ba can gyis me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spos dang /nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che
118b2(rgyud): 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla ro rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu
118b3(rgyud): sku tshegs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba'i kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog thams cad kyi chu po 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bre re rgyu mtsho smin rnams dang /
118b4(rgyud): dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogasu snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla
118b5(rgyud): re rgya mchi sprin rnams dang /gsor gyi ze ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa
118b6(rgyud): dkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /ni mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho
118b7(rgyud): sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/
119a1(rgyud): nA mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebyas par byin gyis brlabs la/rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /mu
119a2(rgyud): tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs
119a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs
119a4(rgyud): pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu thams cad kyi sdong bu yal ga'i rgyan gyis gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phyo ba'i nor bu'i
119a5(rgyud): rgyal po dang /spos dang gdugs pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
119a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byed pa kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'
119a7(rgyud): rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//rin po che thams cad sdang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che
119b1(rgyud): 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /me tog gi sbyin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin pa rgya
119b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang por gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor/
119b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /kun nus sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /bai DUr+ya dang rin po che'i rigs dang /nor bu
119b4(rgyud): rin po che'i rigs dang /nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag/sems kyi skad cig la
119b5(rgyud): kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam los byung ba/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
119b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyings can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/sangs rgyas
119b7(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin
120a1(rgyud): /rnams dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /rnyod reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po chethams cad/
120a2(rgyud): kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thed
120a3(rgyud): snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer
120a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho sngon rnams dang /bskul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongasu smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mchi
120a5(rgyud): sprin rnams dang /rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang //me tog thams cad kyi zo ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i
120a6(rgyud): 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par
120a7(rgyud): bya'o//rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'di 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas thaMd kyi
120b1(rgyud): zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spros thams cad kyi 'od 'phyo ba rgya mtsho sbyin rnams dang /bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'gro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
120b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /gos thams cad kyi 'dra 'phyo ba rgya
120b3(rgyud): mtsho sprin rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro bya
120b4(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod
120b5(rgyud): par bya'o//spros dang /me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyo mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /rin po che 'od 'phyo ba thams cad k+Sho pad+ma'i drub rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor
120b6(rgyud): bu rin po che kha dag mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che dang /
120b7(rgyud): spos dang /tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams deng /nor bu'i rgyal po yid du'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyas
121a1(rgyud): can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang //
121a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du
121a3(rgyud): bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//zhes de lta'i bu'i smon la mo btAb nas/klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang /bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
121a4(rgyud): byas te/zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/rang rang gi stan la 'khod do//de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog
121a5(rgyud): pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
121a6(rgyud): phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos nyon pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongaso//de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsha sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil
121a7(rgyud): 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa lo btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
121b1(rgyud): log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gra sol to//gal te zhu ba zhus na lung bstan pa'i skad du/bcom ldan 'das las bdag la skabs bya na/bcom ldan
121b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa drugra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad cesu gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po
121b3(rgyud): g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//klu'i bdag po tsa dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /ngas
121b4(rgyud): dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi
121b5(rgyud): brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/bde ba
121b6(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa dang /rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus su cher gyi rgyan 'bebs par 'gyur/rtse dang shing gel pa dang /sman dang nags tshal thams
121b7(rgyud): cad 'khrung bar 'gyur te/'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/gagis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/de skad
122a1(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la
122a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongasu 'dri bar sems pa legaso//
122a3(rgyud): legs//klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig dang /ngas khyod la bshad//klu'i bdeg po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun
122a4(rgyud): chad par 'gyur/bde ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro//chos gcig po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byams pa'o//klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang /mi rnams ni mes mi
122a5(rgyud): 'tshig/mtshon gyis mi tshugs/chus mi khyer/dug gis mi tshugs/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/bde bar sad
122a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/rang gi bsod nams kyis yongasu srung bar 'gyur//bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/
122a7(rgyud): mdzes pa dang /mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/'gro ba thams cad du thag thogs med par 'gyur/sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang /rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/bde ba
122b1(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa dang /rmi'i chas bla ma rtogs nas/lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyo bar 'gyur to/klu'i bdag bolta dang rno'i byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi
122b2(rgyud): phan yon ni 'di dag go//klu'i bdag pa de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /byams pa'i ngag gi los dang /byams pa'i yid kyis las kyis gnas par bya'o//klu'i bdag
122b3(rgyud): po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/bde ba thams cad sbyin par
122b4(rgyud): byed/'dzam bu'i gling 'drir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/rtse dang shing gil ba dang /sprin dang /rigs tshal dang /lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do//klu'i bdag
122b5(rgyud): bo de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/tAd+yathA/d+hA ra ni d+ha ra nI/u d+ha ri ni/saM pra tiSh+Thi tA/b+hI dza yaM/bar+Na/sad t+ya b+h+yo tadz+nyA saraSh+Ta/dz+nyA nA ba ti
122b6(rgyud): ud de pA drA ni d+hI nA mA nI/a b+hi shai tsin+d+ri A b+h+r-i byA d+ha ra/shub+hA ba t+ti/U dzi mdu/e hrI ku maM pA la nAM/bI hU he rikle shan/d+hu nA b+hA ba ma/sho d+hi yai marga na/na kaM/d+harmAH
122b7(rgyud): shud d+ha/l-i ka~M bi ti mA ra rA dzas du ShA/sha mo nA sarba bud d+hi a ba lo ka nI a d+hiSh+T+rIta/pradz+nyA dz+nyAn be s+thAn+da/klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi chog don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/chos
123a1(rgyud): kyi sbru la 'jug pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pas/bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/brjod par bya'o//klu'i bdag po gzhan yang /
123a2(rgyud): sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyis sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser/
123a3(rgyud): gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/skra'i rtse mo'i cha shes gcig las byung ba'i rus dang /rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshon bzung bar bya/yid la bya'o//de dag
123a4(rgyud): gis klu thams cad dang /klu'i rigs thams cad dang /klu'i rus thams cad dang /klu'i tshe rigs thams cad dang /klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang /klu'i skye gnas thams cad
123a5(rgyud): dang /klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /klu'i bu mo thams cad dang /klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad gcod par byed//bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par
123a6(rgyud): byed do//klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mang po can gyi sprin chen
123a7(rgyud): bo la phyag 'tsha lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
123b1(rgyud): pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brji la phyag 'tsholo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la
123b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms de'i sprin la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam
123b3(rgyud): mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tsha lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i klog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin
123b4(rgyud): chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdug chen po la phyag
123b5(rgyud): 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshalo//bcom
123b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
123b7(rgyud): gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tsha lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
124a1(rgyud): sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tsha'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
124a2(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar chen gsil byung mi dga' rab 'dzem sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gda' la phyag
124a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i chu sprin la phyag 'tsha lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshalo//ba
124a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das

124b1(rgyud): gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tsha'o//bcom ldan 'das do ldazhon gshegs pa tshar sbyin gyi sngon lad+yA/'cha//bcom ldan 'das da btsun gshegs pa smon 'dra bar mAd+hA ga
124b2(rgyud): sgyu 'tshal lo// m+bu ldan ltas de bzhin ga shegs pa sbyin rnam par rgyas la phyug ni mo/bcom ldan 'as de bzhin ga shegs pa sprin chen skad thal le d+hag 'tsha/
124b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa sprin chen skyos kyi sku l-i phyin 'cha'o//bcom ldan 'as de du zhin ga shegs pa sbyin chen 'phags la phyeg 'tshal mo//bcom ldan 'das

125a7(rgyud): pas/klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chang ba dang /bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /'dzam du'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang /rbA dang //

125b2(rgyud): yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan 'das slad mi'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
125b3(rgyud): char mo 'bab pa'i tshe/gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyod pa dang /mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe/gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /chos ma lags pas/skye bo

125b6(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs par gsol/gang dag klu thams cad la yang dag par skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /

126a2(rgyud): chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang /'dzam bu'i gleng 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzung kyi gseng sngag kyi gzhi

126a7(rgyud): bgyings pa/dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/byin gyis brlabs/
126b1(rgyud): pA rje su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byeng char chos na gtsang /'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/klu thams cad bskul bar byed/lha thung
126b2(rgyud): sim pA byed/bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do//tad+yathA/ma hA dz+nyA na/a ba b+hA sa ni/shrI ti dza
126b3(rgyud): lA gam+b+hi Da~M Te b+hi kram+b+ha/badz+ra saM twA t+t+wa na/pa rA ma bi rarA dzA/nir+m+ma la gun ke tu sbyar b+ha b+he/bi mu lAM ga yiSh+Tha/b+ha ra b+hA ra/saM b+hA ra sa~M b+hA ra/duM dum bu/tA na ha na/ma prad+d+ha
126b4(rgyud): bir+N+Na ta mahA mo he oM d+hAk+Sha ri/pradz+nyA gra shud d+he/pa rI d+hu ra Na mi tra/mai dz+r-i nA~M r-i mo na? skan d+ha/mai tI ma buda~M d+he re/dz+wa l+r-i dza la/dz+wa la dz+wa lAM/dza lo buM d+hA rA/bo d+h+yang ga su su ma~M/da~M
126b5(rgyud): shaM bA le/tsatur du pi shA ra d+ha/aSh+ma da sha a bo Ni ka bud d+ha d+harme shu b+hU ma ti pu N+ya rAM shi/shu kla d+harma sa ma nI ti/gam b+hI ra bi ra dzisa?/bi ma lo/bi shau Sha prA pA tAM/nri d+hapra
126b6(rgyud): b+hA d+harme/sarba lo ka dz+yaSh+Ta/dz+yAShAM pa ra pre ba rI/a nu ta tA re/a sa kaM/d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+hi ri d+b+hi /d+hu ru d+hu ru/shAn ta me taM/shAn ta pA paM/tsa ra tsa ra ni tsi ri tsi ri/tsu ru/
126b7(rgyud): tsuM ru/par ma bud d+ha nr-i mr-i taM/ma hA prad+d+he pA ra mi te swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub
127a1(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas dang /
127a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas tshor ba'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o//s+yAd ya the da na/sa ra sa ra/si ri si ri/su ru su ru/nA gA nAn/dza ba dza/
127a3(rgyud): bo dzaM be dzi bi/dzu bu dzu bu/klu chen po dag tshur shog/sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/tsa ra tsa ra/tsau ri tsA r-i/tsu ru tsu ru/klu'i bdag
127a4(rgyud): bopo chen po dge tshur shig/kye klu chen po dag/sangs rgyas kyi bdun pas/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig/ba ra ba ra/bi ri bi rI/bu ru bu ru/sangs rgyas
127a5(rgyud): kyi bden pas/klu thams cad dgug par bya'o//byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /dga' ba'i sems dang /btang snyoms kyi sems dang /sangs rgyas
127a6(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /bden pa dang /bsdam pa chen pos/klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur shog/sangs rgyas rnams
127a7(rgyud): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub sems da'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig/b+ha ra b+ha re/b+hai ri d+hi ri/b+hu ru b+hu ru/chu chen po'i'o chu dang /

127b2(rgyud): drag shul can khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa/dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas tshur shog/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa

128a1(rgyud): byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/nar nar/nA ri ni ri/nu ru nu ru swAt+ma/yon pa sna tshog su gyur 'a mag spyang bya/mgo dang /

128a3(rgyud): brjid pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig/ga Da ga Da/gi Di gi Di/gu Du gu TA swAhA/stobs dang /

128a6(rgyud): rgyan pob shig swA hA/tshangs pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/brgya byin gyis bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'drir char
128a7(rgyud): rab tu phob shig spring+ga/rgyal ba chen po bzhi'o bden pas/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir cher rab tu thob shig smanaklu chen po dge brgyad pa'i bden pas/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
128b1(rgyud): char rab tu phob shig/swAhA/klu chen po dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bden pas/'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob shog swA hA/klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i bden byas/
128b2(rgyud): 'jam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAt+ma/klu chen po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir cher rab tu phob shig swAt+ma/klu chen po dag dgra bcom
128b3(rgyud): nga'i bden pas/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/klu chen po dag

128b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis bden pas sa chen po 'dir char rab tu phob shiH/swAt+ma/gnod sbyin thams cad kyis bden pas sems can thams cad bsrungs shig swA hA/dri za thams cad kyi

129a5(rgyud): chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/sprin ldan ma/sprin tshe ldan ma/sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/sbyin gas lA ma/sbyin 'byung mo/dus sbyin ma/sprin gyi 'byung gnas maM/

129b7(rgyud): ti li ti li/tu lu tu lu/ha na ha na/da ha da ha/tsa \u0f7f/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/mar dmar da//dr-i marda/pra bar sha big+h+na nAn/mai traM yadz+nyo pa ya te s+phony+dza/bud d+he bud d+he/
130a1(rgyud): bud d+hA/su bud d+d+he/ta ra b+hA ban/sur+b+ba sad+mAn+nanra/ad+hI sha ya d+hama?/san bud d+hAn+nan+ta d+hA d+hA ra/shu b+hU m+b+ha tAM/gur+b+ha gra brad+d+har+Na/many+dzu
130a2(rgyud): nalag/shu ka la/d+harmas t+ya bi te dz+hi/maN+Da yan+yA d+hASh+Ti tu kA~MN+TiD+D+h+ya d+hA ga ba ti/dud d+hA me tri A b+hA rA ya sarba d+hAdz+dzi/shu kl-i shrId+d+ha mo/bairad+hA ran tar
130a3(rgyud): sa ni/d+hu d+hu ra/d+hu d+hu ru/sha ma shA ma/shAn te ma so//char gyi 'gegs thams cad rnam par gsal bar gsol swA hA/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
130a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis bden pas byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par brtul zhugs dang /dka' thub kyi thugs skyon med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag par bskul lo//klu'i

130b1(rgyud): klu ma pog dun la 'ad+ma b+hArA ts+tsha//'jam m+WAr swA twA hA sho/d+han+tu/rgyu ba la stong dan byur ba'o//'am du klong 'dor na r+yar tu

130b6(rgyud): rab tu pho'i shig swAH/klu'i rgyal po dpa la bzang la yang dag par bskul lo//'dzam bu'i gling 'dor chur rab tu phob shig sned+hA/klu rgyal po klog gi phreng ba la yang dag par
130b7(rgyud): bskul lo//'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swAhA/klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu chen po la yang dag par bskul lo//'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu thob shig

131a2(rgyud): zud can la yang dag par bsgrala'o//'dzam du'i gli shA dir rgyur rab tu ba sha~M kA swA/de dag la sogs pa'i rgyal po thams cad la skyed dag pa sgyag//'dus
131a3(rgyud): 'dir char rab tu bag shig s+t+raid+d+ha/n+ta gen+d+ha ga/mad+hA nA ga/g+hor mAn sa~M/nA gad+hA ya/m+b+ha/la ug song /bAn+d+ha nudat+taMH/a /a d+hi ni /
131a4(rgyud): 'api ga l+ye/tsany+tsa le/lo la mad+hA pa na ka raM/kA laM bA shAM/raud+hab+h+yA sa ni/nAT+Tam+b+he Sh+Ta/b+haN b+haH/shi kaun+ti/kan kan/ge \u0f7fga r+b+ha/matwA ga tsa ga Ni/
131a5(rgyud): bar/bi ri bi rau/yu ru pu ru/bIs+yAHnaM/b+hU ru d+hu ru/mat+ma b+hoH/marbad 'i bi ridUr+Ya hu ru/phar pa ra/baR+Sha gan dza lam+ma d+ha ri/shrIm+ma sham+bu/ba ta/
131a6(rgyud): NA numaH/d+hur+d+ha/d+ho d+ha maH/me g+ni br-id+d+hamad+hAkAd+b+hak+ShAD+D+h+yak+Shat+t+ram+b+ha bi/b+hUn+na g+hAn+ta/ no/kan ka na/gaN giH/ma nA//ni r-id+har+dz+dza/@
131a7(rgyud): kar mahA nA dI di ma~M/b+hU ma g+hu ma/g+hu ma pA ya ti ka/dzAM ga ri b+hu dza ga maM/ba~M ka Ta saM ka Te/go ra ba sUrdza ni badz+ra b+ha Na/klu thams cad dgug go/sangs rgyas thams cad
131b1(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang /byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/na maHsar+b+ba
131b2(rgyud): d+hod+d+hab+h+yaHsid dz+nyAn d+hu man+ta/b+hung ni swAdz+dza/'phags ba sprin chen po zag pa rgyan pa'i mang stong phrag brgya pa las tshar dbabang rnyong gis dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i 'dus dus turtsaban
131b3(rgyud): cho ga ni char chen dbab par 'dod na/bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon po bre/baM dan sngon po dpyang ngo //chos smra ba lus bkrus la/yan log brgyad pa la nye bar gnas
131b4(rgyud): shing /gos gtsang ma sngon po bsgos la spos dri zhim pos bskus nas/zas dkar gsum zos la/stan sngon po'i steng du 'dug nas/kha shar phyogasu blta ste/de bzhin ga

131b6(rgyud): bzhi bzhag par bya'o//gtor ma dang /bdug pa dang /me tog ci nus kyi sbyar ro//de la chos smra bas/phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/shar phyogasu khru
131b7(rgyud): gsum tsam du/klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa/klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa/ba'i waM bAs bri bar bya'o//lho phyogasu khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa/
132a1(rgyud): g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o//nub phyogasu khru bdun tsam du/klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa/klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa/
132a2(rgyud): bri bar bya'o//byang phyogasu khru dgu tsam du/klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa/klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang btsos pa bri bar bya'o//chos smra bas rang gi lus bsrungs la/byams/
132a3(rgyud): pa la gnas te/sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag nas/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab na klu rnams dang /dge ba'i
132a4(rgyud): rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/'di ni cho ga'o//gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'isprin chen po'i klung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/nyin zhag cig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag
132a5(rgyud): bdun tshun bcad/gdon mi za bar char 'bab par 'gyuraro//rgya mtsho ni dus las yol yang srid kyi thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//
132a6(rgyud): de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang /yon tan la gnas te/'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang /sha dang nya la sogs pa yongasu spang bar bya'o//'o thug dang zho dang 'o ma dang /
132a7(rgyud): 'bras can bu ram can la sogs pa dang /mngar gsum za zhing bklag par bya'o//de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur te/thub pa'i rgyal pos gsung ba bzhin du the tsom med
133a1(rgyud): bzla sna dang /klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang /klu'i rgyal po klog 'byung dang //klu'i rgyal po snang ldan klu drug phung can dang /klu'i rgyal ba sprin chen rnam pa/
133a2(rgyud): 'phrul dang /klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rgyas byed dang /klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang /klu'i rgyal po che re 'byung dang /klu'i rgyal po skar mda' gti dang /klu'i rgyal de dus
133a3(rgyud): min sgrogs dang /klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang /klu'i rgyal po klog rab tu gtong ba dang /klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang /klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang /klu'i rgyal po 'bras/
133a4(rgyud): mthong dang /klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang /klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgrogs dang klu'i rgyal po 'od chen lam dang /klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /klu'i
