133a6(rgyud): rgyal po zla ba dang /klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang /klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang /klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang dang /klu'i rgyal po sha sho sgra chen dang /klu'i rgyal po dang ding
133a7(rgyud): sgra dang /klu'i rgyal po rab 'jom dang /klu'i rgyal po cher 'byung dang /klu'i rgyal po rlung tshon rnam par 'phrul dang klu'i rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang /klu'i rgyal po 'jo
133b1(rgyud): man macas thams sa na tabacas ma tha/a na byabam thas mamachams mamamams tham mkha' 'am \u0f7f/mam yams tshana.a'
133b2(rgyud): bopo dang /klu'i rgyal po dang ldan dang /klu'i rgyal po skad dkris bzang dang /klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang /klu'i rgyal po sprin rgyas dang /klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byad dang /klu'i
133b3(rgyud): rgyal po spro ni byos 'gebs pa'i rigs dang /klu'o rgyal po legs par 'gebs dang /klu'i rgyal po rnam par rtsi dang /klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang //
133b4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po 'od bzang dang /klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang /klu'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang /klu'i rgyal po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi legs par 'gebs dang /klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyi
133b5(rgyud): mi thub dang /klu'i rgyal po sprin las chu 'byin dang /klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang /klu'i rgyal po klung 'byung dang /klu'i rgyal po 'khrug par byed dang /klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu
133b6(rgyud): dang /klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang /gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /klu'i rnam par 'phrul
133b7(rgyud): pa chen pos//na mkha' la di ri di ri sgrogs shing /rdzi cher chen po rab tu 'bebs te/bcom ldan 'das la srid zhu bya ba dang /chos nyan pa'i phyir lhagaso//kye klu chen po
133b8(rgyud): dang /klu dag tshur shog/mu lu mu lu/tse ta tsa ta/pa Te pa Ta/ma Ta ma Ta swA hA/glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung zhing rje chen po'i rgyun thong la char phob shig/kye kye klu chen po/
134a1(rgyud): dag/sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /chos kyi bden pa dang /dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig/kye klu chen po dag tshur shog tshur shog
134a2(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob shig/g+hu Du g+hu Du/muR+ShA muR+ShA/hi hI hi hI/tsuR+Sha tsuR+Sha/ma hA na ga hr-i da ya/sarba nA gU nAM A kAD+hau sany+tso yai/shi grAn+da re swAhA/sprin
134a3(rgyud): chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan bkod pa dge/gser rnams kyi mtha' rin po che thams cad tshon gyi lnga ldi mdzeswa pa mu tig gi rkyen phreng rab tu 'phyang ba/rgya mtsho chen po'i
134a4(rgyud): sprin dag dang /lho'i rin po chos mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal med khang me tog rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis
134a5(rgyud): rlobs la/rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing /lha'i ras bcos bu mang po mu tig gi rgyan phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul po zab mo sna
134a6(rgyud): tshogs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag
134a7(rgyud): par ston po'i rin po che bkod pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis/na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs/sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sgrogs brgya
134b1(rgyud): mtsho'i sprin dag dang /rin po chu sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla re'i dril bu'i sgra snyan pa sgregs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byin cing me tog gi tshor chen po rab tu
134b2(rgyud): 'bebs pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dig dang /rgya mtsho sprin chen po sgro tshor sgrogs shing /lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la/mu tig gi lda ldi rnam po sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho'i
134b3(rgyud): sprin dag dang /gser skud kyis rgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyis rtse mos na mkha'i kun tu khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dge dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng blo'i 'od kyi

141b2(rgyud): dkar po blangs te tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs bris te/kha dog dkar po glang po che'i dbu can/phyag g.yas na la phug bsnams pa/g.yon pa na rin po che'i nor bu bsnams

155a7(rgyud): spyi bor zhug so//de nas de'i modo la nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad langs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod

161b7(rgyud): bam la yi ger 'dri ba dang /yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/gzungs sngags 'di ni sems ce na dbul
162a1(rgyud): po dang /nad sna tshogs kyi gzir ba dang /'jigs pa dang /sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du/de bzhin gshogs pa thod
162a2(rgyud): gsungs pa dang /bshad pa dang /rje su yi rang ba dang /rab tu phye ba dang /bsngags pa dang /bkrol ba dang /gsal bar mdzad pa dang /bskyed pa dang /byin gyis brlabs pa//

162a4(rgyud): de'i tshe thal mo sbyor nas ched du brjod pa'i ched du brjod cing tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan ba sam gyis mi khyab ste//sangs rgyas chos kyang bas
162a5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab logs//bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyi//rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags//zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen//chos kyi
162a6(rgyud): rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba//ye shes pha rol bgrod pa byon gyur pa//sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'che lo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la mgu zhing ye rangs nas rab
162a7(rgyud): tu dka' ste/dgab dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ji ltar bzung
162b1(rgyud): radzaH/cos ldan+da das kyi sdub//sbrul ro//kun dga' blo 'od khyim bdag rgyu bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shog+sa/nor drung /'bru dang /don pa rnathams cad kyi gto
162b2(rgyud): zhes bya bar yang chung shig/de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nir gyi rgyan gyi gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig//bcom ldan 'as kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nus/
162b3(rgyud): tshechod dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'ang dag /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lha dang /mi dad+ma/lha ma yin dang /dri zar
162b4(rgyud): bcas de'i 'jog rten yi ras te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags n+yo g+hi d+hAn zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtogs so//
162b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/dang por shig sgyid zla the chung gi dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor song ste/de nas
162b6(rgyud): nu sa'i bar du chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dug la/nyi ma la sngon du phyogs par mngo su rtag po ji skad gnas kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//bza' ba thams cad sbyangs te/nyon mo sa
162b7(rgyud): gong sgrub pa de byis te/nub bdun tu bzlas pa bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thong sku yang de'u skam gtogs par gur grom dang /tsan dan gyi byugs par bya ba ni nu mi
163a1(rgyud): snga bar langs te/chur khru bdun//zhong du khru gsum ste/khru bcu dang bcas bya la tshon sna ma lus pa gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i lta bzos bcom ldan 'das ma rgya/
163a2(rgyud): ljang ser sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/phyag g.yas pa na 'bras bu chen po bsnams pa/phyag g.yon pa na sgrib pa po rnams la ster ba'i rin po che'i za ma gtog mu tig dang /rdo rje
163a3(rgyud): pha lam dang /pre DUr+ya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan par bya'o//steng du lha'i bu rin po che cher mngon du 'bebs bzhin pa bya'o//g.yas logasu dpal chen mo pad+ma
163a4(rgyud): phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgongs pa la gnas banon pa bya'o//g.yon log su pad+ma'i dpa la rin po che'i snyim pa gang ba bya'o//'og tu sgrub pa po pad+ma'i lag pa can bya'o//
163a5(rgyud): nas thang spyi bu gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub phyogasu kha bstan l-i bkr-im ste/de nas nye bar spyod 'bri gto ro ma ma gtogs pa mdzod kyi bzhes pa yang dobul zhing
163a6(rgyud): dra zhim tho'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la can da na dang a ga ru'i bdug pas bsreg par bya'o//zhu mor gyi mar me brgya 'bul bar bya'o//de nas stan gcig la gan+da
163a7(rgyud): la bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal la dmigs la nub mo mtshan bzlas pa byas na/de nas skya rengs shar ba 'dus su skyes bu chen po tsam gyi nor rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun 'ba'i
163b1(rgyud): cing khang pa gang bar 'gyuraro//yang na mtshan mo phyed na chu'i nang du zhugs la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o//zla gcig tu gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyis rgyun 'bab par 'gyur te//mi shes
163b2(rgyud): par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyuraro//yang na rgyal po'i skor mngon por 'dod na nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas pa bya zhing /mtshan mo'i phyed na til gyis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na rgyal rigs
163b3(rgyud): las snyed pa chen po thob bo//yungs kar mar la bsres nas sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dang du byed//kun tu ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed//kha cig gis ni
163b4(rgyud): sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan cano dran par byas na sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur//yang ni sgrub thabs chen po bshad par bya ste/cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i
163b5(rgyud): phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/zas ci srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung na thang ka nub phyogasu bstan la dgram zhing /nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol
163b6(rgyud): hU~M phyin pa klag cing /mtshan mo stan cig la gnas pas/nub yal gyis bzlas pa byas na nor gyi phung po chen po rnyed do/mthor gnod byas kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur te/lha khang chen
163b7(rgyud): 'o bya'o//cho ga 'di'i cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas pa byas na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob cing /bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma dngosu mthong zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
164a1(rgyud): chub sems dpar 'gyur//ji ltar de ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing /kha na ma tho ba'i zas chang dang /nya sha la sogs pa sbyangs shing mtshan mo bzlas pa byas na/
164a2(rgyud): dbul por mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang /zla ba bzang po yongasu dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsungs pa la mya ngon par
164a3(rgyud): bstod do//bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzog so///na mo rat+na tA yA ya/oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/snying po'o//na mo rat+na tA yA ya/oM bA su
164a4(rgyud): shrI swA hA//nye ba'i snying po'o//na mo rat+no tra yA yo/oM bA su swA hA/nye ba'i snying po'i yang nye ba'i snying po'o//thal mo sbyar ti gung mo gnyis dang /de nas srin lag gnyis dang /
164a5(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te bsdigs mdzub phan tshun sgril la/mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bsnol te/rtse mo gnyis rgyab sprad de/khab lta bu byas la/gung mo rtswa sprad pa
164a6(rgyud): la ma thob mo zung cig de'i 'og tu sbyar te/reg pa bcas pa ni rab tu gzung ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa ste/las thams cad sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun mi'i gzung
164a7(rgyud): 'di thub pas gsungs pa'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/oM shrI yi shrI ka ri/d+ha na ka ri d+ha na ka ri swA hA/bsgrub par bya ba'i sdig so//rig pa 'di'i dang po re shig dam
164b1(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya ni sor mo rnams thal mo sbyar la mtheb chen dbus su bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//oM sA ma ye/sa me sa ma ya ka ri/ma hA sa ma ye swA
164b2(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngagaso//phya n+ya de nyid la gung mo dang sdigs mdzub kyi tshig gsum pa skul zhing mtheb chung gi nyis cung zad phyir phyung ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya'o//'di
164b3(rgyud): dbab pa dang /bsngo ba dang /bsgrub bya'i sngags kyis bye'o//phyag rgyu de nyid la bsdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya yin te/oM bA su d+h+we swA hA/me tog gi phyag rgyad nyid//
164b4(rgyud): las gung mo brkyang ba ni bdug spros kyi phyag rgya yin te/sngags ni oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid li mang med brkyang ba'i phyag rgya yin te/sngags ni oM bI su d+ha mo ti shri ya~M swAhA/phyag
164b5(rgyud): rgya 'di nyid la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bo chen gyis bkab ste/sor mo gzhan rnams ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni mor me'i phyag rgya ste/sngags ne oM bA su d+ha ra Ni swA hA/sen mo gan
164b6(rgyud): rgyal du byas la mthe bong gnyis logasu sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/sngags ni oM bA su d+ha re ne swAhA/lhag ma nye bar spyod pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i sngags kyis thun mong gi phyag rgya'am/
164b7(rgyud): sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ki'i cho ga ni nyams pa med cing /skra'i nyams pa med pa skud pa ma chad pa'i zheng du mtho gang gi ched nyid la ring du mtho
165a1(rgyud): /byas twa/steng du bcom ldan 'das bri/g.ya su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bya/g.yon du rdo rje 'chang bya/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og thung ka'i dbusu
165a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma bri ste/gser gyi mdog can/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/gos srab mo'i sham kag banabs pa/de bzhin du gos srab mo'i stod g.yogs can/kha
165a3(rgyud): dog sna tshogs kyi sham thabs dang ldan pa'o//de nas 'og phyogasu sgrub pa po lag na mchod pa'i chog bya'o//de nas sgrub pa pos gtsang sgra byas gos gtsang mgyon te gso sbyong
165a4(rgyud): yan lag brgyad bya'o//de'i mdun du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig byis la ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o//de nas sgrub pa po dang ldan pas smyung ba byas te/zhing gi/
165a5(rgyud): dbus su thang sku bzhugs gsol te/dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang /nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o//thang ka'i 'og tu lan brgya rtsa gcig
165a6(rgyud): gis sngags byis pa'i bum pa chus yongasu grang ba bzhag par bya'o//bum pa'i chus gau tor ma btang zhing /glang bu dang /thong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bya'o//glang bu'i mgul//
165a7(rgyud): pa dang /thong 'dzin gyi mgul par me tog gi phreng ba gdags par bya'o//de rnams kyi mdun du sngags pas chu'i rgyun zhing la lan g.yas log su bskor bar bya ba ni sngags pas
165b1(rgyud): mdun du 'gro zhing sngags da'i ni zhing rmor 'gro bar bya'o//byis sa byon 'debs pa'i dus su chog 'dis brgyad brgya bsngags la sa bon sbar pa gang ba lan bdun bzlas te/zhing la gtor
165b2(rgyud): bar bya'o//sa bon gdab de'i cho ga'o//dri ni zhing rnga ba'i dus su yang cho ga 'dis bya'o//tshwa ga lhag po ni 'dir dge slong bya zhi la zhing gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod kyi ston mo byas te/de nas
165b3(rgyud): sngags pas chang ba bdun bzlas pa byed cing /rnga ba ni lo tog rtsa ba bya ba'i cho ga'o//da ni g.yul 'chag pa bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngags pas
165b4(rgyud): rang nyid gtsang sbra byas la gos gtsad mgon la shar du zhal bstan to/sku gzugs bzhugasu gsol la dri dang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /yang na nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma
165b5(rgyud): byas la bzlas pa byas te/'bru'i phung po mtshams bzhir gzhon nu ma gsar du bag ma byas shing khyo yod pa'i bud med bzhi la ston mo byas la/de rnyed kyi mthar zad pa med par gnaso//
165b6(rgyud): de nas skyes bus 'bru 'dral zhing grangs byed pa'i dpral ba la sngags dgod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags de sred du smai bcad byas la bzlas pa bya'o//ji snyed du sngo la bltas
165b7(rgyud): na gnyis 'gyur du 'gro bar 'gyur//de snyed 'das pa bya'o//de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'chings pa'i mi le sogs pa bos shing sbyin pa 'am/dge 'dun la sbyin par bya'o//
167a1(rgyud): g.yul 'chag pa'i cho ga'o//da no 'bru dang mdzod du 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/dang po ro shig mdzod kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du 'byung po gnyis gcer bu
167a2(rgyud): gsum pa 'phyang ba/dbang po 'phyang ba/g.yon pa'i lag na 'dre'i snod gzung zhing 'bru skyug bzhin pa/gser gyi mdog/rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o//mdzod
167a3(rgyud): kyi khang par yang dri dang /b+h+ya ba dang /mchod yon sbyin zhing /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i mdzod kyi nang du gzhug
167a4(rgyud): par bya'o//de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyun gtor bzhin pa'i sngogs pas 'gro bar bya zhing /de'i rgyab nas de nas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o//de'i rjes la 'bru'i mdzad khang du
167a5(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhag par bya'o//de nas mdzod kyi khang da'i du dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas la dri dang /me tog dang bdug po la sogs pas mchod do//nor rgyun mi'i gzungs rtogs pa
167a6(rgyud): bklag par bya'o//gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thung ka'i mdun du dri nas skyes buso 'bru phyir 'byin par byed de/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'dra bar ba sam la gu raM gum gyi glog
167a7(rgyud): la sngags bris la/spyi bor bcings la kha gos kyi bkab la nyi ma re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o//mdzod khang gi sgo ru nyin re nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi mdo
167b1(rgyud): klag par bya'o//sngags pas bsgrub bya'i sngags bltas la/dus gsum du brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o//ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das mu nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogasaso//
167b2(rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/shrI ma hA kA la tan+t+ra/bod skad du/dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/dbang gi rta mchog sku la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/
167b3(rgyud): shar lho'i dur khrod chen po ha ta drag tu dgod pa'i gnas shing can dan gyi nag tshal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba mi ma yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du/dpal nag po chen po
167b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni ya ka la sogs te 'khor gdug pa can rnams kyi dbus na skye 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa'i nag po chen po zhes bya ba gcig yod de/de'i
167b5(rgyud): tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na mthar byed rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te/dreg pa can 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
167b6(rgyud): par zhugs nas lcogs kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas/oM badz+ra kro d+ha ta yau gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM baM zhes brjod pas/dur khrod ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas nas nag po rang dbang med par
167b7(rgyud): 'char byed ta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las tse bya zer zhing de rtogs srog gi snying nge 'di ma sa gsol du rdul ba/oMHdz+ra mahA kA la~M hU~M hU~M tra dzadz+nyA bi nA ma ka d+hu hUM phaT zhes phul lo//
168a1(rgyud): dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po do///de nas rgyal po mag mi bzang gi mthar byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad
168a2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to//e ma pad+ma khros pa'i bdag/nag po chen po drag shul can//gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol//mgon po bsgrub par bya ba gang //gsad cing lus
168a3(rgyud): srog dbye ba dang //ma grub shis bstan pa dang //mgon po'i rtags dang ser ba rnams//rta mchog chen pos bdag la gsol//zhes zhus pas/de nas pad+ma khros pa yis//
168a4(rgyud): nag po'i sgrub thabs tshad du brjod//dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis//sangs rgyas bstan pa srung slad du//gza' skar tshes grangs shis pa la//dur khrid la sogs
168a5(rgyud): shing gcig tu//bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas la//nag po chen po bsgrub par bya//phungs sa 'ams nag dag la ni//stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas ni//dri spos
168a6(rgyud): khrag gi chag chag bya//dbus su gru gsum zla kha mo ldan//phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri//de dbus thod chen nang du ni//sha lnga snying snas rgyan pa yi//gtor ma gshos
168a7(rgyud): bu khru gang tshad//de la mda' gzugs dmar nag dang //gri snying tsa ka li yang gzugs//de nyid mgon po'i rten du bzhag/Da ma~M ru yi lpags pa'i nang //mgon po
168b1(rgyud): srog sngags bri bar bya//lnga yi nang du bla rdos dril//spos dang rgyun gtor gtang bar bya//dkon mchog spyil mchod pa bsham//de nas pad+mar bdag bsgoms la//thugs kA d+hi las/
168b2(rgyud): 'od 'bros pas//bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa//rang gi mdun du bsam byas la//mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya//rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni//chad med bzhi po bsgom
168b3(rgyud): bar bya//btang snyoms la sogs bai raM tri//bad stengs yi ge trUM las ni//nag po zhal gcig phyag drug pa//gri gug phreng ba Da ma ru//thod pa mdung dang zhags pa bsnams//g.yas
168b4(rgyud): g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o//sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan//sku smad pa ti khra bo gsol//stag lpags zhing gi sham thabs can//gtum po spyan gsum mche ba bcigs//
168b5(rgyud): dpral bar dri yi thig les rgyan//spyi gtsug mi bskyod sprul sku brtan//de ltar bdag mdun gsal bsgoms nas//spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa bya//gtor ma pU rdu la sogs
168b6(rgyud): pas//nag po che la sbyin par bya//mgon po'i thugs ki'i hUM las ni//srog gi yi ge g.yas nas bskor//khor yug dag gis bzla bar bya//oM badz+ra mA hA ka la k+ShaM k+She tri g+h+na
168b7(rgyud): bi nA yaM ka hUM hUM phaT/de skad ces ni rab brjod pas//rnal 'byor bar chad byed pa rnams//nag po grub pa'i rtags rnams 'byung //dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las bsnyen
169a1(rgyud): cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang //nag po chen pos
169a2(rgyud): bsgral 'dod na//stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang //drag po e na'i nang du ni//pho mo rab chang thod pa'i nang //gzugs ni spro tshil dag la bya//ming rus dag ni bkod nas kyang //
169a3(rgyud): bsad dang na ba skabs dang sbyar//mgon po'i sku dang dam rdzas rnams//kha dang kha la bgod par bya//phag thod nang du thun rdzas blugs//rtag gtor rgyun gtor g.yas dang
169a4(rgyud): g.yon//gsang sngags 'di yis bsad par bya//oM badz+ra mat+ma ka la k+Shi k+She tra dig+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/oM mahA kA lA ya shA sa na u pa ha ri Ni e Sha a pa sh+tsi ma kA lo a yaM
169a5(rgyud): i dAM rat+na tra ya oM pa kA ri NaM ya di pA ti d+h+waM sma ra si ta dA i daM duSh+TaM kha kha khyA hi khA hi/mA ra mA ra/gr-ih+Na grit+ta/ban+d+ha ban+ta/ha na ha na/da ha da ha/pa tsa pa tsa/di na me ke na
169a6(rgyud): dgra bo mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/hUM ba~M nA yaM ka bi las tr-i bi dzi hUM dza~M si ma bu bi nA ya ka a mu ka bri srog tur thums dza mA ra ya rbad/drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis brab//zhag
169a7(rgyud): bdun bar du smra mi bya//de la rtags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur//dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las lus srog dbye ba'i le'u gsum pa'o///
169b1(rgyud): danas yang dag pa byud bya ba//las mtha' ston srog dag gis bdul//glu gsum dbus su gdug par shing //dbus su nag po 'khor bcas bskyed//ling kA gtor ma d+hA ma r+dz+dza /
169b2(rgyud): rnams//nag po'i zhal du dngul bar //sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya//oMdz+haiM dz+wa l-i raM las rdzogs//thal ba rlud dmar dag la bsku ba//a muk+Sha na myur du zlog/da
169b3(rgyud): nig po chen po'i rgyud las mtha' rdul po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'i///de nas yang dgu bshang bya ba//de ltar bsgrubs kyang ma grub na//gcig dang gnyis la nan
169b4(rgyud): tan bskyed//de ltar byas kyang ma grub na//so gsum khrag gsum dug gsum la//khru gang ba yi gzugs kyi tshe//gru gsum dbus su nag po'i gzugs//spyi rgyur
169b5(rgyud): dag tu lding du gtsug/bris sku dam rjes zla rdo rnams//rlung gi glu gsum mal gyi'o//drug dang cher mas steng nas dgag/thun rdzas brib tsong sngags 'di bzlas//oM badz+ra
169b6(rgyud): hU~Msme th+liM N+Din rgyus trA~M /kAN+Di d+hI l+yAk+Shad+hAm / skad du ts+yai thun swA hA//de la rtags rnams rdzogs pahU~M//de nas
169b7(rgyud): gas nga'i tshi ga bya//dris sku zla dzo ma rdzas rnams//spos 'chus bkri zhing sngags 'di bzlas//oM badz+ra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+na bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT sos sos swA hA//de skad
170a1(rgyud): byas la gnas ni//mgon po'i gzugs kyang smos chus bkru//gru gsum dbus su blangs byas la//dgra bo'i ming rus snying khar gzhug/zhag
170a2(rgyud): bdun bsgrubs la dgra la skyal//a nu ka ni myur du brlag/dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las ma grub na/spogs de'i cho ga dang gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
170a3(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya bo//bya nag 'bur zhing ldang ba dang //mon pa a tsa ra dang ni//dge ba shes ban+de slob dpon dang //'od dang sgra dang khang pa 'tshog/mgon po'i
170a4(rgyud): sku drug dngosu mthong //dgra la dmag drangs sems cen bsad//mi nag dag la snying stobs dang //mdze bo dang ni sprang po dang //bya nag theng la lhung ba 'byung //dpal
170a5(rgyud): mgon po nag po'i rgyud las rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bye ba//ser ba dbab pa'i las bya na//mon nam mdze
170a6(rgyud): can thod pa ru//'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris nas kyang //rigs lnga klu yi sa bon dgod//rtsibs mtshan ser sngon ming rus dang //yul du pob ces bya ba byi//de mthar
170a7(rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs dgu la//dregs pa'i sngags dag bri bar bya//rgyab tu gang yin yul ming dang //rlung gi snying po bro bar bya//bdag nyid pad+ma khros por sgom//gsang
170b1(rgyud): sa sasu gan /A m+bun+tar+m+ma.Ar+b+hin dzA/dz+nyAn+d+ha laka d+hA d+d+ha Ta/d+hA da ba DUr/suts+tsha brnams can rbA r+dz+dza//ra cus no ba bad /
170b2(rgyud): rgyas nag ste che dang//lhag dung dug gis ra ga//'bras gas byu / 'i yul du dang 'bar bya//gas te 'jog rten 'o//dang la mtshan
170b3(rgyud): dUd marab na //denas /sa gsus pa//ini la la stu//de'i skyed sa sbyin rgyu byu nga/
170b4(rgyud): gnas rlom bya rdzus//gti ma dag la btsun par bya//dmad+has r+b+ba rdo lam la sle//zhes gsungs pas rgyal ba nag mi bzangs la sogs da la ba drin su
170b5(rgyud): rkyen pas sbyin du rdzus pa smrams na mi spang /de 'dzin na ku rtugs//d+hu k-i myim pan rgyas
170b6(rgyud): sa kyis sgyu /rgyug smras/dz+haiM hU~M mAr+m+mak+Sha ts+tshama~Md+b+ha hU~M/das/gas pad+ma la na
170b7(rgyud): rgyas/sas rgyas /byang chub sems pa mas cad la phyog /'duni gags kyis kyingasu rna bcom ldan dusu
171a1(rgyud): btul te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/rang por ma lon pa zhig na//byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor dzang+ga/
171a2(rgyud): su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag po/ma hA kA la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba/dpal mgon po nag po chen pos/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
171a3(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyis bzhesu gsol//nad thams cad dang /
171a4(rgyud): rims thams cad dang /gdon thams cad dang /mi ngas thams cad dang /'byung po thams cad dang /nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang /nyes par ltas pa rnams steng du
171a5(rgyud): gzhan 'phrul dab byed la thug pa man chad bcing ngo //'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo //thad ka kho ra khror yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcang ngo //
171a6(rgyud): bAzhan yang oM shrI mar+d+ha ka lA g+h+nA na gu tI sUd+d+hA/na mAHshrI mahA kA la gA ni gu ti shwA yA/na ma yo gi na N+Din/tad+ya thA/oM t+to li hi li/ki ti ki tI nA~M/cid ci de ni sna
171a7(rgyud): 'di bton pas gtsug lag khang dang /dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/rigs 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing /rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla//bdu
171b1(rgyud): sa rnams kyi bar phyug/sngon po la ga du chung zung b+h+yo gtan na rlo pa/l+h+wam ldan gyi lug/rnam pa'i lkog ma stong rdul du rlog pa/dgan mchog gsum gyis bstan bsrung
171b2(rgyud): khaMs zlas shing dum thanaso//'phags pa dang la mgon po rnon ce zhes bya ba'i gzung ra skad du/dI bi mar+thakA i n+d+ra man+dA raH/bod skad du/
171b3(rgyud): lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gri thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mngon pa
171b4(rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ring por ma lon pa zhig no//byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhug so//de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lham ma//lham
171b5(rgyud): nag mo chen mos/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'jug/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen pos gsol pa/btsun pa bac+doMs
171b6(rgyud): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rigs pa 'di 'bul na/bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi su gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bdud kyi yum gshin
171b7(rgyud): rje'i lham mo nog ma chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man ched bcing bar bya'o//'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o//thad
172a1(rgyud): 6bdun rkun rol drug brgyan chad btsod par bya'o//de'i sngags 'di dag tu gazlas paR+YAd+d+ha/taH!/oMn du na du
172a2(rgyud): swAhA/'di bton pas rims dang /nang dang /mi ngas dang /nyes par bltos pa thams cad dang /mdze dang /rol mig dang /g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar
172a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro swAhA/lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs ldog so///'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa/sangs rgyas dang

172a5(rgyud): brjod par bya ba ste/phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der/bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig/tAd+yathA/hA na ha na/rA dza d+ha te na/da ta da ha/rA dza d+hA te na/po tsa ba tsa
172a6(rgyud): rA d+hA ten/hu shr-i baM ba tu bi ra bA raM/baM tu pa ri she d+hA nAM/i paSh+kur tsaN+Da lan/tin ta na/au suM d+ha ni suM b+h+ya/shi ro mr-in+ta/tsak+Shur+ya mAny+tsa/shro tri muSh+Ta/b+hUN muH/
172a7(rgyud): t+yaiti muny+tsa/kar+N+Na muny+tsa/gr-I ba muny+dzi/dr-iSh+Ta muny+dza/kA Ti ka muny+tsa/kuM k+Sha muny+tsa/u ru muN+ya/dza na muts+tsha/tista~M muSh+Ta/b+ho da~M muny+tsa/oM gu l+ya mu n+ye/oM gra pra N+ye ga \u0f7f
172b1(rgyud): sa ra/AH m+b+ha/kAm+b+ha/d+har mu to sa/bdag la swA//oMdz+wA lan+d+ha A thAl d+hu/sarba dzA rAnAn /'phags pa nag po chen po'i gnas//rims nad thams cad las
172b2(rgyud): rnam par thar bar byed pa rdzogs s+ho/rgya gar gyi mkhan pa rmA dang /tshun rgya ma ba ma shes skyes bsgyur ci dus te gtan lde ba pa'o//
172b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/shrI de bi kA la byA ma rA dza tan+ta kI la~M/bod skad du/dngol lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud/rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal
172b4(rgyud): byuphyug na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad de dag gis zas pa dus gcig ni/rirab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshil chen pon po com ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na rdo rje lus bskul
172b5(rgyud): blo'i mi ltar 'byor ba/srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/nyi ma stong gi gzi badz+rod dang ljin nas bzhugs//'dza na brgya byin dang /sha zla dang /srin po dang /mi mi tshogs
172b6(rgyud): bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhug so//de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te/bka' stsol pa/nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin sde brgyad nyon cig/'dod pa'i
172b7(rgyud): khams 'di ni bdud kyi mag shin rje'i sring mo zhes bya ba rgyal che'i chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa cig yod de/khyed kyis del mchod pagyis shig/bstod pa
173a1(rgyud): sa /us nga rgyun gyis rgyu blogs dka sgyus pa dang /'khor na nas nga nga da n+na n+dan las s+hos t+to d+hA sa
173a2(rgyud): na la dge ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/sngon 'das bskal pa dang bya'i pha rol na//dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher sbyangs nas//lo mo b+he khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang //
173a3(rgyud): mtho sa skyes pa rnams la dge bcu yi//tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol sgyur bya yi//dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//'das pa'i dus na sog gcod rab spangs pas
173a4(rgyud): sku tshe ring shing gzugs byang sun sum tshogs//gzhan gyi lan tshugs gnod pa'i rkyen dang ldan//'tsho ba dag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal ba stod//ma byin len
173a5(rgyud): rdul la rab sbyangs pas+ho//bsod nams tshogs kyis longs spyod phun sum tshug so//gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtson brkos//sbyin pa'i gtor 'tshang khyod la
173a6(rgyud): phyun 'tshal bstod//mi tshungs spyod pa'i bka' rnams sbyang ba dang //sangs kyi grong khyer dman lngas rnam par 'jigs//srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du sbyangs pa ste//dge sbyong ldan
173a7(rgyud): mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//nyon mongs brdzun cho ga spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis//gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso//gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i
173b1(rgyud): rang bzhin tu//'don par gasbyang ba khyod la phyab tshal bstod//du mya rkyen drangs mi khyod 'khor dung wAn//da la rnam par 'dul du'i 'khor gyis bskyod//rtswa dang lha min bdun pa
173b2(rgyud): 'dul mdzad ma//dkar mo'i 'khor rje gso khyod la phyaga'i tshal bstod//dbye la khya'o spangs de'i yon tan sbyin pa stes//ting 'dzin rtse gcig mig yi bar chad srangs//dgos 'bris
173b3(rgyud): rgyatshul gyis bstan pa spyod mdzad ma//byis pa 'dul mdzod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//nga rgyal khang sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis//zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma/
173b4(rgyud): chog rngub gshi ba'i ni nyen po byed pa s+ho//dag rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni//'dzin pa'i rnam dz+nyAg rnam
173b5(rgyud): spangs de'i rtags//bdag med rtag su seng ges d+hU brgyun//brlob sems sbyangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//bzung ba'i yul lo gnod sems rnam par sangs//byi rol
173b6(rgyud): yul 'di gnyis med chos gzigs//gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags//sbrulo gyi swA d+hu nA tsan la phyaga'i tshul bstod//log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnam spangs
173b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyani khyod//lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can//spos bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal bstod//'jig rten 'di na las te//
174a1(rgyud): dag ma dag/mu dag mi dge bcu las dran stong grub//dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub//las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas//gong nas gong /
174a2(rgyud): ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang //dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan//gdugs pa'i tshul can 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma//bstod par 'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
174a3(rgyud): de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la//gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa/dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad pa ni//tshogs kyi
174a4(rgyud): sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis//gnyen po ye she sa rim par bsgom pa la//mthar phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags//de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni//
174a5(rgyud): 'odi ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te//dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab bsags pas//dang po sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes//rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni//rnar
174a6(rgyud): mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs//dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni//rang sems gnyis dag la rab brten nas//de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son//
174a7(rgyud): rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher bsgoms pas//lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son//rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas//bdun pa la ni thabs kyis pha rol son///
174b1(rgyud): du sems brgyud pa nyid la cher ba sgoms pas//dngal ldan lha mAnAn d+hA smon lam nyid//dbu bral yang stobs sgra yon tan stug/de y-i stobs kyi sgo shes 'byin par 'gyu
174b2(rgyud): 'di dag rnam por rdzogs par byas nas ni//sangs rgyas pa la sprin gyi'i smon lam can//saM brgya non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'tshang ma//'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston ci/
174b3(rgyud): gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod l-i phyag 'tshal bstod//bdag kying khyod kyi lam lhur myur 'grotho shog/de nas me'i mo ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can gyis dpal lha me nag mo chen
174b4(rgyud): mgoganyis med pa'i sgonas bstod de/dpal ldan lha mo ga m+b+hi mad s+ho//daMn ngomo sgras dral chos nyid 'di las brtsal//den dam kun rdzob gnyisu mad pas bden//'khor
174b5(rgyud): bamya ni ga su med su nag/sems pan sa m+b+ha rgyas ky-i/ma mas kris//laste dang ma sbyin gnyis med pa sto//de 'grus pa/nyis sre pas sbyis
174b6(rgyud): yulo dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi dang //sgras dang smram med ngan dam dbyings kyis bsdus//brisi dA na mas ye shes gnyis mye tshogs chen ste//mthong dang drim pa
174b7(rgyud): gnyis med dag pas bstod//bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni nga tshul gcig/go zus dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu//mtho ris dran song gnyis byal dag pa'i zhing /
175a1(rgyud): bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gi bstod//skyod mod rdzogs pa gnyis mod lhun grub mchog/sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid do//sgrub
175a2(rgyud): dang bsgrub bya gra nyis med grub pa'i drung //bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bskyod//yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems//thabs dang shes rab
175a3(rgyud): gnyi su med pa'i don//stong dang mi stong gnyis me zhi pa'i dang //byur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyog 'tshal bstod//sgra tshig gnyis mod brjod pa med pa'i ngang //lus dag gnyis
175a4(rgyud): med sems nyid gcig gi tshul//rtsol byed brtsol bya gnyis med don gcig pas//rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis bstod//mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis mod
175a5(rgyud): tshul gcig pas//dbyings dang rig pa gnyis medo don rtogs te//srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas//thams cad gnyis meng sku la phyag 'tshal bstod//
175a6(rgyud): phyi dang nang med gnyis med gcig gi dang //sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul//snang dang mi snang gnyis mang gcig gis mthong //gnyis med don mchog
175a7(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul//spros pa med pa'i don dang 'brel pa ste//'di rnams lha mo khyod kyis thugs la gsal//'di
175b1(rgyud): l-I rang stod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog/de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal po zur dung lnga pas dpal lha mo la phrin las kyi sgra nas bstan pa/sems nyid phrin lus rnam bzhi'i khyad par ni//sa
175b2(rgyud): nyi da gud na med cing sems kyang med//don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med//kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems//'thun par bstan pa'i zhi ba dpal lha mo//zhi mdzad ni
175b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can//zhi ba'i 'khor gyi bskor ba'i gtso mo ni//rtags kyi sku mdog dkar me shin tu dngas//kun tu zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//bdag gi dgra dang
175b4(rgyud): nad rnams zhi bar mdzod//'thun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo//rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can//rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni//rtags
175b5(rgyud): kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid//kun tu rgyus mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod//bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzad//'thun par bstan pa'i dbang mo dpal lha mo//
175b6(rgyud): dbang mdzad pang sbyar dbang gis ngang tshul can//dbang gis 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni//rtags kyi sku mdog dmar po shin tu brjid//kun tu dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal
175b7(rgyud): bstod//bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod//'thun par bstan pa'i drag po dpal lta mi//drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can//drag ma'i 'khor gyis bskor
176a1(rgyud): ba'i gtso mo ni//rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu brjid//kun tu drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag pos sod//
176a2(rgyud): khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma grub la//'di ltar 'dzini nyid cir yang snang ba ni//phrin las rnam bzhis 'go don mdzad pa lags//bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grub nas/
176a3(rgyud): khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog/de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la klu'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma/
176a4(rgyud): yon tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni//don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir//rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o//khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon
176a5(rgyud): mya ngan mi mda'i rtag su lcags sgrog mang //bdag de ni lhun grub glang chen kau bas rgyan//gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes bkris//byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug/
176a6(rgyud): rno rgyas gsal//shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas rgyan//dug gsum sdong po gtsad pa'i ral gri dang //bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan ne'u la bsnams//dbang
176a7(rgyud): drag rdzogs phyir ral ba kham nag spug/nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dpal mche ba gtsigs//'khor ba ljags la gtar phyir dkan sgra 'debs//gdugs pazhe la gnon phyir sdang //
176b1(rgyud): //bams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan N+ya dmar//stoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sgyu ma drug panag/ma mo 'dul phyor dur khrod rgyun gyis brgyan//su gsung thuk+kas d+d+haH/
176b2(rgyud): byug d+hu d+hU gsor//sku gsuM mi rdzogs spyod thod pa'i phreng bas rgyun//dran 'amyur mgyogs basbyin phyir chubams rgyan//nami ma smin phyir me rung na dran bgaste//'ad
176b3(rgyud): phyir mongs 'du shing la na/wA m+b+hin+da 'dun phyiraH na //la 'azlog so//da' brtan gan gyi sdug go/ma thabs banabs//bstan bA sud phyir dag ma'i chas
176b4(rgyud): rdzogs//nga rgyal dbang srud bdag med sgra sgrogs phyir//thabs kyi spyan cha g.yas pa seng gis rgyun//zhe sdang dbang 'dul drug chen 'dul ba'i phyir//shes rab snyan cha g.yon
176b5(rgyud): pasbrul gyi rgyan//'du byed mi rtag d+hagra su~M dr-I le bu sgrogs//chags phyir rngam mdzad dak+ta'i rtswa klong 'thung //dam tshig sri phyir zhing ljags rgyan du mdzad//tha dad las rnams
176b6(rgyud): 'dugyi phyir rmo ba'i 'dra//nyon mongs spyi'i po'i tshogs rnams rab stang naso//ye shes rig pa'i tshigs rnams shar ba'i phyir//rang bzhin gnas ma chog byed shar mtshams ni brtan
176b7(rgyud): dbutso'am lo gnas phyir dro du nan//nyin mongs gdug pa 'dun byor ma'i chul//ma/'grom mo khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod//de nas hrul bum gyi rgyal bskul mgo dasum
177a1(rgyud): dngul lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgonas bstod pa/don dam gnyis mod byung chub sems yin yang //skrod gsum gdul phyir rtags ky-i d+hug+h+ra r+m+man/
177a2(rgyud): rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang //rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba las//keng rus thod phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan//sku mdog gnag lo rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal//
177a3(rgyud): sngon mo ral pa 'dzings pa'i sprul pa 'gyed//sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan re mo Ti//glu gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyingasu bzhengs//yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' le bzhod//
177a4(rgyud): phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod//gsung gi sprul pa dpel ldan re ma ti//gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhes//dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum
177a5(rgyud): mem ste//dbang gi phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod//sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma//drag po 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon//'gro drug sgrol
177a6(rgyud): mdzad sems can kun gyi ma//bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod//bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs//de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma yin gyi rgyal
177a7(rgyud): po thag bzangs ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang //thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum//gdod gnas ga
177b1(rgyud): med na mkha'i snying po ni//dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal//'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la//byis pa rnams kyi bstod pa byed pa ltung //blun po rnams kyis dngos por
177b2(rgyud): rab brtags nas//gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/rgyal ba'i don yangs thugs chud khyod nyid la//tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams//nams kyang grol
177b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid min//gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma gtogs par//khyod kyi smon lam brtags kyi cho 'phrul la//don tu gzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams//
177b4(rgyud): khyod la rten nas thams cad btub par 'gyur//gang zhig skye ba med par shes pa dang //gdod nas gnyis med snying po sgom nus na//gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin//khyod
177b5(rgyud): kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis//bskal pa grangs medo 'das par rab bltas kyang //khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus//gang zhig gzugasu mi 'dzin rnams kyis
177b6(rgyud): mthong //sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyis//khyod ni bos kyang bskal par mi thos te//'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni//khyod kyang pos la de yang khyod kyis thos//gang
177b7(rgyud): zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod bsgrub pa'i//blun po de yis nams kyang khyod nyid spangs//lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas//mchod na dngos grub de yis gter thob
178a1(rgyud): 'gyur//khyod ni rgyal ba mang ba'i yon tan sdud//chos kyid sa nu rgyal ba rnams dang mol//zab mo dbu ma'i rang dranan ston pa'i phyir//mi mdzad
178a2(rgyud): 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir//phyi rol tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma//khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rang brtags pa//sgrib pa mang po stong nyid dang du gshegs//stong nyid
178a3(rgyud): dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod//stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod//'di ltar bstod na bstod par 'gyur grang bas//khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang //byis
178a4(rgyud): pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod//de nas na mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser mig can gyi dpal lha mo la bstod pa/dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i dron//thabs kyi tshe
178a5(rgyud): 'phrul na mkha'i mkha' la spyod//byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la//sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyi phyag 'tshal bstod//bdag gis khyod ni mchod pas ma bsgribs
178a6(rgyud): kyang //dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir//'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char 'bab pas//mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis dbang po rgyal gyur cig/dpal ldan khyod ni dge
178a7(rgyud): sdig bdag po ste//bdag gi lus dge yod kyi sdig pa'i tshogs//khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na//thugs rje'i shugs kyi sgrib pa byang bar mdzod//khyod kyi
178b1(rgyud): byu ba yong su 'phags pa na//'gro ze 'dzin mdzad dadag don phun sum tshogs//dga' 'thun phrag dog med pa'i spros pa ni//rno ru yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'dul//'di ltar yAn ldan b+ha
178b2(rgyud): sku mchog ni//nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mdze stongs kyis//phyogs bcu dus gsum kun tu 'gro dan la//sgyu 'phrul dri ba'i tshul gyis nga skul bar stobs//yang dag khyed kyi
178b3(rgyud): yon tan sgyu mchog ni//gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa srung ba'i phyir//sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni//mya ngan mi mda' bzhugs par gsol ba gdag/'di ltar phyog
178b4(rgyud): 'tshal mchod nas bshegs pa dang //dz+haiM su yI rang bskul zhing gsol bA NA nas//dge pa 'di mi dran song stong mi gyur to//thams cad tshigs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo//drinas
178b5(rgyud): dpal ldan lha mo la na mkha'i lha byin rnams kyis bstod pa/bskal pa me g+har 'bar dri'i klong dkyilan//rlung nig dgu da'i klong 'khyil po byung nas//ma cig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbyung
178b6(rgyud): byugs//bdud kyi sum la shrIn rje'i lham ga N+DIn mo//pa ldan lha mi nag mo rim te//nag min spyod rnam pa'i mche na//mthong nag gcar du khrag par bcan/
178b7(rgyud): kyi g+huH gnag ming zhugs pa ni//don dam phyi kyi sbyi gas//de rmugasas rnas namin du khyam ba ni//yum gyi mtha' la sprul pa'i byung pa'i rtags//dziM/
179a1(rgyud): bzhigs maldan//yang dag chos de don dang ldan pa'i tshig ste//zla min ka dz+nyAn sams byud gas na//thig patsho chog gi don du rdzun
179a2(rgyud): snam byed 'akris pa ni//'jig rten 'din mchi can ldan pa'i rtags//ste ra'i rung na nyi ma 'char ba ni//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ga tid nis skems pa'i rtags//
179b1(rgyud): gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni//dug gsum ma rig mun dA sol pa'i rtags//zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khrel ba ni//thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtogs//h+yan
179b2(rgyud): g.yas shang lang nag po bsdams pa ni//sdug bsngal skye shir+Na dra nas gcod pa'i rtags//phyag g.yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i
179b3(rgyud): rtags//drong bug pa phyini phyogs zhon pa ni//log pa ro lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags//srin po'i eg mas snga ru byas pa ni//srin yul lang kaM puHnges 'dul ba'i rtags//
179b4(rgyud): sbrul nas chun pos gong sprid byas nga ni//zhe sdang dbang gi bgegs rigs 'joms pa'i rtags//rus sbal nag po'i phob tu btang ba ni//klu bdud nag pod ma la btags pa'i rtags
179b5(rgyud): snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi khram bam ni//dam tshig nyams pa khram la 'debs pa'i rtags//phyi shar nad kyi rgyal pa btags pa ni//bstan po 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bo la//nad ka
179b6(rgyud): 'bengs shing dal kha sgyur ba'i rtags//don dam bcud kyi rtag su zhag gi zor ga btang //thugs rje chags pa'i rtag su rak+ta'i thig les brgyan//'dul byed phrin las rtag su thal
179b7(rgyud): ba'i mtshan mas btag//ma mo 'bum phrag phran du khol ba ni//khams gsum khyog par phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags//ma cig kha nas mo 'bar rgya mtsho skams//rdo rje 'phyar bu
180a1(rgyud): /rong ma tshogs par 'dzin//'dun /btsun par rgyu ma khyod la bskyod//de nas yang gshin rta nag ngas dpal lha mo la cho nga'i stan gyi sgra nas bstod pa/
180a2(rgyud): sgyu mo dpal ldan ma khe 'gron gra mo khyod la ni//rgyun tu ti la mar gyis byugs lan bu gtsid ma ste//rony+dza rnachas bsgyings shing cha lugs mang po 'tshang byed me//rgyun tu rka
180a3(rgyud): sgrogs lcags la byas pa gcig gi rkang pa mdzes par rgyan pa ste//mtshan mo bang bla zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nig mo khyen nyid yin par shes//ral bus bdag nyid mdzes par
180a4(rgyud): rkyen te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes//'khyer ba 'jug pa'i rkyen ma rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzeg du bya 'phrul ba na//nag mo mche ba mi bzung khyod
180a5(rgyud): zhal du 'gro kun skrod cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur//lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrod dgyes//khyod ni g.yog ba
180a6(rgyud): mya ngan mod cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrogs//khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bcod g.yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa yis//mgo brang lag na thogs shing /
180a7(rgyud): gir thabs bskor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che//rkub chos tshal klu dbang gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings shing lag na mdung dang ni//ba dan thogs shing khrag gi chang
180b1(rgyud): gis ra ros myos twa mig rtswa dmar por byas//mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni 'byung po phal chen kun gyis mthong //rkang pa'i gos ni kro rlon mtshon pas drangs pas snam gyis
180b2(rgyud): phyed ni re rjes dkris//mi'i sgyu ma sar bas zhal gyis zla ba rgyan cing khrag zhag tshom dus thig ler rgyan//mi sha so sor tshem chem za yin me ro'i cod pan mgo la rgyan pa ste//bdag
180b3(rgyud): lo skyob pa'i drag mo mi sha thog sa khyod snga nas ma mthong gzod mthong na//bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig sdang zhing khyod la 'dud//lha mo bzang mo lus mdog
180b4(rgyud): gnog cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la ni//brgya byin stsogs kyi bstod pa byed pa'i ge shin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud//lha rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams 'jug
180b5(rgyud): phyir rab rtul bas na rna ba ya go cig la//brang gis 'gro ba sbrul mgo gdongs ka stong dang ldan zhong phud sgrogs cig gis rgyan nas brgyan du byas//ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs
180b6(rgyud): mod thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor zhing sa gzhi gnon pa'i sa steng gi/phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma zla ba lha mo khyod kyi sked nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon//rgya mtsho klong nas me
180b7(rgyud): 'bar chu rnams snyoms par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams cad zho mjed ma//lha chen sku dang 'tshams par bzhugs pa'i bka' bzlog nag mo mi nad phyugs nad kun la 'jigs pa
181a1(rgyud): /maud//ma gcig da lta ldan khyu ny-id lani bdag ni gus par phyug 'tshal mchod cing bstod par nga//nganas la lha mon bal ma
181a2(rgyud): mchog snyed kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa/mchog lha ma de la lha mo//rdo rje b+h+yo mo nag me che//mer+g+ha ni khyod la phyag 'tshal brjod//bdag gis btsun pa
181a3(rgyud): khyod bskyed kyis//bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas//yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags//ma mor grogs shing 'jig rten skyong //dbanga' rdul drag spyod brgyan
181a4(rgyud): 'gyis che//'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal//gla shin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod //gr-imu dar gos sngon po gsol//sdug dang me sdug cha lugs 'tshang /sbyin mog
181a5(rgyud): tha~Mng na mi sdug kun tu spang //dad cing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud //re 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas//rim 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas//re 'ga' dur khrod dbus na
181a6(rgyud): gnas//lha mi'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'//gnas de ri dang tshal dgon ru//rtag tu lta mo khyod bstod na//de yi dgongs pa rgong bar byed//bdag des rtag tu bstod bya ba ma/
181a7(rgyud): bdag gi bsam pa grub par mdzod//rma ba sgrol rgyal mtshan byas//gang zhig rtag spyan srung por byed//gnag lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed//seng gi sgrag dong rgyu'i
181b1(rgyud): kaM yis//rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang //rdo rje dril chen ston par sgrogs//byin te dril chen snyan par sgrogs//lan 'ga' lag nA d+hi shul thogs//lan 'ga' nyi zla du mtshon
181b2(rgyud): 'phyar//mar gyi ches dgu bcu gcig na//de yi dus su mchod byas na//lho mo khyod las lhag pa med//dadud 'dul lha min srin mor ston//dgra dang 'thang tshe rgyal bar byed//
181b3(rgyud): dud med nang na mchog yin te//tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra//rgyal po'i khab na pad+ma 'dra//zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra//chu la rgalen gru zam 'dra//phongs pa rnams
181b4(rgyud): kyi gnyen bshes 'dra//lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyod tshe//lha mo khyod kyi lte ba la//lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas//lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas//lha ma yin rnams/
181b5(rgyud): pham par byed//lag na mdung dmar chems tshams//ru tshon ba dan me ltar 'bar//dgra 'dul g.yul bzlog khyed la bstod//de nas drang srong chen po kau'u di n+yas dpal lha mo dpe
181b6(rgyud): byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa//'jig rten gtso la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal//ma rnams nadu na khyod ni rtag tu mchog yin te//'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod//byang
181b7(rgyud): bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos//ron tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab rgya na//mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i mdab ma 'dra//bsod nams ye shes snang ba
182a1(rgyud): grags pas rgyun//dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra//dang bdag pad+mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang //sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par
182a2(rgyud): 'gyur//yang dag ye shes kyi nom bkra shis pa//pad+ma lta bur shin tu rnam par dag/lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos//mtshan ma yon tan rnaM pa sna tshogs rgyan
182a3(rgyud): dri med ye shes kun nas rab mdzes pa//dran pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur//ji ltar seng ge gcan zan mchog gyur bzhin//sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba//
182a4(rgyud): yis//bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad 'grub par shog/ces bstod do//de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs
182a5(rgyud): so//da yang bstod pa 'di dag gi don sgoms shig/yid la rtag tu zlos shig/lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni nga la bstod pa yin no//sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no//
182a6(rgyud): lha mo des kyang mi 'di srung bar byed do//skyob par byed do//ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub gtar ro//zhes bka' stsal pa dang /'khor de rnams rab tu dga' nas/bcom ldan
182a7(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje la brgyan gyi char chen po phab nas so so'i gan su 'khod do//bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzog so////rgya gar skad du/shrI de wi kA li
182b1(rgyud): aSh+Ta sha ta ka/bod skad du/dpal lha mo nag myo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa du
182b2(rgyud): gcig na/bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad //de'i tshe
182b3(rgyud): dpal lha mo nag mo chen po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas byang chub
182b4(rgyud): sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don
182b5(rgyud): mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas dpal lha mo nag mo la
182b6(rgyud): gzigs te/'di skad ces gsungaso//thos bsam sgom la cher gnas pa'i//rgyu 'bras rkyen gyis bdag nyid can//'gro la phani mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog/dpal ldan
182b7(rgyud): lha mo dag mo 'phags//byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste//sa ltar sten pa'i bzhor gyur pa//yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra//byang chub smin byed me lta bu//dge ba'i
183a1(rgyud): 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo//shes rab rnam dag na mkha' ste//khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra//'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod//bsod nams
183a2(rgyud): ye shes rab bsags pa'i//las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas//nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul ba go mas//shes rab snying rje'i lam du 'gro//khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu//
183a3(rgyud): dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i chu//kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing //nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal//zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing //ming ni ri bong rA dang
183a4(rgyud): 'dra//rang gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra//u du ma ba ltar khyod dkon yang //bdud rtsi lta bur yongs tshim mdzad//'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags//rang bzhin med pa'i
183a5(rgyud): chos kyang ston//chu dang na mkha'i chub ma ltar//gdul bya'i sing gsum cis kyang 'dul//dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong //dam pa rnams dang yang dag cig/dam pa
183a6(rgyud): rnams kyi lam du 'gro//lha mo ma mo gnod skyon mo//srin mo klu mo sha za mo//bdud mo 'byung mo grul bum mo//drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu ma//rlung mo nag mo 'jigs
183a7(rgyud): byed ma//mkha' gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma//zhe rgyas dbang dang drag pos 'dul//dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston//rnam pa brgyad kyis dbyibs kying 'byung //'gro ba
183b1(rgyud): drug pa'i tshul yang ston//phung po lnga yang brjod par nus//dbang po tshim byud yul lnga'ang ston//rten cing 'brel du'i spyod pa mkhas//yul can rnams ni bsod la mkhas//de brnyan
183b2(rgyud): ngag rnams gsod pa dang //lus can rnams ni gsod la brtson//sems ni gsod pa med la mkhas//'khor ba las ni ring du song //de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te/
183b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang //'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal ldan ma//dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la byams//oM AHhUM shI de bi kA li sa ma ya dzaHTI ka ni D+hA ya sa
183b4(rgyud): mai swA hA/ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa//yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang thob//dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur//yi dgas gnasu mi skye zhing //byol song skye bas
183b5(rgyud): thogs mi 'gyur//lus 'phags gan su skyes pa na//thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing //sgra mi snyan du rlung gis min//de bzhin pa glang spyod du yang //chu dang brlabs kyis khyer
183b6(rgyud): mi nus//'dzam bu'i gling du gang skyes pa//sna tshogs gnod pas nyan mi 'gyur//'dod pa'i lha rnam sa gnasu yang //skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur//bsam gtan
183b7(rgyud): bzhi'i skye gnasu//tshad med bzhini 'phel bar 'gyur//gzugs med gnas ni bzhi por yang //don med na ni mi skye ste//'du shes med par nams kyang min//'phags
184a1(rgyud): pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams//khams gsum tshul gyi bdag don spyod//rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur//sems la 'dzin par mi byed//
184a2(rgyud): nyon mongs rtsu ba drug po dang //de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang //mtshams med lnga yang byung bar 'gyur//bskal pa gra ma med mang por yang //mi khom brgyad du skye me 'byor//
184a3(rgyud): mu stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa dang //mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing //tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan//sdug bsngal bskal pa mang por yang //nams kyang 'khor
184a4(rgyud): bar mi ltung zhing //mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir//nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang //rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par bya//byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni//rab dag
184a5(rgyud): dri medo 'ong byed 'phro//sbyang dka' mngon 'gyur ring du song //mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin//sangs rgyas sa chen bla na med//bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur to///
184a6(rgyud): kun tu 'ong dang bdud rtsi 'od//na mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od//rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od//las kyi 'od dang dpe med sa//dpal ldan sa dang shes rab 'od//thams
184a7(rgyud): cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste//bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang //'di tshe byung na myur du thob//sa rnams ma thob bar du yang //'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang //
184b1(rgyud): shes rang snying N+Do wAn gyur m+b+hi//rnaMs la dga' ba rnams kyis srung //dngos grub thob ste de bzhin gshegs//rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur//dpal ldan byang chub seM dang /
184b2(rgyud): dpal ldan lha mi nag mo yi//ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin gyi//yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad thob ste//sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang //khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur

192a7(rgyud): yi dgas dang /bram ze'i drang srong re re la zos dang /skom yul ma ga d+hi'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyuraro//de ni sngon de bram zer gyur pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' seMd
192b1(rgyud): chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang //de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas bzung ste/des yi dwags dang /bram ze'i drang srong grangasu grangs pa mang ba dang /ches mang dang
192b2(rgyud): ngas zas dang /skom gyis tshim par byas te/de dag thams cad yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten du skyeso//kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung la ngo lon gyis
192b3(rgyud): shig/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lau ki te/so saM b+hA ra saM b+ha ra hUM/kun dga' bo 'di yi dgas kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/lag pa brkyang ste drung du sbyin par/
192b4(rgyud): bya'o//se gol yang brdab par bya'o//de ltar byas na byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i yi dwags gang gA'i klung go bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'du dag bye ma skye dag tshim par byas par 'gyur to/yi dgas//
192b5(rgyud): re re la yang yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyuraro//de dag kyang zos pa tsam gyis yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//kun dag//
192b6(rgyud): bo khyod kyis dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug tu bsnyad par bya'o//de ltar byas na bsod nams kyi phung
192b7(rgyud): ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/tshe yang ring bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyuraro//rtag tu mi ma yin pa rgyu ba
193a1(rgyud): 'byung ba dang /sha za dang /grul bum la sogs pa dang /danod sbyin dang /srin po dang /gdon dang /yo dgas rnams kyis mi mthong byar 'gyur//

193a4(rgyud): na bram ze'i drang srong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i bza' ba dang /btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas par 'gyu ro//bram ze'i drang srong

193b1(rgyud): skom gyi yo byad la/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la 'bul bar bya'o//de ltar byas na/rigs kyi bu'om/rigs kyi bu mo
193b2(rgyud): 'am/dge slong dram/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen ma des/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la lha'i mchod//

193b6(rgyud): ba la skyabs mjed pa'i gzungs/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na/dge 'dun gyi gnas na/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas

194a2(rgyud): b+ha ba/b+hU 'dzings pa sen mo dang mche ri la rnab shin tu 'jig su ru //de na'i de'i du dul dga' bo la 'di skad des smig/

194a7(rgyud): phyag bsngal dang dril te/mtho ros kyi lhar skye bar 'gyuraro//de'i tshe dga' ngas yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba lus mi sdug pa dang /shin tu rid cing skem pa dang //kha nas
194b1(rgyud): me 'bar ba dang /mgron pa mo khab tsam la skya 'dzings pa dang /sen mo dang mcho ba ring zhing rna ba yang mthong la/yid du ma 'ong /mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas/lus sgyi 'u ba nas byed

194b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/lus 'drar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol/zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

195a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/khyod 'jigs par ma byed cig/khyod kyis yi dgas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong

195a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na//
195a4(rgyud): yi dgas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang /bram ze dang drang song la sogs te/mang po'i kha zas dang gtor mchog par 'gyur te/de dag la sogs pa cig
195a5(rgyud): kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur chel gyi ba tshad mas bcal ba'i de bdun bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro//dga' bo nga yang bram zer gyur pa na/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
195a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos pas na/de'i dbang gis yi dgas ched med pa snyed dang /drang srong mang po

195b1(rgyud): khyod kyis zung shog/bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyuraro//dang tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to//na maHsarba ta thA ga ta
195b2(rgyud): oM ba lo ki te/saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgo' bo la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang le la zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dam/bsod nams
195b3(rgyud): tsha zhing 'phel ba dang //sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod na/rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/yang na dus thams cad du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba

195b6(rgyud): rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/yi dgas thams cad skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa mi dge ba'i los bcom zhing /bsod nams yongs su

196a2(rgyud): gshegs pa sku 'jam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis yi dgas mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang tshig

196b1(rgyud): wAr skye bar 'gyur//dga' bo gal te dge slong pa'am/dge slong ma 'bru/dge bstan nam/dun bskyon m+b+ha gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis//bu zas la bsngags te yo shas
196b2(rgyud): la sbyin po byin na/bsod nams tshang med pa snyed yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par med

197a1(rgyud): smon lam 'dong so//gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong ba dang /thos pa'i sgo nas yongasu dag cing /shes pa mi nor bdag tshangs dang

198b3(rgyud): phreM las byin ces bya ba dang lnga brjod pa/spyi zong byed pa cig dang phrad nos/bdag cag gnyis bsams pas dgon pa pas grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te
198b4(rgyud): bslangs pas dkararo gsum dang /mngar gsum dang /'bras dang /nas kyi zan la stsogs pa bza' ba dang btung ba mang du rnyed nas yi dgas mo de'i drung du khyer nas bstabs pas
198b5(rgyud): khwa nas gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga brjod cing gang byin pa mi len par bros te thal na 'di ci las gyur pa dang /'di la sman pa'i thabs ci mchis zhu ru mchis pa lags//bka' stsal pa/rig

198b7(rgyud): pra ba ni gzhan za zhing spyod pa la bdag gis sor sna byas pa las gyur to//yan lag bral sor mos thad kar phug pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa dag la ches kyis khri la byin ces byas

199a3(rgyud): gyur to//kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga stsogs pa ni byed pa rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ste/sngon brjod pa'i bag chags rtags pa las gyur to//de lta bu'i las kyi dbang gis gzhan ci byin
199a4(rgyud): yang phan par mi 'gyur te/chug cibra bu los rang giso sbyin nus pa ma yin tAM/gzhan gyi tshul 'jur 'gegs ma byas pas da lta yang chugatsang ma tsam pas ma reg pa la

199a6(rgyud): gsol ba de'i 'bru don pa shid du gsol/bka' stsal pa/oM ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin te don dam pa'o//dz+wa la 'dod pa mi ltar 'bar ba'o//mi dam ni mi'i rgyud kyis
199a7(rgyud): ser sna dang 'ju ro gegs byas pa'o//sarba ni de lta bu'i las las gyur pa thams cad do//pre ta ni yi dgas kyi snying po te las kyi rgyud smin pa'i don to//b+h+yaHn-i las
199b1(rgyud): dang sdug bsngal byang bar bya ba'i don to//swAhA ni las dang sdug bsngal bkres skom byang bar gyur cig pa'o//da myur du song la de ltar gsos cig ces gsungs pas/de nas gnyis kyis
199b2(rgyud): myur du phyin nas de bzhin du bgyis pas gzod dga' na sa longs spyod cing lus bag glan no//de nas chos ston lnga bab nas gnyis po re mos byas te/shA ri'i bus bshos gsol
199b3(rgyud): nas/gcig gsol du stsal te/chab byin pas yang gong bzhin brjod de bros so//yang gnyis kyis yid mches nas bcom ldan 'das la zhur mchis so//bcom ldan 'das
199b4(rgyud): lags/bdag cag gis gsungs pa bzhin bgyis lags pas/gso ru btub par gda' ba la chos ston yol du dogs nas 'tshal nas yang sngar brjod cing bros nas yang zhu ru
199b5(rgyud): mchiso//bka' stsal pa mi khyod kyi sen par du tsam pa las pas len pa yin gyis lag pa khrus la gzod byin cig/de'i drung du 'gro mi dgos te 'di nyid kyis btub bo zhes gsungs//
199b6(rgyud): de gnyis kyis khrus bgyis te/chu sbyin stsal bas yi dgas mo de nyid du 'ongs nas cung zad na mdangaso dang ldan par gyur te//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
199b7(rgyud): 'di lta bu'i chu sbyin 'di ni 'dir ma zad do dus thams cad du yang ye dam du gyis la thong cig/gzhan la yang rgya cher sbal cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di'i phan yon ni dpag tu
200a1(rgyud): med de ched las 'duso//mdo tsam brjod na 'di lta ste/'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi phyug po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas dbul po 'ga' zhig la sbyin
200a2(rgyud): pa byas na de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye ste/de ci ste zhe na/phyug po rnams ni nga rgyal te dregs pa dang rgyags pas gnas ngan len spro bar byed do//'jig rten gyi
200a3(rgyud): khams kyi dbul po rnams la sbyin pa bya babru yi dgas 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na/de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang me nye'o//de ci ste zhe na/dbul po rnams la ni/'bang du
200a4(rgyud): yod/btsal du yod de/bslang du yod do//yi dgas las kyis de lta bu dag ma yin gyi/ma bsngos na kha ru chud kyang dug chen por 'gyuraro//'jig rten gyi khams kyi
200a5(rgyud): yi dgas la sbyin pa byas pa bas 'jur 'gegs yi dgas cig la chu byin ni de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o//de ci ste zhe nA yi dgas de dag la ni dmigs pas
200a6(rgyud): tshim pa dang /bshoms pas tshim pa dang /bsngos pas tshim pa dang /rig pas tshim pa dang /rjes kyi tshim pa dang /bshal bas tshim pa yod de/las kyi rim pa
200a7(rgyud): bzhin no//'jur 'gegs ni gzhan dka' ba'i las kyis sngags dang /phyag rgya dang /dmigs pa gzhan gyis mi thob/rdzas thams cad la 'thams te bkag pas
200b1(rgyud): na /rgyun rgyu na sa sa/rgyun sa sa rlon pa da s+ho/brgyu rgyun nga / na na/
200b2(rgyud): byed pa dang //'dri gzhan la selan da kri la nas skyi dgas kyi rgyu chud da pa'i mkhyen par rjegs bya 'i tshing rgya'o//don nas sa nas/gas kyi dag sa
201a1(rgyud): mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
201a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
201a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
201a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin par bzhes te/sems
201a5(rgyud): can rnams la chos kyang ston to//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/de dag las kyang
201a6(rgyud): phal tshar dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to//'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongasu brjod pa
201a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ming tsam yang nyan tam klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed de/
201b1(rgyud): me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de dag gi cha yong su zad pa las tshwa mo brgya thug par 'gyur//'jam dpal sems can gang dag tshe dang la
201b2(rgyud): dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang 'phel bar 'gyuraro//sem+bacan gang drag tshe zad kar mtshan 'chang
201b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu
201b4(rgyud): med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/yi ger 'dri 'am/yi ger 'driro 'jug na de dag gi yon tan dang /legs par gyur pa ni 'di dag go/oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/a pa r-i mi
201b5(rgyud): tA A yur+dz+dza na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/oM pu N+yai pu N+ye ma hA pu N+yai a pi ra mi ta puN+ye a bI mi ta puN+ya dz+nyAn saM d+ha ro tsita/oM sar+b+bA saM skA ra pa
201b6(rgyud): ri shud d+ha d+harmA tA gA ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma hA nA ya pa ri wA re swA hA/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig yi ger
201b7(rgyud): 'dri'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/glegs bam la bris te/khyim ni 'chang ngam/klog par gyur pa de'i tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/'di nas shi
202a1(rgyud): 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar
202a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/a pa ri mI tA A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/to thA ga tA ya ar+d+ha tI sa myakr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+yA thA/oM pu N+ye pu N+yai ma tA pu N+yo a pa ri
202a3(rgyud): mi taM pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi ti/oM sar+b+bA so skA ra pA ri shud d+ha d+har+m+me te gra ga na se mu g+he swa b+ha ba di shud+d+hi ma hA na ya pa ri bA re sne hA/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba
202a4(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs de gcig dang /dbyangs gcig gisu tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so//oM ni mo b+he ga wA te/a pi ri mI ta A yur+dz+dza nA su bi ni sh+tso ta
202a5(rgyud): taite dze rA NAM ya ta thA ga ta ya ar+ha te samyAkr-i bud d+ha yau/tad+ya thA/au pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pe ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nye na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/i sar+b+baM saM skAr pa ri shung/
202a6(rgyud): d+ha d+harma tag ga nA sa mud gA te swa b+ha ba bi shud d+h+waM ma tA na ya~M pa ro bA re swA hU~M/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag ngargyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis che
202a7(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungaso//oM na mo b+ha ge ba te/a pe ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyAn su di nish+tsi ti ta dzo rI dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya arba te sa myak+saM bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/oM pu N+ye pu
202b1(rgyud): mahA p+'u N+ye a pa ri mi ta bud+d+he a bAr-I mai tAm+mA N+ya dz+nyAn saM b+hA ro btsi to/oM sar+b+ba swA skur pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma d+h+r-ig ga nas mu gu te swA b+hA bash+yo shud d+ho mahAn ya bA rI ThA ri swAhA/yang de'i tshwa
202b2(rgyud): rgyurgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs paM gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungaso//e na mo b+ha gA ba ti/e.a pa ri mi ti A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta
202b3(rgyud): dzi rA dz+nyA ya ta thA ga tAM yai an+ta taM sa mya kr-i bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa r-i mi ta pu N+ye a pe ri mi ta pu t+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te gr-i ga
202b4(rgyud): nas mr-id ga t+te sa b+hU bA b+hi shud d+he mad+hI na ya bai ri b+hA ro swA/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa ga cig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dngag tu med de'i mdo
202b5(rgyud): 'di gsung sa//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/a pa rI mi ti A yur+d+han su bi ni sh+tsi ta tAM dza~M d+hA dz+nyA ya/ta thA gu d+hA ya Ar+d+ha te samyak+saM bud d+ha yAM/tad+ya thA/oM pud+d+he pu d+hi mahA pu N+ye a bai rim
202b6(rgyud): tapu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu t+ya dz+nyA na sraM b+hA ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+ba si skA raM pa rau shud d+ha d+harmA te ga ga nA sa mud ge te swA b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hI na yaM pA ri bA ro swAhA/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
202b7(rgyud): lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dngag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsung so//oM na mo b+ha ga bi te/a pa ri mi te AM yudz+nyAn su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dz+nyA ya
203a1(rgyud): tathA ga tA ya aHt+no samyak+Sho bud d+hA ya/t+yAd+yAt+tA/oM bud+d+he buN+Dom+bamUr+d+ha pu N+yo a pa ri mi ta bud+d+he A ba ri mi tA puN+ya dz+nyA nA saut+tArabats+yato/oM saHswom+bAr
203a2(rgyud): ri shud d+hA d+hArmA te ga ga nA sa mu gra te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+hi na trA nA~M ya pa ra~M bA ri swAhA/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba drug bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gi cig
203a3(rgyud): gis tshe drang gi tu med pa'i mdo sde bod gsung so//oM naM mo b+haM ga ba te a pA ri mai ta A yudz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dza rA d+hA ya ta thA gau tA ye ar+ha te samyAk+saM bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/
203a4(rgyud): pubuN+ye pu N+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri me ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu t+ya dz+nyA nA so b+hA ro pa tsi taM/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harmA ta kaM ga na saM mud gra te s+yA b+hA ba bau shud d+hi matA nA ya pa rim+bA re
203a5(rgyud): sAhA/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis dgongs pa gcig dang /dbyings gcig gis tshe dpag tu med po'i mdo sde 'dri gsungs so//oM nA mo b+ha ge
203a6(rgyud): to/a pa ri mi tA A yur+dz+dza na su bau ni sh+tsi ta tA dza rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha tAM sa myakl-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye e pa ri me ta pu N+ye a pa ri mI taM pur+g+ha
203a7(rgyud): dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro ba tsaM te/oM sa d+g+has skA rab pi shud d+he d+hAr+m+ma to gra ga nas mud gau te pra b+hA tho ba~M shud d+he ma~M hA ne ya pa riwI ri s+t+wa~Mdz+dza/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi
203b1(rgyud): lngas dgongs pa gcig dang /dbyangs g+hacig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsung sngo//oM na mo b+ha ga bya to/a pa rI mi ta A yur+b+ba nA su bi nish+tsi ti te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA gra ta ya
203b2(rgyud): Ar+d+ha te samyak+saM bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thAM/oM puN+ye pu N+ye matra pu N+yo a pA ri mi ta pu N+ye a pr-i r-i mi ta pu N+ye trA na sAM b+ha ro nga tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saM s+the ra be rI shud d+ha d+har+m+ma to ga ga re se mung ga to swa b+hA/
203b3(rgyud): ba bo shud d+hi mi hA na y+ya pa re wA re swA hA/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye mi snyed kyi dgongs pa gcig dang dbyings gcig gos tshe dpag tu madra pa'i mdzad
203b4(rgyud): 'dri gsungs//aun mo b+ha ga ba taM/a pa rI mi ta A yur+N+Na nA su bi naish+tsi ta te dze rA dz+nyI ya ta thAM gra ta ya ar+ha te samyakr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/au pu N+ye pu N+ye mahA pu N+ye a pA ri mi ta/
203b5(rgyud): pu N+ye a pa ri mi tA pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pi tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra bai ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma to ga ga na sa mud ge te swa b+hU pa bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA rI smai hA/gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo
203b6(rgyud): sde 'dri yI gler 'dra'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug na de tsha zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/tshe yang rnam par 'phrol bar 'gyur//oM na me b+ha ga bA te/a pA ri mi tA A yurdza
203b7(rgyud): na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+yai a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye oM pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saskaM
204a1(rgyud): ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma ta ga gA na sa mung ga ta sa b+hA ba bi shud d+hA ma hA nA ya pa riny+dza ra swAnA/gang zhig tsho dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gar 'dri 'am/yi ga/
204a2(rgyud): 'drir 'jug na de sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du nim yang skye bar mi 'gyur/de nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur te/
204a3(rgyud): gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du ste badran par 'gyuraro//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/u pa ri mr-i ti A yuSh+TAn su rba ni Sh+Thi ta tI dzo rAd+d+hA ye/tithA ga tA ya An+ya tI sam+b+hakle dud d+hA nA~M/
204a4(rgyud): tad+ha thA/oM pu dz+nyo pu N+ye ma hA puN+ye oM pa~M ri mai ta pu N+ye A pA rI mi trA puN+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ra ba tsi taM/oM sar+b+ba saskA raM pa ri shud d+ha d+hir+m+ma tI ga g+ha nu sa mya gau te sri d+hU ba bi shud d+hi ma~Md+hA nAM ya /
