204a6(rgyud): ga wa taM a pra ri mi t+yA A yur+dz+dzan su bi nri sh+tsi ta te dza rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha taM sa myak+saM bud d+hA ya/tad+yA b+hU/oM pu N+yai puN+ye mad+hA puM N+yaM a pa ri mai ta pu N+yaM au pa ri m+bi tA pu N+ye d+h+waM/
204a7(rgyud): na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma ti gaM ga na saM mu da ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya bai re wA raM swA hA/gang zhig tsho dpag tu mod pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ge
204b1(rgyud): 'dri'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug na de chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no//oM na mo b+ha ga bA tAM/a pu ri mai ta A yur+d+ha nA su bi na sh+tsa
204b2(rgyud): ta te dze rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya Ar+ha taM sa myakr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ha thA/oM pu N+yaM pu N+yai ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+yai A pa ri mai ta pu N+ye dz+nyA nA saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma/
204b3(rgyud): te ga ga na se mud gau te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na yaM pa ri wA re swA hA/gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dro 'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug na de'i mtshams med pa lnga
204b4(rgyud): byas pa yang yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro//aM na mo b+ha ga byA tI/a pA ri mi ta A yur+d+ha nA su bi ni sh+tsi tI tai dzo rA dz+nyA ya/ta thA ga tA ya An+ta te samyak+saM bud d+hA yA/tad+ya thA/oM pu N+ye puN+ye/
204b5(rgyud): mauhA puN+ye a pa ri mo taM pu N+ye a pau ri me ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na sr-i b+ha ro po tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pi ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma tog ga ne se mud ga tai swa b+he ba bi shud d+ha ma hI na ya pa rI wA re swA hA/gang zhig tshe
204b6(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ge ra 'dri 'am/yi ger 'dir 'jug na de'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongasu byang bar 'gyu ro//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/a pa ri mi ta A yur+N+Na na su bi ni sh+tsi
204b7(rgyud): ta te dze rA dzA ya/ta thA ge tA ya ar+ha te sa myakr-i bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+ba sa skA ra pa ri shud d+hi/
205a1(rgyud): r+m+ma tog+sa gnas rgyud ga tosab+hadabyu shud d+he man yA ba rgyur swA d+hA/gang nad tshong pag tu med du'o mdus 'ad lcig 'dra'am/yo k+kA dzu
205a2(rgyud): 'jug na/de la bdud dngabadud kyi rigs kyi lha dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin ngos bla sa kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur//oMn mo b+ha ga ba ta a da ri myA
205a3(rgyud): A ur+d+ha na su bi ni sh+tsA ta te dza rA d+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud d+hA ye/tad+ya thA/oM pu N+ye pu N+ye mad+hA pu N+ye a pA ri mI ta pu N+ye a pra rI mr-i ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro paH
205a4(rgyud): te/oM sir+b+ba si skA ra pA raM shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung ga te swa b+hA ba bi shudi d+hi ma tAM na ya pa ri wA ra swA hA/gang zhig che dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ge ra 'dri'am/yi ger
205a5(rgyud): 'drar 'jug na de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mngon sum du chos ston pa mdzad de/sangs rgyas stong gi de la phyag skyong bar 'gyuraro//sangs
205a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/'di la the tsom dang som nyaM dang yad gnyis ma za zhig/oM na mo b+ha go ba tau//a ba ra mo ta A yudz+dza
205a7(rgyud): no su rdo na sh+tsi ti te dzin dz+nyA ya/ta thA ga~M tA ya/an+ta te sa myak+saM bud d+hA la/tad+ya thA/oM pu r+Na pu N+ye meng+ga pu d+ho a pa mi ta puN+ya a pa ri mo ta pu d+ha dz+nyA nas b+hA ra
205b1(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pya rI shud d+h+ya d+hAr+m+ma tI gA ga nA sa mud gA to swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma dA na ya pa rI wA ro swAt+ma/gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'dri yi ger 'dri 'am/yI gIr 'drir
205b2(rgyud): 'jug na rgyal po chen po bzhi de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang /sbed par byed par 'gyu ro//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA r+d+ha/
205b3(rgyud): ya ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samya kr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ya b+h+yAM/oM pu N+ye pu N+yai ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mo ta pu d+h+ye a bai ri mi tA pu N+ya dz+nyA naM saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+be saM sgyer pA r-i shud d+haM d+harmA
205b4(rgyud): ga ga na se mud gA te swa b+ha ba bi shud d+hi mahA naM ya pA ri wA ri swAhA/gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ge ra 'ang+gi'i ma/yi ger 'drir 'jug na/de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
205b5(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro//oM na mo b+ha gA ba te a pA ra mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/
205b6(rgyud): ar+ha tA samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/tAd+yaSh+Ta/oM pu t+yaM pu N+ye mar+tha pu N+ye a bA ri mi taM pu N+ye a pi ri mi tA pu N+ya dz+nyA naM saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te gi ga na sa mud ga te swa
205b7(rgyud): b+hA ba bi shud d+hi ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/sa phyogs gang du mdo sde dkon mchog 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te phyag bya bar yang 'os par 'gyur//byol
206a1(rgyud): song gi skyo gan bu song ba'i bya dang ri dgas gang dgu gi rna lam du grags par gyur bya de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
206a2(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/a pa ri mI tA A yur+d+ha ne su ne sh+tsi ti te dzo rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud d+hA ya/tad+yaSh+Tha
206a3(rgyud): oM puN+ye pu N+ye mahA pu N+ye a pa ri mi tA pu N+yai a pa rI mi taM puN+ya d+h+r-i na saM b+hA ro pa tsi t+te/oM sir+b+ba sa~M skA ra pa~M r-i shud d+he d+har+m+ma te ga gun sA mud ga t+ye swa b+hA b+hA bi shud d+he mad+hA na ya

206a6(rgyud): tsite/oM sir+b+ba saM skAr pa ri shud d+he d+hirma te thA bA ne sa mud pa te swa b+hA bo bo shud d+he ma hA nA ya bi re wA re swAhU~M/gang la la zhog bris chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i byor ker sha pA ni

206b1(rgyud): A pa ri mai ta A yuSh+TA na mu bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/tA thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha te samya kr-i bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM pu d+h+ye pu N+yai mAd+b+ha pu N+yai A pa ri mi ta pu d+h+ye a pa ri myi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na sa b+hA ro pa ts+ya te/

206b3(rgyud): dam pa'i chos mtha' dag mchod par 'gyu ro//oM na mo b+haM ga ba te/aM pi rA me ta A yur+N+Na ne su bi nish+tsi ta twe dzo rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya ar+d+ha te sa myakr-i bud d+ha ya/taMd+ya thA/au

206b5(rgyud): 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang /gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyo bo dang /log par dang sel dang /gsar thub dang /'od srung dang
206b6(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i
206b7(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A~M yudz+nyA na su bi ne sh+tsi ta ti dza rA dzA ya/ta thA ge tA ya/ar+ha te sa mya kr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ye thA/oM
207a1(rgyud): pu N+ye pu N+ye mAh+ma pu N+ya a pa ri mri ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+yadz+nyA na saM b+hu ro pa ts+ya te/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga nA sa mud ga te swA b+hA ba

212a1(rgyud): An+ta tA san+tak+ko b+ha d+hA ya/tud+yan+tu/oM saHswA skur bar shung d+had+har+m+ma t+ta ga gnas mu dka te swab+hA ba bi shud d+ha mar+d+han ya ba ro wAr sAhA/gang zhig cha dang
212a2(rgyud): ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gar 'dri'am/yi gar 'drir 'jug ni/de'i sdig pa'i phung po rang tsam yang yong su 'byung bar 'gyuraro//oM na ma b+ha ga ba te/
212a3(rgyud): A pa ra mi tI A yur+d+ha nA su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dz+nyA yaM/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+d+ha ti samyak+saM bud d+he yaM/tat+tathA/oM sAd+g+ha saskA ra bir shud d+ha d+harmA ti ga gan sa mu da ga tAM s+yA b+h+ya
212a4(rgyud): bI shud d+he na tA ne ya bai raM wa re swA hU~M/gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gor 'dri'am/yi ger 'dir 'jug na/de la bdud dang bdud kyi rigs
212a5(rgyud): kyi lha dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin pos glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/a pa ri mai ta A yu rdzu nA su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/
212a6(rgyud): thA ga tA ya/Ar+d+ha tau sam+bak+saM bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM sar+b+ba se ske ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma taM ga ga na sa mu gai te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya bi ri wa re swA hA/gang zhig cha dang yos
212a7(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug na/de'i tshe ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston par
212b1(rgyud): mdzad do/sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag skyong bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/'di la the tsom dang som nyid ma byed yid gnyis ma
212b2(rgyud): byed tsog/oM na mau b+ha ga ba taM/a pa ri mi to A yur+dz+dza na su bi nish+tsi ta twe dze rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/arti te samyakle bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+hi d+har+m+ma te gra ga na sa
212b3(rgyud): mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re sne hA/gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ge ra 'dri 'am/yi ge ra 'drir 'jug na/rgyal po chen po bzhes de'i

212b5(rgyud): myA kr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/au sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ra wa rai swA hA/gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di
212b6(rgyud): yi grir 'dre 'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug na/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro//oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/a pa/
212b7(rgyud): ri mi ta A yur+d+ha na su bi ni sh+tsi ti te dzo rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa mya kr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma ti go ga na sa mud ga ta swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha ma hA na/
213a1(rgyud): ya pa ri wa re swA hA/sa phyogs gang du mdo sde 'di 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/phyag bya ba'i 'o su 'gyur ro//byol song gi skye gnasu song ba'i//
213a2(rgyud): bya dang /ri dgas gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur ro//oM na mo
213a3(rgyud): b+ha ga wa te/a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+dza na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dza rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa myakle bud d+hA ya/tad+ba thA/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ra shud d+ha d+harma te go ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba/

213a5(rgyud): mi 'gyur ra//oM na mo b+ha ga bai ti/a pa ri mi ta A yur+N+Nan subi nish+tsi ta tai dzo rA dzA ye/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyAkr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+yA thA/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pA ri shud d+ha d+harma/
213a6(rgyud): te ga ga na sa mud ga taM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa raM wa re swA hA/gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kar sha pa Ni gcig sbyin pa byin na//
213a7(rgyud): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi

213b7(rgyud): mung ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/'di lta ste/dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te/sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams
214a1(rgyud): kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyis/tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus//oM na ma~M b+hu ga ba twe a tra rdurma
214a2(rgyud): ta A yur+d+ha na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te sa mya kr-i bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra bi ri shud d+ha d+harma te ge ga na sa mud gra te swA b+hA bi ba shud d+hi mAt+ma nA ya

214a4(rgyud): tshad ni bsring bar mi nuso//oM na mo b+ha ga bA te a pA ri mi ta A yur+N+Na na su bi nish+tsi ta te dz+wa rA dz+nyA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te swa mya kr-i bud d+hA yA/tad+yA thA/oM sar+b+bA sAM skA ra ba
214a5(rgyud): ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga naM sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba ba shud d+he ma hA na ya pa rai wa re swAt+ma/gang zhig cha dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/yi ge ra 'drir

214a7(rgyud): pa byas pa yi no//oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a ba ri mi ta A yur+d+ha na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA yau/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyakr-i bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/oM saR+Wa saM skA ra pa ri shud d+ha

215a1(rgyud): su bi ni sh+tsi ta t+ye dze rA dzA ya/tA thA ga tA ya/ar+ha to sa mya kr-i bud d+ha ya/tad+ya thA/oM sar+b+bA sau skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga to swA b+hA ba

216a1(rgyud): mod kyi yang ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to//de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to//de'i btsun mo

218b3(rgyud): mi thub pa dang /rdo rje rta mgrin dang /rdo rje bgegs mthar byed dang /rdo rje gau tsug tor dang /rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdun cu dang /spyan ma dang /mA ma kI dang /
218b4(rgyud): na bza' dkar mo dang /sgrol ma dang /'od zer can dang /dbyangs can ma dang /phag zhal ma dang /khro gnyer can dang /ri khrod ma dang /dug sol ma dang /nor rgyu nA ma

218b6(rgyud): tu bzhugaso//de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bla ma dang /bkur sti dang /rim gror bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags pa du mas
218b7(rgyud): bstod par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po thugs rje chen po yongasu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
220a1(rgyud): sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing lhas bco brgyad du gyur to//de'i ltas dri mthong nas lang ka'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs shin tu snyoms pa dang ldan
220a2(rgyud): nas rang gi 'khor du ma dang lhan cig der lhags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra sgrogs kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugasu chud nas sku'i gnas thams cad nas 'od zer bye ba phrag
220a3(rgyud): du ma byungango //'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang gsal bar gyur te/de'i tshe sgra sgrogs snyems pa dang bcas pas de'i
220a4(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du yams nad la sogs pas rnam par 'tshe ba de thugs kyis yongasu dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
220a5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdong bcu gcig pa drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la spyi bos
220a6(rgyud): phyog 'tshal te/g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i tshogs rnams kyis nang nas lha'i bu rin po che pad+ma'i dra bra
220a7(rgyud): rgyan pa zhes bya ba bzhengs te/thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras//kye ma
220b1(rgyud): mgon pa rdzogs rje can//rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dang bcus//che ba'i byin brlabs ldan pa rnams//sgra sgrogs snyoms pa gzhom pa dang //nyon mongs rtsad nas gdon pa du//
220b2(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan pa dang //bdag la shin tu sbyin pa'i phyi //sku dang rje su 'thun pa yi//rig sngags sbyor ba khyed par can//snying po dam pa bshad du gsol//
220b3(rgyud): 'khor tshugs thams cad kyis//mnga' phyugs mi tig d+hAr gyis gang /btsam ldan du ba rjid ston//rin chen matog ga ga sa gyur// rnam sa seM dang sa
220b4(rgyud): ye//yon chub bdug sus dr-i dang ba shog//rje 'byor dad pa'i stobs kyis phul//thub pas nimakha'i mdzod du rlangs//wA la bram dri ma y-is//rima~M ma'i si la snyan 'angano
220b5(rgyud): dang //b+hU rgyal mtshan lta ba lbub dang //lha ljin bzla'i'adrims mchod//de nas mgon po spyan dus gzigs pad+ma gzhan nu ljin la mnga'abs/bzhengs 'dzum thal mAM sbyar na
220b6(rgyud): ni//ston pa la ni 'di skad gsil//sgra sgrogs bzhin gyis snyems pa dang //mda' dang rtsol gyis drags pa ste//'di ni legs brtsams las byung yin//shin tu log
220b7(rgyud): ngas las kyang min//sngon du sangs rgyas gdong mdzes kyis//bstan pa la yang mgo btang ba'i//bsod nams grangs kyis byung ba yin//'ag pa du mar 'khrul pa ni//zas
221a1(rgyud): maman[]thamasas na mams ma tham/a namamathas natham/sa mthama.amam tham mtsham la kham ma mtham mam yal ya ma mkhan ya/mal ma ma
221a2(rgyud): dang snod spyad gos nor rgyan//bskal pa bzhi bcu'i mchod sbyin te//de nas brtsal dang shugs kyang yin//mnga' ni b+h+ring gi rI ti yi//byin rlabs sngon du
221a3(rgyud): byed mod kyang //grangs mang tshul khrims bral bas ni//srin po'i rigasu 'khrungs pa dang //'khor bcas gzhan la gnod 'gyur yin//ngas ni ngang tshul rmad byung ba'i//
221a4(rgyud): lus kyi bde gshegs sbyin pa dang //sgrub brjod legs byas mtha' yas pa//spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs//gang ga rlung gi rdul dang mtshungs//de skad 'bras
221a5(rgyud): bu de brtsams te//dang po'i las cani ji snyed la///phan gdogs bzhi ni bya ba'i phyir//cung zad bsdus nas brjod bya ste//legs par nyon la yid la zung //sngon tshe 'das
221a6(rgyud): dus bskul pa ni//gang ge klung bcu'i snga rol gyi//tshar 'das pa yi snga rol no//bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan//man dA ri'i dri zhes bya ba//'jig rten ston pa
221a7(rgyud): byung ba'i tshe//bdag ni khyim bdag drag por gyur//thub pa de la rig sngags mnos//thob ma thag tu bskal ba'i grangs//bzhi khri snyed kyi 'khor ba bsnyil//de rjes bskal pa
221a8(rgyud): gang ga klung //bye ba snyed cig snga rol na//bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan//thogs med pad+ma brgya yi spyan//gtsug tor yon tan rab rgyas pa'i//'od zer
221b1(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba//'jig rten ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe//bdag nyid drang srong bdag por gyur//rig sngags 'di mnos sgrub pa yis//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing //
221b2(rgyud): sgyu med chos la bzod pa thob//de rjes 'das dus bskal pa ni//bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rol na//bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan//tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du/
221b3(rgyud): ston pa byung ba bdag gis mnos//de tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis//bdag la dbang bskur lung bstan mdzad//khyod kyi sngon du bskal pa'i grangs//brjod mi lang nas reg
221b4(rgyud): sngags phyir//yang dag stong phrag stong stod kyang //dang ba'i mchod sbyin chen po byas//bye ba phrag grangs bcu gcig tu//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs//de dang de
221b5(rgyud): yi rnam smin mchog/sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam du//yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur//phyis ni 'dren pa shAkya zhes//mi mdzod 'jig rten khams 'khrungs tshe//mi yul
221b6(rgyud): las kyang khyad par du//yi dwags gling du skyes pa 'ga'//gtan la 'dud 'phel bya ba'i phyir//mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum du//skad cig glog 'gyu ji lta bar//rig
221b7(rgyud): sngags 'tshong ba gdong bcu gcig/yan log stong dang ldan pa la//spyan ni tshig stong sum cu pa'i//mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku 'byung 'gyur//de tshe bskal ldan la la zhig/
222a1(rgyud): mtshan nas brjod cing sku la mos//rig sngags zlos pa po gang zhig/'jig rten 'dod pa kun grub cing //phyi nas ye shes nyis 'gyuraro//'brur
222a2(rgyud): bstan de skad thob pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig/grangs snyed zhal nas gsungs pa yi//rig sngags snying po gdong bcu gcig/mthu chen thogs pa med pa
222a3(rgyud): ste//'gro la sman cing bde ba dang //nad kun sel byed sdig kun skyong //bkra shes med pa kun bzlog cing //rmi lam mtshon ma ngan kun sel//dus min 'chi dang ngan sems
222a4(rgyud): bzlog/rtag tu dpal dang sems bde thob//mya ngan sdug bsngal ngal bsel//rtsed 'khrug thams cad zhi ba dang //bdud dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur//'jig
222a5(rgyud): rten smyon pa kun 'grub cing //bdud dang bar chad mtshon che nad//dbyig pa dang ni bcing ba dang //brtson rar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal//gsod sngar khri dang yan
222a6(rgyud): lag bcad //mig 'bru mtshon gyis btsam pa dang //chu dang me dang rlungs g.yos//dug dang byang stems ro langs dang //chom rkun mi ma yin rnams gnon//rig sngags
222a7(rgyud): 'di yis bsrungs pa dang //len dang 'dzin dang bri ba dang //klog dang kha ton bshad sogs rnams//brtson la 'jig rten lha btsas dang //bdud dang tshangs pa dge sbyong dang /
222b1(rgyud): bram ze bcas pas gnod pa nid//sngon gyi las drag yod pa yang //byang zhing bsrabs te med par 'gyur//nges pa'i dngos po 'di lags pas//rig nas mngon sum yod chas
222b2(rgyud): b+hair//rnam par rtog meng sems kyi byung //de skad skyabs dang skyob po dang //srung dang dbugs 'byin dpal mgon dang //gling dang khang khyim 'di nyid yin//rangs phyogs
222b3(rgyud): srid par//mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang //'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba med//gang gi sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal mchod//skyabasu 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags//mngon
222b4(rgyud): par dga' zhing gzungs sngags 'dis//nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pa la//phyogs bcu sangs rgyas ma lus po//mtshungs par yi rangs legs pa sbyin//rtsa ba bzhi dang mtsham
222b5(rgyud): med lnga//ma lus sdig kun byang bar 'gyur//gnod sbyin srin po sogs snang yang //bzung nas byams pa'i snying rje'i sems//dang po bskyed nas blo med kyi//byang chub sems
222b6(rgyud): mchogs la 'gyod//gang gi klung brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi//mtshan nas brjod cing bstod pa bas//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang //bdago gi mying brjod dran byed cing //rig
222b7(rgyud): sngags rgyun tu brjod na de//myur du mchog dga'i sa 'thob cing //lag pa'i mthil nas mthong ba ltar//bla med byang chub myur du 'byung //rtse gcig dran pas gos byas te//rtag tu
223a1(rgyud): nang par sngar langs nas//chos bzhin du ni dge dgyes to//brgya rtsa brgyang du gang brjod pa//tshe 'dir phan yon bcu thob 'gyur//rtag par lus
223a2(rgyud): la nad med dang //lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyi srung //nor 'bru rin chen gos rnyed dang //dgra sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang //bza' rnams bkur cing rigs btsun 'thob//
223a3(rgyud): dug dang 'dre gshen gdon bral dang //lus la dri zhim kun dga' dang //bsam ngan mi snyan brjod byed dang //rims nang bral zhing dgang sla dang //dus min 'chi ba sangs
223a4(rgyud): par 'gyur//gzhan yang yon tan bzhi thob ste//'chi kar sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang //mkha' la 'od 'byung lhas mchod dang //nam yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing //
223a5(rgyud): bde ba tsan nam bdu 'gror skye//rig sngags 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi//ye shes snying po 'dzin pa la//byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi//rnam par thar pa'i chos sgo 'thob
223a6(rgyud): bskul pa du mar dge bsags dang //rig sngags 'di snyed 'gyur ba ste//dad ldan khrel yod ngo tsha shos//blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che//mdog dkar dang bzang
223a7(rgyud): gsong por smra//sems 'jam lus ngag dal bar spyod//bla ma la gus brtul zhugs che//sred pa chung zhing sbyin la dga'//sangs rgyas gus shing sems bcas pa//
223b1(rgyud): nyin mtshan rgyun tu rig sngags 'don//bcu bzhi'am ni bco lnga dang //khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la//gso sbyong sku yi mdun du blung //skyon med can dan dkar sogs shing //rig
223b2(rgyud): bzang las byas sku gzugs sam//yang na sa rdo rin chen sogs//bzang las bde bar gshegs gzugs bya//yang na ris su bris kyang rung //sku gcig po 'am lha tshogs
223b3(rgyud): kyi/dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la//mngon sum bzhin du dmigs byas na//myur du mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur//yon tan kun gyis rgyan pa yi//bum po chu dang
223b4(rgyud): bcas pa la//sngags brjod pas ni 'dod don kun//'grub 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o//nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman rnams la//sngags 'das bza' 'am byugs pas sam//bdugs
223b5(rgyud): pa tsam yang gnod pa sel//srad bu 'am ni gos dag dang //phyag rgyas gdab kyang de bzhin no//'dod pa gang dang gang la yang //me yi las kyi sbyor bar bya//gsang sngags
223b6(rgyud): 'dun 'dzin yid byed la//bdag kyang rjesu 'jug par bya//de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs kyis//sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la ni//che de du brjod
223b7(rgyud): pa 'di brjod do//e ma rang bzhin med pa'i chos//sna tshogs gzugasu snang ba la//brjod rtog bral ba'i skad cig ni//zhi ba'i che ba nyid yin no//sred pa dngos po med pa le//
224a1(rgyud): dmigs par byed pa sgom pa'o//dmigs pa mthar thug mod mthong ba//don sgom pa'i 'dra su du'o//kun tu bzang po'i gsang sngags kyi//don la
224a2(rgyud): ched du 'di ltar brjod//e ma sku gsum tha dad par//lus ngag yid kyi don las byung //don gcig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis//sku gcig tu ni nges par gzus//gang la
224a3(rgyud): gang phyin bskyed pa la//'ja' tshon pozhin du snang mod kyang //tshig gis brjod pa'i sprul tsam ste//ye shes sku la dbye ba med//sgrib pa rnam sel las la ni//ched du brjod
224a4(rgyud): pa'adi ltar brjid//e ma dngos par de bo nyid//ma byung ma skyes ma 'gags pa//skye 'gag lta bu'i tshe 'phrul na//sku des phyag rgya sngags snang //yon tan rgyu mi rlu
224a5(rgyud): bzhin du//skye ba'i ngo la gsal bar byed//nan tan gyis ni de nyid kyang //rgyu ba med par khong du chud//byang chub sems dpa' sa stong gis//rgyu la ched du 'di brjod do//
224a6(rgyud): e ma rang bzhi no rnam dag la//thog mod blo yi mun pa'i dbyings//rnam ts+tshe/bag chags kyis bkrugs nas//blo bur dkar gnag lasu snang //dkar po sa sa rgyas
224a7(rgyud): chos dge 'dun//de la sgro btags byang chub sems//de las byung ba'i phrin las kyis//nyon mongs las kyi sbyin spyo byed//mgon po byams pas sngags skabs kyi/
224b1(rgyud): lomal chod du 'ad ltar brjod//oM ma gdod nas sgrol zhi sems//chu ltar dang dar snang maud kyang //sna tshugs 'gro ba 'o gzus byung ngas//mun pa thibs blos rnam par d+hAd+hAr+ya/
224b2(rgyud): de nyid sems kyi snang pa'i phyir//'ad rtsom med pa'i sems kyis grol//rtsol ba sems kyi mas ni//dri ma med de'i sems 'ching 'gyur//namakha'i snying po sa sngags mang la/
224b3(rgyud): ched du 'dri ltar brjid pa mdzad//oM ma stong bye mtshan mthul//khwa dag du bras bral chos nyid da//dger ba'i sems chen gas pa byed pa//shes ra chen po y+YA ga min/
224b4(rgyud): man ni de ma shes byed can skye//gang shid don du ni sna // 'i hU~M thugs kyis//b+h+ya 'gyur mig mye na//byang chub sems pa'i sa na//
224b5(rgyud): lA ched du 'di ltar brjod//e ma rgyu rkyen namakhara' la//tiT+Ta skur rgyun 'khor ba yis//gsal nas nyin mtshon bye phrag brjod//nyon mongs ma rig sred len gyis//'du byed
224b6(rgyud): srid pa'i las bskul te//rnam sa mo gzugs skyemarag tshor skye rga shi sdug bsngal//gsal byed dag pa nyid kyis dang/phyag na rdo rjes 'bras don la//cho
224b7(rgyud): brjod pa 'di brjod do//e me zab cing rgya cheg//sngags mthu chen medang ni//sangs rgya stsogs kyis ma nos//shes pa nyid kyang rjes med la//shes byan mug
225a1(rgyud): yod//shes pa yul gyi rnam par ni//rtog pa'i bzungs 'dzin gyis bsgos pa//de zad nas nu grol bar 'gyur//de nas rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs//
225a2(rgyud): spos dang me tog 'thor byed cing //snyan pa'i sngags kyis glu yis ni//mgon pa spyan ram gzigs la bstod//oM bcom ldan mgon pa thugs rje spyan ras gzigs//zhwa
225a3(rgyud): grangs mdog dbyibs du ma cir yang snang //stong dang brgya dang bcu gcig drug dang gcig/byams pa'i zhal bzangs mnga' ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo//spyan mI'o//oM/
225a4(rgyud): rab dgyes zhal mdog du ma cir yang 'gyur//la la byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i zhal//la la 'dod rmongs ser sna chen po'i zhal//khro sdang gtum chags lte ldan phyag
225a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo//mA ma kI'o//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang skur rtogs pa'i zhal//bstan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag/mdzad pa grangs med chub pa'i phyag
225a6(rgyud): rgyar ldan//gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'chilo//na bza' da// mo'i'o//oM/mdzad pa thugs d+h+rU'i dbyibs la thugs med kyang //rnam pa rgya ma
225a7(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad mdzad pas//zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam por sbyong ba yi//mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//sgrol ma'i'o//oM/nyi ma'i gzi ldan 'od zer
225b1(rgyud): 'gyod pa ltar//'jug dgongs ma mnga' kun rtog mun bral yang //bskal pa rgya mtshor khyad par don gsal ba'i//mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//'od zer can ma'i'o//
225b2(rgyud): oM sems kyi rgyud 'geb mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe//'dod chags byung ma thag tu yal ba ste//nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad nas pha mtha' med//mgon pa skyon ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//
225b3(rgyud): dbyangs cano//oM/nyon mongs bdag tu gzung na 'khor bar skyo//de la yang yang rtags na ngan 'gror skye//rang bzhin med par shes nas grol bar 'gyur//mgon po spyan ras
225b4(rgyud): gzigs la phyag 'tshal//phag gdong ma'i'o//oM/chos rnams dag par mthong na mthe ris 'thob//gnyis 'dzin rtog pa chad na mya ngan 'das//sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan na gzhan
225b5(rgyud): don 'byung //mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//khro gnyer spyan ma'i'o//oM/rang tshul spyod la chags pas sa bon rul//gzhan tshul dman par brjod pas zhing
225b6(rgyud): sa tshig/lus ngan gtsang sbra tsam las byang chub ring //mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//sa 'dzin ma'i'o//oM/bdag lta mun pa'i dug gis brgyal ba la//bdag
225b7(rgyud): med phyogs bral ste shes bdud rtsi'i sman//pha rol phyin bcu spyod dang rtog rtsol mdzad//mgon po spyan ras gzigs pa phyag 'tshalo//dug sel ma'i'o//oM dang tshul ba
226a1(rgyud): spyod nga rtul zhen pa med//gzhan spyod btang snyoms byas nas rang sems sbyong //slod med bzod ldan dang gis rgol ba lags//mgron pa spyan ras gzigs
226a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo//ri khrod ma'i'o//oM//khrel yod doshos shing gtong lo dga'//dad dang thos ldan tshul khrims shes rab bzang //chog shes 'dod chung 'ong dang gzhan du
226a3(rgyud): phyug//mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//nor rgyun ma'i'o//oM/yi ge 'dra 'chod sbyin nyen klog dang 'chung //kha ton 'dzin sems sgom brtson de la tshu'o//khrus
226a4(rgyud): sogs bsrung gnas dkar gtsang yon tan stsol//mgon pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//dkar mo'i'o//oM/rang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spyod/'jig/
226a5(rgyud): rten 'jig rten 'das mchod dam pa 'dzin//thos bsam sgom brtson de ni dgra las rgyal//mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo//rnam par rgyal ma'i glu'o//oM
226a6(rgyud): tha dad kyi 'tshong dbyer med gro lnga ba yi//thubs dang shes rab bde chen byang chub lam//rnam thar ye shes mtha' yas dpal ster ba//mgon po skyon ras gzigs la
226a7(rgyud): phyag 'tsha lo//dpal phreng me'i glu'o//oM/ngasam pa bzang po gser gyi sa gzhi la//byang chub phyogs chos dpag bsam shing chen 'khrungs//ye shes thugs rje
226b1(rgyud): rgyun rgya rnyan mdzad pa'o//mngon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'argyalo//yod bzang ma'i glu'o//sgra sgrogs 'khor bcas 'drar gyur te//rlung gis btab da'i rta dang mtshungs//
226b2(rgyud): thal mo spyi bor sbyar nasu//tshad du brjod pa 'di gsol to//oM/mgon po rang byung bcom ldan 'das//gtso bo rab tu che ba'i lta//bsod nams du mas skyed pa'i sku//ye shes/
226b3(rgyud): mtha' yas thugs mnga' ba//blo ldan srid mthar mdzad pa'o//tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad//gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che//mdzad spyod mo pa' mnyam spyad phyag
226b4(rgyud): 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan thub pa chos//'khor la legaso leg so zhes//oM/Ad+hohrIHhUM swA tA bcas//yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs//lcags kyu can gyi/
226b5(rgyud): har nas//klu phyugs 'dzum phrag 'dren pasgyur//dge sbyong kun slong dkar pos ni//byang chub na cheni gling 'jog mdzad//'phags pa spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyu
226b6(rgyud): rgyal po pad+ma dra dro zhes bya ba las gleng gi zhe'i le'u skye dang pa //de nas bcom ldan thub pa che//mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas//sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya
226b7(rgyud): ting nga 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//yan lag cha shes thams cad las//'od zer sdulnga bya ba phrag/drug cu drug cu'i mthar gzhal ba//grangs med dge ni bkye bar mdzad//
227a1(rgyud): zhing khams grangs mong bdun gyis mtha'//phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad du//'od kyi gang nas 'od de las//snyan pa'i tshogs bcad 'ad sna //
227a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang ni chos la smras pa spangs//le lo tsha dang spyod pa mchog 'dzin spangs//'gyod dang chos la ma nges 'byed pa spang //nga rgyal che dang 'dod chags spyod pa spangs//
227a3(rgyud): 'bro rnams med na byang chub lam med de//'gro la brten nas byang chub che thob 'gyur//byang chub che lam thugs rje chen po ste//'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar 'gyur//de skad
227a4(rgyud): grags pa de ma thag/phyogs bcu'i zhing bzhugs sangs rgyas sras//brjod kyi mi long gtso bo mchog/spyan ras gzigs dbang grangs med gtso//thams cad 'khor
227a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams//mi mdzad zhing 'dir lhags par 'gyur//'di nas shar phyogs zhing khams ni//grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid nas//zhing khams seng ge spungs
227a6(rgyud): par ne//sangs rgyas seng ge rol pa yi//drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso//spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra//mdog dkar shal gyi ri 'dra ba//byang chub sems
227a7(rgyud): mchog bye ba phrag/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs//glog 'gyur bzhin du zhing 'dir byon//bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la//phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas//
227b1(rgyud): 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi//dal gyi me tog rnam+b+has g+hA taur//bdo bar gsheg so rdzogs sangs rgyas//'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang //rmad 'byung chen po tshig bcad kyis//zhang
227b2(rgyud): rnams rnam par gsos par 'gyur//'phro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcom//shes rab mtha' yas gsal bar mdzad//bdag kyang snying po 'ang yis mthus//phrin las 'di nyid
227b3(rgyud): grogs bgyid do//oM hrIHsiM ha nA da hUM phaT/snying po de skad phul nas kyang //thub pa'i ga la de logasu//'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni//dbus btsugs thal mo
227b4(rgyud): sbyar nas bzhugs//lha yi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi//zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na//sangs rgyas rin chen dpa' bzhugs pa'i//
227b5(rgyud): drodrung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso//spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi//nor bur 'khor los bsgyur ba che//gser gyi ri bo mdog 'dra ba//byang chub sems tshogs
227b6(rgyud): byi ba phrag/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs//glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon//bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la//phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas//'dab ma stong dang
227b7(rgyud): ldan pa yi//rin chen gser gyi me tog ni//rgya che du ma 'thob par byed//bde bar gshegaso rdzogs sangs rgyas//'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang //rmad 'byung che ba'i tshogs bshad
228a1(rgyud): kyis//zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur//'gro ba'i ser sna 'ching ba bcad//sbyin pa'i 'byung gnas gter chen rdol//bdag kyang snying po 'ang ya
228a2(rgyud): mthus//phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do//oM pad+ma d+hA ra d+ha ke hUM phaT/snying po de skad dul nas kyang //thub bo'i ga lA de logasu//'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni//bus
228a3(rgyud): btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs//nub kyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi//zhing khams pad+mo brtsegs pa na//sangs rgyas pad+mo'i 'byung
228a4(rgyud): gnas bzhugs//drung du bya chub sems dpa'i gtso//spyan sa gaN+DIgs dbang thugs can//pad+mA nir+d+ha shwa ra gtso//pad+ma ra~M ga'i ri 'dra ba//byang chub sems tshogs kyi

228a7(rgyud): bcas kyis//zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur//'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'dab rjeb bskams//tshul khrims byugs spos cher du phag//bdag kyang snying po de yi

228b2(rgyud): pus btsugs thal me sbyar nas bzhugs//byang gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi//zhing khams rdo rje dkod pa na//sangs rgyas rdo rje rtogs med

228b7(rgyud): 'di nyid grogs bgyid do//oM rat+na a grA a~M pra ti ha ta hUM phaT/snying po de skad phul nas kyang //thub po'i ge le de logasu//'khor bcas dga' bo'i tshul gyis ni//pus bcu
229a1(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs//byang shar phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi//zhing khams gtor tshon brtsegs pa na//
229a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas don yod 'byung gnas bzhugs//drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso//mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni//rje btsun don yod zhags pa can//shel gyi//

230b1(rgyud): semus mchog bye ba phrag/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs//glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon//bcom ldan mgron po thub pa la//phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas//'dab

231a3(rgyud): g.yogs sel//dag pa'i smon lam 'khor lo bskor//bdag kyang snying po 'di yis mthus//phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do//oM b+h+rUM d+hIHha hUM swAt+ma/snying po de

231b1(rgyud): me tog ni//rgya che du mar 'thor bar mdzad//bde bar gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas//'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang //rmad 'byung chen po'i tshig bcad kyis//zhing rnams rnam par

231b3(rgyud): snying po 'di skad phul nas kyang //thub pa'i ga le de log su//'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni//pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs//spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs

231b5(rgyud): rnams ni spyi bor bzhag/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi legaso byin//na mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang //de'i tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi//khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams//sa
231b6(rgyud): stengs thams cad gar gyis bkang //g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zla gam dang //zlum po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gros//mchod dang phyed mchongs dril po dang //rdebs dang btsir
231b7(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis//bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad//leg pa thal sbyar che btsu mas bgyid//sor mo cig snol gcig 'khyud dang //kun snol kun 'khyud kun gdengs
232a1(rgyud): dang //rgyubasnom ras 'khyud kun 'khyung dang //myos ris khyud sbyong kun skyong dang //mnyam gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgyu//sa gnon sgyung sbyin mchog
232a2(rgyud): sbyin sogs//phyag tu dum bgegs rtsa la mdzad//gzhon yang 'jig rten skyeng ba'i tshogs//mi lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams//gdong bcu gcig bzhis bya ba//sngan
232a3(rgyud): mod pa'i rig sngags rmad//ngo mtshar byung zhes thos ma thag/lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas//rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te//phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni//spyan
232a4(rgyud): sngar 'dug te 'di skad gsol//gang zhig gdong bcu gcig pa yi//rig sngags len cing 'dzin pa dang //rgyun tu 'don dang yid la byed//'jig rten mgron po spyan ras gzigs/

232a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bshes//rigs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yang //byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te//bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs//skyes bu khyi mchog
232a7(rgyud): /chen po ste//bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing //de yi tshul khrims ral ba med//mau de skye ba don yod de//lha gnas dga' gnas spu gseb tu//ye shes
232b1(rgyud): 'od zer bdud rtsi 'jud//'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang //gdon rigs ji snyed yod pa'am//rig sngags byang stems ma lus pa//de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro//cho ga bzhin du
232b2(rgyud): spyad pa yis//tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang //shi ba sems rgyal med par ni//gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang //rgyal ba rnamastsal
232b3(rgyud): chos nyan cing //rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig tu//stobs dang mi 'jigs kun brnyes te//mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas//skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du//'gro ba ma
232b4(rgyud): lus dag byed cing //zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma pra ba zhes bya ba las lha byu bI le'u ste gnyis pa'o///
232b5(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin//bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la//phyag 'tshal phyogasu 'khod nas ni//gsang ba gtod nas tshig 'od gsol//phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po//
232b6(rgyud): mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun//rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon//'gro ba thugs brtse chen po yis//snying po byin rlabs ldan la gsol//rmad du 'byung ba'i snying
232b7(rgyud): po la//phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang //rig pa 'dzin rnams 'thun par dgyes//'on kyang 'gro mangs gzung ba dang //dngos grub thams cad myur ba dang //snying po mthu dang

233a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i phyir//mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyis//byin rlabs ldan du rtsa ba'i sngags//'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol//rig sngags nyi ma zla ba
233a3(rgyud): 'odod//rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed//'gro ba thugs brtse mdzad pa dang //bdag la phan pa'i don smad du//rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral bas//rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags
233a4(rgyud): bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches//sdig kun myur sgrol bya ba yi//ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las//spyan ras
233a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra//rtsu ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungaso//na mo rat+no tA ya ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki shI rA ya/bo d+hi sa~MtwA ya/mahA satwA yaM/ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/
233a6(rgyud): tad+ya thA/oM a ka Te bi ka Te/ni ka Te/TI ka Ta/ka TaM ka Te/ka ro Te/b+hir+ya swAhA//yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun//rig sngags 'dis ni nges par bskyed/
233a7(rgyud): khyad par du ni mdze nad la//rtsa las byung ba'i me bzhin no//rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi bzhi//sbyor phyin maN+Dal lho pa brgyad//ba ser skya yi bdud rtsis byug/yan lag
233a8(rgyud): bcu gnyis mgor bcas pa'i//sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas//lhag ma yan lag thig lor bya//cung zad lce la myang bas ni//dus dus sum brgya drug
233b1(rgyud): 'i chod//nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni//lho gtsug dus su rtogs ldan 'gyur//do nas bcom ldan thub pa chos//nga la snod 'tsho ba bzlog pa yi//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs
233b2(rgyud): nas//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi//rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsung so//na mA rat+na trA~M mA ya/na me Ar+ya a ba lo kI te shwa rA ya/bod+d+hi s+yAd+d+ha
233b3(rgyud): ya/many+dzu sad+d+ha ya/s+yAt+mAk+ShA na Ni krA ya//oM \u0f7fkrA rba ti bad+hA tsin d+ha ma Ni t+pa la man+ta badz+rI ru ru tiSh+Thadz+wA la A kar yad+d+hi/d+h+r-i s+yAt+ma/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/
233b4(rgyud): bur gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir//bdun phrag sngags grangs dang mnyam pa'i//nyungs kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad//rang gi lus sam yan lag la//mchod dang bcas pas gdags
233b5(rgyud): par bya//de la yang yang gsol ba gdab//de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches//khams gsum dbang du bya ba yi//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/
233b6(rgyud): mgon po pad+ma gar dbang gi/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya a bi l-i ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/mut+ma kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+yad+hA/
233b7(rgyud): sarba satwA bA sa nA gA d+hi ni/na maHsarba sad+d+hi bi sa na/A~M ta ra Ni/na maHsarba satwA ba yo d+ha ra NA ya/na maHsta~M b+ha pra ma nA ya/na maHsarba sa~MtwA bo d+hitsit+taM kaM sa na ka~M rA ya/na
234a1(rgyud): sarba sat+kA ban+d+ha nats+tshad na ka R+Sha ya/na maHsarba satwA duHkha ba mok+Sha Nu kA rA ya/nA maHsarba An+ta kAR+Sha bi d+hA nA ma ka ra/na maHsarba bod+ha d+ha ra rA dza drA
234a2(rgyud): sha pra ta ye mahA yo ga yo gI shwa rA yaM/ha saM ha s+ya nA ya/na mas+thi d+hA i daM Ar+ya a ba le ki twe shwa ra mu khod gIr+N+Nashi bi bai ra dA r-i n+yA da/yak+Sha/rak+Sha sa/shAg+h+ra~M
234a3(rgyud): po ka pA la ya/br-iny+tsA ma he sh+tsa raM/nA ra ya Na skan+do da ku b+he ra/a suM r-in+d+ha/mA tr-i g+naH/namaskr-itiHdz+nyA khaiNaMs hri da ya/ta yaM gr-I bA na ma yi/ma hI da ya/nAwau
234a4(rgyud): a pa b+h+ra me yo ta s+thA daM ka a ba haM/sarba bi nA ya kaM a ma g+hA/sarba kar+m+ma b+hai Shiny+tsA/bi nA ya kan/tad+ya thA/oM ti ru l+yA/ta nu ta la/bi tA ru la/sar+b+ba biSha kA ka/sarbi dzung
234a5(rgyud): d+ha bi da naM/pra dz+nyA taM pa ta/a na la bis+phu li ka/aT+TA hA sa ki shwa rA ya/a to ba pra bi ta ya/badz+re khur nir+b+ba ti ta/tsa li ta pra bu da ta la/badz+rod shAn+ti ta ti/sI ta ma du tog
234a6(rgyud): taprA na maN be kA ra ba ra dun+taM bid+yA ka ma ga sa b+ha ka na ka ra/sarba b+hu ba twA he sha kA rI/pa ra ma shIn ka ra/bud d+ha bo d+hA ye mA tau/b+ha ga bA hA ya gr-I ba~M sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya/m+b+ha bar+t+ti/

239a7(rgyud): ma gyur na//bdag gis mtshams med las byas te//dus gsum sangs rgyas kun bsrungs yin//snying rjes snying rje can 'grub 'gyur//sdang bas khros pa 'grub
239a8(rgyud): 'gyur te//rtag pa'i gnas 'dod blo gros can//rnam par mi rtog btang snyoms kyis//'dod pa kun 'grub zhen pas byin//yid la byed pas 'ching bar 'gyur//
239b1(rgyud): se'u po che'i lcug ma la//ro bsregs thal bu khri phrag bdun//bsngags nas gtor bas char chos pa//char pa myur du 'chad par byed//dri chu gla rtsor bcas pas ni//

243a1(rgyud): /yo ga shwar hu du du du/bIr+yan+te ma hA bIr+yad+ha/d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+ha ra Ne shwa ra/dz+wa la dz+wa la/bi ma lA ma la mur+N+Ne/Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra/kr-iSh+NA dzi na mu ku Ta la skr-i ta

243b6(rgyud): byas nas//nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod//khong du 'thungs pas dbyig dug dang //sbyar dug len cig skes dug dang //bza' nyes tsam yang sel 'gyur//

244b1(rgyud): bla ma'i lung dang bral bas ni//nam kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur//spyi bor yi go oM dat+ta //nan tan du nr-i bas par bya//dpral bar yi ge a ljang gu//de bzhin du ni bsam

244b4(rgyud): pArA yi ge hraM bkod bya//yi ge'i tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas//gang dang gang yong rung ba yi//rtsol ba rnams la 'jug par bya//rtsol ba de dang de dag kyang //sngags

244b6(rgyud): kyi zhing khams du ma sbyang nas kyang //'gro ba rnams kyis lus ni//'gro bo grol ba'i spyod pa ni//kun bzang mchog dang mtshungs pa ste//'gro dang dbyer med don pas

245a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes//lhag dang bcas pa'i rtsom pa ni//shin tu ngal bya nyid yin te//ngal ba nyid kyis grol ba'i lam//bgrod du
245a2(rgyud): bka' ba de spangs nas//shin tu bag yangs bde ba'i lam//skal sman yang dag sgrub 'di la//nan tan du ni 'jug par bya//ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe//'khor rnam

245a6(rgyud): tha dad do//na mo rat+na tA yA ya/na ma Ar+yA dz+nyA na sA ga ra bi ro tsa nA b+hU ha rA dA ya/ta thA ga tA ya ar+yA ta samyak+Sha bud+d+hA ya/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo//a d+had b+h+yaHsamyaMk+saM bud d+he/
245a7(rgyud): b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba la~M ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+hi ri d+ha ri/d+hu ru d+hu ru/in+d+ra baT+Te/tsa li tsa mo
245b1(rgyud): nam bran la/ku sums su ma/byAd+ya/i lI mI li/tid+hU lAm pan+d+ha ye swAt+ma//shud d+ha ya swA hA//maHk+tarA D+hikA ya b+hU hA/'di gsungs chenas rgan dag/rnam pa drug tu/
245b2(rgyud): g.yos par 'gyur//rtsa ba'i snying po stong brjod pa//dngos grub ci dang ci 'dod 'grub//gzhan yang sngags pas kun gyi dbur//sngon gyi phyag 'tshal bzhi po brjod//na mo rat+na tra
245b3(rgyud): yA ya/na ma UR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan+ta b+hA ha rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/samyak+Sha bud d+hA ya/na maHsarba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHad+had b+h+yaHsa myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya ba lo
245b4(rgyud): kai te sh+tsa rA ya/bai d+hi sa twA ya/ya hA satwA yau/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/ha ra ha ra/oM li ma~M li/tsi li tsi li/khi le ho la swA hA/dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug pa'i sa//
245b5(rgyud): chu dang gos la bdun bdun brjod//khrus byas gos gon nang du 'jug/snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang bsam//na mo rat+na tA lA ya/na me Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra be ro tsan+ta b+h+ye ha rA dzA ya/ta
245b6(rgyud): thA ga tA ya/aR+sha te/samyakr-i bud d+ha ya/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHad+had b+h+yaHsamyakra bud d+hi b+h+yoHna ma Ar+ya ba lo kaM te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sa twA ye/ma hA sa twa yaM/ma hA kA ru
245b7(rgyud): /NI kA ya/tar+d+ha thA/oM d+hu ru d+hA ru/ha ra ha ra swA hA/bdun drag r-i re btang ba yi//spos bsregs pa dang mar me s+pha ra/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na swa ga ra bai ro
246a1(rgyud): tsanA b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/a d+had te/sam+bak+saM bud+d+hA ya/na mAHs+yArba ta thA ga tA b+h+ya/an+mA b+h+yaHsam+b+hak+saM d+h+ye b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo kat+tat+yA shwa rA ya/
246a2(rgyud): bod+d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/mat+mak+Sha ru Ni kA ye/tad+yathA/sai ri si ro/d+hi d+ha ri/sid+d+hi ri sid+hi ra~M swAhU~M/me tog b+h+yog spos me rtag phreng //bdun bdun brjod la skye

246b1(rgyud): dkar ba'i shing du ma bus//sum cu bzhi mar snang rtsir ni//zhag gcig langs nas nyin gcig pas//nang re nu bar re re la//sngags re btang nas 'asregs nas bzod//
246b2(rgyud): rnams brlabs nas 'gyur/na mo rat+na tA ya~M yA/na ma n+ta dz+nyAn sA gar bar tsan b+hU han+nad+hA ya/ta thA ga tA yA/an te/sam rbodrAd+hA d+hA yA/na mA/sarba tAthAg+h+ra tA/

246b5(rgyud): rAd+hA tr-i yA ya/nA ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA gar bai ro tsan b+hU ha rA d+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te/sam+b+har+tha/bu d+h+r-i ya/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHar+had b+h+ya/sam+bak+Sha bud d+hA b+hUHna ma Ar+ya
246b6(rgyud): ki ya/bod+b+hi /mad+hA yam kr-i r+ra kr-I yaM/taHSh+Ta/au t+ti /te/bad /kauH/dz+nyA ga tA//Ur+ya kai te shA rA yau/
246b7(rgyud): sarba sAd+ha na rmAny+dza/hUM sa gis slar yang spyan bras dang //rang nyid gnas nas ldag don phyir//tshul len bdun btab pa yis//'dus nas dgongs pa de dag 'gug/rnam
247a1(rgyud): maurat+nAtra yU ya/nam stun+nadz+nyAn s+thA gar roHnASh+Tad+hAn+mar+N+Na yA/t+yAT+Ta gad+hA yA aHt+te/sar+m+mak+saM brAd+d+hA ya/na maHs+yAR+tha tAn+taglA te b+h+yaHarbA b+h+yasam+b+ha/bar+b+heb+h+yo/nA ma stAr+yA ba rbak+Sha
247a2(rgyud): shwa ra ya/ro d+hi satwA ya/mih+ne setwA ya/ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM badz+re hU~M hrIHha~MH'jig rten 'pho la rob dgo'i bas/za skom byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags//de nas bcom ldan thub pa tshes
247a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//mgon po zhal ni bcug pa'i//rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsung ngo //na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byA ha rA dzas
247a4(rgyud): tathA gra tA ya ar+ha te/san+yak+Sha bud+d+ha ya/na maHsarba ta thA ga twe b+h+ya/ar+had b+h+yaHsamyAk+saM bud+d+he b+h+yoHna ma s+yAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi sad+d+ha ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+yarmA/na maHsarbad+d+ha

247a7(rgyud): bi br-i h+ma pra ma~M Na ka ra/sarba b+hA bi nA shA ya~M ka~M ra~M/sarba b+h+ye bi ta la/bi sha ma d+hin/dung sA dan/dzu mi taM/sarba bin+d+ha bi nA ya kAn/kha d+hi satwA kAr/pa ra~M tsak+ka/dur b+he k+Sha sha ke b+ha ya~M na~M sar
247b1(rgyud): na sun / rgyun tu rgyu rgyu tu kAr+m+ma kun s+ho sgyu/ smra/
247b2(rgyud): rmya dod ti ra nI pra d+hu na b+hi la/mA d+hi mr-i d+hi /mad+h+ya ma shrI mA d+hIn da~M Ni k+Sha u la~M ka ka ri t+ti p+paR+tha ka re/d+hI trI NAM ba bI sa naM/bar b+hin/da~Mdz+dzaHrmAN+Dini/ ba~M ra kar+m+ma Ni su d+ha ni/sarba b+hu d+hi ni/bAshas
247b3(rgyud): swA hA/ma lo mo la swA rmA/ li tsa li swA ng+ge mamam khri las chu pra pra d+hi na bA rgya/shwa br-i rA lu ki t+ye d+ha ma nu mu khi s+thAr+m+ma/oM k+Sha rakArI
248a1(rgyud): sa ra si ri si ri/su ru su ru/muny+dza muny+tsa muny+tsA ya/prA shA ma ya pra shA ma ya/yu d+hod d+hA rA Ni swAh+ma/tsin+ta ni rA mA la ka ri phaT/a su ra nA ra ki ti ha phaT/dza ya ka
248a2(rgyud): phaT/ska ti ri phaT/sa ha sra ne tre phaT/sarba b+ha dra d+ha ra na maHtr-i te pheT/sarba b+ha ya bi mo k+Sha NaM phaTi/ma ra tsakr-i na paM ra Ni phaT/pa ra se n+ya si gru pa Ni phaT/sarba kr-i t+ya ka ma si du ni
248a3(rgyud): phaT/sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/sarba byA d+hi bi nA sha ya phaT/sarba gra ho tats+tshin+da na phaT/rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/sa pa ra sa pa ra/naM te tsa sha ri sa ma nAM/
248a4(rgyud): sarba pra ya pA te b+h+yaHsarba yut+te b+h+yaHdu sa tri te b+h+yo/sarba trit+ta ka kho ra da/sarba be shaM b+h+yaHsarba kA ye bAk+ShI te te si tse b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/sa ha sra b+hu dze/sa ha sra ne tra e ka/

248a6(rgyud): 'di yon tan mtha' yas te//gang la 'di ni gtsug tair du//yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs//'chang dang klog par byed pa des//mtha' yas yin tan
248a7(rgyud): rnyed par 'gyur//nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang //khyad par du ni sdig kun 'byung //ba dkar mo yis bdud rtsi lngas//maN+Dal 'jam po lnga byu Da la//gtsang sbra ldan pas dbus ni//shing /
248b1(rgyud): ring 'brel ldan pa bzhag/gzhan yang ring stsol ldan pa so//sku gdung banan phyog sa bar to//tshad ldan pa mi tham pan//lnga po dbus drang mtsham sa m+b+ha//rigs lta'o//
248b2(rgyud): mengag dang phyeg che can//sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang //sras byi tha dang zla bar bya//ci 'dod byab rgya bris byes te//chos gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar//'dod la dmigs
248b3(rgyud): nas sngags brjid//bzhi khri rdzogs nas bco lnga la//'dod pa gsol gdab khrus byos nas/ci 'dod myur du grub po dang //bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang //rnam pa 'tsha dang mithun
248b4(rgyud): pa/khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur//sngags brjod yon tan mtha' yos rnams//bsdus nas sgrub po la ldan 'gyur//mngon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/sngags
248b5(rgyud): gang brjod po tsam la yang //gshis ngan shi be bco lnga med//skyes bzang bco lnga thob par 'gyur//mu ge rgyal po'i chad pa dang //dug dang mtshan dang g.yul 'gying
248b6(rgyud): dang / stug sogs sbrul sogs gcan zan gledug/drug can poso dang me chus 'chi//sgrog tshogs bdun dang nyol nyes dang //g.yang byed dang dri lta 'dras gcas//gtsar
248b7(rgyud): mi rung dang bdag lce ba rnams//de la nam yang mi 'dzeg so//rgyal po ches ldan yul skye zhing //'phags pa bzhugs dang dus bzang yul//bshes gnyen bzang dang dbang /
249a1(rgyud): po tshad//dge la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan//bran khol bzang ni nor mangs rtag/gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dod sbyor//sems bder
249a2(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong bas srung //sangs rgyas zhal mthong don zab rtags//gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed//snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa dang //yon tan dran nas
249a3(rgyud): spro ba dang //dkoni mchog gsum la dam pa dang //phul du 'byung ba'i blo yis 'brel//tshul bzhin mo yin yid bral dang //bka' lung sde snod dang ba rnams//

249a5(rgyud): pa drag po'i blo byung che//sngags 'dis stong pa nye du bya//oM shru n+ya tA dz+nyA ne badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/gang gis lus dgra yid g.yo na//sngags 'di brtan par byin
249a6(rgyud): gyis brlabs//oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya~M bAk+tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma kau ts+yai//gang la gnod yod sems ldan dang //ngang gis sa gzhi 'gags yod pa//gsal phyir seng
249a7(rgyud): ldeng dkar po ni//brag las skyes shing gzhan pa las//sor drug chad ldan phur bu ni//brjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can//mgo bo rkad pa brgya mdud tshul//sor tshwa
249b1(rgyud): phyed phyed ldan pa la//zur ni bcu drug rked pa la//sor gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o//sor gsum zur gsum rtse rno ba//dpal mtho cung zad par reg pa//ngos dang skangs ni zab
249b2(rgyud): po ste//sngags kyi byin rlabs ldan pa brgyad//khang pa'i zur dang phyogs bzhi por//g.ya su phyogs pa gzugs par bya//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA ma Ar+ya dz+nyA sA na ga ra bai ro tsa na

249b4(rgyud): d+hi ya/hu lu hu lu/tiSh+Tha toSh+Tha/ban+d+ha pan+d+ha/ha na ha na/da ha da ha/pa tsi paM tsa/a mr-i te hUM phaT/ltas ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang //ga nas khang byin gyis brlabs pa

249b7(rgyud): rak+Sha hUM phaT brjod//shin tu 'jam pa'i gtan la ni//rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas nas//bsrang te mig ni sna rtser phab//dal ba'i rlung ldan dag na la ni//lce yis cuni
250a1(rgyud): rlung reg par bya//lte bcung zad la bum pa yis//sems ni bag yod gnas par bya//rtag pa ma yin mi rtakA min//gtsang ba ma yin mi gtsang

250a3(rgyud): skye mched mid ma yin//yid min rtag min chad pa min//mun pa ma yin shes rab min//'gro min 'ong min gnas ma yin//'dod gzugs du ma bsgyur byed pa//mkha'

250a5(rgyud): dang de bzhin rten gyis min//gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med//de la sems dpe'i sems nyid kyang //gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi gnas//gar yang ma song brtags/
250a6(rgyud): na stong //brtags par byed pa rtogs pa tsam//dngos rnams rtags pa ming tsam te/kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la//rten na rang gis sems bzung na//drod kyi bzhi
250a7(rgyud): pa dang por gzung //phyug pa'i gnyis pa de la brten//de la dang po gnyis pas bskor//dang po'i bco lngas mnan pa ste//bcu drug pa ni grogasu gzhag/yi ge drug la
250b1(rgyud): grub pa ni//sangs rgyas drugi rang bzhin te//'od zer rnam pa drug dang bcas//rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas//yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug/yul drug dag gi dbang byas nas//
250b2(rgyud): nyan mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas//nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin//phung ba rnam pa drug dang ldan//phung po grangs kyi dbye bas ni//yan lag drug drug 'phel bar
250b3(rgyud): 'gyur//yan lag rdzogs pa'i grib mas ni//rang bzhin dag pa'i sems sgrib byed//sgrib gnyis go bas 'jug po ni//gsal ka'i ri bo dang bcas pa//rtag chung
250b4(rgyud): gnasu bzhugs pa'o//srog rtsol bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis//phyi rol snang ba nub par 'gyur//rtsol dang bral nas dga' skye ste//yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur//yi ge
250b5(rgyud): gsal ba'i 'od zer ni//ba spu khung rnams thams cad nas//sems dang bcas pa sdang 'jug ste//slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni//yi ge nyid kyang mi dmigaso//'dzin pa de las
250b6(rgyud): zothos nas kyang //sgyu ma'i rnam pa rjes dran bya//de la goms nas ting 'dzini//nyams pa med pa thob par 'gyur//ting 'dzin de bstan gyur nas ni//lus 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa
250b7(rgyud): thob//rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni//bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur//skad cig de la rjes rnams ni//na mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang //mkha' ltar kun la khyab pa
251a1(rgyud): spyod//rten spyan ras gzigs dbang ste//lus ni 'phags pa 'jam dang lo//yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste//mgo dang thod ni ma pham pa//gtsug tor
251a2(rgyud): sgrib pa rnam pa la nyid//nyi zla kun tu bzong po ste//sa chu me rlung na mkha' dang //rnam shes nyid dang bcas pa'o//thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste//bsam gtan la ni
251a3(rgyud): gnas pa'i phyir//stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya//sems klong pas ni nges par 'grub//'dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi//dus ni rtag pa ma yin te//mi rtog sems nyid
251a4(rgyud): 'brel gyur nas//dus la tha dad mi rtog/nyi mo'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang //namakha'i phyogs ni ji lta bar//sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya//gzhani go skabs mi
251a5(rgyud): 'byed//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/thun mong gi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///
251a6(rgyud): de nas drang srong gnas nas ni//sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba//bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' rigs 'dzin zhig/rgya cher rang gi 'khor
251a7(rgyud): bcas la//dkyil 'khor phru du lhags nas ni//rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod//phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas//thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni//
251b1(rgyud): ston pa lnga ni 'di skad gsol//oM mthara' yas spros la nyer zhi zhing //zhi mdzad du ni rab spyod mdzod//rtog bcom rtog mkhyen rtag yongs zhugs//ye shas kun rgyal phyag 'tsha'o//
251b2(rgyud): zhi las zhi 'gyur mtha' 'byung ba//chos rnams kun mchog zhi chos che//spros med la sa spos dkar bcu bya//mtha' yos chos la phyag 'tshal//grol gyur grol mdzad dag pa
251b3(rgyud): dag par spyod pa gtsang ma mgon//tshogs rdzogs tshigs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal//tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshalo//rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas rgyan//'jig rten rab gsal
251b4(rgyud): mjed pa'o//rtag pa don chen rtag zhugs la//mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal//khams gsum bag chags kyis bkrugs pa//thibs pa'i ling rtog zhugs pa rnams
251b5(rgyud): mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang //sems lags la myur shin tu dga'//mngon sum med la brjod bral yang //lkog tu gyur pa smos ci dgos//lkog don mngon du byed pa la//
251b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog/mngon sum thob ldan ming nas kyang //don la sems kyi gsal ba skye//don gang yang yang goms pa las//sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste/
251b7(rgyud): gsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu//sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o//blo dmAnA~M kyis 'jug pa dang //'bring po 'phro bar bya phyir dang //rnon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur phyir//gzugs
252a1(rgyud): brnyan byung tshul ba shad du gsol//myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang //myur du byang chub cher 'gyur cing //gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul 'byung can//
252a2(rgyud): 'dren pas di ring bshad du gsol//mkha' sprin rtag pa med pa la//mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltararo//rnam rtog gis bkrugs sems la ni//su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin
252a3(rgyud): par 'gyur//dmigs pa'i mtshan ma gsal byed pa//gzugs rnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste//legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing //byin rlabs nges par 'jug par
252a4(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'dren pa gtsos//ljags kyi dbang po rab bkram nas//gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba//nga las mnyan par brtson pa ni//legs
252a5(rgyud): pa lha yi drang srong mchog/rigs 'dzin byang chub sems khyod legs//rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan nas kyang //legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog/khyod la yang dag
252a6(rgyud): bshad bya ba//byin rlabs dgyes pa'i gzugs brnyan dang //tshon gyis ris su bris pa'am//rin chen rigs sams rdo'am//shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags//dang hrI
252a7(rgyud): las can sems can la//dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang //byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur//tsAn dkar po gsal zhing drang //gzhon zhing chags pa med
252b1(rgyud): la/bas shing du pas bdugs nus no//dad wAn+da dang tshul bzang bas bzhag/'jog rtenu dbang phyug dgan b+h+yo sgra//bcoM ba rgyad stong tshud ldan pa la//kAdan khyi ga nas
252b2(rgyud): dgu ste//rgyad yol sor ched drug gis bskyed//bzhengs te ldem bag nyams dga' ba//rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyi sa rgyan//g.yas kyi dang po bgrang phreng ste//gnyis pa
252b3(rgyud): 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag/g.yon pa dang po pad+ma dmar//gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs thogs//zhal gyi drangs ni bcu gcig le//mdun gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can//b+h+yarma

252b5(rgyud): su gtum pa'i khro zhal gsum//sto dang ser dang ldeng gu'o//rgyab tu khro gtum mdog dmar pa//rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal//khro ba'i zhal rnams mcha ba gtsigs//mi
252b6(rgyud): gsum dbu skra ster zi na//gyen du zor bcugs bcings pa'o//stengs du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa yin no/byi ru bcag pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i//dbu mi cod pan nad rnams//'di
252b7(rgyud): dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams//re re bzhin du bzhugs par bya//dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang //rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang //lag rgyan sen mo der bcas pa//de
253a1(rgyud): shal rkang gdub ska rags can//rgyan dang na bzar mdzes pas brgyan//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//ris ma dag la dga'agyur nas//yid
253a2(rgyud): gzhungs dal spyod khro ba med//sreng chung shes rab snying rje che//thabs ldan ri mo rgyud la mkhas//bsam pa bzang ldan tshul khrims srung //'di chos gzo la gzhungs pa yis//
253a3(rgyud): dben zhing nyams dga'i gan su dri//gzugs bzang yid ngal gtsang ldan pa'i//bu mos bkal ba'i ras la ni//tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o//mthas par bcas te 'dzi
253a4(rgyud): por bya//thig gi phyogs cha bshad nas kyang //ser skya chen gyi gzugs brnya ni//tshad la mkhas pa tshad ldan pa'i//nan tan du ni bri par bya//dkar po wa yi shos
253a5(rgyud): yin te//dmar po sems rtsoli khri'o//sngon po rams dong mthing shing ste//ser po ba bla dag pa yin//nAg po snag tsha nyid yin te//ljang khu rams dang ldong ros sgyur//
253a6(rgyud): yang na spyang ma nyid kyis byas//smug rtsi rams dang skags sbyar te//gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya//sbyin dang bral na grub par 'gyur//shing sbyin ser dang kau pi
253a7(rgyud): ta/lo mi ta dang tha na dzor//de dag so sor sbyar ba yi//gsal zhing bkrugs med dag por byed//a ta pas ni snun par byed//gan to has ni rtog par 'gyur//
253b1(rgyud): rgyas par bru bzhi sgra bzhi pa//yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung //dkyil 'khor cha rim gsum pa'am//yang na gnyis sam gsum yang rung //dbus gdong ni bcug ni//mdzes pa'i lha
253b2(rgyud): mo bzhi ldan dri//shar du spyan ras gzigs dbang gis//dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso bo can//de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi//phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o//lhor ni 'jig rten dbang
253b3(rgyud): phyu'i/dkyil 'khor shAkau thub gtso bo can//lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgri ba dang //'bengs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa'o//nub tu rig ma'i dkyil 'khor ni//sems dpa' bzhi bzhir
253b4(rgyud): bcas pa'o//dbus su rdo rje dbang mo yang //mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste//g.ya su rdo rje dpal 'byung ngo //rgyab tu rdo rje dpag med//g.yon du rdo rje don grub bo//shar du lha mo spyan ma ni
253b5(rgyud): mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o//g.yasu rdo rje rgyal po'o//rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa ste//g.yon du rdo rje legs pa'o//lhor ni lha mo mA ma ki/mdun du rdo rje rin cheno//gau ya su rdo
253b6(rgyud): nyi ma ste//rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan no//g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa yin//nub tu ni bza' dkar mo yang //mdun du rdo rje chos yin te//g.ya su rdo rje rnon pa yin//rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu zhes
253b7(rgyud): pa/g.yon du rdo rje smra ba'o//byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang //mdun du rdo rje las yin te//g.ya bu rdo rje srung ba'o//rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te//g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro//

255a5(rgyud): gnag/rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon//nub du chu lha dkar po ni//klu yi khri la sbrul zhogs bzung //de yi g.yon du sa bdag dkar//bum pa gzung ste rus sbal zhon/

259a7(rgyud): lus ngag yod dang longs spyod bcas//ser sna med pas mchod 'os mchod//lha dang lha min gsang ba pa'i//rig 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rgya//des spyod dam tshig
259b1(rgyud): dam pa rnams//sdom tshul brtan po gzung bar bya//'gro rnams kun la snying brtse dang //yi dgas rnams la gtor ma sbyin//'dzem+b+ha la ni chu yis mchod//yi dgas dag kyang
259b2(rgyud): chus gnyis bya//de rjes slob ma rab dga' nas//ci 'byor lha dang bla ma mchod//dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon dgongs//snying brtse bdag la gzigs nas kyang //lha dang spa Da
259b3(rgyud): dang byin rlabs thabs//de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol//rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs bzhugs po'i//nyams dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che//yid bzhin long spyod char du
259b4(rgyud): 'bor/khang chen der ni bdag 'jug 'tshal//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//zab mo'i sangs rgyas spyod yul ba//spros bral dmigasu med pa'i don//la mo chen bdag
259b5(rgyud): la stsal du gsol//de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa//de nyid bcu sbyar mkhas pa pos//g.yon pa chos gos rtse gzung ste//lag pa g.yas chos phyag rgya can//gsang
259b6(rgyud): bstod 'dzum pa'i 'od mdangs rgyas//dang ldan pa ni 'di skad brjod//oM bu shog theg pa chen po yi//khyod ni tshul chen snod yin phyir//gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga
259b7(rgyud): rnams/khyod la nges par bstan par bya//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rdo rje gsang sngags rab skam pas//mtshungs pa med
260a1(rgyud): pa'i ye shes rnams//shAkya seng ge dpa' bos kyang //gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med kyis//bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i//dpung chen dag kyang
260a2(rgyud): 'dis bcom//'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs bya'i phyir//'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das//de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir//bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shog/sngags dang
260a3(rgyud): rdzas kyi srung ba dang //lha yis rten mig de la mchod//u dum+ba ra'i me tog ltar//'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/'byung 'gyur
260a4(rgyud): yang na mi 'byung //sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni//de bas kyang ni chos dkon te//dang gi tshul min sems can don//mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus//bskal pa du mar bsags
260a5(rgyud): pa'i sdig/gang la sdig khur ci yod pa//lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang //byin rlabs tsam gyis byang gyur nas//blo gros dri ma med pa yis//spyod tshul rlabs pa
260a6(rgyud): zhugs nas lha//ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcad nas//mtshan ldan sku ni gzhan don spyod//bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis//rnyed pa mtshungs me de ring rnyed//
260a7(rgyud): gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas//bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams ni//gang du skyes kyang gzung ba'i phyir//de nas khyed rnams thag tshon rigs//sha stag tu ni skye
260b1(rgyud): nges te//theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba//dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di//gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang //bde bar gshegs pa nyid 'gyur//de bas sgrol
260b2(rgyud): brtson par gyis//slob ma ku sha dge ba yis//stan le nyal nas rmi lam dri//gsang dang sbyong ba byas nas kyang //chus bkrus 'di rnams klag pa dang //bkra shis dus
260b3(rgyud): klag byas te//gdong ba dar gyis bcings nas kyang //'bras kyi me tog phreng ba ni//lha yi dkyil 'khor dbus dor//slar blangs mgo la bcings bya ste//pad+ma ldan rigs
260b4(rgyud): mtshon gyis rgyan//mig phye de la lhanas dang //byang chub phyogs chos mchin ma yi//yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba//mchod rten lha tshogs bcas pa gdon//yid ches
260b5(rgyud): drang ba mngon byas la//ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa bya//de nas dag pa'i sras de la//mur me la nI mar me ltar//'dod pa'i lha ni stsal bar bya//brjod pa dang bcas 'brel
260b6(rgyud): yis//rtsa ba'i snying po nyo skyong tshogs//sngags kyang gsal bar sbyin par bya//zhi ba shel gyi phreng bste//rgyas pa la ni a ru ra//dbang la lung thang dmar po shis//
260b7(rgyud): drag por 'am ru rag sha//bi de ces ni las kun byed//sngags btsod bco lo na pa mgo la bcing //hUM dang bcabo pa'i rdo rje yang //lag pa g.ya su bzhag par bya//stod ga'o//
261a1(rgyud): kr-iSh+Na sa ri ste//smad g.yogs kha dog sngon pa'o//dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste//zhal zas snod ni pad+ma rgyun//sems can kun don spyod pa'i rdzas/
261a2(rgyud): thub pas bkra shis bzhed po'i rtags//gdugs nya bum pa dpel be'u dang //rgyalnga mtshani 'khor lo pad+ma sprul//nad sel bde byed 'tsho ba'i phyir//'dod yin phyogs
261a3(rgyud): rigs grub pa'i rdzas//gi wang du ra ba li khri zhe//bil ba sbrang rtsi a ru ra//ka ri bi ra'i 'bras bu rnams//hrIHzhes dag pas stsal bar bya//gur gum ga pur glu
261a4(rgyud): dang /ba yi 'o mas sbyar byas nas//tshig 'di lce la bzhag par bya//oM yan gar nges pa'i tshig rig dang //ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang //dri ba lan ldon
261a5(rgyud): /spobs pa rig/phyi nang mtshon nyid don rig shog/badz+ra d+harma pra be sha/oM bcas brjed cing lce la ni//lan gsum rdo rje bzhag par bya//hrIHyi ge dmar po me 'bar
261a6(rgyud): bsam/gang lo goms pa de 'byung zhing //goms pa gzhan gyi dbang med na//rtog pa'i 'byung ba chad pa'i phyir//kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad//dmigs
261a7(rgyud): pa'i rten gyi sngags la yang //byin rlabs tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur//sa la dbang bskur thob 'dod pas//phyag na 'khor lo'ochang la dmigs//ting 'dzin brtan
261b1(rgyud): lardo rje ste//dpa' thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs//gzugs bzang 'dod pas pad+ma ste//spobs pa 'dod pas ral gri'o//gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste//rdo rje dkar pos
261b2(rgyud): sems gsal 'gyur//shes rab 'dod pas glegs pa mo//khang bzang gis ni mi'i rgyal po//thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jom//thal sbyar bas ni 'gro bas bkur/
261b3(rgyud): 'khar bsil byams dang snying rje skye//lcags kyu 'jig rten skyong bas srung //rin chen zo'u 'brus lce bder 'gyur//dril bus skad snyan byed par 'gyur//bgrang phreng gris ni
261b4(rgyud): lung bstan 'thob//khyi rkang gis ni nye dbang 'gyur//lho sogs gdug pa dung yin te//mdung rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal//pad+ma dmar pos lha ru ste//ril ba spyi
261b5(rgyud): blugs tshing ris skye//sprin mdog lnga ni drang srong skye//me long gis ni lha zhal mthong //pad+ma ra gas ye shes skye//pad+ma sngon pos dag pa'i zhing //pad+ma dkar pos dge tshegs
261b6(rgyud): 'phel/ri boso bu dang bu mo 'phel//dgra stos bdud kyi bar chad sel//'khor dang sems 'thun 'bring g+ha ras//phub kyis dgra dang gcan zan 'joms//rnga yab dkar//
261b7(rgyud): pos sdig pa 'phyag/me tog snyems nad sel byed//rin chen mdangs ni yid 'ong grogs//gzhus ni nor dang go 'phangs rnyed//chu shel dug dang tsha rig sel//mi 'jigs
262a1(rgyud): spun gyis 'jigs skyug 'joms//dag la rdo rje gad+hAn shing skye//rdo d+hA nag mo bdud 'dul 'gyur//rin chen ral dris rig sngags bzlog/b+hU
262a2(rgyud): ba na las lhung bzed//rims nad sel byed zhags pa'o//'bru 'dod pas ni 'bru'i snyam//nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phug/yang na lung bstan 'dod pas na//mag
262a3(rgyud): la sangs rgyas dmigs par bya//mngon par shes pa lnga 'did na//sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya//de nas mgon pa spyan ras gzigs//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
262a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i zhal//sa yi snying po la gzigs nas//sa yi go rims 'di gsung so//rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni//gsang sngags thams cad sa gsum ste//gsang sngags
262a5(rgyud): sa dang sngags sbyar sa//rigs 'chang sa dang rigs gsal sa//rigs mchog sa dang rin chen sa//phyag rgya chen po'i sa rnamaso//gtsug tor tsA po'i sangs rgyas sa//gnas
262a6(rgyud): skabs drug tu rgyal bas gsungs//kun tu 'od dang dad pa'i spyan//yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen so//rdo 'chang ye shes bla ma'i sa//rdzogs sangs bde ba chen po'i sa
262a7(rgyud): sa yi snying pos gsol pa//mgon pa 'phags pa thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/byin rlabs lcags kyu lta bus 'khor ba'i brtson ra nas//klu phyugs 'gyu
262b1(rgyud): phrag drang ltar dge ba kun slong gis//byang chub rin chen sa la 'jog mthong ngo mtshar che//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtsu ba'i rgyud kyi rgyalnga po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/
262b2(rgyud): byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o///de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du//rab dga'i tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha//ting 'dzin yangs pa zhes bya ba/
262b3(rgyud): rtogs pa rgya che zab pa zhig/'khor dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te//me tog rin chen rigs byung ba//sten pa'i phyogasu char bzhin phab//mkha' la gdugs kyi bla re bkang //'kham
262b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa mgrin gcig tu//bsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol//lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i//rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa//rdo rje rnal 'byor las
262b5(rgyud): byung phyir//bdag dang sems can kun tu yang //dngos grub 'byung rim pa sha du gsol//la la g.yeng bar gyur pa yis//bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyi//sngags rgyud
262b6(rgyud): brdebs pa 'chang byed 'byung //snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye//gdams ngag med pas 'gro ba bslus//dngos grub med pas bston pa zhig/sred pas lan cig sogs
262b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//gnyis pa dmyal tshogs ngan 'gror 'gro//la lo las kyi skye mched sgo//dbang po rten khang dmar myur la//gdam ngag rgyud tshul yod mod kyi//chos tshul
263a1(rgyud): man#mas sa na mtha ma tham//a namaHthasamam/thas ma#mas gams ma a#ma
263a2(rgyud): bzhin du spyod byed cing //gar la dbang du gzung ba yi//bu 'dra bas kyang brnyas gyur nas//snang ba 'phel nas rtsod par 'gyur//des kyang gnyis ka dmyal sogs
263a3(rgyud): 'gro/la la thos chung shes rab dman//rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can//bstan pa dang ni 'chang byed la//skyo ni smod smra bas dmyal sogs 'gro//la la mi dge'i bshes gnyen gyis//
263a4(rgyud): log lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin can//yang dag lam smod brtson pa dor//log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro/la lo bsam med sngags brjod med//mar me bdug spos gter ma sogs//'byung
263a5(rgyud): pos brlabs te bdag nyid dang //'khor bcas tshe thung long spyod 'grib//la la 'ding sred gtum rdeb che//mkhas gzhan dag la phra dog gis//spro ba kun tshul chos la smod//rang
263a6(rgyud): nyid lte ngan skab la rtsod//ther zug blo yi mun pa can//'byung po drag po'i rigasu skye//la la ser sna rab 'jug pas//lha dang bla ma'i tshig gis bstod//zas dang long spyod rgyan
263a7(rgyud): gos dang //me tog bdug spos gtor ma sogs//nyu du mug tshul rgyun stsol na//zos skom dag gi gdungs pa yi//yi dgas dman pa'i rigasu ni//yang nas yang du skyo bar nges
263a8(rgyud): de phyir de dag spangs nas ni//ya rabs bsam pa bzang ldan pas//tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis//gtan la phab don ma 'khrul bar//brjod cing yid la byed pa dang /
263b1(rgyud): the tshom med par brtson byed pas//'gro tshogs sgrol byad thabs thob nas//rang don 'ba' zhig smos ci dgos//de nas lag du rdo rje gtso//ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i skud//'phro la
263b2(rgyud): snying rtser rab gzigs nas//gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad gsungs//nga la mnyan par brtson byed pa//shin tu legaso lha yi bu//lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i//ting 'dzin nga yi

263b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang mgon po gtso//rang gi sems la bskyed par bya//shin tu gsal na dngos grub 'gyur//dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems//gnyis pa yi ge'i byang chub sems//gsum pa sgo
263b5(rgyud): btags ming tshogs sems//bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems//lnga pa byin rlabs rgyas 'debs sems//sku dang brag cha'i tshul 'byung bar//gtso bo'i 'khor gyi khyad par gsol//dbu
263b6(rgyud): yi ge oM la ste/shwa ra du hUM ste lho ru na//nub tu hrIHyig byang du ha//rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed//lha ni gang du 'phe 'gyur bso//dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'o byung yin//rigs kyi
263b7(rgyud): phyag rgya de nyid kyis/rig pa rigs kyi rgyas 'debs shing //rigs kyi lha tshogs pho mo rnams//nyams dga' dben pa'i tshul gyi su//phan tshun du ni bltas nas gnas//ldel bag na bza' 'phyang 'phrul
264a1(rgyud): dang /'phur lding sil snyan rin chen tshogs//du ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste//la la ldems bzhangs 'gying dang bcas//la la rdo rje skyil krung bcas//la la pad+mar
264a2(rgyud): skyil krung ste//la la sems dpa'i skyil krung can//la la khro thabs brkyang bskum can//la l-i zhal phyag zhabs kyang mang //la la zhar sti gnyis yin te//la la zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis
264a3(rgyud): lo la pang rdzing pad+ma tsan+da//lA la pad+mo mi 'jigs phyag/gu Na de buM pa 'khar bsil dang //rnga yab legaso skyabs sbyin phyag/rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang //khar rnga shing rnga rjerdzi rnga dung //zangs
264a4(rgyud): lcags rdo dang rus pa'i rnga//ring zlumi rked nyeg le'i phyal che//chung phra sgo yengs dog pa dang //ral gri chu bro bri rangs dang //pri leb gri zlum gri kyog dang //sta zur sta leb phyel sta dang //
264a5(rgyud): snga chung gzhogs ste 'jigs ste dang //zlum sta phreng sta bzhar sta dang //mdung dang rtse gsum 'phen mdung dang //'khor lo kha T+wAM gtun shing sgyogs//snyo ma tig bu me tog dang /
264a6(rgyud): sdong bu lo 'dab yal ga dang //ba dan pad gdugs rgyal mtshan spungs//rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom//'khor lo glegs bi ma ut+pal po//de la sogs te mchog mtha' yas
264a7(rgyud): phyag rgya stong snyed tshangs pa 'am//brgya rtsa brgyad dam bzhi bcu drug/nyi shu gnyis sam bcu gnyis drug/bzhi 'am gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung //phyag rgya bcings ldan phyag rgya ste/
264b1(rgyud): des ni lha la rgyas 'debs byed//goms pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya che//seng ge'i sgra ni sang+ga zhon//rgyal po rol pa'i stabs tshul can//rtse gsum sprul dang mi 'jigs phyung//pad+ma sdong bcas
264b2(rgyud): ral gri 'bar//dpa' bo'i lcags kyu thod pa ni//nang pa bdun gyi cha gnas pa//gtum po drag po 'od ldan ma//g.yon du klu yi dbang phyug mi//pad+ma dang ni zla ba'i steng //phyogs
264b3(rgyud): mdog sems dpa'i skyil krung can//yid bzhin nor bu N+Da la bcibs//zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang //rdo rje pad+ma rin chen phyag/skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can
264b4(rgyud): 'khor ni sems dpa'i skyil krung ste//mdog bzang sgeg po'i lha mo ni//yid myur rin chen bzang mo dang //pad rgyal mo dang rta rna mo//rin chen pod+ma zla nyi la//'khor lo grogs kyi
