264b6(rgyud): por zla sems dpa'i skyil krungango //mi bskyod pa ni mkha' lding bcibs//ral pri pad+ma mda' gzhu dang //skyabs sbyin gang ba'i bum+ba thogs//bzang 'dzin ma dang rnam sbyangs ma//sa srung ma
264b7(rgyud): dang rab brtan mo//de dag gong gi cha byed mtshungs//don yod zhags pa klu stengs bzhugs//rin po che dang zhags pa dang //skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'chang ba'o//seng ge mo dang glang po ma
265a1(rgyud): rta gdong khyu mcho gdod ldan pa/pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la'o//ha la ha la rul sbrul stengs//rdo rje dril bu skyabs sbyin dang //chos kyi za ma tog 'chang ba'o//nye 'ang
265a2(rgyud): ma dang zla 'od ma//chu dbang ma dang nor phreng mo//dge bo'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o//mgon paM pad+ma rgyan lung che//chu srin steng du ral pa'i tshul//Da ma ru dang bgrang phreng dang //mi
265a3(rgyud): 'jigs phyag dang lcags sgrog/lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo ma//gsang ba mo dang ril bsrel mo//glang sor rdo rje chos dbang phyug/chos kyi 'khor lo chos 'chang rgya//skyabs
265a4(rgyud): sbyin pad+ma pau tir bcas//dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma//sil snyan ma rnams pad zlar ni//phyed krung ldem bag tshul du'o//rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor ni//ha ri hi ru d+ya ri
265a5(rgyud): zhon ni zhal gsum phyag ni brgyad pa la//'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang //pad dkar bgrang phreng skyabs sbyin dang //'dud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'chang //mkha' lding
265a6(rgyud): gdong ma shA ri'i gdeng //nyi zhal zla zha lha mo'o//mgrin sde dga' bo nye dga' ste//zhal gsum phyag drug pod+ma dang //po tI skyabs sbyin bgrang phreng phyag/seng ge'i gdong mo
265a7(rgyud): klu zhal mo//dga' byed mo dang srog byed mo//pang zlar sems dpa'i skyil krung //dbu su mgon po gdong btsug/gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin pa mo//sngags srung ba dang grub gsungs
265b1(rgyud): ma/na gong ltar cha byad phyogs mdog go//phyogs bzhi 'khor lo'i cha la ni//gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas//shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni//thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug/rdo rje phyag
265b2(rgyud): rgya gter sgrom can//kun kyang pad+ma zla ba l-i'o//lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste//grub chen dbang phyug dang phag zhal//grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang //gru 'dzin dbang phyug zhes bya'o//
265b3(rgyud): nub tu pad+ma'o dbang phyug ni//skyes bu sang+ge'i zhal dang ni//pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag/rtse bran rgyas 'dzin zhes bya'o//byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang //'khor lo 'chang dang stag
265b4(rgyud): lpags 'chang //kun grub dbang phyug sgra dud 'phel//phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog cano//'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang //rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po//kun tu grags pa'i lha chen rnams
265b5(rgyud): stan la dga' ba dgod par bya//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das don du//rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa//bskal pa bzang po 'di 'byung ba'i//sangs rgyas stong yang dgod par bya//de ltar
265b6(rgyud): rgyas par spros pa ni//lha rnams bgrang ni rgya che bor//tshig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha//mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi//lha grangs
265b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o//spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu//'jig rten dbang ni dkyil 'khor lnga//rigs pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga//rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun
266a1(rgyud): mal na[]thams sa na mthas ma tham/a namaHthas thaH/thas mamam mamam/tha mam ayamanam ma kams
266a2(rgyud): dkyi ba 'khor de dag re re la//sems kyi dkyil 'khor lha mang ste//rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shu lnga//rgyu 'bras tshul du rnam pa dgu//ye shes cha la
266a3(rgyud): lnga yin te//chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal//gang gang mos pa de dang de'i//dkyil 'khor rnam par spro ba 'am//gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yis//byang chub rdo rje mchog thob
266a4(rgyud): nas/khams gsum rgyal por longs spyod che//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur//gtsang sbra che zhing dang sems can//rtse gcig sgrib la nan tan stsol//blo bzang 'gro la
266a5(rgyud): 'jug cing spyod//ngag snyan ngang gis khro ba med//g.yo sgyu 'dod brkam g.yeng ba med//lus ngag dal zhing thos pa mang //nga rgyal ser sna tshogs pa med//gteng phod snying rje drag
266a6(rgyud): ldan pas//spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs nas//de yi snying po rtsa sngags la//bar chod med pas rab brjod nas//gzhan la phan phyir smon lam brjod//spyan ras gzigs
266a7(rgyud): mgon phyag 'tsholo//gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang che//khro bo chen po rdzu 'phrul gyis//de dag myur du sel byed shog/spyan ras gzigs mgo ni phyag 'tshalo//gang la nang rims
266a8(rgyud): gang blangaH//gso spyang sman dang sman par no//bdag nyid myur nas myur sel shog/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsha lo//mu ge'i nang du 'byung 'gyur tshe//phyogs
266b1(rgyud): gcig nas ni rnam g.yos nas//zas skom rgyun chud med par shog/spyan ras gzigs mgron phyag 'argya'o//gang du 'khrug brgya 'gyu//rang dbang gis ni sems 'gyur nas/
266b2(rgyud): bde bas pan tshun sdum par shog/spyan ras gzigs mgron phyag 'tshalo//byil ming gcig la gcig za dang //zos sgom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe//de dag sel po'i sbru
266b3(rgyud): gyur cig/spyan ris gzigs mgon phyag 'tshalo//yi dgos zas skum gdungs pa dang //log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs che//nang bral bdung rtsi kun snang sheg/spyan ras grwa
266b4(rgyud): mgon phyag 'tshal//'gro ba'i skyabs dang thabs mkhas dang //shes rab glu dang ldan nas kyang //thabs kyi sdug bsngal grol bar shog/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsha'o//
266b5(rgyud): tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtog/mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'jog/'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jun shog/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tsholo//ngan song gnas rnams mthong
266b6(rgyud): rlob kyang //der phyin de rnams zad pa yi//gnyen pos sar 'byung bar shog/spyan rapo gzigs mgon 'ga'ichag//dmyal rnams cha gang bcad gtubs che//go
266b7(rgyud): tshe dang bsal grib dong //dred kyi 'od du gyur par shog/rig sngags yang yang brjod pa yis//yang dog lam nyid rtog par roshog/kun 'byungs bon rul nas ni/rdzu
267a1(rgyud): bsngal phung po skam par shog/mgon po mya dran 'das thob nas//'jig rten phyogs bcur rab glags 'gyur//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
267a2(rgyud): bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas//dngos grub myur du rnyed byi'i phyir//sgrub pa la ni brtson par bya//zla ba dkar po'i chos gcig nas//khrus byas gos gser gyon
267a3(rgyud): byas nas//sku gzugs bzang po'i mdun 'dug nas//bsnyung bar gnas nas nyin gcig la//dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad//brjod cing tso 'byor mchod par bya//
267a4(rgyud): tshos brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni//dben par gdan khri bzang po la//sku gzugs nub tu gzigs nas bzhag/bza' ltung mngar bas sbags par mchod//a ga ru dang
267a5(rgyud): du ru ska/bdug pa rgyun tu bsreg par bya//'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing //zhag gsum bzlas pa ci nus bya//de nas zhag gsum bar du bdag/'o ma zho dang 'bras can
267a6(rgyud): 'tshal//lha la mchod pa cher bskyed nas//byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgyad//du ru ka yi mar du sbyang //dum bur re re sngags re dang //byang chub sems dpa'i drung du
267a7(rgyud): sreg/sa yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo//steng zhal nas ni snyan pa'i sgra//legaso leg so rigs kyi bu//khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus cin//'dod sman don gnyer
267b1(rgyud): yin pa//mkha' la 'phur ram rkang mgyogs sam//drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la//bdag dang skal mnyam 'dod na yang //de ring nyi du sprul bar bgyid//bco lnga'i chos la sku gzu
267b2(rgyud): te/bde gshegs ring bsrel yod pa yi//mchod rten nang ngam drung du bzhugs//gso sbyong blangs nas bsrung bar yis//sgyu sna'i me tig brgya rtsa brgyad//sdigs re brjod pas
267b3(rgyud): sku la brdeg/de tshe mdun zhal rtsa ba nas//'brug sgra chen po lta bu 'byung //sa chen rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur//de tshe bdag nyid mo sgeg par//sngags bskyug rje su dran bya ste//byang
267b4(rgyud): rgyub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa li//bdag nyid gus pus phyag 'tsha'o//bdag ni sems can thams cad
267b5(rgyud): kyi/mgon skyabs re gnas gyur nas kyang //'gro ba kun gyi re 'dod rnams//tshul bzhin du ni skong bar shog/de tshe 'dod pa stsol ba la//lha klu tshogs kyi bar chad
267b6(rgyud): med//sngags kyi 'dod don kun sgrub yin//bsod nams rdzogs byed smin lamo//phyag 'tshal brtan la bskor ba dang //mchod rten rtsig cing dkyil 'khor ni//rnal 'byor
267b7(rgyud): yan lag las ldan pas//bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir//rgyun ched med par brtson pa na//dge byed sprin lam rgyas pa ni//de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur//dpyir/
268a1(rgyud): smon lam mchog tu bshad//gang la dge sbyong g.yel ba yis//le lo can ni bdud gzungs nas//gya tshom smra zhing chos la smad//bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur/
268a2(rgyud): de phyir sman rigs gdol pa can//log spyod ca ni ring du song //ser sna le lo nga rgyal can//bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni//bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam pa//zhugs dang slar la
268a3(rgyud): bting bar bya//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o///
268a4(rgyud): de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs//sngags brjod tsam gyis gsal bar bshad//nad gdon gang dang gang la yang //sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la//rang gi rtse gcig sems kyis
268a5(rgyud): bzla/dang po snying rjer bcas pa yi//sngags kyis nang dang gdon las grol//de tshe mchod la brtson par bya//smo nad nyin re ldang ba dang //nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa 'am
268a6(rgyud): nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i rims//'byung po mkha 'gro sha za 'am//skyo byed brjed byed lus srul po//'dre gdon drag pos bgyis mod kyang //brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar
268a7(rgyud): 'gyur//yang na srad bu kha dog lnga//bdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad//mdud ldan mgul lam dpung par gdags//kha na ma tho bsags pa yi//sgrib kun zhi zhing byang
268b1(rgyud): gyur na du bgegs sogs nad lta smos ci dgos//bde rlabs bsam gyis mi khya'o//skrangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang //shu ba pol mig rma 'dzu dang //me dpal ldog pa g.yan la sogs//ma rungs pa
268b2(rgyud): nod rnams dang //ral gri mda' mi dung la sogs pas//myos saM de yis nyen pa dang //sbrul dang sdig pa rtsangs pa dang //bung ba mchu rnon la sogs pI//bdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang //brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
268b3(rgyud): stong du brjod//yang na sa ser 'jim pas byug/de yi nad las grol bar nges//bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi//gzhogs gcig phyogasund langs sam//rna ba 'on nam sna sum sA na//rgya rtswa brgya du bzlas
268b4(rgyud): pa'am//'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang //lan bdun brjod na sku byug dang //zos shing rna ba snar byugs nas//sos par 'gyur bar the tshom med//de nas byang chub sems dpa' che//nyi 'od kyis kyang rig sngags
268b5(rgyud): 'chang //srung dang lam 'gro bskyab pa'i phyir//byin rlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs//na mo bud+d+ha ya gur gan mo d+harmA ya tA yi ne/na maHsaM g+hA ya ma hA te/tri b+h+yo bi swA hA nA ma/nyin mtshan dusu 'di brjod
268b6(rgyud): pas sdig kun byang zhing nad rnams zhi//lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing //rtag tu sems dga' dam pa 'thob//byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyang //srung ba'i don du sngags 'di gsungs//sha
268b7(rgyud): ma ta he ru sha ho//A dz+nyo pa te/su ru te/shaM ki Te/ba ra ma hA te/su ru te/kA la Ta te khi ma te swA hA//tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la//bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig/na sar ba ta
269a1(rgyud): na#mas sa namaHsa ma tha/a na maHthas mtham/thas #ma mas ma lam #ma
269a2(rgyud): nAnd sel 'gyur//gzhan yang yon tan grangs med thob//sbrul gyi rna ni sgo phye la//bdun bzlas rma khar bya ba na sos//seng ge stag gzigs
269a3(rgyud): dom dred kyi//lpags la nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags//brjod nas gra khrims can la bskon//de ma thag tu rim sel 'gyur//glo bur nad kyis nyen pa la//lan bdun brjod
269a4(rgyud): pa'i gu gul bdug/ldong ros yung kar lan tshwa dkar//sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod//nad pa'i mal bzhag nas bdugs na//'byung po 'bros te nad las grol//til mar
269a5(rgyud): nang du ru rta bcos//byugs pas gzhogs nad rna nad dang //zha brum myur du sel bar byed//yang na rtse mar nyid la bya//til mar lto bar bskus pa yis//myur du bu thon
269a6(rgyud): 'gyur bar nges//lcim rtsa sha ma thon par nges//du ru ka dang spyi nong sbyar//snying nang drag po sel bar 'gyur//ba rog mo yi lci dron gyis//rma khar brnyan ni mes tshig
269a7(rgyud): pos srin bu rong bu snying la za//rta dkar gcin la khyod gong 'thung //des ni sreg chags bud par 'gyur//'bras la rams kyi lo ma yis//khu bskol bas byugs
269a8(rgyud): par bya//bong bu'i drug pa sar pa brtsir//nyal kar mig du blug na sos//mtshan mo srang la kud dkaro//de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu
269b1(rgyud): dag dkar//phung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal//phug ron ril ma nyi shu brgyad//bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang //shing sgrog la sogs grol bar nges//thal ba//
269b2(rgyud): 'am byed ma la ni sngags//stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol//gdon dang yams nad bzlog pa la//dri bzangs chu la bzlas nas bkru//bud med bu 'dod don du ni//steng bzlas pa mar
269b3(rgyud): btung bar bya//byi ba sbrul dang ru sbal sha/phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rangs//mar ga ni dang shu dag dang //sga dang gau snyod sbrang rtsi sbyar//sngags 'di yis ni shes rab
269b4(rgyud): 'dzal//na mo rat+no tra yA ya//na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/po d+hI sat+kA ya//ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya//tad+ya thA/khA hi khA haM/ba li te swA hA//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma
269b5(rgyud): stAM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te rashwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA sat+kA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM pad+mi phu/mahA pad+mi pu/pad+ma lo tsa ne phu/e maM g+ha be te/na mo a do ta ku tA
269b6(rgyud): ye/sa ra sa ra/gats+tsha gats+tsha/i maM mik+Sho ro gaM nA sha ya swA hA//nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang //thal bas mig ni phyi rol skus//mig nang thams cad 'joms par 'gyur//
269b7(rgyud): skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun//bsngags bdun bzlas pas rna ba yi//nad rnams thams cad 'joms par 'gyur//gur gum ka ra cha mnyam pas//sna yi nad ni sel bar
270a1(rgyud): byed/a ru ra yi phye ma dang //sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pa ni//so yi nad dang lce yi nad//thams cad 'joms par shes par bya//oM hUM shrI
270a2(rgyud): hUM shuk+She gu/nyi shu rtsa gtsog chu la bzla//'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo Ar+ya A ba lo ki te shwa rA ya//bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ma hA satwA ya/
270a3(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM rat+na shre/ma hA tsaN+Da/a su ra marta ka/dzA la dzA la/ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/hu ru hu ru ki ri ki ri/ha na ha ne/sarba dzA ren+d+ra kaM/ban+d+he ne/mA ra ya
270a4(rgyud): mA re ye/sarba gra haM swA hA//sngags 'di mtshal gyis bris nas kyang //mgul du btags nA ned rnams sel//gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis//las rnams
270a5(rgyud): de dang de la sbyar//sbrang bu srin bu sbrul lhog pa//g.yen pa shu ba skye nad la//sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gis byug/gang zhig btson du zhugs pa la//nyi shu rtsa gcig
270a6(rgyud): bzlas pa lnga//tsAn sde gu snying kar byug/gang gi mig nang sel ba la//shing mngar chu 'am spos chu 'am//la la sha yi khu yis bya//rna ba la ni til mar gyis//
270a7(rgyud): gzhan gyi yi ge gsal ba dang //'thab mo shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe//bum pa chu yis gdong pa bkru//gang yang byis pa srung ba ni//seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi
270b1(rgyud): pa/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang //don yod zhags pa'i sngags rings dag/stong rtsa brgyad tu bzlas btags na//tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod//ba lang rwa dang po so 'cha'//shing
270b2(rgyud): kun dang sbrul lpags pa dang //ras bal sa bon drug po dang //de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis//nas kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i sku//byi la'o rtug pa pra hA ti//shug pa bya rog sgo nga dang
270b3(rgyud): ba lang rmig pa na le sham//da ru ra dang lhan cig sbyar//de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis//lpags rnams sel phyir ru tra yis//dud pa bcu drug zhes bya ba'i//pu shel rtse dang ba bla
270b4(rgyud): dang /ba can dugi ni sbrul shun gyis//bdugaso na rims nad thams cad sel//nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed//ba lang lci ba'i khur ba ni//so ma ra dza'i phye ma gdab//
270b5(rgyud): yi ge hrI yis byin rlabs nas//mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags//brgya rtsa brgyad brjod mthungs pas ni//dug dang rims nad sel bar byed//skyer ba bskol ba'i khu bar ni//so
270b6(rgyud): po ma ra dzi'i phye ma sbyar//ril bu rgya srin tsam gyis tshang//yid bzhin nor bu sngogs brjod nas//zob pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams//zos kyang lus la gnod pa med//'o mur
270b7(rgyud): yung ba sran cig po skal//so ma ra dza blugs te blud//so so chang la ha la'i sngags//brgya rtsa brgyad sngags grangs tshang ba//brjod blung na skyugs nas ni//dugis tshugs par mi
271a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro//khyim gyi dud pa d+d+ha ma n+ta dang //du dmar \u0f7f myar 'gas//b+h+yan bams/na rdzogs//ts+tshaH rgyu ky-i cung /
271a2(rgyud): bar byed sbrul nad thams cid sel bar byed//shrI dag ru rta a gau ru//lung ba bong dadaka po rnams//de ni yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye//byugs pos du gnad thams
271a3(rgyud): cad sol//rgya mtsho srang gang mar srung gnyis//gcin srung brgyad dang lhan cig bskol//rdo rje chos kyis sngags kyis 'thungs//dug nad thams cad srel bar byed//rgyam
271a4(rgyud): rnatshwa gsum mar srang ba zhi//sbyar te mi shol sngags brjod naso//byugs nas reg pa tsam gyis ni//sdig pa sgyel gyi sbyin pa sel//kum ri dang ser po gaN+DIs//b+h+yon cham
271a5(rgyud): slar bcas lnga//gar dayang sngags dang chu yis bcud//dug nad thams cad sel bar byed//sIr pi gnyis dang ldong ros dang //ge thal gur gum leb rgan gyi//b+h+r-id+thad+han
271a6(rgyud): phreng sngags kyis brdung //dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed//glang la gza' drong rgyu skar gyis//'tsho ba 'byung na des bsal phyir//pad+ma 'dab brgyad maN+Dal gyis/
271a7(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dngos rnam ru//mgon po 'jam po'i rdo rje ni//mkha' lding gzug su 'gyur ba la//spyan ras gzigs dbang badrug gis//gus
271b1(rgyud): tshul du mchod byed bkod//nyi ma zla ba lag 'dzin pa'i//khyab 'jug gis ni byi bya'i gzugs//munan pa'i mkha' lding mig sman mdog/nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs//mig
271b2(rgyud): sum ldan po brjod pa yi//rin chen+da lA yi sder bshog can//rdo rje mchu rdo khro dang sa//nyi ma bye bas rgyan pa'i 'o//snying ka/ nyi ma 'od 'bar lo//ga yi ga nag po snga
271b3(rgyud): kyis dmyal//spu rnams gzings kyis gyur nas kyang //phyogs bcur rdo rje khyab par 'gro//gza' dang rgyu stor mag byas te//gdon drang klu rnams sreg par byas//thugs rje mi
271b4(rgyud): shol ba yi sngags//'brug sgra lta bur gsal bar brjod//gA yang grongs med stong drug ni//l-I saM rnams thams cad stugs 'dis chug/mkha' stong dkar ba brjid pa
271b5(rgyud): lus/klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya//de la mgrin pa sngon po yi//rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bkul ba ni//sa steng gtum po klu yi gdon//du ma nges par sel bar byed//
271b6(rgyud): dod tshangs pa'i srin po bsregs//'gro la 'dzinang gtang bar byed//mkhar lding dmar po snrel zam//me tig thong mkha T+wA~M ga/g.yon na 'chang sna g.yas pan//ral
271b7(rgyud): mi 'od 'bar ba 'chang //mgon po sa ne'i sgras bskul nas//dpe rlabs bskul po'i me dang mnyi ma//sbal dang rin chen dbyun rje can//mkha' lding sha zi'i gdon lani/mgon
272a1(rgyud): sngags kyis bskul//mkha'agro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni//ljang ku ral gri phur pa 'chang //pad+ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul//las rnams gang dang gang
272a2(rgyud): la yang //sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o//ji ltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas//lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya//ngo bo nyid kyi mtshon pa yis//sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs
272a3(rgyud): 'gyur/dad ni phyag rgya bshad par bya//sku yi mdun du langs nas kyang //rkang pa g.yas pa yud tsam bskums//lag gnyis so sor thung ngu brkyang //gung srin so sor mthil
272a4(rgyud): du bkug/mthob mdzub dag ni so sor brkyang //gru khug lag mthil mdun du brtan//'gro 'am 'dug kyang dgra dpung las//rgyal phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya//na mo
272a5(rgyud): rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+yA bA lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM a ba te/ba ro ba te/e h+ye hi swA hA//yang na
272a6(rgyud): sngo ni ltar lus bsrang te//snying khar thal skyer spro ba bsnol//mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs rtse mo spyad//mtheb gnyis mdzub tshig dang por bkug/lag ma thil cung zad ma reg
272a7(rgyud): pa gzung sngags gang brjod phyag rgya'o//bgegs kyi 'tshe ba byung ba'i tshe//sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis gsal bya//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nam Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/
272b1(rgyud): bo d+hi srat+tA yA/ma hA satwA ya/mahA kA ru Ni kA y+ya/tad+yaSh+TA/oM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma Ni maN+Da lA ya/e h+ye h+ni pa ri mA shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA//yang na sgom pa 'jug pas ni//thog mar phyub//
272b2(rgyud): rgya 'di bcing //dbus gtsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar//mdzub gnyis bkug la rtse sprad nas//de la mtheb gnyis bzhar bar bya//'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges//yod
272b3(rgyud): na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas//so ro mo rtse rnams reg par bya//mtheb gnyis brkyang nas mdzub nang sbyar//sprin 'tsham su ni bzhag par bya//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+yA
272b4(rgyud): ba lo ki te shA rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/mo hA kA ru Ne kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM sarba dr-iSh+TA na mau badz+rA ya me swA hA//khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur//yang ni b+h+r-ing
272b5(rgyud): ste mnyamo gtsug rgya//snying kAr bzhag la stegs 'di brjod//nA mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ba~M d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/
272b6(rgyud): tAd+ya thA/oM sarba de ba aM na le swA hA//glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin//yang ni sbreng ste rting pa spring //log gnyis kyis 'jigs byed tshul bya//rtsa sngags gang rung brjod pas
272b7(rgyud): ni/de ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur//yang na pad+mo rgyan lung gi/rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o//lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag gis//mthe bo'i se mo mnan byas
273a1(rgyud): te//mthe'u chung rgya mo'i gung mo sprad//gshegasu gsol ba'i phyag rgya sgra//dbug na mdzub rtse bgul zhing dbug/yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub ma
273a2(rgyud): dgug/g.yon pa sbyar btang bya'o//na mo rat+na trA yA ya/na maM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ba~M d+hi satwA ya/mahA sAtwA ya/ma hA kA ru NaM kA yA/tad+ya thA/oM br-ih+ma/e
273a3(rgyud): hi swA hA//yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na//mdzub mi g.yas pa lha chi ni rnams//yang ni phyag rgya 'di bcas la//nyi zla gzas bzung dus su ni//gzungs sngags pa mar la/
273a4(rgyud): bzlas nas/phyag rgyas btab nas zos pas nI//shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel zhing //nang med gzugs bzang thob par nges//'grengs te rkang pa shibs thal sbyar
273a5(rgyud): nas/'theb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa//snying khar bzhag bya spyan ras gzigs//yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya//mchod sogs las kyi sngon 'gro ba'o//
273a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la yang ngo //mdzub bkug mthe bong se mor bcas//lag gnyis rgyu ba spang gar dbang rgya//thal sbyar mthab mdzub so sor brkyang //mgrin pa
273a7(rgyud): sngon po'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang //mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya'o//lag gnyis rgyab sprad ma thob gnyis brkyang //bdug pa bzang la sngags
273b1(rgyud): 'di bzla//na mo r+yAt+na trA yA ya/na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/da d+hi satwA ya/mahA sat+kA ya/mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/na mo rat+na sha ri tsan+na/a l+r-i kA ra ma na te dzaM pu pra tsaka ba shwa rA dza
273b2(rgyud): ya \u0f7ftad+ya thA/oM rit+ne rat+ne/ta ta she rat+na tra ta sha rat+na/pra te ma he rat+ne pra b+hU te/rat+ne gir+b+he swA hA//sde ba ra brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur//'gro gzhan
273b3(rgyud): bdag la byams 'dod ni//so shing la ni nyi shu gcig/ldob rkyen 'dod pa shu dag la//steng brgyad bzlas nA snying khar bsku//gang bshang phyag rgya dang bcas pas//bdug pa'i
273b4(rgyud): sngags 'dis bgegs kyang 'bros//na maHsarba bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/na mo rat+na twA yA ya/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/be d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/
273b5(rgyud): tad+ya thA/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/tad+ya thA/oM hu pi hu pi/ka pa du pi/pra gA ya ni swA hI//rnam grangs 'dug pas sangs rgyas 'dug/lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya//yan lag
273b6(rgyud): g.yas pa'i mthe bar ni//lag mthol bzhag nas sor mo dgab//rna lteg phyar nas mdzub mo ni//brkyang brkum bskul bas spro ba dang //g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste//
273b7(rgyud): dus ma yin par 'chi sogs bzlog/lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang //sor mo bsnol te bkod pa las//mthe bong mthe'u chung so so ni//spra de sprad pa shes rab rgya//
274a1(rgyud): oM sar+thas shAd+hA na swAt+ma//de bzhon stsol te dkanA pa yA//gung gnyis nang dub shobs sbyong ba/mar ma'i rgyu sgra sngags 'dam//oM dz+nyAn+tadz+nyAn/
274a2(rgyud): hA/nga nyid smrabs nas grang ma sa /rje snang bsgres kyi bdug sus//sa~Mr+b+ba bad+hUd+hArmAhUM//ti skangs rtsa mes rang dun/na pa'i tshus ni sbyin pa
274a3(rgyud): baibi d+hi swAhA//rting sprang sor maM gyen du bgrod//zhal nas mthor tshul bshos kyi rgya//oM na~M ba~M d+hi praSh+TA ta~M swA hA/lag gnyis bkug nas rtswa brgyad sprang //mtho bong gyen du
274a4(rgyud): yan paM ni//na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o//oM bA sa ra Ni swAhA//snyim pa kha phye bteg pa'i tshul//ri ma skyil ba'i phyag rgya'o//oM UMk+Sha~M d+hIHsa ka la ga Na pa riny+dza
274a5(rgyud): ba rI ke ra a A/a bA tA raM taM/A b+hA ta ra ti/a ba ta rin+te da shaM di ka lo k+Sho pA la/sa pa ri wA re b+h+yaHoM daM ba liM gr-id+hAm+b+ha/khA da tu bi nr-i dz+yo/ya thai ba~M ya thaiSh+TaM dzaHd+hU \u0f7f/
274a6(rgyud): d+hiSh+Tha sar+tharba satwA ni/shwA ti~M ku ru/br-iSh+Ta~M k+Sha rU bA shi ku R+Sha/AM b+hAr+yAHkurA gr-i d+h+waM/ka rata kArba~M hu~M hU~M hU~M phan+d+ha/Ur+yA ya~M bi lo ki ti shwa ra s+ya/Adz+nyA pa ya tIswAdz+haiM/oM a
274a7(rgyud): sbyi sa ma hrI Sh+T+r-i / dzahU~M rdza / tu phyir ba dang gnas / sbyi ba gyu
274b1(rgyud): amA hAHl-ika shwarAd+hA nusmA ti kAn+d+ha pa r+m+ma//yo dgus rnams la skur rngas/ phyir chu dang bcas pa stsal//rnal 'byor ldan pa'o rnal 'byor grogs//lha nga 'jog rten stong
274b2(rgyud): dang / 'byung ba yi dgas kun brtson 'gyur//sems kyi ljags rgya ldan pa s+ho//nyon mongs sems la rang drang to//k+Shek+Sha 'brim phrog sems dag d+hA 'i// slong d+hA
274b3(rgyud): chub rin chen gyis//las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed//mdzad pa rgya chen kun grub 'gyur//'phags pa snyen ngas gzigs dbang phyugi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+yA d+ma bzhis
274b4(rgyud): bya ba'i rgyud las sngags kyi sbyar ba 'i leru ste brgyad pa'o///de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i cha//nyi ma'i snying po na
274b5(rgyud): byo ba 'khor gyi chags dang bcas pa zhig/mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang //bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis//bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas//bskor
274b6(rgyud): du ma byas nas kyang //phyag 'tshal gsang bskor phyogs gcig mchod//dbus gzugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol//mgon po'i yon tan kun gyi rgyal//ye shes rmang
274b7(rgyud): kyi 'byung gnas gtso//thar pa'i lam chen nyi shar rgyal//'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshalo//mtshan dab mthar thug med pa'i sku//gzi brjid rgya chi mkha' khyab la/
275a1(rgyud): bla gros yangs pa'i na mkha' can//sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo//tshangs dbyangs du ma bas mi khyab//nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas/
275a2(rgyud): tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung //gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo//ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgri//bas mo yas bsam du med bsams pas//bas ma~M khyu
275a3(rgyud): pa'i shes rab dang //thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshalo//'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i//ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa//kun rtog dra ba sel ba yi//skyon
275a4(rgyud): ma di ring ba shad du gsol//byis rnams mun po'i 'ob su lhung //nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyi skrag/rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzo dang ldan//byang chub sems dpa' 'tshang
275a5(rgyud): bas 'jigs//nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la//shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis//bag chags bcas pa gtan spong ba'i//thabs mchog du ma ba shadu
275a6(rgyud): gsol//de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches//'di zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas naso//tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas//nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas//
275a7(rgyud): shes rab snying rjer 'brel ba yi//sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma gsungs//bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di//nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni//legaso byang chub sems dpa' che/
275b1(rgyud): ba dang ldan pa khyad lags//n+ya gcig gus dang bcas pa yi//sems kyi legs rten yid la bzung //nyams dka' bde ba'i sa phyogs//shin tu du/sa las na//
275b2(rgyud): 'khor gru be ni sgom pa bya//glu bani sgra bani rta babs bcas//shar ram lho yi sgo gtud bya//dkar ba ser po dmar po dang //ltung gA chen gyis bri bar bya//dbus
275b3(rgyud): 'dab brgyad pa//dkar po'i lte bar 'tshams par dmar//mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa'o//gser dngul zangs sam sa nyid la//bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phreM//kha g.yel
275b4(rgyud): zhabs tshong zhum pa la//shin tu gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang //ga bur gur gum bcu grang dang //gla rtsi gi wang chu yis bkang //b+ha g+h+ri seng g+hi ha sa der//ka ri kar ni de bko/
275b5(rgyud): nas 'bras til gro mon sran dang //gser dngul byi ru mu tig dang //man shel yin te rin chen lnga//bum par skul nas ras dkar gyis//mgul pa bcings nas kha rgyan
275b6(rgyud): yang /dri zhing shing l-i me tog bzhag/me tog phreng dang bcas pa de//pad+ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang //rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas//dpag bsam shing chen 'bras
275b7(rgyud): bur bcas//'jig rten dbang gis gang ba yis//sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas//sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas//dgongs pa rgya chen skyes 'gyur te//
276a1(rgyud): legaso bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur//rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi//lha mo tshogs dang glu len dang //bkra shis du ma brjod par 'gyur//da
276a2(rgyud): mkha' la ye shes kyi//'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis//shing chen yongasu smon pa las//bdud rtsi tshor chen 'bebs par 'gyur//'jig rten skyong la gtor me sbyin//rgyal
276a3(rgyud): dang rgyal sras mchod par bya//skar ma la sogs 'bab pa'am//chos gcig nas ni nya yi bar//sngags kyi phreng ba brjod par bya//lha la yang yang bskor ba bya//las
276a4(rgyud): rnams gang dang gang la yang //lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya//de dang de ni las rnams la//ci bde bar yang sbyar bar bya//phran tshogs las la spyan ma'i sngags//lhog
276a5(rgyud): pa 'brum pa la sogs la//mi bshol ba ye sngogs kyi sbyar//gdon rigs bzlog la ga ra dbang ste//bya do stems rig sngags bzlog pa la//don yod zhags pa'i sngags
276a6(rgyud): kyis bkru/shes rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos//klu nad ha la ho las sel//tshe 'phel pad+ma rgyan lung ste//mgron sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed//ha ri chen pos bu dug/
276a7(rgyud): spos te//gdong bcu gcig pas blo bur sel//seng ge sgras ni 'dze nad sel//rnal 'byor yo byad 'dod pas ni//yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyi bkru//bkra shis rol
276b1(rgyud): mo du ma dang //gtsang sbra gos ser ldan pa yis//snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkru//myur du sgrib pa 'byung ba dang //'dod yon kun grub sngags phred ni//gang dang gang
276b2(rgyud): yang sbyar bar 'gyur//phran tshags gzhan lta smos cing gos//zla ba bzas bzung gyur pa'i tshe//mar srang gcig ni dngul snod gzhug/sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags
276b3(rgyud): brjod nas//zla ba seMs na se mar blangs te//zos sam lus la byugs pa yis//nad rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur//ldong ros go'u wang che mnyam pas//sku yi mdun
276b4(rgyud): bzhag sngags stong bzla//chus dkri dpral bar thig le ni//khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub//chu sgron sbyar nas lus bkrus na//nad dang bgegs rnams dge
276b5(rgyud): par 'gyur//bse 'bras la ni brgya rtsa brgyad//bzlas nas khro zhal g.yas la byug/drag dpung phyogasu bstan ne ni//dgra g.yul shin tu nyes par 'gyur//bal bu
276b6(rgyud): 'bras bu sngags rer bcas//bal bu le lo brgya rtsa brgyad//sku yi drung du bsregs pas ni//mi yams phyugs nad thams cad 'chad//skud pa tsang ma mdog dmar po//
276b7(rgyud): sngags re btab pa'i mdud pa bdun//zhal gcig steng zhal btags nas ni//nad pa la btags rims nad zhi//sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig/mdun zhal steng
277a1(rgyud): bzhag blangs btags pas//mkha' gro 'byung po ro langs gdon//drag pos zin pa 'joms par byed//gral te des kyang ma smos na//mdung re byAm+b+ha
277a2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad brjod nas//zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te//blangs te btags na nges par grol//sdug bsngal nad pa yun rings brdungs//khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs
277a3(rgyud): zhugs nas//'bru re sngags re thang 'bro ma 'bras//sku bdun brgya rtsa brgyad bsgrags te//gong ltar sgrub pa'i skud pa yang //lus la btags na nges par grol//mdza'
277a4(rgyud): pab dang 'khrug pa dang //byang stems drag po bzlog pa la//sku la spos dang me tog mchog/bi ni yi yi gzugs mdun du//bro bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming sreg/sngags re
277a5(rgyud): mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad//mdung ldan g.yon gyi khro zhal gdagis//zhag bzhi lon na sku las dgrol//mdud pa re re'i bar du ni//sngags re brjod cing ba cad par byang
277a6(rgyud): bdag la sdang byed skyabasu 'ong //rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa'o//brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni//tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la//mdud ri sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad//mdud
277a7(rgyud): nas mdud bzhag stong btags pa//zhag gcig lon bsgrol lus btags na//las rnams bkra shis tshu ldi 'grub//gang zhing sgrib pa'i gshegs ldan pos//las
277b1(rgyud): gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing //dus dus bkra mi shes byung na//glu tsang sgra bum chu bzang po gnyis//brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs der brjod//dag pos sku gzugs brgyu bar bya//gnyis
277b2(rgyud): pas bi na ya ka bkrus//brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas//rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya//bar chad byang nas 'di kun 'grub//tso lter sprul pa'i gdon bsal phyir//byi ba'i mag
277b3(rgyud): thal ba dang //sa bzang chu ltar smras pa'i sa//byi la yis na gzugs byas te//sku yi mdun du bzhag nas kyang //khro zhal gi yon par sras bus gdagos// mgrin sngags
277b4(rgyud): stong phrag byung //gzungs brgya zlas pa'i ral gri yos//dum bu brgyaHba rgyadru ga tug/dum tsau ri re sngags re dang //deng gi nang du dor bar bya//de dag gnod pa gtan du gsol//
277b5(rgyud): mig na de sna tshogs ma rungs la//'bras bu gsum pa zhib tu btags//snang dkar ri khye'u che'i nu zhor bcas//bu bcas sar po'i bud mod dang //khyi phag dag gis mthong
277b6(rgyud): byas nas//zlum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags//sngags stong bzlas nas sbyar ba des//mig tu blugs na mig 'bras skye//mig nad thams cat+pa sol bar byed//mig
277b7(rgyud): rnon dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur//lhag mo ma yin khron pa'i chus//gu gu lor bur cham nyam bskal//khyor gang 'dag par gyur pa de//rtsa ba'i zhal sdang so sngags sbyong
278a1(rgyud): stong bzlas//bkrol nas ril bu byas mid na//ha la ha la'i dug 'joms 'gyur//glang po dkar po'i gi'u waM ni//mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun/
278a2(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan lag bskul//dpral bar thig le byas gyur na//lha klu 'byung po'i mi rnams dga'//khyo shugs mthun rtag pa la//ngur pa'i 'jug sgo sku mdun du/
278a3(rgyud): stong bzlas lag tu blangs nas bdun//chu bskems sa 'am tshor med na//ling ki'i drung du sku bzhugs la//cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du//stong brjod chus skyes cher chen 'bebs
278a4(rgyud): gang zhig char tshe rang 'dod ni//'gog par snyams zhugs phyag rgya bcing //sku yi mdun du rtag par ni//a ga ru nag bdug pa sogs//mchod pa rgyun tu mchod bya zhing //
278a5(rgyud): brgyad nas nye bar sngags stong brjod//mig mngon shes sgrub pa'i phyir//dri zhim dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la//rgyal mtshan ba dan kha dog bzhi//bla ro yol ba dkar po yi/
278a6(rgyud): dbus su pad+ma lnga bris te//ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdungs bzhugs//tsan dan dkar po'i dri chu dang //bdug pa rgyun tu mchod par bya//ba mdog ser skya'i mar gyi ni//sgron
278a7(rgyud): ma'i phreng bas mchod par bya//man shi ri ka ku shu dang //pad+ma dmar dang sngon po dang //rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang //nya rkun nag po'i myu gu dang //ma rlabs pa dang gu gu le dang /
278b1(rgyud): ku banA sa dang gi lu wi dang //bur gum dmar dang ser po dang //tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs//de rnams phyed chad gla rtsi dang //ga pur sprul nas re re'i tshad//sngags ni stong
278b2(rgyud): brag re re grangs//sku yi mdun du brjod par dbye//de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas//sngags khrid ba cas tI nyal no//zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal//sku yi steng zhal btags nas ni//meched
278b3(rgyud): pa byas nas gsol ba gdab//khar ba'i thur mas mig tu sprul//ling thog gam ni mchi ma 'jig/sbyin dkar sbyin dmar g.yos pa dang //klad pa na dang mig nad dang //glo bur long dang
278b4(rgyud): thibs pa sel//nyin gnyis bskus na lus kyi nad//bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel bar 'gyur//gsum po gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur//bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad 'byang //lngas ni
278b5(rgyud): cod po g.yul las rgyal//drug pas rming na byad stems sel//bdun pa blo bur 'chi ba med//bdun phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob//gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur/
278b6(rgyud): bzhi pas gnod sbyin lnga pas klu//lnga pas lha ma srin po rnams//drug pas mkha' lding dri bdun lha//bdun pa nag po chen po 'grub//brgyud pa ma mo dgus gter mthong //bcu
278b7(rgyud): pas 'gro ba'i sman par 'gyur//bcu gcig lha mi'i khang par phyin//bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srong khyim//bcu gsum klu'i khang par byin//bcu bzhi sum cu gsum pa'i gnas
279a1(rgyud): bco lnga mtshan mo kun mthong ste//bcu drug khams gter mthong bar nges//bcu bdun rdo rje sa gzhi dang //rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med//bco brgyad
279a2(rgyud): pa ni nyi ltar mgyogs//bcu dgus rgyal sras kun mthong 'gyur//nyi shus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis//lung bstan dam chos bshad par 'gyur//nyi shu gcig bris gzu
279a3(rgyud): khams phyin//mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur//lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi//zhing khams du mar phyin pa dang //dam chos nyan dang zhing sbyong 'gyur//mig sman
279a4(rgyud): sbyor ba blo med 'di//sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsang //de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba//sna tshogs sman gyis sbyor ba yos//bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i//'dod
279a5(rgyud): po'i don kun 'grub byed nyon//ga pur gla rtsi gi'u waM dang //gur bum dze ti li shri dang //ka ta na li dang sug smel dang //n+dan dkar dang pad+ma dang //gser gyi me tog ut+pa
279a6(rgyud): la sngo//re re la yang sngags stong bzla//sbrang rtsi dkar po lhan cig bsdu//dkyil 'khor dbus su sku yi zhal//dbu ma la ni gdags bya ste//tshes gcig nas ni bcu
279a7(rgyud): bzhi par//nyin re sngags stong brjod par bya//mchod pas rgya cher mchod par bya//bstod dang gsol ba gdabs par bya//dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang //bco
279b1(rgyud): malanayang thamathacams sa na mthas ma tham/a namam thas nathaH/Shas mthamamatham tham mamasal mamamam aHThayam amal na yamam mam ma
279b2(rgyud): lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla//de nas gtsang ma'i snod bzhag ste//dgos pa gang dang gang la yang //lha ni de dang de dag sbyar//gang la bgags kyis gdon gyur nas//pad+ma gar gyi
279b3(rgyud): sngags kyis bdun//mgo bo'i nad yams bsal ba dang //ha la ha la'i sngags bzlas pas//gso la sogs pa 'dul bar bya//gzhan dag dga' bar 'dod pas ni//yid bzhi nor bu'i phreng
279b4(rgyud): sngags kyis//mig gi steng du byugs par bya//rgyal po rgyal mo la sogs pa//pho mo dbang du bya 'dod na//rdo rje chos kyi phreng sngags kyis//dpral bar thig le bya ba'o//'dze la sogs
279b5(rgyud): pa'i nad la ni//seng ge sgra yis phreng sngags kyis//lus la reg pa bde bar byug/long du zhugs pa'i nad la ni//ha ri chen po'i sngags dang chus//rang gi khong du btung bar bya//byad
279b6(rgyud): sems rig sngags bzlog pa la//don yong zhags pa'i sngags kyis bdug/dug nad sel la mgrin sngo te//sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni//gdong bcug pa nyid kyis sbyar//rgyal srid
279b7(rgyud): thob par byed pa ni//mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung //de nas sbyor ba bA shad bya ba//'byung po sha za mkha'i gro dang //lus srul po dang brjod byed kyis//nyin cig nas ni nyin bdun bIr
279b8(rgyud): glo bur ba yi rims rnams dang //rtog pa'i rims dang drag po'i rims//brtun byed la sog rI rigs dang //glo bur ba dang rtag pa'i gdon//nad drag po ni ji snyed dang //dug rigs
280a1(rgyud): rims dung sgru ba dang //'bras dang ldog pa med pal dang //shu bsngo dang 'brum bu'i rims//ngal mig me dpal ldog la sogs//mngon du glang dang bang
280a2(rgyud): snang la/dasngags stong bzlas pa'i 'jam pa ni//sku zhal dbus la btags nas ni//mchod pas mchod sngags khri brjod//ches gcig nas ni tshes brgyad par//gsal ba yang
280a3(rgyud): ni gdab byas nas//ches dgu'i snga gro dgrol bar bya//bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod//byug pas nad rnams thams cad sel//cho ga de ltar ldan pas ni//sna nad ru
280a4(rgyud): 'brumar b+h+yog/yang na bre bar sngags bcas gdags//byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la//'bru mar ram ni sbed bu bya//dud 'gro la ni chu nyid dme//yang na srid bu bya ba
280a5(rgyud): ste//rtse mar dag gi mchog tu 'gyur//sbyor rnams gong dang gang la yang //sku byad mchu dpe ldan pas ni//me long nang gi gzugs ltar dmigs//gsol ba btab pas
280a6(rgyud): sgrub par gagyur//dang ba skye mdza sman sems//thun mongs rigs can sra po sleb mas//gnas pa mas dang ldan pa ni//thun maung kun tu zhugs pa gas//gsum
280a7(rgyud): pa rigs pa'i rtags ldan po//rigs 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs//bzhi pa lhag sems 'thun ldan zhing //gsang sngags sngon du gyur pa yi//lnga
280b1(rgyud): med pa'i sems//drug pa bdag gzhan dbyer med sems//bdun pa chos rnams rgyal ba'i sems//brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sems//dgu pa rten 'brel zab snang sems//bcu pa
280b2(rgyud): mtshan bral grub pa'i sems//bcug mtshon bral snang ba'i sems//bcu gnyis chos kyi sgo yi sems//bcu gsum lhag par 'byung ba'i sems//bcu bzhi shes bya mthar thug sems//
280b3(rgyud): rgyas dang sras dang khyab pa dang //rtags dang 'gyur med gya nom pa'i//gnas skabs bcu bzhi rab tu rtogs//sems rtogs gyur na sangs rgyas chos//rgyud kun du ni rgyal bas bshad//
280b4(rgyud): 'od zer lcags kyu khyud mo raM'i bor//spros pas lha klu 'bum phrag dge ba kun slong sems//dkar po skyes nas byang chub rin chen gling //thob mdzad blos bsgyur 'di ni ngo mtshar che//'phags
280b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dre ba zhes bya ba las sku la rten pa'i sbyor po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs//rgyu
280b6(rgyud): chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi//shar lho'i mtshoms na bi zhugs pa yi//nya na ka 'os la sogs pa//drang sring tshegs rnams mgrin gcig tu//bcom ldan 'das la 'di sad gsol//
280b7(rgyud): oM kun mkhyen ye shes nyi ltar lha//mtshan dpe du mas rgyan mdzad pa//bdud las rgyal ba rkang gnyis mchod/'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo//zhi ba chags bral 'od gsal ba//rgyun
281a1(rgyud): tshad med pas 'khor lo'i tshul//skyen na 'chi las sgrol zhing //rnam dag sgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal//sa chen sa chen gzhan rnams kyang //sa la 'dren
281a2(rgyud): mdzad tshugs chen rdzogs//rgyun mi chad du sku 'byung ba//thal sbyar dbus bcugs phyogs gcig 'khod//de nas rgyal ba kun gyi yab//dbang phyug chen po'i mchogri lha//spyan
281a3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can//'gro la thugs brtse'i sla du ni//rig sngags bla na med pa gsungs//sngags de myur du 'grub pa dang //skongs dang ngadag la sel ba'i phyir//mi
281a4(rgyud): yis las la brten po'i phyir//sbyor ba rim pa bshad du gsol//de skad gsol nas drang srong tshogs//phyaga'i'atshal bskor ba byas nas kyang //mchod pa'i char chen phab pa ste//

281a7(rgyud): pas nad yams gnod pa zhi//nad la mar lhag nyung zhig btung //nad gzer gang yang 'joms par 'gyur//yang na 'bru men phye ma 'am//sa 'am spra tshil gzugs byas te//
281b1(rgyud): skusmad phrul bAtags nas//rog sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod//ral bris bachubs nas skyon srog bya//brgya drug ldas na sdud pyod nyams//yang mdug gzusas brnyan gar+dz+dza
281b2(rgyud): dug khrag nom pa'i shing lnga skye//drug cu rtse ni'i grangs kyis ni//tsher bcad pa mi dbang du 'gyur//'byung po drug bzhin pa'o//gu gul yungs ka ri da ltar sregam
281b3(rgyud): sgyog ma la//bu ram skad d+hI ni mar ga//sku yi sna mdun du bsregs pas ni//'gro ba'i nad lams 'chang par 'gyur//gra gul da// bo nyi shu ga cig/bsregs na byang chub

281b5(rgyud): bsod nams rgyas 'dod na//dri bzung chu dang sa gtsang la//klu ba'i khwa brang dkyil 'khor bya//dri bzong shing la khru gang brtsig/mAn+t+ri sha ka yungs kar snang //rnga ma zho mar a ga
281b6(rgyud): //tsad don dkar po dmar po dang //d+hi zhim man 'i tshad kyi shing //'bru bzang tshod dang bcas pa dag//deng bar sngags stong 'das nas kyang //brgya rtsa brgyad tu bsgrags
281b7(rgyud): pa yis//tshe ring nang med rgyal srid za//stong gis 'jig rten pa dag 'byung//khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin te//'dum gyis gzugs khams mngon du 'gyur//sa yas rgyal
282a1(rgyud): sras kun mthong zhing //mngon shes drug dang ldan pa 'gyur//bye bas rgyal ba kun mthong zhing //ning khams du ma sbyong bar 'gyur//gzhan yang phran tshugs las/

282a3(rgyud): rnams ni bsal bya la//gu gul sgog pa rnga mo'i sha/brgya rtsa brgya du bsreg par bya//rmi lam ngan dang mtshan mau ngan//phra mo nad dang gdon rigs la//dur ba yung kar mchog tu bshad//'bru rnaMs
282a4(rgyud): gang dang gang 'dod la//'bru rigs de nyid sbyin bsreg bya//char pa dbab par 'dod pas ni//tsam pa kA dang rnam gsum dang //mngar gsum nA ga ge sar dang //dbang po lagi sbyin sreg ni//nr-i 'di
282a5(rgyud): char pa 'bab par 'gyur//gal te bcad por 'drod pa ni//thal ba de ltar yungs kar gyis//nan tan phyogs bzhir gar dbang gi/sngags kyi yang yang gtor bar bya//yung kar ni mar ska rtsing+ga/
282a6(rgyud): 'bras yos kyis ni byis pa sos//gdon nam rigs las 'jigs pa dang //khyim srung bar ni 'dod pa yis//pad+ma dmar po'i sbyin sreg ni//nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na bya//sems bzang gtu
282a7(rgyud): rings 'dod pas ni//tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin bsreg bya//phran tshegs yims nad sel ba la//lo ma tsam gyi sbyin bsrog bya//phyug nad sel bar 'dod pa'i tshe//'o ma me tog dkar
282b1(rgyud): bcas sreg/nad dang gdon bcas se lA ba la//mngar gsum 'bru bzang ga pur bcas//du ra ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams//dri bzang 'o ma can rnams ni//me tog bzo b+hI shing
282b2(rgyud): la sreg/gdon nad zhi bar 'dod pas ni//'bras bu gsum sogs shing rnams sreg/gdon phran pa ni mngar gsum dang //dur ba dkar po bsregs pas zhi//rmi 'om ngan dang ltas
282b3(rgyud): ngan gang //'bras phye mar bsngags sel bar byed//gos dang snod bcas rdzas dang lus//gzhan grib ngan pas gos pa la//'bras phye mar dang spos dkar dang //me tog dkar po bsrog

282b6(rgyud): pas glo nad sel bar byed//'bras bu gsum dang zho sha lnga//bsregs pas snying nad sel bar byed//lu su sbreng dang byi dang ka/bsreg pas mchin po'i nad sel 'gyur//me

287a7(rgyud): gnyis dang bcas pa bri//rwa rnams la ni hUM gnyis pa'o//rigs sngags bzlog dang bcas pa bri//lte bor oM hrIHswA hA'i bar//bdag nyid bsrung zhes bri bar bya//mu khyud dang
287b1(rgyud): /rang ba ga//gtogs du yod bcan no sdugaso//gnyis pad+ma gdod bcu gtsug pa thugs//gsum par bad+ma ga da ga/sngags rnams g.yas bskyor ba bya//gA smyen

288a1(rgyud): tu bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur//oM ha na se rU pa d+hA ri swAhA//sad bu ma nyams dkar po la//nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud pa bya//bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzla

288b1(rgyud): ba dang //rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur//de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis//'gro ba'i dron du 'di skad gsol//rang 'byung can gyis ras la ni//sen rtsis 'khor la

289b1(rgyud): ma rnams ni ci bdor bri//gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'//glo bur yi mug+na skye 'gyur na//pad+ma 'dab mA bzhi pa yi//dbus dang gzugs mtshan ma bri//la shu mar rdo rje mdog

294b1(rgyud): las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur//gal te bye mas bdug pas kyang //sdig pa thams cad byung 'gyur te//kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang //gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod//

295a1(rgyud): /gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i//ril bus bgegs tshogs sel bar byed//ke sur+Na dang sge'u gsher dang //bA la ta ka tsha ba gsum//ser po mu zi phye ma rnams

295a7(rgyud): ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa yi//bar snang la ni 'gro bar nges//pan du ma dang kir dang //ma ka ri dang su mi tam//pra ban ta ma'i ril du ni//nyi zla gzas bzung du//
295b1(rgyud): ming/shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste//gos pa 'dzin 'gyur smos ci dgos//gi'u waM swA hA tse ni dang //sre ta sbrang gi ril bu bya//sngags stong bzlas nas khur bcug na//'das
295b2(rgyud): pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur//gi'u wang su ga pa yi dang //ba ra swa ta ha su ri//A re hu ri sbrang rtsi ri bcas//ril bu byas na sngags stong bzla//mi pas ma 'ongs don nas/
295b3(rgyud): shes//gzhan yang nad 'don byed pa yi//ril bu chen pa bshad par bya//rgyal dang rnam rgya la na gu la//kran d+ha na gu li dang ni//ru Ni e pa ya ba ni//i pa yan ta ka/
295b4(rgyud): ra gan d+ha ka dang pri yang ku//'khor lo che dang 'khor lo dang //briSh+Ta kau Ti de bzhin du//so ma ra tsa un na ti//re re la yang sngags phreng dang //brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod
295b5(rgyud): par bya//de nas brdungs te sbrang dang bcas//byis pa la ni dpung par te//bu 'dod mo la mgul par gdags//'di btags pa yi de ma theg/'jigs pa brgyad dang nad las
295b6(rgyud): grol da ba mar shu dag ba lcir bcas//lcags kyi sno du btsos pa yis//ril bu a mra'i 'bras bu tsam//sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod//phyis ni nyi shu gcig brjod
295b7(rgyud): nas//snga bar med pas shes rab 'phel//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ye/ma hA sat+kA ya/mahA kA ru Ni kA yau/tad+ya thA/oM shud+d+he mri te/
296a1(rgyud): /r+m+madz+dza r+m+ma//na rab rgyu du//dul sgrags sa ts+tsha//rgyus ma na na rlu smra//nga smram ma

296a3(rgyud): mchog de la rab dag nyid//'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang //'byung ba la sogs smras kyi dgos//rtag par rang gi yid la ni//snying po gsang sngags bcang ba byA/

296a7(rgyud): bya yin//sngags sgrub pa la mamos pol//'dun du rtso man de dag rnams//de skang gsungs pa'i dmathan/rdo rje snying po nyi 'od dang //bdag tshon chen sno
296b1(rgyud): dang /pad spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang //ye shes dbang phyug par dbang phyug/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams//rang rang sde dpung sngar bcas pa//'khor gyi dkyil 'kho
296b2(rgyud): chen po rnams//'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas//mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bkram byas te//rin chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yi//mchod pas na mkha'i gtor rab bkang
296b3(rgyud): rol mo du ma lhab lhub dang //sil snyan lha yi tshogs rnams kyis//sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar//bkod pa mtha' yas bsham byas te//de nas byang chub
296b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs//mgon 'gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams//spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la//yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod//spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod/
296b5(rgyud): rten ched/'jig rten dbang po dbang phyug cha//pad+ma sems dpa' bang 'byung che//rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal//dge pa chen po chas rgyal gaH//blo gras chen pa sems dpa'

296b7(rgyud): mchog sbyin la phyag 'tshal//snang ba kun chen thabs po che//tshe mnyam dga' ba dgongs pa che//dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal//bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal//bsaM
297a1(rgyud): chen mkhyen chen thog chen po//rnal 'byor chen po med rngan po//bde stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad che//pad+ma rgyus 'al phyag 'tsha'o//chos ma

297a7(rgyud): ldan rdo rje gzugs//gozi brjid che mchog chos snang ba/snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal//de tso mgon rgyal po pad+ma dang mi//myos kyi dpal mag ni 'dren mdzad /

297b7(rgyud): la rtog pa'i ye shos ngo bo nyid//nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungaso//kun tu bzang po spyod tshul can//dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba/sems can gang du 'dod sbyor
298a1(rgyud): ba'i rigs ni rigs chen thams cad pa'o//lus ngag yid bcu spyod bcu ni//rgyun mi 'cha du sbyor mod kyang //rags pa yi ni gzugs brnyan//
298a2(rgyud): mthus sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi//lha la goms pa lha mthong ngam//mngon shes dang po sems gsol bsre//mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu 'phrul
298a3(rgyud): che/du sems snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa//mtshan ma phra mo la sogs pa'i//mngon shes 'jig rten gsal mthong sa//'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste//brtan//
298a4(rgyud): pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o//dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam spyod//sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang //zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang //sdug bsngal
298a5(rgyud): kun 'byung 'gog dang lam//bzhi bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang //rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur po//'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs kun mchog/mtshan med
298a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin la gnas nas//rtsol bcas gzhan dron sgrub pa dang //rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang //nges tshig chos don spros pa'i mtha'//rdzu 'phrul

298b1(rgyud): bsdu spyod pa//rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis//cho sku kun snang kun tu 'dra//bang skur snang ba pad+ma'i spyan//yi go 'khor lo sprul tshogs rgyu//mtshon bya mtshan nyid rdo rje

299a1(rgyud): 'byed//theg dman mi len pa dang bdun//nyan thos rang rgyal blo ldan dang //rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tshom med//lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen

299a3(rgyud): kun blo ldan brgyang por blta//bskur ba med cing bden par smra//bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste//brgyad pa de yang sgrub pa'i rgyu//rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid//

299a6(rgyud): g.yeng ba dang //des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das//gdung ba cha ga sdang 'khrug pa dang //des ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang //dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdon//sngags

300a4(rgyud): gyi sbyin pa yang byin te dran pa tsam gyis len bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

300a7(rgyud): sa man+ta a wa lo ki te hUM phaT swA//gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas bsrung bar gnas pa byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig du dran pas brjod par bya'o/

302a7(rgyud): spyod la yang dag par dusu song ba zhes bya 'i kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par 'gyuraro//blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun du mtshogs par 'gyur//phyogs
302b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rje su sems par 'gyur//'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol tu

308b7(rgyud): ba ni gang ltogs pas sdug bsngal te 'bum par mi 'gyur ba'o//gnyis pa ni gang chad pa ngan pas bcad de'i tshir bas nyams thog pa'i gnod pa dag gis 'bum pa mi 'gyur/
309a1(rgyud): ba'o/gsum pa ni dgra dang /kho na mtshos pa dang /phyi bzlog pa rnams kyi dug dang /mtshon gyis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o//bzhi pa ni gang

309a7(rgyud): can rnams dang /'byung po sdig pa can rnams kyis bklags bltas pas 'gum par yi 'gyur po'o//bcu bzhi pa ni gang gsor mi rung ba'i nang rnams kyis btab nas
309b1(rgyud): 'gum par mi 'gyur//bcwo lnga pa ni grang bdag la bdag gsod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba ste/grang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin can+ta te/gang snying rje chen po'i rang banin rgya
309b2(rgyud): snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de la/smre shis ngan du 'bum pa rnams pa bcu sde 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga yang thob par 'gyur te//dang po ni gang dang bang du
309b3(rgyud): skye ba thams cad du chus dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o//gnyis pa ni gang 'i phags pa'i yul du skye ba thong par 'gyur ba'o//gsum pa ni dus bzang ba dang byud pa
309b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o//bani pa ni gang rtag tu dge pa'i ye shes gnyen rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o//lnga pa ni gang dbang po mtha' dag tshang ba'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ba'o//drug pa ni gang
309b5(rgyud): dge ba'i phyogs la sems yong su smin par 'gyur ba'o//bdun pa ni gang tshul khrims nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o//brgyad pa ni gang gnyen pa shes rnams dang /blan g.yog rnams
309b6(rgyud): kyi bye brag shes shing 'thun par 'gyur du'o//dgu pa ni gang yo byad dang /nur dang /zas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chud par rnyed par 'gyur ba'o//bcu pa nI gang gzhan gyis go 'pha
309b7(rgyud): bstod pa dang /mchod pa dang /bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur ba'o//bcu gcig pa ni gang nor dang /yi byad mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'o//bcu gnyis pa ni gang bsams pa sam
310a1(rgyud): dang 'thun par 'gyur ba'o//bcu gsum pa ni gang lha dang klu dang /lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba'o//bcu bzhi pa ni gang sangs rgyas
310a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing chos kyang thob par 'gyur ba'o//bco lnga pa ni gang chos thos pa dang /don zab mo shes rab kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ste/gang la lo
310a3(rgyud): zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa des gong du smos pa skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i sladu lha dang mi thams cad kyis
310a4(rgyud): rtag tu brjod cing bzung bar bgyi ste/de la skyo ba bskyed par mi bgyi'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad smras nas/de'i
310a5(rgyud): rjes la 'khor yang ba'i dbus de nyid 'dug ste/log pa gnyis mnyam par thal ma sbyar nas/sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed/'dzum pa'i bzhin
310a6(rgyud): rgyas par byas nas/rgyas pa chen po kun sa yongasu rdzogs pa thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen po gzhi mdzes pa 'di smras//na
310a7(rgyud): rAt+na tra yA ya/na ma Ad+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA yaM/ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM sarba ban d+ha nats+tshe dan kA ra ya/sarba pA pa sa mu drats+tsha
310b1(rgyud): ShaN+Da kAR+Sha ya/sarbab+hU d+hi pra shra ma n+ta kaR+Sha ya/sar+b+ba e d+h+ya ba dra ba bon+d+ha shan kan+d+ha ya/sarba d+ha yeSh+yA t+ta rat+ta ka rA ya/ta spyan ma b+h+yot+ta/oMd Ar+yA y+ya ba lo kr-i to shwa ra ta ban+d+ha l+yak+kaN+Da
310b2(rgyud): nam pa hr-i da ya/m+bo borti yi Sh+ya mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM/raishu b+hi tse ta nAM/sarba sad+d+hen+taM/pA ba mArga br-i shi d+ha ne/tad+ya thA/A ba lani//lo kr-i ma ti/lo ka ga ti/e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satA/hi bo d+hi sat+taM/
310b3(rgyud): h+yemahA badz+rI satwe/haM bru~M yad d+h+ye twA/h+ye mung+ku kar+m+ma Ni ka/spyir hr-id ya/ats+tsha/s+thAn+ta pra lo kit+tashwar la/ ma me d+hIHt+takrU ru Ni ka/kuru ku ru kAr+m+ma/sne d+h+waM ya~M s+yAH
310b4(rgyud): bi d+yAn/da hi daM hi/me a raM ga mr-i ga mi bi haM ge ma/sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra/du hu du hu ma hA bI r+yen+te/d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hA rA Ni shwa ra dz+wa la dzI la bi mi la mUr+ha/Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/kr-iSh+Ta dzi na
310b5(rgyud): dzAMT+Ti mu ku TA/a lo kr-i ta/sha rI ra lam+ba pra lam+ba bi lam+ba/ma hA sed d+ha shud d+ha d+ha re/ba la ba la/mi hA ba la/ma la ma la ma hA ma l-i/dz+wa le dz+wa la/ma hA dzI la/kASh+TaM pak+Sha/
310b6(rgyud): kr-iSh+Te par+Na/kr-iSh+Na pa sha/nir+g+hA ta ne/he pad+me hAstu/dza ya kaR+Sha/ni shwAtsA raM shwa ra/kr-iSh+Ta sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa b+hI ta/e h+ye hI ma hA b+hI ra/ma hA ba ra ma hA ba ra he mu kha/tr-i grA
310b7(rgyud): hata ne shwa ra/n+na rA ya Na ru po/ba la bi gidz+haiM ra~M/he nI la kaN+De/oM h+ye ti mahA/ha la ha la/boSha ni rdzi ta lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha ni sha na/dweSha bi Sha bi nA sha na/mo ha bi Sha
311a1(rgyud): nA nan/nA mak+ShA hu lu hra la?/muSh+Ta muH/muts+tsha ruts+tsha/ta l+yAh+Na la/mat+tA pad+yA nA b+hau/sar sAr+Ya/sI ri sI smAn+d+ha s+yAr+tha/s+yAt+yAh+lAt+tha/
311a2(rgyud): d+ha ya bo d+hA ya bo d+hAm+b+ha mi/ti ba ni la ka/oMdz+yo ti/maskr-i t+ta/mahA so hA mr-i kha h+na s+pho hwA sa/mun+tarmAny+dzi/mat+maT+TanA niHde ne/e d+h+ye ti b+hI b+hU mat+ta sid d+hA
311a3(rgyud): ra bar+d+ha n+tu/na s+t+rai d+hA ya/sUr+d+ha mA bid+hA na/skAr sbya ra/!/haM b+ha ga d+hAn/lo ka~M bai l-i kiH/tAMthA gat+ta/te/m+b+ha dar shan/kA ma s+ye ra shin+tha/prA
311a4(rgyud): sA d+hA ya mi swA hA/sid d+ha yai swA hA/ma hA sid d+hA ye swA hA/sidI d+ha ya~M ge shwa rA ya swA hA/ni la kAr+N+Na ya swA hA/ba rA ha mu khA ya swAhA/sitwA mu khA ya swAhUM/mad+h+ya na ra sa ha rmA
311a5(rgyud): khA ya swAdz+dza/badz+ra hastA ya swA hU~M/ma hA badz+ra hom+b+ha ya swAhAM/sid d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya sI hU~M/ma hA sid d+ha bid+d+ha d+ha rA ya swAhA/pad+ma hwAstA ya swAhA/mahA pad+me hastA ye sAhA/kr-ISh+Na
311a6(rgyud): sarba kr-i ti yad+b+ha pa d+b+ha yA swA hU~M/mahA mU lpA ma gun+d+ha d+hi re ye swAt+ma/tsakrAy+YA d+hA d+hA rA ya swAt+ma/sha ShA shirjenanA dan kaR+Sha ya~M swAhA/bo d+han keR+Sha yo sAM hA/ma
311a7(rgyud): tats+tshe daM shakr-i mdzin ya swA hU~M/b+h+ra ma /trA~M san+na yA s+t+rait+ma/ kai shA~M rI ya swA trA~M/ma hA lo kaM shwa rI yai swAhA/sarba sa~M ded+he shwaR+Sha ya swAhA/rik+Sharak+Sha.oM
311b1(rgyud): stan+ta /nad+d+ha/nAm N+Dag pa /nam+b+ha /ma pa lo/to shA ts+tsha sa bad+d+ho twA ya/ma r+b+bA ma/maHrA/ya sa rgyun tu mo/ dz+nyAn s+ho/
311b2(rgyud): bau dza yi/oM ma~M g+hi pA sha/a pra ti hat+ta hrIHhe hU~M phaT swAhA/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan rIs gzigs dbang phyug gis/snying po 'di brjod nas sa tshan
311b3(rgyud): po ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos//rab tu g.yo so//'gu 'o//'ur 'uro//bar snang las rin po che dang 'dres pa'i me togi char mngon par bab bo//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
311b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad rje su thugs rong //bdud dang /gzhan mu stegs thims cad sngangs skrag ste/spu zing zhes byed par gyur to//'khor dri thams cad ni so sor
311b5(rgyud): 'bras bu theb ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob//kha cig ni sa dang po thob/kha
311b6(rgyud): cig ni sa gnyis pa/kha cig ni sa gsum pa/kha cig ni sa bzhi pa/kha cig ni sa lnga pa nas/kha cig ni sa bcu pa'i bar du thob bo//gang dag gis bla na med pa yang
311b7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dpag tu med//de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/gos legs par bgos nas/gus
312a1(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso//kye k+She las mdzad pa chen po legs/
312a2(rgyud): legaso//bdag kyang 'das pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnamasu 'dus par gyur te/bdag gis de dag tu chos kyi rnam
312a3(rgyud): grangs dang /gzungs kyi sgra sna tshogs dag kyang thob na/bdag gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi thogs pa med pa rgya chen po 'di ma thos kyis/dbyung
312a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' las mdzad pa chen po de'i lus dang /rtags dang /tshul dang /mtshan nyid nges par bshad du gsol/bdag la sogs pa 'khor chen po 'di thos
312a5(rgyud): par 'tshal zhing smos so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs/tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//kye khyed kyis thabs mkhas
312a6(rgyud): pa/sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir dri ba 'di byaso//da nyon cig dang mdor cung zad cig kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o//de nas 'phags
312a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugis 'di skad ces smraso//'di ni snying rje chen po'i som so//'di ni mtshungs shing mnyam pa'i semaso//'di ni 'dus mi byas kyis sems
312b1(rgyud): ma ma yamamamamamamamasasamamamathas ma tham/a nam tha.a namathas sa mamatha mams mamam mamathas mam ma 'a mamasa' yang ma mtsham mams mal yaH ya kham mams thas ya
312b2(rgyud): dun na tu na na ng+yas 'dun gyu ba lta sno s+ho// spyad du byas da zhus par mas//'dun ma lan pa na tshun med pa'i ma /
312b3(rgyud): ni bla na myed pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/sems de dag la sogs pa ni snying po 'di'i mtshan nyid dang /tshul yin par de ltar zhes bya'o//de ltar tshul 'dis spyad par bya'o//bsgom
312b4(rgyud): par bya'o//tshangs po chen pos 'di skad ces smras//bdag la sogs pa 'khor 'dis snying po 'di'i tshul dang /mtshan nyid dang sman tshod ma 'tshal te//da sman tshod ni blang //rmi
312b5(rgyud): bskyung bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snang ba 'di brjod
312b6(rgyud): cing 'dzin no/des byang chub sems dpa' chen po yangs pa bskyed pa'o//de ltar yi dam bcas nas/bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus bzung bar bya'o//zas dus
312b7(rgyud): dus su bzara' ba dang /tshul khrims dang ldan par bya'o//sems can thams cad la mnyabya pa'i sems brnyed par byu//rtag par rgyun tu rgyun mi 'chad par gas sngags 'di
312b8(rgyud): brjod par bya'o//gtsang mar gnas pas gnas par bya'o//khrus legs par bya'o//gos gtsang ma bags la lho'i ba dan dang /maur mi dang /bdug pa dang /me tig dang /
313a1(rgyud): gtor ma la sogs pas mchod par bya'o//sems rtse gcig tu bzung bar bya'o//yang dag par ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o//zhes de skad
313a2(rgyud): ces brjod par bya'o//de ltar gzung bar bya'o//'on tang byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang /lha'i drang srong du ma yod der 'gro ste/dbang
313a3(rgyud): byed cing dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyuraro//kho bo kyang do'i tshe mig stong gis sgrub pa po de la blta'o//lag pa stong gis sba zhing bzung //'jig rten gyi mdo dang /yi ge
313a4(rgyud): rnams len cing 'dzin kyang nus par 'gyuraro//gzhan mu stegs can thams cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang /rig byed rnams kyang nges par rtogs par 'gyuraro//gang
313a5(rgyud): la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pas ni 'jig rten na 'byung pos byung ba'i nad kyi rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang su la byung yang rung sos par byed//des zhi
313a6(rgyud): bar mi 'byur ba'i nang gang yang medo//yang 'byung po 'am/lha rnams la yang rgol ba'i mthu yod por 'gyuraro//bdud kyang pham par byed//gzhan mu stegs
313a7(rgyud): can rnams kyi phyogs kyang lkugs par byed//gal te ri la gnas pa 'am/dgon pa na gnas pa gang zhig kha ton byed dmo//bsam gautan byed pa la den gnas
313b1(rgyud): pa sdig pa dang bgegs byed pa dang /gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang /'byung po sna tshogs gang dag sems 'khrug par byed na/snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas de dag thams cad bcings
313b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//gang la la zhig tshul bzhin du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/srog chags thams cad la snying rje bskyed par bya'o//de'i tshe khro bos kyang lha dang /klu'i rgyal
313b3(rgyud): po thams cad dang /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs la srung ba gyis te/phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o//mig 'bras bu dang /rang
313b4(rgyud): gi srog ji lta ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyuraro//tshig su btsad pa dag kyang smras pa/gang zhig dad pas snying po 'di//kha yis rtag tu 'dzin pa yi//sgrub pa po la dus kun tu/
313b5(rgyud): sems la srung ba gyis shig ces//khung bu mig dang de bzhin du//stobs po che dang lu gu rgyud//lha yi dam pa lcags kyu dang //lag na rdo rje bsgo bar bya//kho bo'i snying po mchog
313b6(rgyud): 'di ni//dad pas rtag tu 'dzin pa yi//sgrub pa sdig dang bral ba la//khyed cag bsrungs shig skyongs shig ces//dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang //nor gyi bu dang drag
313b7(rgyud): po dang /ku ma bi ra dang ser skya dang //de dag rnams la kho bo bsgo//gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis//gsang sngags 'di brjod 'dzin byed pa'i//rig sngags 'chang la ma
314a1(rgyud): /g.yol bar//soms shig spyang ba gyis pa nigaHsa//ldarnon dang ni da mchog dang //ts+tshin da la dang sum la//ping gal dang ga sbyin /
314a2(rgyud): khro bas lung gis bsgo bar bya//grang zhig rtag tu dang po yis//kho bo'i gsang sngangs 'di 'dzin cing //rtag brjod rig sngags 'chang ba la//bsam bgyis shig srung
314a3(rgyud): g+his//sgrub pa po la bsrungs shig ces//bden pa po dang so brtsegs dang //mi mjed badrug dang lha mo dang la//de dge kun la kho bos bsgo//gang zhig dad pas kha
314a4(rgyud): 'grusang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing //brjod byed rig sngags 'chang bral//sems shig spyang bgyis shig ces/chen ma da sa ngan drung //rgyu yi dbang
314a5(rgyud): po brgya byin dang //sum cu gsum dbang ro ldangs dang //mang po 'dzin la kho bos bsgo//kho bo'i rig sngags 'di 'chang la//soms shig srung bgyis shig ces/
314a6(rgyud): glagranas lnga dang na gnas pa yi//gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha rnams dang //yang dag shel dang nor bu bzang //de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo//gang zhig dang pas kho bo
314a7(rgyud): yi/gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing //brjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la//soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces//rgyal po rnam thos bu dang ni//'phrog ma cu
314b1(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang //yul 'khor sbyang dang sbyong pyod dang //mag mo bzang dang 'bogs skyos dang //snyoms spyong gzhonar gyur pa dang //de dag /rnams la kho bstA pa///gang shig
314b2(rgyud): rtag tu dad pa yis//rtag tu gsang sngags 'di dzin cing //brjod byed rig stegs 'tshong ba la//sems shog srung po myos shig ces//dge'i nye dag klu gnyis dang //stobs
314b3(rgyud): kyi lha dang rgya mtsho dang //drang srong nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang //de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo//gang zhig rtag tu dang po yis//rtag tu gsang sngags 'dri 'dzin cing //brjod byed rig
314b4(rgyud): sngags 'tshong ba la//sems shig snang ba gyis ni gces//b+hU yI rgyu la b+ho ut+pa la dang //'tshul chen lto 'phyeche rnams dang //khyu men mi tsid+yAn dang //de dag rnams la/
314b5(rgyud): des bad+mo//gang sheg rtag tu dad pa y-i//rtag cu gsung sngags /brjod byed tshig sngags ba li//sams shig srung ba skyes shAg ces//rgyu dang me yi
314b6(rgyud): sgra rnams dang //shaM za rnams dang klog dang sbyin//bral bum dag dang mkha' lding dang //de nas rkyen la kho bas bste//bde byed pa'i steg rig 'khor la brgya dang ldanapa
314b7(rgyud): khyod thams ca dang /de bzhin du skyed / rgya ba don mad /ste dngami mi zhes pa dang /gan byud m+b+hi mi dang ldan pa rnams kyang na byung
315a1(rgyud): po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byed pa de'i phyi bzhin du 'brengs shig/gnod pa sol cig/srung ba gyis shig/gal te sngags pa mi
315a2(rgyud): zhig ri dang /nags tshal stong pa thibs po dag na/gcig pur grogs med par nyal na yang /bde bar byed pa'i lha de dag rang gi 'khor dang bcas te srung bar bye'o//yis
315a3(rgyud): kyi nad rnams dang /bgegs rnams kyang zhi bar byedado//gal te ri khrod du lam stor bar gyur na/gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas pa dang /bde bar byed pa'i lha dang /klu'i rgyal
315a4(rgyud): po de dag mi gzugs kyis de la lam ston par byed//gal te ri dang /nags dang /dgon par son la chu dang me med par gyur na/klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de la srung ba'i phyir chu
315a5(rgyud): dang me ston par byed//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang rig sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa gzhig cing
315a6(rgyud): bsal ba'i phyir/zhi bar byed pa'i tshig su bcid pa 'di dag smraso//gal te 'brog dang ri khrod rnams shig tu//stag dang spyang ki gcan zan khro rnams dang //sbrul dang tshangs
315a7(rgyud): pa dang ni mkha' 'gro cha//'ong yang 'di thos sngags mthus ldog par 'gyur//rgya mtsho chu klung mtsho bran 'gram gnas na/dugo ldan sbrul dang sbrul 'dzin byed pa dang //chu
315b1(rgyud): mtshan amamamamamacamamasasamathams ma tham sa a nathatha' thas mamathatha thas mamam yams lams mamags mam amamam mams/kham tha mtham bas a.a yaH ya sa mayas pas
315b2(rgyud): sron gnod sbyin nya drang ku bor//'ong na 'dra gsang sngags thos na 'jigs par 'gyur//dmyag dpung rgyan po'i dgra dang 'thab pa dang //nor 'phyog chom rkun rnams dang phyud na yang //
315b3(rgyud): dad pas rtse gcig sems dang byams pa yis//gsang sngags bzlas na sdig byed mi nus ldog/rgyal po'i khrid can go rar bcug pa dang //btson rar lcags dang shing sgrog bcug na
315b4(rgyud): yang //dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na//rgyal po bdag nyid de la dga' bar 'gyur//gal te dug can nags sam khyim+b+ha glang na//dug can zas yod do rno son gyur la//
315b5(rgyud): dad dang ldan pas gsang sngags mchog brjod na//dug rnams thams cad gyur nas bdud rtsir 'gyur//gal te bud med bus thogs mi phyin cing //g.yon can bgegs kyis na
315b6(rgyud): bar byed na yang //dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na//'byung po 'bros shing bde bar btsal bar 'gyur//'byung po sdang dang gnod sems klu rnams kyis//bsad pa'i
315b7(rgyud): che du gnod pa byas na yang //dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na//tshe yang 'phel zhing nad rnams 'byang bar 'gyur//gal te 'byung pos skrangs nad byas pa dang //bal
315b8(rgyud): bldags nad dong shu ba rnag khrag can//dad pas rtag tu gsang sngags 'di bzlas na//gsang sngags mthu yis thams cad med par 'gyur//sems can rab tu sdang bas bsad
316a1(rgyud): pa'i phyir//g.yo dang rgyu yi las rnams byed na yang //dang pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na//de drung sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gro mi 'gyur//dam
316a2(rgyud): pa'i chos nyams sems can rnyog pa can//'dod chags bcingaso shing lag pas rmongs rnams dang //nyin mtshan mi drang ma mi rtog ldan zhing //khyo dang lhan cig mi dag
316a3(rgyud): bud med rnams//gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pas 'byin nus te//'dod chags mi zhi sems ni drang por 'gyur//gal te snying po 'di yi mthu brjod na//bskal pa gcig
316a4(rgyud): gi mthar mar phyin mi 'gyur//tshon skud sna lnga pa la snying po 'di lan lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas te/mdud pA nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa mgul du bdag so//snying po 'di ni sngon
316a5(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o//gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed
316a6(rgyud): la yongasu rdzogs par mi 'gyur pa de dag la/myur du yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsung so//gang dog sangs rgyas nyid du sem smra bskyed pa de dog kyang /byang chub tu/
316a7(rgyud): sems bskyed par byed//gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/lha'i drang srong gang
316b1(rgyud): dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems bskyod par bye'o//gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po rnams dad pa rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed//snying
316b2(rgyud): 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po lnga thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur//gal te dgos pa zhig yod na yang kho bo'i snying rje dang /thabs la mkhas pas thams cad 'gro'o/
316b3(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na/sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams kyang /gal te snying po 'di thos
316b4(rgyud): no/sdug bsngal rnams las yong su thar par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' gang dag so dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang /sa bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du 'thob
316b5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems
316b6(rgyud): can gang dag gis snying po 'di lan cig thos nA/drang po'i sems kyi bsam pas mos shing skam par 'gyuraro//dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thob
316b7(rgyud): po dgal te de ltar bzod na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na yod pa'i ra dang //rdo dang rtsig pa dang /ri rab dang /ri khor yug rnams kyang
317a1(rgyud): mtshan mthamamamacamasas ma thabs ma tham/an \u0f7f thas mamathas tham mamamam mam yaya bsags mam mams ma mams/lam tha mtham mtham a.a.aHya ma mams pas la
317a2(rgyud): g.yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du phye mar 'gyur//rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang khrol zhing 'thor bar 'gyuraro//gal te de dang de'i ga ma yon sems can gang dang
317a3(rgyud): 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu semos bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe 'di la dam par gyur pa de dag gis/nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul khrims dang
317a4(rgyud): ldan par byas la/snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na/yod la bsams pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha' bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de
317a5(rgyud): dge thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gri sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs
317a6(rgyud): pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /lha'i drang srong dang /klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro//mi 'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bab chu 'am
317a7(rgyud): rgya mtshor khrus byas na/de na srog chags gang dag 'khod pa la des reg pa de dag gi las shin tu lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
317a8(rgyud): dge par pad+ma los brdzus te skyes par 'gyur/mngal nas skye ba dang /drod gsher las skye ba dang /sgo nga las skye bo 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/gang 'di 'dzin pa dang /brjod
317b1(rgyud): pa dang klog pa lta ci smos/'don cing brjod pa lta yang ci smos/rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung ngos sems can gang la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad 'byung
317b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro//yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung bar skye bar 'gyur ro//'di ltar yang shes par bya ste/gang 'dzin pa dang /'tshong ba'i///

317b5(rgyud): su 'du shes bskyed cing gus par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab skyed dag gis sdug par dgongs shing yongasu

317b7(rgyud): snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongasu skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o//gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o//gang la ting 'dzin brgya
318a1(rgyud): stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o//glang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams la

322b1(rgyud): bya'i lag pa la ban+d+has te 'dug par bya'o//su sa'i 'og gter rnams thob par 'dod pa des rin po che za ma tog+sa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o//su drung srong gi lam

322b7(rgyud): la bltas te 'dug par bya'o//su skad ston cing tshangs pa'i sgra lta bu 'dod pa des/rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o//su dgos pa thams ca
323a1(rgyud): dag par 'dod pa dang /lce bde ba dang /mkhas par 'dod pa des/phyag rgya rin po che thog pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par byar//sul+yA rnams dang

323a4(rgyud): skyer ba'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o//su tshe rabs tshe rab su sangs rgyas dang m-i 'bral bar 'dod pa des/sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug
323a5(rgyud): por bya'o//su skye zhing skyo ba na sangs rgyas rgyal po'i gnas dang /khang bzongs skye zhing me'i mngal du mi skye bar 'dod pa des/sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag
323a6(rgyud): pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o//su mong du nyan pa dang /mang du slob par 'dod po des/glegs bam thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o//su tshe 'di nas bzung
