330a3(rgyud): ya/ma hA satwA ya/mAh+mA ka ru Ni kA ya/na mo mA hA s+thA me pra b+hA ya/bo d+hi sadrA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/na mo bi pu la/bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi ta a saM gA yaM
330a4(rgyud): Ur+ya sha ti sA hA sra a ti raM ka/pr-i b+hU a ba b+hA si ta mUrta yaM/ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+De lAM/a laM kA ra d+hA ra Ne/b+ha ga ba te/pad+ma pU NA ye/sarbA lo ko a pa sha ma
330a5(rgyud): ma nA ya/bi bi d+he mu kha sa mA be raH/oM b+haSh+Ta sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM b+hur b+hu ba sI hA/ma hA A lo ka ka ra Na ta misti mi ra paT la bi nA sha kA rA ga dASha
330a6(rgyud): mo hi dzA la sha ma ka/sha sa kA/sa mA shA sa na ka ra/rak+Sha ka/sarba a prA ya durga ti pra sha ma na ka re/sarba satwA sa mA shwA sa na kaM ra/sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/
330a7(rgyud): sarba hasha gta/sa ma pa dA na ki ra/e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwA bi re pad+ma A lo ka sa~M b+hu ta ma hA ka ru Ni ka/dza DA ma gu Ta/a la kritashi ro ma Ni ka ni ka/rA
330b1(rgyud): badz+re baiDUr+ya A lang kr-i ta/sha rI ra a mi tA b+hU dza na ka ma la/a lAng kr-i ta pra b+ha ra NA ra dza na sha ta sa ha sr-i a b+hi la Shi tA kA ya/ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra ba ra da/b+hi d+ha ma bi d+hA ma/dIn+na
330b2(rgyud): sha ya bin+d+ha sha ya/ma hA yan traM/krI shaM ka b+hU ta/a ba ba d+hA bi bi d+hi sid+d+hi/seng sa ra tsa ra ka/pra ma tha na ka ra/bun+d+ha ShA prad+d+he/prAR+YA ShA n+yA grA/b+hA r+ya ShAM s+yA ga ra/sU
330b3(rgyud): Sha sing ha/b+hu ra b+hI rA dza su dweN+DA tA pA rI br-i ti/d+hu ma d+h+ya ma/sa ma sa ma/d+hu ru d+hu ru/pra sha sa ya/pra sha sa ya/b+hai ri g+hi raM/bai bai re bai bi ri/tsi ri tsi ri/si ri si ri/
330b4(rgyud): su ru su ru/d+hi ri d+hi ri/bi d+hi ri bi d+hi re/bi ri bai rau/mur+Ya mu ru/mU khaM mu khaM/mu yA mu ya/muny+dza muny+tsa/d+hu na d+hu na/bi d+hu na bi d+hA na/d+hu ru d+hu ru/g+ha ya gA ya
330b5(rgyud): ga d+ha ya ga d+hA ya/saM ha sa hA/pr-i sa hA pra sa ha/nan bi bi d+hakle shi bA sa na/nan bi bi d+hakle shrI b+h+ra saM naM/ha ra he raM/saM ha ra saM ha ra/d+hu ru t+yai d+hu r+Ya tu/mr-ih+ma maN+Dal
330b6(rgyud): ka rA Na sha tAM pra se ka/oM ba b+hA si ta bi bi d+ha bA sa na sha me ka/sha sa ka/rak+Sha ka/ma hA bo d+hi sad+d+hi ba ra ba ra da swA hA/gzungs sngags 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
330b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i phyag gi rkyen gyi yu ba zhes bya ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang /klu dang /mi 'am ci dri mas yongasu bsgyur bas/rdo rje chen po dang ldan zhing dga' ba'i rgyu
331a1(rgyud): las byung ba'i khang bzangasu thams cad kyi mchog pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du gsungs te/sgrib pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'joms pa'o//gang
331a2(rgyud): la la zhig gis mnyan pa dang /blta ba dang /klag pa dang /brjod pa thob na/mi de'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ji snyed mchis pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro//su zhig dad par
331a3(rgyud): gus pas snga de brjod na/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba bgyidado//gang ci 'tshal ba dag kyang de bzhin
331a4(rgyud): du 'gru'o//su zhig gal te bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yang su rdzogs par 'thob par 'tshal ba des/gcig pu phyogs dben par mchis la/byang chub sems dpa'
331a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing gzhan bsam par ma bgyi bar/gzungs sngags 'do lan bdun brjod na/yid la bsam pa gang rdzogs
331a6(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ba de gang yang ma mchis//sems can+da thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyuro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu rje su mngon du
331a7(rgyud): dran na/bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro//'khor los bskur ba'i rgyal po stong du tshangs pa'i bsod nams dag kyang thob
331b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//gar skyes gar skyes kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyuraro//rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro//du zhig snyim pa
331b2(rgyud): spos kyis bkang ste/'phags po spyan ras gzegs dbang phyugi mdun du gtor la/gzungs sngags 'di yang lan bdun brjod na/stong gi bsod nams kyi mchog dang /snying rje chen rje/
331b3(rgyud): rang bzhin yang 'thob bo//de mi'i 'jig rten 'dir yang stobs chen po yongasu rdzogs pa 'thob bo//su zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du blta zhing /gzungs
331b4(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' mtshan rgyas pa mthong nas/sa dri ma med pa yang 'thob//'jig rten na yang snang ba bgyid//tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
331b5(rgyud): 'dres rnams kyang mthong /ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur mchi bar 'gyur ro//gar skyes gar skyes kyang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//las kyi
331b6(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//su zhig gzungs sngags 'dri 'dzin pa des/tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la bsrab pa'i gzhi brgyad bzung ste/gos gtsang ma bgos la ring
331b7(rgyud): bsrel dang bcas pa'o mchod rten gyi mdun du'am sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la der me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bgyi/
332a1(rgyud): bdug pas kyang bdugs par bgyi/mar me yang bud par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o//de'i tshe gzungs
332a2(rgyud): sngags 'di yang ldan brgya rtsu brgyud bzlas brjod bgyis na/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor dor 'dug ste/mtshams med pa
332a3(rgyud): khru so blas pa las kyi sgrib pa mi dge pa ji snyed mchis pa thams cid 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyang yong su dag par 'gyu ro//sangs rgyas kyi
332a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyang 'thob bo//'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyang 'thob bo//sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gal te char dbab
332a5(rgyud): par 'tshal na gyen du na mkha' la bltas la gzungs sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na char 'ba'o//gal te sa la bltas te gzungs sngags brjod na/sa bon thams cad
332a6(rgyud): rnam pa brgyar phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro//gal ti 'bab chu skams pa'i shul la me 'bab chu chen po 'am/'bab chu'i dong 'am 'tshe'am mtshe'u 'am/mtsho bran gyi 'gro
332a7(rgyud): dumachis te brjod na/chu thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//nad thams cad kyi don du gzungs sngags brjod lag pas bya bas na sos par 'gyuraro//dran pa nyams
332b1(rgyud): pa'i mi'i mdun du brjod na/dran pa skur 'thob par 'gyur//b+hu bas nyen pa 'am/skom pas nyen po'i mo'u bdong du bltas te brjed na/bzlas pa 'am skom pa zhi bar 'gyuraro//gal/
332b2(rgyud): te mtshams bcid par la na/des mdze'u chu'i rlung ngu zhugs te der mchis la/gzungs sngags 'di yi ger bris d+hi/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo lnga btegs na/dpag tshad brgya
332b3(rgyud): mtshams bcad par 'gyur te/der nyes pa rnams mi 'byung //mtshams kun tu srung ba rdzog so////de ni lus thams cad bsdu ba'i phyag rgya brjod par bgyi'o//
332b4(rgyud): lus drang por 'greng te/rkang pa nye bar mnyam du gzhibs lo/rkang pa g.yas pa yad tsam bskums te/lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang /phung mo dang srin lag gnyis lag mthil
332b5(rgyud): du dgug/mdzub lo dang /mthe bong dang /mdze'u chung brkyang la lag mthil bkan te bzhago/lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyi'o//lag pa gnyis ka'i gud+mo bkug
332b6(rgyud): pa lag pa 'phrag pa dang mnyam par bzhag/lag mthothil ni mdun bu stan te bzhi po//'di ni lus bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o//su zhig bdud dang /gzhan mu stegs can dang /
332b7(rgyud): dbra rnams pham par bgyi ba dang /lam dang po la gnas par 'tshal naM/phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o//na mo rat+na tra yA
333a1(rgyud): @la/na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shU rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mAhA satwA ya/mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/a ba d+hi ba ra ba d+hi/a h+ye hi s+yA hA//gang krung du
333a2(rgyud): phyag rgya ji skad smos pa de bzhin du lus gnas par dab+he se la/snying khar thal mo sbya r-I te/sor mo thamad cing phan tshun thed kar bsngal la/g.yon pa'i ser mo rnams kyis
333a3(rgyud): g.yas pa rnams la 'khyud par bgyi/mdzub mo gnyis byin du sgreng la/rtse mo gnyis sprad//mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po la reg par bgyi'o//
333a4(rgyud): lag mthil ni me 'byang bar bgyi'o//'di ni gzungs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste gnyis pa'o//bskal pa du mar tshe rab su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba thams cad
333a5(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//cha phyi ma la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub brnyes par
333a6(rgyud): mdzod par brtsams pa'i tshe bdud kyis mtho brtsams pa'o//phyag rgya 'dis btul/de'i tshe zhi ba'i bde ba dang /bsam gtan dang /snyoms par 'jug pa yang brnyes par
333a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//gzungs sngags 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o//taud+ya thA/sarba d+hA ra Ni/ma hA lA ya/e h+ye hi pa ra ma shu ma shud+d+ha sat+kA ya swA hA/yang thog mar lag pa
333b1(rgyud): man yam thamamamacamasasanamams mthama.anam thas nathams mas nathatham a lang yams thamags mam mas ma mamalas lam mam mams ma.a ya yang tham mamam thas
333b2(rgyud): blogayas pa 'byin pa ltar bgyis lA/dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/mgo bor thal mo sbyar la 'dzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo spyad/mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis
333b3(rgyud): kyi tshigs gnyis pA la sbyararo//'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste/rnam par grol bar bgyi ba'i slad du/bsam gtan dang /snyams par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro//'di ni phyag rgya gtso
333b4(rgyud): pa'o//snron de bzhin go shegs pa rnams kyis kyang 'thun par bsgoms te/de'i tshe bsam gtan rnams dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par grol ba brnyeso//
333b5(rgyud): yang 'di ni gzhan te 'greng la rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gzhi po//lag pa'i gung mo dang /srin lag dang /mthe'u chung rgyab sbyar te/sen mo phrad par bgyi/mdzub mo gnyis
333b6(rgyud): brkyang ste rtse mo phrad par bgyi/mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa la reg par bgyi/lag mthil nang nas sngor bcu tsam gyis bkyed la smin mtsham su gzugs//'dri
333b7(rgyud): ni mig stong gi phyag rgya ste bzhi pa'o//gal te phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs sngags brjod na/skad cig de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa/bkri
333b8(rgyud): pa bye ba phrag stong mthong bar 'gyur ro//gang dag rig sngags 'chang de dang lhan cig spyod cing grogasu gyur pa ni zhing re re na yang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs pa bye ba phrag 'bum
334a1(rgyud): dang /bzhi stong nyi shu mchi'o//gang dkyil 'khor du mthugs pa dros ni blta bar mI rogs te/phyag rgya de 'chos nyid do//sprul rogs shon gang /
334a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid la'o//'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sbyin pa ye shes kyis rtogs par 'tshal ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro
334a3(rgyud): gzungs sngags ni 'di lags te/tad+ya thA/oM d+hu sarba tsak+Shu kA rA yA d+ha ra NI na drA ya swA hA/yang 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par gzhibas+ya te/lug pa g.yas pa brnyan la so
334a4(rgyud): mo lnga bzhi pas te brkyang la/lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te brkan la log pa g.yas pa'i rgyab la sbyar te snying khar bzhago/'di ni ldag pa stong thams cad bsdus
334a5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya sngo lnga pa'o//'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/bdud dang dgra mchis pa rnams thulo//gzungs sngags 'di lags te/na mo Ar+yA ba
334a6(rgyud): lo kau te shwA nAM ye/tad+ya thA/sarba duSh+Ta oM ha yaM me swA hA/yang 'greng rjeng pa phrad par bgyis la/lag pa g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyis te/lag pa g.yos
334a7(rgyud): pa yang de bzhin du bgyis le/lag mthil bdag logasu bsten par bgyi'o//'di ni ting 'dzin rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ste drug pa'o//'dis ting 'dzin thaMd
334b1(rgyud): dudu rdzu rmA na kur+b+ha smra tu rgyuzla na rgyu ga na blan na/
334b2(rgyud): nga/na rgyu ng+ge/ gas gas du gyu N+DI/chos ga
335a1(rgyud): malan sa thamamasamamamasasamathamams ma tham/a nam thas mthamathas mamatham mas sa mas bamags mtsham yam tham galal las ma mnyam thabs thal ya yang a mtsham thams ya
335a2(rgyud): dang /phyag rgya dang /chos kyi sgo du ma gzung ba'i slad du stsu dza'o//nyi ma spyang gus rngan+da pa dang /zla ba spya kris zin pa'i tshe/bamar la lan nyo shu
335a3(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te phyog rgya 'dis phyag rgya btab la 'thungs na dbang po rno bar 'gyur ro//nyin gcig bzhin du chos kyi tshigasu bcad pa khri lobs nubs par 'gyur//
335a4(rgyud): ro//phyag rgya 'di dang /chos kyi sgo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi che du gsungs pa'o//
335a5(rgyud): yang 'greng ste rkang pa nye bar gzhibs la/lag pa thal mo sbyar te snying khar bzhag la mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bkug ste/rtsa ba'i sngags chen po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
335a6(rgyud): brjod par bgyi'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang ring gi nor bu'i yid bzhin lta bu'i phyag rgya ste dgu pa'o//'dis nges par lha'i gzhal med khang rnams su
335a7(rgyud): 'jug//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu yang mchi'o//mchod pa'i don du rin po che brgya stong dag kyang bsams pa bzhin brnyed par 'gyur ro//su zhig chos
335a8(rgyud): kyi sgo 'di'i las bgyid nus na/de nang par sngar langs la khrus bgyi zhing kha gdong bkrus te/phyag rgya de'i dam tshig bgyis na/des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
335b1(rgyud): bragang+ga klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/sprul pa du myur tshe rab su bsags pa'i sdig pa mi dag pa'i lus lci ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//phyug rgyu
335b2(rgyud): yin ten dang /bsngags pa rab tu mang ngo //yang snga mo bzhin du thal mo skur te/mdzub mo gnyis bklub la mthe bo'i se mo la bcar te/mdzub mi gnyis kyi sa po yang /
335b3(rgyud): phan tshun du rgyub sprid la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems la 'dod pa'i phyag rgya skye bcu pa'o//ci 'tshal ba de bzhin
335b4(rgyud): du 'grub//nges par bla na med pa yang dreg par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//yang thal mo sde ma las mtho bong dang /mdzub mo so sor btung ste/
335b5(rgyud): yig mthil dbye bar bgyi'o//'di ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gaung+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyen gyi bdag la stsal ba ste/'dis de dag byang chub kyi
335b6(rgyud): rab tu rtogs//'dis rtsa ba'i gsang sdigs 'arjod par bgyi'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya skye bcwo gcig pa'o//
335b7(rgyud): yang thal mo snga ma las mdzub mo gnyis bskum zhing brkyang bas bskul bar bgyi'o//'di byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting 'dzin rnams 'thob pa'i
336a1(rgyud): phyag rgya ste bcu gnyis pa'o//gzungs sngags ni 'di lags twa/oM sarba bud d+hA sa ma ya a d+h+ye hi par mya shud d+hA satwA swA hA/de ni byang chub sems dpa'
336a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug m+bi stong dang ldan pa/lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khar khru bcu drug pa'i tshi ga brjod par bgyi'o//thog ma r-i rI rnams dang nye ba/
336a3(rgyud): sa gzhi ba shes pa'i phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o//der sa brkos te/gseg ma dang /gyo mo dang /rus pa dang /mo gtsang ba rnams bsal la/dri zhim po dang bsres
336a4(rgyud): pa'i ba'i lci ba dang /'jim par bsres te byug par babyi'o//der mchu zheng du khru bcu drug pa'i stegs bu bgyi'o//'phang du ni mtho gang gi cha du bgyis la/sgo bzhi btod/
336a5(rgyud): shar gyi sgor ni yul 'khor srung /lho'i sgor ni 'phags skyes pa//nub kyi sgor ni mag mi bzang /byang gi sgor ni rnam thos kyi sras te/de dag gi gam yor rang rang gi
336a6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad bro'o//dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa lag pa stong dang ldan pa bzhag par
336a7(rgyud): bgyi'o//de'i mdun du khri'u bzhag ste/khri'u stong du gzungs sngags kyi cho ga bzhag par bgyi'o//de la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug/me tog sna tshogs pakA mo/
336b1(rgyud): lha ba shos sna tshogs dbab po//der mchod pa de rnams bzhug ste/sgrog pa rnam dgu dang /sha dang chung ma dbab po//gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyu nA nyin gcig mchod pa thang
336b2(rgyud): kyang sar pa gzhan gyis brje'o//cho ga 'dis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dngos po thams cad kyis ma chad par bgyi'o//sgrub pa po gang dag sngon mthong ba de dag gis bri bar bgyi'o//de sgrub pa
336b3(rgyud): po shar phyogasu bltas te//'greng la gzungs sdigs snga ma dang po nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi mthar phyin gyi bar du skyo bar mi bgyi'o//thog ma'i phyag
336b4(rgyud): rgya dang pa lan gcig bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par bgyi'o//bcu gnyis pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du bgyi'o//der de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa brtan po'i sems bskyed/
336b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o//cho ga 'dis de bzhin du dgug par bgyis na/thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ro//de tshe sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du nges par drang po'i sems kyis drang por bgyi'o//gsang
336b6(rgyud): sngags dang lha thams cad rjesu dran par bgyi ste/ji ltar na mdun na mi lam na gnas lta bu dang /phan tshun gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//dmigs pa gzhan la dmigs
336b7(rgyud): par mi bgyi'o//de'i tshe rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan stong brgyad cu bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'on tang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun dga' bo'i gzugs kyis
337a1(rgyud): der mchis te/sgrub pa pol ci 'dod ci slong zhes 'dri zhi phan tshun smra bar 'gyuraro//sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyis mchod pa bgyi bar bsams la/bdag
337a2(rgyud): la ji skad dris pa lan gdab par bgyi ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzungs sdigs kyi rang bzhin 'tshal zhes brjod par bgyi'o//yang na 'di
337a3(rgyud): skad du 'di ni lung bstan pa'i dus lags pa bgyed na/thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges par thugs rje chen po bskye du gsol/bdag ni snyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /grags
337a4(rgyud): pa me 'tshal gyi/nam zhig na sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta ba dang /yongasu skyob par 'gyur snyam du semaso//yang 'byung po gnyug mar gnas
337a5(rgyud): pa thams cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam du sems zhes brjod par bgyi'o//gal te yid la bsams pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na gzhan
337a6(rgyud): la mi brjod par bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar bgyi'o//gal te cho ga 'di 'grub na bzlas par bgyi/gcig tu bzung bar bgyi'o//'di ni bslab pa gcig tu gsang //

357b1(rgyud): tshan amamam tham/thachamasas mthams ma thaH/a tsathaH/tha a na thaH/Sha sa mtham maH am ya thamamamam mamam/kham tha mtham mama.a yaHa maHmamamamamama'am
357b2(rgyud): rtag tu gzungs 'dzin sbyang bar byed//bdag gis nor bu bzang po dag dang ni/sde dpon chen po sa 'dzi na pu la pa//btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed//bdag gis
357b3(rgyud): ngaga' dang ni bsnyen dga' bo/klu rgyal rgya mtsha dang ni e la'i 'dab//btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed//bdag gis lA ma yin dang dri za dang //mkha' ldang mi
357b4(rgyud): lAm ci dang lto 'phye rnams//btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed//bdag gri chu dang me dang glogi lho//grul bum bdag po dang ni sha za dag/btang nas rtag tu gzungs
357b5(rgyud): 'dzin srung bar byed//dge ba'i lha de dag dang klu'i rgyal po dang ma mo la sogs pa de dag kyang so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa dang /mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin dag
357b6(rgyud): gis kyang rtag par thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongasu srung zhing skyob par byed pas//gang zag de ri dang dgon pa na gcig pu nyal bar gyur pa ni yang dge ba'i lha de dag
357b7(rgyud): res kyi mtshan mos de la bsrungs nas bgegs dang bar chad yong su spel bar byed//gal te gcod rong dag tu gnas de la ma stor bar gyur pa las rig sngags 'di bzlas par
357b8(rgyud): gyur na de'i dbang gis dge bo'i lha dang /klu'i rgyal po dag dge ba'i mi'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas lam yang dag pa nyid ston par 'gyuraro//gal te ri dang na gas chal
358a1(rgyud): dang dgon pa dag tu gnas pU las chu dang mo dag gis phongs par gyur na yAng klu'i rgyal po dag gis yongasu srung ba'i phyir chu dang me dag mngon par sprul par/
358a2(rgyud): 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzungs 'di 'dren tsong yongasu 'dzin pa dag gi che du gnod pa dang bgeT yong su bas la bI phyir shin/
358a3(rgyud): bsil bI tshig su bcwa pa 'di dag smraso//gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las//stag dang spyang ki gcan zan gtum pa dang //rtsangs pa sbrul dang 'dra srin phrad gyuro kyang da/
358a4(rgyud): gzungs 'dri 'don pa thos na gnod mi nus/gang zhig chu ba rgya mtshor zhugs pa las//gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang //gnod sbyin srin po nyo dang rus spel dag
358a5(rgyud): gzungs 'di thos nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur//gang zhig g.yul sprid dgra yis bskor ba'i ma//chom rkun mi rungs nor ni phrogs pa'i tshe//rtso gcig thugs rje chen po'i
358a6(rgyud): gzungs bzlas na//de dag bairtsi sems bskyed nas 'dog par 'gyur//gang zhig rgyal po'i 'gyod las thogs pa dang //lcags sgrog khong skyil btson rar chung
358a7(rgyud): pa'i tshedartse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na//rgyal bas brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur//gang zhig byad stems dug mda'i khyim zhugs te
358b1(rgyud): zas skom dug can gyis ni bsad pa'i tshe//rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na//dug nyid zil dang ra zas skom nyi du 'gyur//bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe//
358b2(rgyud): bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe//rtse gcig thugs rje chen po gzungs bzlas na//'dre gdon byer nas bde bar bca' bar 'gyur//klu gdon gtum pos
358b3(rgyud): gdug pa'i dbugs bta bas/tsha ba'i nad kyis nyen nas 'chir nyi che//rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na//rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur
358b4(rgyud): klu gdon rgyu bas gces te skrangs pa dang //shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'jig pa'i tshe//rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas nas//mchil ma lan gsum
358b5(rgyud): byugs pas skrangs pa zhi//sems can rtog pas mi dge bskyed pas na/byad ste mas sngags dang dgas ni gtses pa'i tshe//rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas
358b6(rgyud): ni//stems gnod kun gtong ba'i mig la 'dra//sdig 'phel snyigs mas dam chos 'jig pa na//'dod pa'i me chen sems ni rmongs log pas//khyod shug
358b7(rgyud): so sor gzhan la 'did zhen nas//nyin mtshan log bsam rgyu ni mi 'chad tshe//gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na//'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems
359a1(rgyud): bsal 'gyur//bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyas brjod na//bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yod mi 'gyur//rig sngags 'dri lan lnga
359a2(rgyud): bzlas te tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi mdung nas mgul du gdags par bya'o//gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ba phrag
359a3(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub pa yongasu ma rdzogs
359a4(rgyud): pab yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa dag myur du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag 'bras
359a5(rgyud): bu mngon du ma byas pa de dag myur du mngon du bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamos na drang srong gong dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems ma
359a6(rgyud): skyed pa dag myur du sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /sems can+da gang dag theg pa chen po'i da la drad pa'i dbang po ma thob pa dag gzungs 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis
359a7(rgyud): mo thus theg pa chen po'i sa bon dang chos kyi myu gu 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin pas bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang /byams pa dang /snying rje'i mthus
359b1(rgyud): de dag gis ci drang tse 'dod pa thams cad 'byor par byed//gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gis gnasu ngan 'gro gsum po'i sems can ji snyed gnas
359b2(rgyud): pa dag bdag gis rig sngags 'di thos par gyur na thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa dag ni myur du thob par 'gyur la/sa
359b3(rgyud): bcu pa'i bar du yang ma thob pa thob par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du yang phyin par byed pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad brgyad cu yang rang gri ngang gis
359b4(rgyud): 'thab par 'gyur ro//gal te nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag gzungs 'di rna bar lan cig thos par gyur tam/gzungs 'di spyod cing yi ger byis sam/drang po'i sems kyi chos
359b5(rgyud): bzhin du gnas par byed na/dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ma btsal bar rang gi dang gis thob par 'gyuraro//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasaM na ri dang /chu
359b6(rgyud): klung dang /brag dang /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu ji snyed pa dag kyang g.yo zhing 'khol bar nuso//ri rab lhun po nas ri khor yu gi ba raM dag kyang g.yo zhing rdul phran bzhin du 'jig par
359b7(rgyud): nus den gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyi tha~Md tu rlan pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par nuso//sems can gang dgra tshe 'di nyid la smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub bar
360a1(rgyud): 'dod na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du gso sbyong dang /tshul khrims la gnas nas gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas la gdon mi za bar smon pa rnams kyang mngon
360a2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/'khor ba'i mtha' nas 'khor ba'i mthar thog pa'i bar du yang sdig pa'i las thams cad ma lus pa yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong gsum kyi stong
360a3(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nang dang phyi rol na sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams dang /tshongs pa dang /brgya byin dang //rgyal
360a4(rgyud): po chen po bzhi dang /lha dang /drang srong dang /klu'i rgyal po ji snyed gnas pa thams cad kyis kyang mkhyen cing shes par 'gyur//lha 'am mi gang yang rung ste/gzungs
360a5(rgyud): 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa de dag chu klung ngam/rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas pa las de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg
360a6(rgyud): par gyur na/sdig pa'i las dang kha no mi tho ba lci bo thams cad yang su byang nas zhing yongasu dag pa dag tu pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur pas mngal dang /drod gsher
360a7(rgyud): dang /sgo nga las skyes pa'i lus len padri 'gyur na/len pa dang 'dzin po dang /klog pa dang /kha ton du 'don pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs 'dzin
360b1(rgyud): ba de dag lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te/gang zag de'i lus dang /spu dang /skra dang /gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa rdo rje phyogasu song ba'i sems can gzhan rgya
360b2(rgyud): lus la reg par gyur na/de dag gi sgrib pa dang /sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad mi lasdu par yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur bas/yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa
360b3(rgyud): myamyong bar mi 'gyur zhing /rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sder skye bar 'gyur bas na yongasu 'dzin pa de dag gi bsod nams dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab par
360b4(rgyud): rig par bya'o//gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byed pa'i kha nas ji tsam tu tshig tu brjod par byung ba dge yang rung /mi dge yang rung ste/lha'i bu'i bdud dang /mu stegs can dang /lha
360b5(rgyud): dang klu dang /'dre srin thams cad kyis thos par gyur na de dag thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nyid du 'gyur pas/de la sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i
360b6(rgyud): sems bskyed nas bkur ste dang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro//gzungs 'di 'don cing yongasu 'dzin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gter nyi du rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas gang ga'i
360b7(rgyud): klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snying rnams kyis phangs shing gces par mdzad pa'i phyir ra//gang zag de ni/'ide can gyi lus kyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/de
361a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegab pa thams cad kyi da ra gyis snang bar mdza pa'i phyir//gang zab ngan rnams pa dang /d+h+r-ing rje 'og t+tar+ya smon par da bar
361a2(rgyud): ste/'di ltar gzungs kyi sems can yong su skyob par byed pa'i phyiraro//gang zag de ni dam pa'i chos kyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kun sno/
361a3(rgyud): par byed pa'i phyiraro//gang zag de ni bsam gton dang /ting 'dzin gyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rnams rtag par mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyiraro//
361a4(rgyud): gang thog deni no mkha'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/rtag par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis sems can la blta bu'i phyir//gang zag de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i mdzod yin
361a5(rgyud): par rig par bya ste/lha dang klu dang dge ba'i lha rnams rtog par yongasu spang ba'i phyi ro//gang zag de ni dam pa'i tshig mdzod yin par rig par ba ste/kha nas gzungs kyi sku
361a6(rgyud): 'byung ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'i phyir//gang zag de ni rtag par gnas pa'i gtar yin par rig par bya ste/'jig pa gsum gyi bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus
361a7(rgyud): pa'i phyiraro//gang zag de ni rnam po raM grol ba'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gyis bshol bar mi nus pa'i phyiraro//gang zag de ni sman
361b1(rgyud): gyi rgyal po'i mjed yin par rig par bya ste/rtag par gzungs kyis sems can nang pa rnams kyi nang bso ba'i phyiraro//gang zag de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/sangs
361b2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu rgyu ba la rang dbang thob pa'i phyiraro//de bas na gang zag de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod no nams kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig
361b3(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongasu skyonas tshe ring 'i sman yongasu tshol bar 'dod pas dben pa'i gan su 'dug nas mtshams yongasu dag par bcad/gos la sngags kyis btab
361b4(rgyud): nas mgo bar bya'i//chu dang zas dang spos dang sman rnams li lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste spyod par byed na gdon mi za bar cha ring bar 'gyur//gal te tshes bzhin du
361b5(rgyud): mtshams bcod chos bzhin du yong su 'dzin par byed na thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te de la mtsha mos bcad pa'i cho ga ni ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis
361b6(rgyud): btab ste/sa la ri mo bris nas mtshams bcad par bya'o//yang na chu gtsang mo lA lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phyogs bzhir gtar nas mtshams bcad par
361b7(rgyud): bya yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams bcad par bya'o//yang na 'du shes kyis gang du phyin pa tshun chad
362a1(rgyud): mtsham su 'gyur//yang nA thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab skye mtshams bcad par bya'o//yang mtshon sna lnga'i skud pa la
362a2(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams bcad sder bya'o//de ltar chos bzhin du 'di yongasu 'dzin par gyur na rang gi ngang gis 'bras bu thob
362a3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//gzungs 'di ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur na/'don pa dang 'dzin
362a4(rgyud): pa lta smos kyang ci dgos//rig sngags 'di 'don pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed
362a5(rgyud): pa yin par rig par bya'o//gang dab sems can sdug bsngal gyi bgegs la yongasu 'dren pa'i chad du chos bzhin du 'don pa gang yin pa de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan
362a6(rgyud): pa yin pas ring por mi theg par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//ci tsam du sems can snang cog gi che du bzlas brjod byas te/de dag gi
362a7(rgyud): rna lam du grags par byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed na/gang zag de dag yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'thob par 'gyur pas brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
362b1(rgyud): glang la la zhag samasaHgcig tu sems dang lus gso sbyong dang rgyal khrimastsa la gnas nas/sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid
362b2(rgyud): kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas byas pa'i sdig par las rnam pa sna tshogs 'thol ba shags te/kha nas gzungs 'di myur du bzlas brjod byas nas sgra rkyen chad pa meng par byas na/dge
362b3(rgyud): sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po de dag tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur//dbang po rnon pa shes rab dang ldan pa sbrum pa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhig yin na nI sa bcu'i 'bras bu yang dka'
362b4(rgyud): med par 'gyur na//'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa phran tshegs yongasu gnyir bcem mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de yang byang chub
362b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthu shin tu zab pa'i phyir dang /gzungs 'di'i byin mis brlabs shin tu rgya che ba'i phyiraro/bcom ldan 'das kyi kun dga' ba
362b6(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na de'i tshwa yul de'i rgyal pos yang dag pa'i chos kyis yul 'dzin cing /mi rnams bag yangasu bkod/sems can
362b7(rgyud): snyams las mi gcod cing /nyes pa byung ba rnams yongasu skyibs nas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed/thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs
363a1(rgyud): sngags 'di 'don par byed na/yul de'i gnod pa dang /bgegs thams cad yongasu bsal bar 'gyur/'bru rnams lags shing mi mang ba bde bar
363a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//gzhan yang phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra dag snga na yang du 'ongs te gtses pas 'bangs mang po mi bde bar gyur tama?/blon po chen pos rku ba shams nas log par gyur teri mun/
363a3(rgyud): byung bar byar tam/than chen byung bla gyur tam/nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam/de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byung bar gyur na/de'i tshe snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas
363a4(rgyud): nas de'i phyogasu kha bstan te spos dang /me tog dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rin po che'i bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang /ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis
363a5(rgyud): sems rtso gcig tu mchod par bya'o//gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed//gzungs kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di
363a6(rgyud): 'don par byed na/phas kyi dgra rnams rang dul bar gyur nas slar log ste/sros nas tshul bzhin du yul skyong zhing yul yang 'dro bar gnas par byams pa'i sems kyi
363a7(rgyud): phan tshun gcig la gcig blte bar 'gyur/rgyal bu dang blon po rnams kyang srizhu dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur/btsun mo dang sras rnams kyang rgyal po la sri zhu dang bsnyen
363b1(rgyud): mnamamatham pathathachas sa nathasamatha/a nathaH/tha.a \u0f7f/Sha sa mtha.amathasamamalamam#
363b2(rgyud): bkur byed par 'gyur/lha dang klu dang 'dre srin rnams kyang yul de srung zhing sbyang bar 'gyur/char chu dus bzhin du 'bab cing 'bru rnams legs pas mI mang po rnams kyang rlab tu dga'/
363b3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//gzhan yang khyim du nad chen mi rungs pa dang phrad par gyuraro tam/ltas ngan sna tshogs byung bar gyur tam/'dre srin dang log pa'i bdud rnams kyis khyim bkrugs
363b4(rgyud): par gyur tAm/mi ma rungs po dag gis klung skur btab nus rku ba shams te gnod pa byis par gyur tam/khyim tshe chung rnams phyi nang mi 'dum par gyur ni/snying rje chen po dang
363b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas sems rtso gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan rasau gzigs dbang phyug yid la byas nas gzungs sngags
363b6(rgyud): 'di lan stong chung bar bzlas na/gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa de dag thams cad yongasu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad
363b7(rgyud): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di'i ming ci legs/ji ltar yongasu bzung bar dugyi/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo rig sngags
363b8(rgyud): 'di la ming rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/rgya cher yongasu rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o//thogs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o//sdug bsngal rnams las yongasu skye
364a1(rgyud): pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o//cha skyed pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o//ngan 'gro yongasu sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o//las kyi sgrib pa rnam par 'joms
364a2(rgyud): pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o//smon pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i gzung so zhes kyang bya'o//sems kyi rjesu rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o//sa gong ma
364a3(rgyud): rnams las myur du 'do' ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o//de ltar yongasu bzung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ce mo gsol to//bac+doMs
364a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci lags na/'di lta bu'i gzungs bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
364a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces kyang bya'o//den yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o//'od skyong pa'i mig can zhes bya ste/rigs kyi bu
364a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i ming dang gzi byon dang mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med po'i snga rol nas mngon
364a7(rgyud): por rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin yang /thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthus son/
364b1(rgyud): bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems pa'i lus mngon du bstan pa yin pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyod drung /chungs pa dang /brgya byin dang /lha dang /
364b2(rgyud): klu rnams kyis gus pas bkur sti byas nas brnyas par mi bya'o//lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te/sems rtsi gcig tu ming nas brjod par byed na bsod nams rgyud

364b6(rgyud): thams cad gdul bar 'did ni rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i lag la mchod//lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la mchodado//phas kyi rgol ba'i

378b7(rgyud): zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/bdag nyid kyi lus srung ba'i sladadu gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa

399a6(rgyud): myong zhing gtan tu 'byung bI dus ma mtshos pa zhig lags na yang //rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar
399a7(rgyud): bo'i ngo tshes bco lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas/rig sngags steng rtsa brgyad chang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad
399b1(rgyud): byang bar 'gyur te/gal te byung bar mi 'gyur na na//de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags//de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan+da ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul rgya
399b2(rgyud): rlung pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags tI/langs nas 'greng sngar sug pa g.yon pas srog pa rkeng pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong la btsir nas khu tshur+ya bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o//
399b3(rgyud): de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa goyas pas g.yon pa'i lag dAr gyi steng du btsir nas/lus po che'i spa lan bdun par bgyis nas/dpag tshad brgya stong du mA maNi 'tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchis

399b6(rgyud): par sgreng ste/lag ngar gyi tshogs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/lus po che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na//drang srong 'phur te mchi dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du
399b7(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur lag so//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/sug pa gnyis na mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/lag ngar

400b6(rgyud): so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi che du 'di ltar zhus pas na/khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o//byang chub med/

401a1(rgyud): rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'dis so//na mo rad na d+ha yA ya/na mo Ar+yA ba lo ke te shwaR+Sha ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satwA ya/yaR+tha k+Sha ruN
401a2(rgyud): kA ya/tad+ya thA/oM tsakra pA ti tsin+ta me NaM ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+ThA ta/dadz+ra bA ra/A ka rA ye hUM sneh+lA/'di ni lus kyi sngagaso//oM pad+me/tsi naM tA ma Ni/dz+wa laM ma hA badz+ra b+ha raM hU~M/

405b2(rgyud): rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste/ril bu gcig khar mu ra nas rgyal po'am/blon po nye phan nam+ba/skye bo'i cho gas mang po dag lnga gtam dgyis par gyur na bkur sti

419b4(rgyud): na 'grub par 'gyur//cho ga gsang sngags grub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///de nas thabs ni rim pa dang //gro ga ras sdom shing shun la//ra yi'o

419b6(rgyud): de ni yang dag dgod//lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i gsum//nub tu de ni yang dag bgod//lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la//e yau rnam par sbyar ba ste//byang du de ni yang dag dgod//
419b7(rgyud): dbus su thugs kyi sa bon te//shan+tiM ku ru mtsham su'o//swA hA dbus dgod par bya//de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod nas//dngul lam dkar po'i ga bur gzhug/thod/

420a2(rgyud): /rnams 'grub par 'gyur//pA la sh+lo yis legs par bris//ba shi ku ru mtshamasu dgod//khom por dmar por sogs par gzhug/dbang gi las rnams 'grub par
420a3(rgyud): 'gyur/tsan+dan dkar po de zhim zhing //nim pa'i chu yis legra b+hA bris//mA ra ya ni mtsham su dgod//lcags sa mthong bar yang dag gzhug/phrin las thams cad
420a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//tsan+dan dri kar po dri zhim zhing //zhi bas de ni mo la sreg/'bras bu dmar po bcas pa'i shing //rgyas pas de ni me la'o//dbang ni pa la sha yi shing /
420a5(rgyud): de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur//nim pa'i shing la char bcad pa'i//bsregs pas phrin las 'grub par 'gyur//'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///
420a6(rgyud): de nas las kyi rim pa ni//dur ba'i rtswa dang 'bras kyi 'dab//til dang yungs kar tsi tse la//gsang sngags bzlas na grub pa ni//da li'i shing la legs bsgregs nas/
420a7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//ku sha star pa shug 'brum dang //stag pa'i me tog brdza po dang //gsang sngags bzlas par rab byas nas//sngon shing la legs
420b1(rgyud): bsregs nas//rgyus b+hA bya ba'i las 'grub cing //nus pa'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur//b+hA la shA yo shing dag dang //khro dang tsa tso mo snyan lnga//gsang sngags bzlas pa
420b2(rgyud): byas te/pad+ma ka yi shing la bsregs//nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur//thams cad dbang du 'dus par 'gyur//gro dang so pa 'bras deng ni//bra bo min srin til nag po//
420b3(rgyud): gosang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te//kha ti ri ye shing la sreg/nus pa wAn+d+ra te lus rnams ni//myu ba nyid du 'grib par 'gyur//pra ta kha che'i shing dag la//lo mya 'phral
420b4(rgyud): bur bcas pa dang //rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas//mya ngardo 'chang gi shing la bsregs//nus pa thob nas myur du ni//mi rnams thams cad dbang du sdud//ldong
420b5(rgyud): ros pad+ma'i rtsa ba la//mu la ba tra'i shrIng dag la//gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas//ma dz+ra ra yi shing la bsregs//'khor lo'i 'og tu bcug pa'i so//rgyal ba
420b6(rgyud): dbang du byed par 'gyur//pa la sha yi shing dag la//ka re bir 'bras dag lo//gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas//'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas//ral
420b7(rgyud): gri 'og tu bcug nas ni//yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur//tshe rangs brgya ru lon pa'i rus//mtshon gyi bsnun pa'i rus pa dag/gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/
421a1(rgyud): sbyor ba'i me la rab bsregs te//lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na//glang po dbang du 'gyur bar byed//ba le ta dang ta le sha/kha tI ra dang d+ha ti ma//
421a2(rgyud): dur khrod rishring la rab de srogs na//stag la sogs pa dbang du 'dri//nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang //sman dang rin che na sna tshogs dang //maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te/
421a3(rgyud): rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni//pad+ma chu shel las skyes pa'i//chu shel mdog dang 'dzum dang bcas//rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs//ku shi'i stan la
421a4(rgyud): shar du 'dug/pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis//byams pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya'o//nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang //shu pa g.yan po me dpal dang //
421a5(rgyud): nad dang gdon dang tha mis cod bzlog/mtshams med lnga dang mi dge lnga//'bras bu sdug bsngal thams cad bzlog/me'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
421a6(rgyud): de nas rgyal pos 'jigs la//maN+Dal dkar po ljags byas la//can dkar po'i dris bsgos te//mchid yon me tog bkang ba dang //ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa
421a7(rgyud): yis/ rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la mchod//sdig pa thams cad mdun du//bshegs nas myur du skyabasu 'gro/gro ga dag gam shing shun la//rgyal po dag
421b1(rgyud): /gro gzugs byas te//yig 'bru lnga yis btab pa yis//tshon sna lnga yis rab tu btsod //byams pa'i sems kyi chu bo la//bkur na rgyal po'i tshad las thar//oM hUM traM hr-iHa sho na ha/
421b2(rgyud): dI ma ka to//so ra sa ra kar kar b+hU d+h+we//gcan can 'jigs pa 'ong ba'i tshe//maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la//me tog dkar pos rab tu gtor//mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod//
421b3(rgyud): sdig ba shags myur du skyabasu 'gro/'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga//tshon stu l-I yi phur ma la//byas pa lus la btags pa la//gcan zan su 'jigs thams cad la//myur
421b4(rgyud): nyidu galo bar 'gyur//chom rkun dag gis 'jigs pa la//rdo rje sngon pa rdo rje can//mthing nags gnan phyag rgyu can//mchod nas bdag nyid skyaHsu 'gro/ak+Sho b+h+yaHtaka
421b5(rgyud): kA raM Nag du kha ti pa//sA d+hi tsi kr-i ta a/ri ka tse tse tra tin du dan+taM sa ra sa ra ka ra swA hA//sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la//bal po se'u'i lcug mo la//bram ze'i gzugs
421b6(rgyud): kyi rgyan bsgom sA nas//rin chen 'byung ldan bkur bsgoms te//spyi bor mu tig byi ru dang //me shal bad+mA da ka dang //in+d+ra ni la dung g.yas 'khyil//gser dang dngul dang
421b7(rgyud): dur ba dang //rin chen rgyan dang 'bru snang ba cas//ku shaM gA rtsi rngan dang //bol su spyir ba ud pa la//gung gum dr-i nim lus byugs la//oM rat+na sa b+ha ba//sa te bi
422a1(rgyud): sa ra sa ra kar kar swA hA//lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs pa la//stag dang 'bru gi rus pa la//mkhar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang //zangs phyer gan phye ma
422a2(rgyud): dang /dgaser gyi bye ma gro bar btum//snang ba mtha' yas bskur bsgoms te//byams pas phyogs mtshams kun tu bstan//dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas gdugs//oM
422a3(rgyud): a mr-i ta badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra dz+wA la/gardza gardza sa ra sa ra/ka ra ka ra swA hA//mi yau 'jigs pa dag lha ni//'brug rus sin da wa sha dang //til dang sa lu tsi tse dang //nas
422a4(rgyud): dang gro dang rgun 'brum gyi//thang phrom dag la sngags btab ste//me yaM phyogasu gtor bar bya//oM bai ro tsa na pra b+hA/dz+wa la dzA la sa ra sA ra ka ra ka ra swA hA//rnam par snang
422a5(rgyud): mdzad skur bsgoms la//me la gtor na sa yis gsod//chu bo dag gi 'jigs byu la//mdze can pho myo'i thud pa yi//ra dang khyi dang phag khrag/sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs
422a6(rgyud): dang bcis//nang du bcug ste chu bor dor//don yod grub pa'i sku ru gsal//oM a me g+ha sid d+hi/oM ka bai tA ra NI sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA//phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin
422a7(rgyud): te/thugs rje chen po'i kha dog ni//so sor gsal zhing bsgoms par bya//byams pa kun la rab tu blta//'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur//'jigs pa kun
422b1(rgyud): srung ba'i le'u ste drug pal//sku gdung mo tog dkarabs mchad//gan dri yis chag chag btAg//snying po gzungs dang bcas pa'am//khyu gang tshad karamacha
422b2(rgyud): rten la//legs par bstod cing mchod par gyi//stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i//thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar//rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan//byang chub
422b3(rgyud): phyogs ni yong su rdzogs//dri mA~Md dung 'dra dkar ba ste//rgyal chen bzhi yang dri bzhin//bya chung chen po'i mchod rten na//khri'i bang bcu gsum tog dang ldan//hU~M yo rol
422b4(rgyud): mtshar du 'bab//tshe sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gter//rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid//phur bus gdab cing yongasu bzung //sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che//de yi bsod nam
422b5(rgyud): rab bstan pa//mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu//nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams//skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur//shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni//byams
422b6(rgyud): ldan snying rje can gyis byas//bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi//'dra ma khan+da snying d+hI chen byis byas//rang bas ma rnam par dag pa yis//mdun du bdar te mchod par bya
422b7(rgyud): ched dang kha dog yongs dag gsal//yid du'ong ba dag la'o//zas dang yid du ring ba yi//dkar gsum sngags pa spangs pa yi//sha dang sgrog pa la~M phug dang //zan
423a1(rgyud): chang ni shin tu spangs//shol phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang //bo d+hi tsi dang mu tig shis//g.yal dang sbrid pa mi tshigs rnams//nam yang chod par mi bya'o//
423a2(rgyud): ye byed dam tshig snyan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed pa//po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la//brtan nas bdag ni byams
423a3(rgyud): sems ldan//muM las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni//dmar ser ut+pal po tI 'dzin//yoM nyi mo pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs//bum pa kha dog ser po ni//rIn chen
423a4(rgyud): lnga dang 'bri sngar bcas//tad+ya thA/oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+hi ri d+hi ri/d+hu ru d+hu ru/in+ne bran+te/tsa li tsa le/pra tsa laM pra tsa le/ku su me ku su me/mAn+da re/i li mi li/tsi
423a5(rgyud): tedzi la mA pa ni ya swA hA//lan bdun yongasu bzlas byas na//gti mug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur//ras ris mchod rten la rten nas//
423a6(rgyud): maN+Dal dri zhimA me tog dmAr//kA ra ra mngar gsum dog dang ni//'bras dang til dkar yung dkar dang //pad+ma'i rtsa ba dkar po lnga//ril bu rgya shug 'brum blo tsam//spyan
423a7(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni//hrIHlas byung ba'i sku mdog dkar//phyag na pad+ma mchog sbyin mdzad//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs//tad+ya thA/oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/
423b1(rgyud): d+h+r-idz+yo d+hi raM/d+hu ru d+hur+Ya/iT+Ta baT+Ta/tsa lwa tsa l+ye/pra tsA la pra tsa le//ku su ma ku su ma myan re/a lam la/tsi tI dz+wa la ma ba na ya swAhA//ril bu dag la sngags btab ste//byams pa/
423b2(rgyud): sems dang ldan pas bza'//srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas//rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur//maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas//ut+pal sngon po nom pa dang //oM ka ru
423b3(rgyud): dang tsan dang //dri yi chu yis bume pa dragang //phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can//sku mdog ldang sngon cung zhig khro//rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis/
423b4(rgyud): sa.oMn+d+ha d+hAr/d+hurAr+thad+he//sum sa mam nga /oM ma n+ta/d+hIH mA ni ya/
423b5(rgyud): hUM bskyed phyag na rdo rje ni//bum pa'i chu yis khrus byas nas//zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur//drug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad
423b6(rgyud): padA ras sem grog shing shun la//'khor lo rtsigs bzhi mu khyud bcas//d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+hi ri d+hi ra~M/d+hu ru d+hu ru/che ge mo la rak+Sha k+Shau zhes

424a2(rgyud): srung ba yi ni dam pa 'dris//srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'o//mu tibA rin chen byi ru gser//ga bur gur gumo gla tso dang //a ga ru dang du r+yas//phur ma snying dkar gdag
424a3(rgyud): par bya/tsan+dan gla rtsi gur bum dang //gu gul nag po bsregs pa'i phye//pa yi 'o mas 'degu bya//gnas gsum dag tu byugs pa sA ni//gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs
424a4(rgyud): kun los//byugs pas da ni srung bar 'gyur//srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////ser ba yongasu srung ba ni//seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la//
424a5(rgyud): gzungs sngags bzlas pa dbus su ni//hUM las byung ba'i sku bskyed//phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po ni//shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni//sku mchog dkar po me dpung
424a6(rgyud): 'bar/de rdo rje 'khor lo sdig mdzub mdzad//oM pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hU~Mn ha na hU~M phaT/lho ru ga shin rje gshed po ni//dmar po lag nA bo con 'dzin//oM ya mAn+ta kr-it+ta tiSh+ThaN+Di
424a7(rgyud): hUM phaT/nub tu rta mgrin dmer po no//me dpung rdo rje dbyug po 'dzin//oM ha ye gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaTi//byang du khro gnyer can spu ni//ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa s+ho//rmi
424b1(rgyud): a mo g+ha ka d+h+r-i ku ti dan+ta ban+d+ha hUM phaT/phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ni//bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//gcan zan dri ma yungs kar bsres//gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' ba
424b2(rgyud): gtor//oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha hU~M lu hu lu/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ha nu ha nA/hU~M phaT//sor bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ho zer
424b3(rgyud): rab tu bkye ste//phyog stong dang spyan stong la 'od zer 'byung ba 'di lta ste/dkar po dang /dmar po dang /nag pa dang /ljang ku dang /ser po dang /'od zer de dag gis 'gro pa ris
424b4(rgyud): drug po de dag thams cad la khyab ste/dbugs dbyung ba mdzad//de nas rgyal chen bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan//
424b5(rgyud): 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshang pa mdun na 'don dang /tshangs pa chen po dang /'od chen dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsel dang /
424b6(rgyud): dpe chung dang /chad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nam
424b7(rgyud): snang ba dang /'og min la sogs pa'i lha de dag gis/mchod pa'i sprin gyis char phob nas//lha'i bus tshig su bcad pas bstod pa//spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i skud/
425a1(rgyud): phyag stong nyon mongs grol ba'i phyag/spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te//'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod//ces bstod nas/bcom ldan 'das

426a3(rgyud): dAdra nas 'di brjod par bya ste/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/kA ya bak+Sh+ya ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ar+tha ko&haM/de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgyad du lha mo bas mo//oM bi lo ki ni/a ba lo ka

426a5(rgyud): ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pA la sha'i 'dab ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o//oM b+hu ri Ni mahA tsakra birti ni hUM/nub kyi mdab ma la b+hu ri Ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ud pal sngon po lta bu

426a7(rgyud): 'di ni pid+me'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtsham su ba cad lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o//oM badz+ra pad+me shwa ra ma pad+me hU~M/lho phyogs kyi mtsham su pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'i/
426b1(rgyud): a bau sh+tsa pad+mA d+hA/'don sna tshogs kyi pad+ma sA/nub phyogs kyi mdzums pad+ma nag po bsdams pa//oM bi shwa bak+Sh+ma hU~M/'di ni sna rmugs kyi zhal ts+tshan te/byang phyogs kyi mtshams
426b2(rgyud): su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o//oM pad+mi nit+te shwa ro hU~M/zo 'bru'i dbus 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug/de ltar gagong sgom pa dang ldan
426b3(rgyud): zhing ting 'dzin la gomis par byed na dngos grub bstan por 'gyur//de yis sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i long spyod thams cad ste ro//sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing //gzus
426b4(rgyud): dang sa yang de bzhin//'jig rten kun gyi 'di ston cing //sa rang nyid rjesu sgrub//sangs rgyas nyid ni byang sems nyid//rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin//yod 'ong sangs rgyas ni
426b5(rgyud): 'phang ni//spyad mi dgas par 'grub par 'gyur//byang chub sems dang gi bur bcas//tsAn dmor dang rab sbyar te//rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan//sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud
426b6(rgyud): len yin//sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni//bcud kyis le ni bde ba yang //'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yos//gzhan zhing nad med dam bde zhing //tshe dang stobs dang brgyan
426b7(rgyud): 'brus da //bskal bzang ye shes bla na med//skye ba 'di la 'grub par//maM lus lus pa med pa 'gyug/dbang dang dbug dang dbye ba dang //bsad dang bskrad pa ma /
427a1(rgyud): pa/rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang /na mkha 'gro ba de bzhin no//sra bcu'i dbang phyug thob 'gyur zhing //ting 'dzin la gnus par 'gyur//
427a2(rgyud): phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yis//rdo rje dam tshig de yis ni//rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog/'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur//oM hriHpad+ma nin+te shwa ra hUM/rtsa ba'i
427a3(rgyud): sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyin mo dang nub mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro//yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur//yang
427a4(rgyud): na stong bzlas brjod byas na dus ma yin par 'tsho ba med par 'gyuraro//yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlas brjod byas na thams cad kyis mchod pa'i 'osu 'gyuraro//gzhan yang
427a5(rgyud): stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas na skal pa bzang ba dang //g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyuraro//
427a6(rgyud): yang na stong phrag lnga bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad kyi snying 'khrug par byed//stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyu ro//stong phrag bdun
427a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyuraro//stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na rig 'dzin ma grub par 'gyuraro//stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod byas
427b1(rgyud): na sbyin mo grub par 'gyuraro//khri tsho gcig bzlas brjod byas na lha dang klu dang /mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro//stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar snang la 'gro ba'i
427b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor me rnams 'grub par 'gyur//stong phrag sum cu bzlas brjod byas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyuraro//stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na mkha' la
427b3(rgyud): spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod bya son ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub po'i reg 'dzin
427b4(rgyud): du 'gyuraro//stong phrag bdun cu bzlas na sa gsum gyi bdag por 'gyuraro//stong phrag brgyad cu bzlas na 'khor los bsgyur bu'i rgyal por 'gyur//'bum phrag gcig bzla
427b5(rgyud): brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyi du 'gyuraro//'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na rang dga'i gzugasu 'gyu ro//bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas
427b6(rgyud): na sangs rgyas nyi du 'gyuraro//bye ba phrag cig bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du rje su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 'grub par 'gyu zhing lus
