434a6(rgyud): ldan zhing /mthong ba dang thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/gzungs 'di thos pa'i don
434a7(rgyud): mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de yang yongasu dgod du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems can dag
434b1(rgyud): de dus 'brub par shes na sgyu so//dbasmon ga shegs pas 'khor ba zlo ba 'ang byin myos bzlas can to//danas byung chub sems dpa' sam 'tshan pa 'phags pa skrun ras gzugs
434b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smraso//dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sa das
434b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o//tad+ya thA/kha ga ma kha ga ma tsak+Shu/kha be/shro tra kha be/g+ha na khaM be/ji
434b4(rgyud): kha be/ga la ya kha be/ma na kha be/sa ra kha be sa ra kha be si ra kha be/shU na tA kha thaM/oM ni mi tra kha be/a prA Ni hi ta kha be/sam+b+hi d+hi khi be/pU ra mi tA khe be/bo d+hi khe be/sa ra
434b5(rgyud): sar sa ra/sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/d+hArma a d+hISh+Thi tekau li ka la ka la/saM g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/nu mo dA na ba tIn+ti/bud d+hA ko tsI d+b+h+yAM/a d+hiSh+Than du man/tsa ta
434b6(rgyud): s+yA pAr sha do A yung ba lu tsing dan du/tad+hi thA/sur b+hi su b+h+rU~M/mahA sur b+hI/mu ni mu ni/man+t+ra munau/mA ti ma ti/mad+hi ma ti/na mo rang ni tra yA oM/na ma ar+ya a bA
434b7(rgyud): mo ka te shwa rA yai/ba d+hi satwA ye/ma hA satwA ya/mahA kI ru Ni ka ya~M/sa mra ngan dun no/sa man+ti d+hi dr-i d+ha ra tI swAhA//gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dab bya
435a1(rgyud): ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpar bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna
435a2(rgyud): tshogs thob par gyur to//gzungs 'di'i tshi ga ni 'di lags te/nang bar langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phag+sas
435a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro//phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar par 'gyur ro//rim nad thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
435a4(rgyud): rlung gis zin na mar dang /'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o//so na na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te bca' bar
435a5(rgyud): bgyi'o//rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par bgyi'o//klad pa na
435a6(rgyud): ba la 'bru mar ro//lto na ba la byab par bgyi'o//gdon gyis btab pa la//tshon srung sna lnga lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdagaso//mkha'agro ma'i gdon gyi
435a7(rgyud): btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te ga shis thams cad byug/nad thams cad la byeb par bgyi'o//'di ni sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o//ji ste sangs rgyas dang
435b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /gzungs dang /ting 'dzin 'thob pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang /mi snang bar bgyi ba dang /mig bslu ba dang /ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub/
435b2(rgyud): por 'tshal na/des sku gdung dang brgyas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad ba zhag la/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
435b3(rgyud): dang /bdun bris te/me tog sna tshogs kyis chal bar bkang la/ts+tshinA dan dang /A ga nu dang /kun tu ru'i badrug pas bdugs te/mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bung cing mchod pa
435b4(rgyud): chen po bgyis te/tshangs par sbrid pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'dri dag gis mtshams bcud pAr bgyi'o//na mo rad na tra yA ya/nam
435b5(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki twe shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA yA/mahA satwA ya/mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+ya thA/ti li ban d+ha mi/mi le ban+d+ha mi/tsi li mI li ban+d+ha mi/bdag gi marnams la su yang
435b6(rgyud): 'di' bar ma gyur cig swA hA//tshu la lin nyi shu rtsi gcig yongasu bzlas te phyogs bcur mtshams bcad par bgyi'o//gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'dri
435b7(rgyud): dag kyang zlog mir brjod par bya'o//na mo rad ne tra yA ya/na ma Ur+ya a lo ka ta shwarA ya/baM d+he satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma kA ru Ni kA ya/tad+yathA/tsi li tsi li/
436a1(rgyud): mi li mi li/tsal la/e hi b+ha grA n+d+han/Ar+ya a ba la ka ta shwaR+Sha ya swA hA//'di ni bdag gi snying po bshud pa ste/des ngadag dgug par 'gyur//
436a2(rgyud): de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngos tshesra brgyad nas bzungs te nya'i bar du lani brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/dus gsum du khrus bgyi/
436a3(rgyud): dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyidado//de nas tshes bco lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o//'on tang nam gyi gung thun la
436a4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par rgyan pa/lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing
436a5(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur ro//de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing bstan par bgyis na/mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro//gzungs dang ting 'dzin kyang
436a6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro//shar phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//lho phyogasu rin chen tog dang /nub phyogasu 'od dpag med dang /byang phyogasu
436a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro//de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dog rags pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar
436b1(rgyud): 'gyur//'di nas shi 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag /pa rnams skye bar 'gyur te/thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur
436b2(rgyud): drinid nas bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i rigs pa sbyin ras gradags dade phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa'i de dag dang gnas ka nad ma'i ros
436b3(rgyud): kyis lha'i bu rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
436b4(rgyud): glugargyas po la mngon par k+Sha//'phags pa kun tu bzang ba zhes bya ba'i gzus rdzogs///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin miH dang /d+hun shU la / chen
436b5(rgyud): gyi l-its+tsha bA ban d+he pre shes sdes bskur cing zhus te skadags rjod kyis kyang btsas na sa gta nul phab pa//rgya gar sa /An+yA maM pa ma~M kI
436b6(rgyud): rA h+yA ya~M grI ba d+hA ra Ni/bod skad du/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya gri ba'i gzungs//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
436b7(rgyud): na mo rad ni dza pA yaM/na ma I r+ya a ba lo ki ta shwarA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya~M/ma hA satwA ya/mit+tak+ShA ru Ni kA ya~M/sarbos twe b+h+yaHsanA ga tin/na maHsa zlos t+ye b+h+yaHsa
437a1(rgyud): ba ha ra Ni/na maHsar+b+ba sat+kA b+hA yot+ta ra NA yaHna maHsar+b+ba b+hA bA pran man na kA rA ya/na maHsar+b+ba sat+ka rba b+haH ki ta sa na kaR+Sha ya/na maHsar+b+ba ban+d+ha na/
437a2(rgyud): ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/na maHsan+na duHkha ra mo k+Sha Na kr-i rA ya/na meHsAr+b+ba An d+hA ka ra bi d+ha ma na ka rA ya/na maHsar+b+ba did+hA rA dza ba shu prab+hA ye/ma hA yo gA/yo gI shwa rA
437a3(rgyud): yaM/te s+ya na maHkr-it+tA i da na Ar+ya a baM lo ki te shwa ra mu khod gI n+ti r-i ShI bing dA da de ban+na ga/yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/shakr-i pad+me/lo ka br-i la/biSh+Nu ma hI shwa ra/nA ra ya Na
437a4(rgyud): skan+ta ku be ra/a su rin+d+ra/ma tri gaN/na maHkr-i tan/badz+ra khu ri sa hi yaM/ha ya gI ba brah+ma/pra ra mi hr-i da ya/mr-i brta yi Sh+ya mi/a baM pra me yAr+d+ha sA d+hi kan/
437a5(rgyud): aM ba d+yan/sar+b+ba b+hU tA nAM/sar+b+ba big+h+nAM bi nA ya ki/a mo b+hi/sAr+b+ba karma NaM/bi shA nany+tsA/bi nA ya kaM/tad+b+haSh+Ta/au ta ru la tra ru la/bi ta ru lA br-i ta ru la/
437a6(rgyud): satwa biSh+ya g+hA ta ka/sin+d+hi Tu tA bi dra ba Shika dza li ta/a na la/bi sU lig/Ad+b+ha ha sa/kaM sa ra/a to ba/bra bi ta ka yaM badz+ra/bu ra nirga tI ta/tsa li te bA su d+ha ta
437a7(rgyud): la/badz+rodaH si ta/haM si ta ma ru tok+Sha te/pra sha ma na ka ra/bai da duSh+Ta bits+tshin/saM b+hak+Sha Na kar/swa bid d+ho pa da sha ka ra/pa ra ma shAn+ti kar/dud d+ha bud d+ha/
437b1(rgyud): d+hA ya m+bit+te/byA gu b+hAn ha ya b+hI ba/sar+b+ba bid+d+ha hri da yA/myA bar+N+Na yi Sh+Ta mau/khyA nga khyA da/mA hA ra dr-i/man+tan/ruk+Sha rak+ShA/Ad ma swa hi tan/man tran/sid+d+hi sid+d+ha/sar+b+ba karmASh+ya//
437b2(rgyud): sted sid+d+haM/de hi da h+ni.A bi sha A ba sh-i/pre bi sha pra dzi shaM/sarba gra ti Sh+ya a pra ti hitA/d+hun d+hu na/bi d+hu ne bi d+hA na/ma tha ma tha/pra ma tha pra mtha/sar+b+baM ba ro pA gra maH
437b3(rgyud): kr-i t+yA ka kho /dur laM gi ta/mu sha kha/bi sha ka raM/bi shwa daMSh+Ta bi shats+tshuHyo a bin+d+ha ra bi sha ka raM//sid+d+hi an+d+ran/tsAk+ShAr mo ha na/tsit+ta bka she pa na ku ra/ni t+yA/
437b4(rgyud): ya bAr prek+ShA NA/trA sa ya trA sa yaM/mahA bo d+hi satwA/r-i t+yA d+hiSh+ThA ni na/sar+b+baM b+hA ye b+h+yaHsaMt+kAn+taM rak+Sha ra//ma ma bud d+hanid+harma saM g+hi/a nu dz+nyA taM/me karma/shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru
437b5(rgyud): phaT/ha yi grI ba phaT/badz+re khuR+Sha ya phaT/badz+ro daMSh+To ta ka tr-i bA ya b+hai ra bA ya phaT/pa ri man+tha/sha ma ka R+Sha ya phaT/pa ru duSh+TA big+h+nAn/byA bak+Sha Na ka rA yaM phoT/saMr+b+ba gra
437b6(rgyud): hodA sA da na kAR+ShA ya phaT/sar+b+ba g+h+ra hi Shu a pra ti he tA ya phan+di/pa Ta la mu khA ya pheT/yi ge tsi ta/ma ma a hi tI shin/kaM yai kra mi ni/min tray+YAn+ti/ye man+ti/dzaM ba
437b7(rgyud): yan+ti/dz+re hr-in+ti/kA kho rda ku rban+ti/sarba nA b+ha mu khaM na ba kr-i tA ya phaT/na maHsar+b+ba duSh+Ta gra hod sA da nA ya/ha ya grI bA ya/sid+d+han+tu man+t+ra pa da swA hA/oM a mai tod b+ha bA ya
438a1(rgyud): sa g+huk+Sha//snronam+b+ha ta ya dz+dza/yon mo 'i shAm+b+hatA yoH/nA maHAt+ma s+'un+tu/pod+d+han+tu man+t+ra pa d+hA yak+ShAH//'phags pa spyan dam gas
438a2(rgyud): dbang phyug ha ya grI ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so///rgya gar skadu/Ar+ya ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya nI mai.aSh+Ta shi ta kan/bod skad/'phags pa
438a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//
438a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pho brang ri po Ta la'o tsa ma na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa/dzam bu na de'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/
438a5(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha mo yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
438a6(rgyud): 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /mi dang me mo yin pa byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la sti stang du byas/
438a7(rgyud): blo mar byas/rim gror byos/mchod cing bkur stir byas te/yongasu bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te//thog mar dag pa/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba don
438b1(rgyud): bzang ba tshig 'bru bzang po//ma 'dres pa/yong su byung ba/yongasu dag pa/yong su rdzogs pa/yongasu gsal ga tshungs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to//
438b2(rgyud): nas tshangs pa la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug la bskyod pa/kye bcom ldan 'das/bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas
438b3(rgyud): khur bor bdag don rjesu brnyes//srid pa sbyor ba yongasu zad //yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems//shes rab shin tu nir grol//klu chen po ni cing shiso//sems la dbang
438b4(rgyud): sgyur thams cad kyis//mchog tu pha rol phyin bathog/ye shes tshigs ni yongasu rdzogs//srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu rtu la//gzhan la phan pa mdzad la btsun//thugs rje rjen
438b5(rgyud): 'brel pa'i thugs//skye dgu kun la mchog tu byams//bde bar brtson pa byams las byung //mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas//bde bar gshegs pa nyid la skyes//bde bar
438b6(rgyud): shegs pa nyid kyi bko'//khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med//dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs//rigs pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin/
438b7(rgyud): mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes//cha br-i da ni lta bur zlum//skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni//sum rgya de nyis dog dang ldan//dpe byed bzang po brgyad nas kyang //snron rnams
439a1(rgyud): kun tu brgyan//sku mdog gser gyi kha dag 'dra//sku tshad rgyal kar shram po//nAg go sar gnonu ltar//cud zad dam ba 'druba'i mdzan/
439a2(rgyud): dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan//thor tshugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs//de bu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs//'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro//'od 'phyi 'dom gang
439a3(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur//gser gyi ri 'dre grags pas khyab//gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che//shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi//nyi ma'i gtsug tor dag dang ldan//nor bu rin chen
439a4(rgyud): 'bar ba'i sa//sri ral khAr ni ske phyed rgyan//sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas//pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod//tshul khrims ma nyams ral pa med//thon ka seng ge'i
439a5(rgyud): ral ba 'dra//sku ni 'jam zhing ldi do brag can//gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra//g.ya su'o khyil po'i dung yang 'dra//dpral ba zla ba bkam pa 'dra//
439a6(rgyud): dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che//smin mtshams par yang yong ma chad//shangs kyi dbyibs kyang cung zad mtho//mgur kyang bu pa'i mgrin pa 'dra//dpung pa dag kyang rab
439a7(rgyud): tu zlas//phyog sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring //sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar//phyag sor rnams kyi bar 'brel ba//phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la//
439b1(rgyud): 'khor lo dag gis rab tu rgyan//ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes//sku mdangs 'jam zhing shangs kyang rgyas//gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbang ltar snyan//yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar
439b2(rgyud): 'gyur//blta na sdug cing mngangs dga' ba//pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra//pad+ma dag las kun tu skyes//pad+ma dag gis gdan lo bzhugs//phyag na pad+ma bzang po bsnam/
439b3(rgyud): ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams//khri snyen sa le'i lpags pi ban bas//dbyug pi dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin//ngaka shis dag gis gtsang mar gyur//snga ni sa gsung zhing
439b4(rgyud): gsong por gsungs//bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs//yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra//sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad//bzang po snang ba'i ljong shing
439b5(rgyud): ltar/sems can kun gyi gso su 'gyur//sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa lags//bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'//bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin//
439b6(rgyud): baM spa nyag ma re re yang //sems can rnams kyi gtso bor gyur//bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad//ba shol ba med cing nges par mdzad//rab tu drag pa'i brtson
439b7(rgyud): 'grus can//'khor ba dag las rab tu rgal//dam chos rgyal mtshan mnga' gsol ba//yid bzhin 'khor lo dge ba sbyor//don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren
440a1(rgyud): ha ya grI ba bdud bzhi 'joms//kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel//lha ma skal marje su 'brang //khro ga nyar tsa ni dka' bzhin byed//rgyal ba tsani tshul
440a2(rgyud): dang ldan//mthu chen ldan zhing dran dang ldan//yon tan ldan zhing byams dang ldan/shes rab ldan zhing dpal dang ldan//tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan//don
440a3(rgyud): rnams kun rig pa po//the tshom thabs cad gcod pa po//chos rnams thams cad sgrub bo//'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa po//zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra//skud smad
440a4(rgyud): rin chen kun gyis brgyan//gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas//'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhagatshangs pa la sogs phyag bgyis pa'o//'phrigs pa spyan ras
440a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gang zhig bstod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyis sgrib pa yongasu byung bar 'gyuraro//dkyil 'kha thad
440a6(rgyud): du zhugs par 'gyuraro//gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//bskal pa stong gi bar du yang ngan 'gror mi skye'o//mnar med par mi 'gro'o//su zhig
440a7(rgyud): nor par langs nas klog gam/zlog tu 'jug gam/kha tin du 'don na mi de'i lus la mdze dang /shu ba dang /klan pa dang /dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad zad
440b1(rgyud): las thar bar 'gyuraro//skye sa cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur//gar skyes kyang
440b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro//rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid bzhungs par 'gyuraro//sems dpa' bar 'gyuraro//dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro//
440b3(rgyud): gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyuraro//bstod pa'i dris bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed mchod ba byas par 'gyur/rnam par smin
440b4(rgyud): pa yang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag medo//rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsol rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzog so//
440b5(rgyud): //rgya gar skad du/kA ru ni ka s+ye Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra su shaM ka ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/bod skadadu/'phags pa gnod 'dzin tshwa dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa la
440b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i grong khyer gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang po'i bus gnas
440b7(rgyud): ni bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen ngo nor bu bzang po'i bus 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge
441a1(rgyud): bstan nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po nyi na lanA gsum/mtshan lan gsum soms par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag tu
441a2(rgyud): de'i rjesu 'byung bar bgyid/bdag dpag tshad brgyar yang gnod sbyin rnams las srung ba bgyi'o//bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o//'dod pa dang ldan pa'i kha nA ma
441a3(rgyud): tho ba ma gtogs pa 'di lta ste/zas dang /skom dang /bca' ba dang /bza' ba dang /nor dang /'bru dang /dbyig dang /gser bsul bar bgyi'o//tad+ya thA/hi li ma Ni b+ha dra hi li
441a4(rgyud): hi li ma Ni b+ha dra ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ki li ki li ma Ni b+ha dA/ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dA/tu ru ma Ni b+hau dra/tu ru tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/tsu ru tsu ru ma No b+hi dr-i/
441a5(rgyud): su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/su ru su ru me Ne b+ha dra/oM e h+ya hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha me tsi ya sA d+ha ya swA hA/tad+ya thA/pU ta na b+hU ta ni/su ru me/su ma te/su ban te su p+lu sh+tsi/ha l-i mi li swA hA//tshe
441a6(rgyud): ga ni zla ba yar gyi ngo ches bco lnga la tsan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas la/a ge ru bsregs nas bzlas brjod byas na de'i 'og tu gser thob par 'gyuraro//'phags pa gnod
441a7(rgyud): 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba rdzog so///rgya gar skad du/Ir+ya ru tsir ang ga yaSh+Ti nA ma d+ha ra nI/bod ska du/'phags
441b1(rgyud): pa lus kyi dbyi su mardzas bcas bya ba'i gzungs//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha 'o//na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi te.A khA ya/sUr+yA sha
441b2(rgyud): ta satwa sra au ti raM ka te dza/prA b+hU a b+ha sau ta mur+t+ta yem+b+ha hA ma Ni mu tra kuN+Da laM/a la ma kA ra d+ha ri Ne b+ha gra b+hU ti pad+ma pA NA ye/sarba lo ka a pa ya shA ma d+hA ya/bi bi d+ha khu kha saum thA
441b3(rgyud): sha a biShA/sarba satwa pa ri mau ts+r-i kA ya/tad+ya thAM/oM b+hu ra b+hu ba swA hA/na hA a lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mi ra pa ti la bi nA sha ka/rA ga dwe Sha mah+ma mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/sha sa ka
441b4(rgyud): rak+Sha ka/sarba a pa ya durga tI pra sha ma ka/sarba satwa saM mA shwA si nAM ka ra/sarba A shA pa re pU ra ka/sarba ta thA ga tA saM b+ha nA ka ra/he hi ma hA ba~M d+hI sang+ga/ba ra ba ra dA ya kA/pad+ma
441b5(rgyud): a lo ka saM b+ha ta/ma hA kA ru Ni kI/he TA mu ku TA/a lang kr-i te shi ra/ma Ni ka na ka rA dza/sha ta badz+ra bai DUr+ye i lang kr-i ta shA rI ra a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la a l-i kr-i ta/br-i
441b6(rgyud): b+ha ra Na rA dz+nyA na sha ta sa he se A b+hi la she ti kA yaM/ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba rA bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/bI nA sha ya/bin+na shaM yA/ma hA yAM trakl-i sha ka ba nA a ba ba d+ha bi bo d+he satwa sa ra tsa ra ka
441b7(rgyud): pra ma thA da/bu ru Sha pad+ma/pu ru Sha nA ga/puM ru Sha sA ga re/pu ru Sha si ha/bi ha bi ra/bi ra dza/su dan ta pa raM br-i ta/d+ha ma d+ha me/sa ma sa ma/d+hu ru d+hu ru/pa shA sa ya pra shA
442a1(rgyud): sna b+hUHnas sa thaHna swA d+ha/r+N+Na T+Ta tra d+d+ho /sangs /su sbya/
442a2(rgyud): nuru ru mu ya mu ya/muM tsamUn+te/d+hu na d+hu na/bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/nu ru d+hu ru/gA yaM gA ya/gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/hA sa ha sa/pra ha sa pra ha sa/nA nA bi bi d+hak+Sha sha
442a3(rgyud): sa nA/ha ra ha ra/siM ha ra saM ha ra/d+hu ru TaM d+hu ru Te/ma hA maN+Da/a lang kA ra Na/sha ta pra sai ka/a ba b+ha si tA ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka/ma hA ba d+hi satwa pa ra dA
442a4(rgyud): swAhU~M//bcom ldan 'das lag na ped+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs byang chub sems dpa'i khang bzang dam pa/rdo rje chen pos
442a5(rgyud): bgegs par gsungs pa/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin byed ma'i bu dang //mi 'am ci dang /lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par
442a6(rgyud): byed pa 'di/sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyin tom/'chang ngam/'don tam+b+ha/klog gam/mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/de'i las dang
442a7(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro//nangs par langs nas lan cig 'don na/lag na pad+ma phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro//yid la gang dag 'dod
442b1(rgyud): pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro//gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rje su dran
442b2(rgyud): par byas la lan bdun brjod na/dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad kyi yi du 'ong bar 'gyuraro//de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyuraro//yud tsam
442b3(rgyud): zhig 'chag cing 'dug la yid la brjod na/bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las byang bar 'gyur ro//'khor los bsgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi
442b4(rgyud): phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//tshe rabs tshe rab su yang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro//skye bo khyad par du 'phags pas bskur bar 'gyuraro//me tog dri zhim pos
442b5(rgyud): snyim pa bkang ste/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi mdun du len bdun brjod na/yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyuraro//snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba de la skye bar
442b6(rgyud): 'gyur/dam pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro//de nyid kyi gding du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigaso dbang
442b7(rgyud): phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing /chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur//tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa thob par 'gyur//ses
443a1(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa tha~Md
443a2(rgyud): zad par byed par 'dod na/tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la bskung ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsAn dkar pos
443a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskus la/dkyil 'khor de dang /bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/bcom ldan 'das dang /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri
443a4(rgyud): zhim po'i bdug po dang /mar me dang /spos kyis sti stang byas te/de nyi 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/des sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//mtshams med
443a5(rgyud): pa byed pa yang sdig pa byang zhing shin tu yongasu dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang /shin tu yongasu dge pa'i lus dang dgra dang /yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro//de bzhin/
443a6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun tu ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang /dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang /sa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang /ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs
443a7(rgyud): sgrub par mdzad//gnam la byin du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab po//sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyuraro//'bab chu
443b1(rgyud): dzo /mtsho'u dang /rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nad thams cad la lag pas byab cing bzlas brjod byas na sos par 'gyur//dran pa nyes
443b2(rgyud): pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyuraro//bkres pa dang /skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas ni tshim par 'gyur ro//mi ngas chen po byung na ra sma bros te//
443b3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags na/dpag tshad tshun chad mtshams bcad pa dang //bsrang ba byas par 'gyu ro//'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso///
443b4(rgyud): rgyo gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /zhu chen gyi lits+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phan pa'o///rgya gar skadu/sI ha n+ta da tan tranA ma
443b5(rgyud): bod skad du/seng+ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug tu
443b6(rgyud): bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugaso//de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang lam
443b7(rgyud): rnams ji ltar sbyang /e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i mchog sman ras gzigs seng+ge sgra zhes bya ba yodade/de yis smon lam sbyang ba dang /bsod nams dang ye she
444a1(rgyud): kyi tshogs bsngags par yid la byas//de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug 'angs te//gsang sngags kyi chog 'di dag smras//na mo radA na tra yA ya/
444a2(rgyud): na mo Ar+yA bA lo ki ti shwad+hA ya/bo d+hi satwA yA/mahA satwA ya/mahA kA ru Nik+Sh+Na yAM/taHthA/oM a ka Te/biM ka Te/ts+tshi ka Te/ka Ta ka Te ka ra~M Te/ka ra kaMnra/bir+ye swAts+tsha/
444a3(rgyud): AHb+h+yAM/sai ha nA dad+d+ha/bruM mrAd+h+waMHmaM A/aM ba la ni b+h+yA/d+h+r-i dz+nyAM ba prar+the d+hu baM b+h+yAM/sarba amr-i tan+thi/au ba te li/me be ta li/d+h+waM d+h+waM ts+tsha AH/au ga g+ha/
444a4(rgyud): ma d+hU ya/sa~M kA /a tre+e NA sru~Mk+ShA swA kAn+d+ha sa/hU~M ga sa d+his Sh+Tu uHSh+T+r-iHhrI Sh+T+r-im+b+hahU~M/s+t+wa~MH
444a5(rgyud): tI shru trI smr-i ti sa ma~M byA ti/sa ramA taM sid d+hA s+yAhUM/oM AHhrIHhUM swAhA/phuHd+hIHoM siM han+ni dahU~M phaT yan+d+ha gai dub+hA la mU ra ya phanra/d+hA lA dz+ha la hUM Ta/aM A
444a6(rgyud): bin+nan+ti kr-itib+h+yAM/au ag+na ye a tiSh+Ta/oM b+hi sa mA ya ye shaM/mih+nA k+Sha yaM hats+tsha/ka byA/ma hU~M ni ya s+thAn+te/oM b+ha ba ga ag+na ma?/n+ti ku ru smai hAM/AHhrIHsi
444a7(rgyud): haM R+R-i da badz+ri kra brti la kaM kaT+Ta ng+ku b+h+rU~M/ma t+tAr Ni si ha na dan+duT+Ta sa tA n+do d+yAn+na hU~Mdz+dzahUM hUM hrIhUM//gsang ba'i bdag pa 'di ni mal gyi kyi zhes bya/
444b1(rgyud): bsad pa dang /phyir ldog pa dang /dgug pa dang /bcing ba dang /zhi ba'i las yin te/nang par ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du mnyes
444b2(rgyud): pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur ro//'dri ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste//seng ge'i steng du zla ba la//rgyal po rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs//g.yas na thad mtshan rtse gsum la/drag
444b3(rgyud): po'i rgyal rigs dbang du bsdus//pad+ma'i rtsel thod pa ni//phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da/shes rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas//dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la//reg sngags rnam par
444b4(rgyud): rgyan pa po//gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'phyang //rtse mor 'od dpag med pas rkyeni//seng+ge'i cha las byung ba yin//'dam skyes dmar ba'i lo ma gnyis//pad+ma bzhi la sngags
444b5(rgyud): bzhi ldan//rang lus 'og nas thal mo sbyor//sku la 'dud cing 'phrin las byed//rdo rjeri gdan la mi bskyod pa'i//thugs kho nas ni sngags 'od 'don//spro ba gsum du ldan
444b6(rgyud): pa'i sngags//nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bya'o//gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di la smod pa'i sems can de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smod pa yin/
444b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pa rgyud 'di nyan pa dang /sems pa dang /mchod pa dang //'chang ba dang /tha na 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang /sum cu
445a1(rgyud): gsum gyi lha dang /tshangs pa'i bu dang /tshangs chen rnams kyis srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /smra ba dang /kun tu rdzasu 'brang bar byed/de bas chas
445a2(rgyud): lhag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bu la mas srung ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur ro//bdud kyi bar du gcod par mi nus so//gang shrI 'phos nas nub phyogs
445a3(rgyud): bde ba can du pad+mo las skye bor 'gyuraro//mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur//tshe 'dir me dang chu'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyuraro//'dir ni mdo tsam skyesu zad kyi
445a4(rgyud): de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur//gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang /'tshe ba dang /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi byed na/de
445a5(rgyud): la lha'i bu dang /klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis srung bla gyis shig ces bka' stsal to//de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang /tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga' nas tshul bzhin
445a6(rgyud): du khas blang bar byas//de nas gzhan srung ba'i phyir bdag sa dkar po lo lan du mar bsngags na bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro//seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs
445a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta prad+d+haM kA ra dang /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'ges khug pa lhas btsas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
445b1(rgyud): rgya glar swA du/Ar+ya ba ma ki te shwa rA ya sing ha nA da nA ma d+ha ra NI/bod skad du/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug si sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tsha'o//
445b2(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho drang rI po Ta la'i rtse mo na/rin po che'i khang bzengs rin po che dang /mu tig dang /
445b3(rgyud): nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa/'od kyis stong gdum khyer pa/me tog dri zhi mo po sna tshogs kyis/kun nas brgyan pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu
445b4(rgyud): med pa dang /nyan thos chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongasu bskor zhing /bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i gdon bshams pa la bzhugs//'khor der byang chub
445b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcu
445b6(rgyud): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi
445b7(rgyud): 'khor dang btsun mo dang /long spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las rgyal po dri mdze dang /bol mig dang dbugs mi bde ba ni nad 'bar ba byung ste/de ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/
446a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jal dpal sngon 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal khyed nyid byang chub sems dpa'
446a2(rgyud): shes rab chen po zhes bya ba yin la/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba yin pas/byang chub sems da
446a3(rgyud): de gnyis stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng+ge dkar po gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan/mdung rtse gsum
446a4(rgyud): ba dang /ral bri dang /pad+ma dang ud pa la thogs nas phyin pa la/rgya mtsho chen po la rgal ba'i dusu seng ge bzhag nas khur res byas shing byin pa la/byang chub sems dpa' shrI
446a5(rgyud): rab chen po khyod nyid ni grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bku mo//byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog bsam pa la stong 'og par snang gi klu dang /lha la soms
446a6(rgyud): pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snongad bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs/tri shUl rtse gsum pa lag na thogs/seng ge dkar po la zhon/mya ngan du ril pa thaMd du bcings
446a7(rgyud): nas steng gi lha la bsdigs te/snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas//rang gi grogs pos spangs nas cig pu lus//lha rnams kun gyis nyes na chad pa'i las
446b1(rgyud): grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'bums par bgyid//ces smras te lnga rnams la tri shU la gdengs pa dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mjed kyi bdag
446b2(rgyud): po tshangs pa dang /khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/lha'i me tog pad+mo dang /ku mud dang /pu NA ri ka dang /tsam pa ka la sogs pa phul ti thod pa bkango //de nas
446b3(rgyud): bar snang gi lha dang /klu dang /dri za dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /grul bum dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/tri shu la gdengs nas
446b4(rgyud): snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/ring gi phrogs po spangs nas gcig pu lus//sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i las/grang khyer 'joms shing sde brgyad 'gums
446b5(rgyud): par bgyid//ces smras te/sde brgyad la tri shU la gdangs pa dang /klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen dang /dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams thos
446b6(rgyud): kyi bu dang /lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thigs zangs ris dang /mi 'am tswi'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can dang /grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pa dang /no mkha' lding gi rgyal po
446b7(rgyud): gser mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas pa dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste seng ge la rin po che'i rgyan phulo//de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te/snying
447a1(rgyud): rnga'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas//rang ni grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus//klu tshogs rnams kyis nyes na chad pa'i las//grong khyer
447a2(rgyud): 'joms shing klu rnams 'gums par bgyid//ces smras te/rgya mtsho chen po tri shU las bkrugs pa dang /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang /klu'i rgyal
447a3(rgyud): po 'jog po dang /de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/'od dang ldan pa/lha dang /lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa/klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug g.yog dang 'khor
447a4(rgyud): du bcas pa 'dus te/dga' ba'i mdangs phyung nas klu'i rgyal po ba ru ne sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas/phyag 'tshal bskor ba lan gsum byas te/byang chub sems dpa
447a5(rgyud): snying rje can//khyod la bdag ni skyabasu mchi//klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig/nyams na klu'i gashr-id ma mdzod//ces smras nas tri shU lan gsum bkris//kha
447a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur/phuHphuHzhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cing gnas//klu'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas/bskor ba lan
447a7(rgyud): gsum gsum byas nas/byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can//khyod la bdag cag skyabasu mchi'o//klu rnams thams cad srabasu bzung //nyams na klu'i gshed ma
447b1(rgyud): mdzod//ces smras nAs/klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs skud la 'khris//klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang bdag cag ni bran bgyid//ci bka' stsal pa nyano zhes
447b2(rgyud): smras nas klu rnams so'i gan su dengaso//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni snying rje klu 'dul zhes bya'o//snying nad sel ba zhes bya'o//'jam dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub seMd
447b3(rgyud): shes rab chen po de 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng+ge khyod nyid yin no//de'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje mchog de ni da lta'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng+ge sgra klu'i
447b4(rgyud): ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yino//'jam dpal ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen po'i sngags brjod par bya'o//yid la zung cig/na mo rang nA tra yA ya/na
447b5(rgyud): ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bo d+hi satwA ya/ma hA satwA ya/ma hA kA ru NI kA ya/tad+yA thA/oM U ka Te bi ka Tu ni ka Te/ka TaM ka Te ka ro Ta/tsi ti dz+wa la ka ro ti bIr+ye swA hA/
447b6(rgyud): gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus gsungs la/da ltar ngo nyid kyis brjod pa'o//'di'i tshe ga ni mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o//bcom ldan 'das spyan ras
447b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug saung+ge sgra'i sku lug ma 'am/bris su'i sbyar sngar ba'i lci bas le ma ltung bas sor ma 'dres par maN+Dal brgyad byas te/mauN+Dal re re la me todag tshom puny+dza
448a1(rgyud): dkram te/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/maN+Dal re ro la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsu
448a2(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba de bsdus te/lci ba lhag ma las bsngags shing nad pa la byugs na nod thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//lha dang klu la sogs pa'i dug gi nad thang
448a3(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyuraro//zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur ni/'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yino//'jam dpal thugs//

454b7(rgyud): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzadadu gsol/d+hun d+hu na/bi d+hun bi d+hun/ma tha ma tha/bra mthi bra ma tha/bzhe su gsal/bzhengasu gsol/chur gshegs tshur na
455a1(rgyud): na du rgyunan tu rgyug na / du smra/rgyun rgyun du / nan smyan/
455a2(rgyud): sh+tse tA madz+nyA u pa bi d+hA ya s+thAt+ma/ki ri ta ne swAh+ne/shu la ne swAt+ma/tsakra Ne swAtrA~M/baidzA NI s+yAhU/ti Ne tI ya s+t+raiHtr-iN d+he ye prA he ruM p+tA yaM s+t+raihA/s+t+raik+ShA sh+na yAm+b+ha
455a3(rgyud): shi shi ni swAhA/pra tse pa tI ye swA h+ma/yA maM ye s+thAhAM/ya me b+hung+ga sAhA/id+b+ha dzadz+nyA d+h+r-i to b+h+yaHswAhAM/dze rA mr-i dz+nye b+h+yo b+hU te b+h+yaHswA hAM/saM sre daM tshaM b+h+yo b+hU ti b+h+yaHoM pa pat+tA ke

455b1(rgyud): gzungs/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpar thams cad la phyag 'tshal//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can ma'

461b1(rgyud): /rairi bug+d+ha tra pra b+he dwe ni/da shAk+ShA ra pa da n+ya se/bid+yA hUM kA ra dwI pi twe/na mastu re pA drA g+hA ta/hUM ka ra kA ra bI dzi te/mr-i ru mun dA ra kI la sa/b+hu ba na tra ya ts+tsha lI ni/na maHsu ra sa rA kAR+Sha
461b2(rgyud): ha ra NI ka ka ra s+thi te/tA rI dwi ru ka ta s+phu Ta kA ra/e shi Sha bi Sha nA she ni/na maHsu ra ga NA d+h+r-ik+Sha/su ra kan+di da si be te/A baM d+ha mu da t+sa b+ho ga ka li/duHswap+na nA sha ni/na maH
461b3(rgyud): tsam+bu erka saM pur+b+ba/na ya na d+yu ti b+hU su r-i/ha rA hwe ru ka ta tuta tA re//bi Sha ma dzA ra nA sha nI/na mes+t+ri ta tra bi n+ti sa/shi ba shaka ti sa ma nI te/gra ha be tA Da yak+Shau g+ha/nA sha ni pra ba/
461b4(rgyud): re tu re/man+ta mu la mi daM sto taM/ni ma skA ra k+Shi baM sha kaM yaHba Thi ta pra yat+nA d+hI maM/daM byA b+hak+ti sa man ba ti/sha yam+b+ha prA ta ru ta thA pA yaHsma reta sar+b+ba b+ha yi pra daM/sarba pA ba pra sha ma

461b6(rgyud): b+hU tha dzaM ga maM/smr-i dran+ta ta pra la yaM yA tikhI hi taM po tA me ba b+hA/grA ha dzA ra bi ShI rat+ta naM/pa ra ma rat+ti bi nA sha naM/a n+ye ShAM tse ba sat+kA nAM/dIsti sap+ta b+hi ba ret+ti naM/pu trak+Sha

482a4(rgyud): gnon ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma//grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma//des ma nor ma bsod nams ma//skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma//mthar byed 'jig byed 'jigs/
482a5(rgyud): byed ma/drag dang brtul zhugs chen me ma//'gro la gcig tu phan par brtson//skyabs byed gus la gsong po ma//de gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma//rtag mo kun 'gro rjes 'gro/
482a6(rgyud): ma/don kun sgrub byed bzang mo ma//gsang byed gso byed nor sten ma//mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma//spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid skyes//mtshan brgya
482a7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad 'di dog no//phan par byed par grags pa ste//mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba'o//lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba//skal bzang skal po dang ldan byed//dug
482b1(rgyud): ni thams cad nyams byed la//na na thams cad 'i byed ma//sems can kun la bang stor ma//blo ldan dang zhig lan gsum klog/mnyam gzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis//des ni dus mi rung
482b2(rgyud): daru nga rgyal srid dpa la yang thob par 'gyur//rtag tu sdug pa'ang bde bar 'gyur//bkren pa phyug par 'gyur ba'o//rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur//yid gzhungs 'gyur
482b3(rgyud): bathe tsho med//bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur//tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur//dgra rdzo ba shes por 'gyur ba ste//rnga can dang ni mchi ba can//dog pa'i ma
482b4(rgyud): mo rgyal dka' dang //sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las/mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis//'jigs pa kun la sgrol bar byed//dus min 'chi la sgrol bar byed//skyes
482b5(rgyud): bu snyan pa thob par byed//mi ni skye ba don dang btsos//de gcig pu yi phan yon gyis//gang zhig 'di ni sngar langs nas//skyes bu gang zhig sgrogs byed pa//de yi dus ring tsho dang
482b6(rgyud): ldan mi ni dpal gyis dgo' 'gyur te/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //dri za dang ni lus srul po//'byung po go shed byed srin po dang //ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan
482b7(rgyud): pa/gnod sbyin ma dang yi dgas byed//smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams//grib gnon dang ni brjod byed dang //sha za la sogs pa rnams dang //raM langs la sogs sna tshogs
483a1(rgyud): rnams//bskul byed gzhan sems sdang ba rnams//grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur//ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur//sdang ba'i sems can 'ching
483a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur//nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur//phyug dang long spyod yon tan ldan//bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur//blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur//rigs dang
483a3(rgyud): ldan zhing mthong dgar 'gyur//gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal po//bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur//dge ba shes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten//byang
483a4(rgyud): chub sems kyis rgyan pa dang //gang dang gang du skyes pa der//rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong //dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs gsungs pa
483a5(rgyud): rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogaso///rgya gar skad du/tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan+da/bod skadadu/lha mo sgrol ma'i
483a6(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shul dang /na bza' dang /shem thabs kyi gshal kas 'jig rten gyi khaMs
483a7(rgyud): chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshalo//de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyis mchog brjod pa/oM trai lo kya bi dza ya//a tsit+ta dza ya/
483b1(rgyud): a ni ran+da dzA tA ya/pu dzA ma/bi dza ya/ma hA dza ya/bi dza ya/dza ya dzA ya/ha he/smA ra sma ra/ba ra ba ra/bA ra dA/ma hA de ba/bi la sa/bi las/be las/ba dza a mo ta ka ra tha
483b2(rgyud): dzA ya de bi hI hI/ki na ki na bi la ba se/smai ra sma ra/ma ya pradz+nyA a ni ba ta/badz+ra mi hA kA ru Ni kA/b+hI gi nI hUM hUM/sU te sU ta/s+pho ta s+phota/a be sha ya/a be sha ya d+hu na d+hu nA/bi b+hU
483b3(rgyud): na bi d+hu na/kam+ba kam+ba/kam+ba ya/su ra bi gan d+hi/a ti si ta/mu khe ha la da ba la/saM ga rI dzA na bi ma bi gai/bi nA sha ya bi nA shwa ya/ha b+ha ga ba ti/san tA sa ya/bi
483b4(rgyud): gan+thin/pa ri ba lA ya/asma ka asmA kaM/mA da ni mA da nI/saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+hA ya/ha ra hA ra/hI ri hi ri/hu ru hu ru/bi ta ra ka ba radz+r-i/haM haM/trot+sA ya hAM tAM/swanadz+dza
483b5(rgyud): tA ya/san tro ya/man+ta man+ta/man+di mar+Ya/tsa ra tsa ra/saM tsa ra saM tsa ra/be ga bo ga be ga ba ti/na mo na mo na maHswA hA//de nas lha dang lha min tshogs//srin po gnod sbyin mi
483b6(rgyud): 'am ci//lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang //'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams//'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog/gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas//skrag
483b7(rgyud): cing mgo bo smad gyur te//lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas//gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'di//mtshan dag khyab par bya ba'i phyir//'dod pa'i lha yi dag bzlog pa//sgrol
484a1(rgyud): ma snan yangs ga 'cha'o//spyan ras gtsigs kyis gags smras pa/ny+tsa kyis grags //spyan pa khyad na sems can rnams//na dran/
484a2(rgyud): slad du 'byung ba lags//de nas dbang phyug la sogs po//lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang //rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang //de bzhi no reg sngags 'chang ba rnams//bla
484a3(rgyud): gis phrag pa gcig gzar te//bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang //pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du//btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras//sgrol ma 'di 'bar de la ni//phyag 'a
484a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal byab 'tshalo//ming ban rtsa brgyad dam pa yis//dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi//bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba//skye dgu'i dbang phyug mngon shes
484a5(rgyud): sbyor/dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la dag/rgod bag med cing dreg pa med//pad+ma'i spyan dang pad+ma'i zhalnga//pad+ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin//spyan bzang sbyin yangs pa
484a6(rgyud): ste/sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od//skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin//de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa//mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo s+ho//dkon mchog gsum
484a7(rgyud): po rgyal mdzad ma//spros dmar sen mo dmar po ste//spyan rtsa domar po sa gzigs par mdzad//dga' mdzad dga' stobs pad+ma lags//pad+ma'i mdog can pad mdog
484b1(rgyud): gyis//'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste//'jigs de'i cha lugs stobs man//'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma//bstod ldan me mchog dam pa lags//rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje
484b2(rgyud): can/rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsil ba//byang chub rdul med dri ma med//zlang lha mchog rnams kyi rje//sred bye dang ni sred bya'i bar//rgyu zhing grashegs la 'od zer mdzes//chu lha g.yul
484b3(rgyud): 'gyed 'gying bag can//skyes mchog rang bzhin yId 'phros rgyas//gtsug pud gsum po lto tshil gsum//spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel ba//srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba
484b4(rgyud): tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grags//rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin//sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med//nor sbyin mdag sbyin zhi ba ma//gzugs bzang phyul ba
484b5(rgyud): num bzang //rgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'du'o//dul ba srung ba rdul sel ba//phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma//rgyags po sbyin ma dregs spong ma//drag mo lags
484b6(rgyud): taM gzi bskyed ma//dkar mi zho mdzad bdeb mo//skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan//tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags//zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal//zla ba'i ga
484b7(rgyud): ni 'phrog par mdzad//nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dbyes pa mo//yid 'od bzang zhing zhim mo//bde ma bde ldan mu dang stegs//bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma//nor spel
485a1(rgyud): bsod nams rnam par rgyal//'dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'od//'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin//sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal//sems
485a2(rgyud): can kun la med mi 'gyur//mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma//cha lugs spro ba cha lugs bzang //rgyan dmor rgyan du thogs pa ste//na bza' gser ba nabs
485a3(rgyud): gang ga ma//dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par gzigs//gi'u wang gi thig le spros//'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid//dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma//tshems
485a4(rgyud): dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum//dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub 'khor thogs//do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can//'od dpag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma//grog ni ni ma
485a5(rgyud): pa'i lo ma thogs//nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang //nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du thogs//nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can//nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba//'bar
485a6(rgyud): ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can//skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad//zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can//tshangs pa'i zhugs can rlung dang ldan//bud med lags te mkha' las
485a7(rgyud): gshegs//lha mo mchog 'od 'phro ma//'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul//'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma//drag po thor tshugs gtsug pud can//tshangs pa tshangs
485b1(rgyud): pa'i gsungs ldan rgyal//pi kla'i skad 'dra ldeg bzang ma//'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skyes//dbyig pa'i shing la rdo rje thogs//drag me rin chen 'od kyis brgyun//gshe
485b2(rgyud): na spyan cha dri mud gau re//gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug/rig sngags 'tshang ma gzugs 'chang ma//stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mjed//stobs dang stobs meng mnga' ba ste/
485b3(rgyud): shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad//sgyu stsal lags te sgyu stsal ldan//de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags//steng nas khyams dang khyams bza' tshul//tsam pa kA yi chun
485b4(rgyud): bos gsal//ser mo can pa legs pa'i rten//drag mo phye gan chun po thogs//bskal po dezang mo ga shalaM ka can//de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyis//rigs mtshan
485b5(rgyud): shin tu stongs dang ldan//rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma//badre ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs//blo mdzad shes rab bskyed par mdzad//lha mo la me cod pan can//lha rnams kun la
485b6(rgyud): tshul lhag ma//sred med bu mo sdig pa sel//bkra shis de che shes dang dgyes//rab tu dga' ba grogs ni dga'//spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan//dga' ma
485b7(rgyud): dga' bar mdzad pa ste//chos rnams kun gyis legs pa'i rten//sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma//nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste//las dang nyon mongs rab
486a1(rgyud): 'jams byung //'dod pa'i sku rnams rab 'joms ma//shes pa 'du mang sangs rgyas pa//rol phyin pa bcul gnas//sa bcu dag la mnga' bas
486a2(rgyud): pastobs rnams bcu pos cher gsal ma//rdo rje cod pan rdo rje chang//rdo rje phra mo lha min spel//dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags//rdo d+ha lcags kyu bde ba dpal//rdo rje zham
486a3(rgyud): ba zhags pa bzang //sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams//yid 'ong yod la tshim par mdzod//pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma//tshwam mdzad shas cher bde ba ste//rol
486a4(rgyud): cing gar thabs ston par mdzad//chos can ti la ha la'i 'od//chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags//khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang //bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste//rdo rje 'a
486a5(rgyud): bstobs mo che//lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal//bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod//kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni/
486a6(rgyud): smra ba rnams kyi mchog lags gsungs//de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi//lha ma sgrol ma brjid pag cen//'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa/
486a7(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun//nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis//thams cad rtag tu 'thun par ni//stobs bcu dag le brtson pa gyis//de bzhin gshegs pa
486b1(rgyud): tshul chen yang //dus kun du ni bsrung bar gyis//zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing //'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa//rgal dgar khyad
486b2(rgyud): kyis rgal bar gyis//mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la//dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis//de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi//phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal//de bzhin gshegs/
486b3(rgyud): pa'i 'dug sgra//'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa//kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'o mchog/mun pa sel bar byed pa dang //mthu stobs rgya chen bskyed byed pa//sgrib pa thams cad
486b4(rgyud): gcod byed pa//tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis//dge par byas pa ma yin pas//shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi//gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyuraro//sngon chad
486b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i//brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la//dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi//dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur//nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms
486b6(rgyud): shing dang sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa//sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i//gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa//su zhig mnyam par gzhag pa yis//nyan+ta tam
486b7(rgyud): 'chang ngam khrig byed na//rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin//de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur//nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing //sems can kun las lhag pa'i
487a1(rgyud): mchog/'jig rten dag tu chos sheshos la//'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs//su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di//'don cing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal
487a2(rgyud): de bzhin stong byed dag ni//sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur//de yi don kyang 'grub 'gyur zhing //rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi//gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba
487a3(rgyud): gang /thams cad yis dbang du 'gyur//lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i//ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di//'jig rten dag na rgyags pa dang //nyon mongs mi rigs/
487a4(rgyud): kun sel ba'o//de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba//'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs
487a5(rgyud): par sad par mdzad pa po//rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyad par stobs kyis brten pa yis//gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la//don chen grags shing phan
487a6(rgyud): phyir zhugs pa gang //rab des chos de dang ni sdung byed dang //de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas//bzod med nyon mongs sel ba dang //zhi ba'i yid ni bskyed
487a7(rgyud): po'i tshig/rgyal ba mchogs bka' stsal nas//gzhes par gyur te mi gsungs bzhugs//de na sgrol mchog lha mos gtsor gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog pa
487b1(rgyud): dga' ba rgya chen spyod cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas//lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dgu' ba rgyas shing rmad byung nas//rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar
487b2(rgyud): tIsmra bzhi par 'gyur//sgrol mo'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te lha mo sgrol mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzog so///rgya gar skad/Ar+ya A gra pra dI pA d+hi raN+Da
487b3(rgyud): bid+d+ha rA dza/bod skadadu/'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdagis thos
487b4(rgyud): pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal//mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
487b5(rgyud): 'dren chen po dang /lha dang /mi 'bum phrag du ma dang //byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dong /thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas
487b6(rgyud): nas chos ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa
487b7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa des/byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang
488a1(rgyud): 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mjed 'dir btang //de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal
488a2(rgyud): byed kyi tshal/mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
488a3(rgyud): thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu
488a4(rgyud): 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag
488a5(rgyud): 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
488a6(rgyud): sgron ma mchog ces bgyi bo da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
488a7(rgyud): de'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des/bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mjed 'dir btang ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
488b1(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog de/bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/'tsho 'am/stobs dang /bde ba dang /
488b2(rgyud): kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la rig par gnas sam//zhes bsnyun gsolo//'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo //'di na mi 'ami ma lags pa 'am/'byung po 'am/sha za 'am/gnod
488b3(rgyud): sbyin nam/srin po 'am/grul bum 'am/grul bum gyi sde dpon nam/rgyal po 'am/blon po chen po 'am/chom rkun nam/sbrul lam/srin bu 'am/srin bu lu ta 'am
488b4(rgyud): sdong bu lcags phye 'am/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag la 'tshe bar bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung //sems can rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde
488b5(rgyud): pa dang /mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /stobs dang ldan
488b6(rgyud): par bgyi ba dang /mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /srung ba dang /sba ba dang /bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
488b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur ste/'di lta ste/dz+wa le dz+wa le/dz+wa le ga te/huk+ku/muk+ku/saM ma te/ma hA saM
489a1(rgyud): mat+ta/mAdz+dzad+g+ha la/d+hUb lam/saHsar+b+ba/mAd+hA le/uH muH/shAm/som to/mahA sa mat+mA/mat+na sha m+ba swAH//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
489a2(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyed kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig/long shig/tshangs shig/lcogs shig/kun chub par
489a3(rgyud): gyis shig/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o//kun
489a4(rgyud): dga'o gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/gzungs kyi gsang sbra
489a5(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /len pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bdun du tsha
489a6(rgyud): rabs dran par 'gyur//tshe 'di nyid la yang snron gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /'gro ba thams cad dang rjes 'dzin
489a7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gon
489b1(rgyud): 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la 'gus pa yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pastan las langs te/gos phrag pa gcig tu
